K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:8b-0: mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi @8b bram ze de rnams kyi tshig yang dag par bden par mi 'gyur grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:8b-1: gzhon nu skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:8b-2: dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur du 'ong gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:8b-3: ma la bdag gis gzhon nu zhing ba'i grong du btang la ci nas kyang de la sems g-yengs par 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:8b-4: gzhon nu sh'akya thub pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:8b-6: khyod zhing pa'i grong du song la las kyi mtha' la ltos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:8b-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:8b-9: shi ba mthong nas ni yid byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:8b-10: rab tu byung ba la ni mngon par zhen pa'i blos yab sh'akya zas gtsang gi tshig gsan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:8b-11: shing rtar zhugs te zhing pa'i grong du skus gshegs kyi thugs kyis ni ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:8b-12: de la lam gar gter lnga brgyas kha nye bar bstan te sgra phyung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:8b-13: gzhon nu bdag cag ni khyod kyi nye du'i gter lags kyis bdag cag bzhes shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:8b-14: byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:8b-15: re zhig de rnams kyis blun po'i yongs su bzung ba byas nas ci zhig bya'i khyed nga la dgos pa med kyis song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:8b-16: tshigs su bcad pas kyang gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:8b-17: gang gis nga la 'chi ba'i gtam smras pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:8b-18: de dag kyang shi gtam du gyur pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:8b-19: bdag kyang shi nas ring po mi thogs par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:8b-20: gzhan dag gi yang gtam du 'gyur bar 'ong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:8b-21: de rnams kyis yang sgra phyung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:8b-22: gzhon nus gal te mi bzhes na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:8b-23: bdag cag rgya mtsho chen por 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9a-1: sems dpas ci bde bar zhugs shig ces gsungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9a-2: de rnams rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9a-3: byang chub sems dpa' gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9a-4: ci tsam na zhing pa skra gyen du 'greng ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9a-5: lag pa dang rkang pa ser ka byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9a-6: lus rdul gyis yogs pa dag cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9a-7: rmon pa lcags zer bu rnon po can gyis lus dral bas rgyab dang mjug ngo'i phyogs khrag gis yogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9a-8: ltogs pa dang skom pas dbugs rdzangs shing snying ga'i phyogs nas dbugs rdzangs pa ring du 'dren la gnya' shing gis mnan pa'i rma las rnag khrag 'dzag pa la sbrang bu dang 'bu'i tshogs za ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9a-9: thong lcags kyis rkang pa rma byung zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9a-10: kha dang sna nas kha chu dang sna chu 'dzag la sprang ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9a-11: sha sbrang dang sbrang bu mchu rings kyis yogs pa rnams gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9a-12: gzigs nas kyang thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsod nams bskyed cing bsags pa'i thugs rjes kun nas bskyod pa'i thugs kyis zhing pa rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9a-19: deng phan chad bran du mi bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9a-21: rang dbang can gar dga' bar 'gro bar byas bde ba la reg par gnos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9a-22: rmon pa rnams kyang bkrol nas gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9a-23: khyed cag kyang deng phan chad rtsva mchog ma nyams pa la za zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9b-0: chu ma rdul ma rnyogs shing dang ba @9b dag la 'thung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9b-1: khyed la phyogs bzhi nas kyang rlung bsil ba ldang bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9b-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' yid byung ba de nyid kyis yab sh'akya zas gtsang gi zhing blas kyi mtha' la gzigs nas shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9b-3: shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9b-4: 'dod pa las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9b-5: rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas shing dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba zag pa med pa dang 'dra ba'i bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9b-6: skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9b-7: byang chub sems dpa' spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9b-8: mi 'gro bar shing gzhan rnams kyi drung na sdod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9b-9: rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9b-10: byang chub sems dpa' ring zhig thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9b-11: 'di ltar snga dro'i dus las yol gyis ltar 'gro'o zhes de shing rtar zhugs nas zhing pa'i grong du song ste phan tshun du byang chub sems dpa' tshol zhing 'dzam bu'i drung du phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9b-12: de'i tshe nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma shar phyogs su gzhol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9b-14: shar phyogs su bab par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i mthus shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:9b-16: rgyal po zas gtsang gi nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma shar phyogs su gzhol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10a-0: shar phyogs su bab par gyur na shing @10a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10a-1: 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ba mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10a-2: mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10a-3: gzhon nu ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10a-4: 'di ltar da ltar nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma shar phyogs su gzhol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10a-6: shar phyogs su bab par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10a-7: shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ba ngo mtshar che'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10a-8: de nas dga' ba'i bsti stang byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10a-10: ji ltar bltams tshe sa ni g-yos pa ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10a-11: 'dzam bu'i grib mas khyod sku mi gtong ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10a-12: blo chen khyod kyi ya mtshan gnyis 'di ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10a-13: kun gzigs khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10a-14: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa' skyil mo krung bcas pa las bslangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10a-15: shing rtar zhugs te dur khrod kyi nang nas ser skya'i gzhir gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10a-16: byang chub sems dpas dur khrod kyi nang nas mi ro rnam par sngos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10a-18: rnam par bam pa dag gzigs nas de shin tu skyo ba skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10a-19: shing rtar zhugs bzhin du skyil mo krung bcas nas bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10a-20: de nas yab rgyal po zas gtsang gis skyil mo krung bcas pa las bslangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10a-22: grong khyer gyi nang du 'jug pa na mtshan mkhan rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-0: gal te gzhon nu @10b zhag bdun gyi bar du rab tu ma byung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-1: 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur bar lung bstan par rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-2: de rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-3: gal te de yi bzang po gzigs bzhed na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-4: de yi slad du dgung bdun bar du srungs shig dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-5: mi dbang gdugs ni bdal bar gyur pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-6: rin chen sna bdun 'byung bar the tshom me //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-7: khyod sras rin che bdun po yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-8: dbang phyug gi ni rgyal por 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-9: rgya mtsho la ni thug pa'i sa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-10: chad pa med par skyong bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-11: 'on te sa ni spangs nas su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-12: bsnyengs med nags su bzhud na ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-13: thams cad mkhyen pa thob gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-15: sh'akya dus legs kyi bu mo ri dvags skyes zhes bya ba de skar khung na 'dug pas byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-16: kye ma 'di yi yum bde zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-17: yab de yang ni bde ba yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-18: kye ma gang gi khyim thab 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-19: bud med de yang mya ngan 'das //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-20: skyes mchog bsam gtan pa de yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-21: mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra thos nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-22: mya ngan 'das pa zhi nyid du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-23: mkhyen nas de la thugs dgyes gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-24: de nas byang chub sems dpas legs par smras pa'i phyir mu tig gi phreng ba 'phags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-25: byang chub sems dpa'i mthus skar khung nas song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-26: de'i mgul du 'khris par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-27: skye bo'i tshogs kyis nang du song ba de mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:10b-28: de rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la rgyas par smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11a-0: rgyal po zas gtsang gis ri dvags @11a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mor blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11a-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mo sa 'tsho ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11a-4: ri dvags skyes la sogs pa'i 'khor bud med drug khri yod do /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11a-5: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gcung bre bo zas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11a-7: tshad med zas gsum dang lhan cig gcig tu tshogs nas gros bya bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11a-9: mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sh'akya thub pa la gal te zhag bdun gyi bar du rab tu ma byung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11a-11: 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyis de lta bas na bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' zhag bdun gyi bar du bsgrims te bsrung bar bya zhing grong khyer yang legs par bsrung bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11a-12: de nas de rnams kyis ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer ra ba rim pa bdun dang 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor nas grong khyer gyi sgo 'phar lcags las byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11a-13: sgo 'phar rnams la dril bu shin tu sgra gsal ba btags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11a-14: sgo phye na de'i sgras dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu grags par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11a-15: byang chub sems dpa' ni khang bzang gi gzhi na bud med yid 'phrog pa gzugs bzang ba rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11a-16: gar dang glu dang rol mo rnams kyi spyod pas bsnyen bkur byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11a-17: blon po rnams ni dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig ra ba'i phyi rol khor khor yug tu gcan pa byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11b-0: blon po @11b rnams ni dpung brgyas tshugs pa yang byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11b-1: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi sgor yang sgo phye na de'i sgras rgyal po zas gtsang gi pho brang du grag cing de thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11b-2: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi mi dang grong khyer gyi sgo srung rnams dang; pho brang 'khor gyi mi grong khyer gyi phyi rol nas srung du bcug pa rnams bag dang chas te 'dug par 'gyur ba de lta bu btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11b-4: steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi skyes pa med par zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11b-5: pi wang dang gling bu dang 'khar rnga dang sgra snyan la sogs pa rol mo'i cha byad dag nye bar len cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11b-7: mtshan mo ni rgyal po zas gtsang yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang shar sgo'i phyi rol na 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11b-8: lho phyogs na ni bre bo zas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11b-9: nub phyogs na ni zas dkar ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11b-10: byang phyogs na ni tshad med zas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11b-11: grong khyer gyi dbus kyi 'dram po byed pa ni sh'akya ming chen no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11b-12: de shar sgor song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11b-15: rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11b-16: kho bo mel tshe byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11b-18: mel tshe mdzod dang khyod la legs par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11b-20: tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11b-21: 'jig rten gnyid log ro dang mtshungs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11b-22: gnyid log bdud kyi dbang du song /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11b-23: 'di na mi nyal rtag tu mkhas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11b-24: de bas ma nyal mel tshe byos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11b-25: lho sgor song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11b-28: bre bo zas kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:11b-29: kho bo mel tshe byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-1: tshe mdzod dang khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-2: 'jig rten gnyid log ro dang mtshungs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-3: gnyid log bdud kyi dbang du song;/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-4: gnyid log 'chi bdag dbang du song //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-5: de bas ma nyal mel tshe byos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-6: nub sgor song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-10: kho bo mel tshe byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-12: mel tshe mdzod dang khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-13: gnyid log pa ni rtag tu myos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-15: dgon pa'i nags su nyal ba 'dra //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-16: de bas ma nyal mel tshe byos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-17: byang du song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-20: tshad med zas kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-21: kho bo mel tshe byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-23: mel tshe mdzod dang khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-24: tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-25: ri nyal ri sul nyal ba bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-26: rgya mtsho'i chur ni nyal ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-27: ljon shing rtse la nyal ba bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-28: de bas ma nyal mel tshe byos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-29: dbus kyi bzhi mdo dang sum mdo dag tu song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-32: srung ma rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-33: bdag cag mel tshe bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-35: mel tshe byos dang legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12a-36: tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12b-0: chos spyod chos ma yin ma @12b spyod; ;bden pa smros shig brdzun ma smra //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12b-2: de bas ma nyal mel tshe byos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12b-3: de nam nangs nas sh'akya ming chen gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12b-5: dgung bdun la dgung gcig ni thal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12b-7: rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12b-9: gzhon nu 'khor lo sgyur bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12b-10: bdag cag nam mkha'i ngos la rgyu zhing gling bzhir phyi bzhin dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12b-11: de bzhin du dgongs gcig lus so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12b-12: lha rnams kyis dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12b-13: mi dbang sh'akya sras po thub pa 'di //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12b-14: bdag nyid chen po pha rol phyin drug rdzogs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12b-15: thub rnams dgyes pa mdzad pa dka' thub tshal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12b-16: 'phags pa dgyes pas nags su gshegs par bzhed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12b-17: de nas byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo dang lhan cig skyes pa med pa na rol mos rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12b-19: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12b-20: bdag la gzhan dag gzhon nu sh'akya thub pa ni skyes pa ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12b-21: gang gi phyir grags 'dzin ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:12b-24: bud med drug khri spangs nas rab tu byung ngo zhes gzhi des kha zer bar 'gyur du 'ong gis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-0: ma la bdag gis grags 'dzin ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o snyam nas des grags 'dzin ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad pa dang @13a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-1: grags 'dzin ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-2: de 'di snyam du sems te nam langs nas byang chub sems dpa'i snyan du gsol lo snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-3: de nas byang chub sems dpas de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-4: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pas tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-5: bud med dang bdag khyim nyal ba'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-6: tha ma deng gi 'di yin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-7: phyin chad khyim du bud med dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-8: nga ni lhan cig mi gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-9: de nas bud med de rnams gar dang glu dang rol mos dub nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-10: kha nas kha chu 'dzag cing skra zhig la gos dang lag pa dag lhug par btang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-11: brla ba'i tshig byung rgyal du brdol zhing gnyid log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-12: byang chub sems dpas bud med de dag thams cad kha nas kha chu 'dzag cing skra zhig la gos dang lag pa dag lhug par btang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-13: brla ba'i tshig byung rgyal du brdol zhing gnyid log pa gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-14: gzigs nas kyang btsun mo'i 'khor la dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-15: des tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-16: rlung gi shugs kyis padma'i tshal ltar sa gzhi 'dir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-17: lag pa dag dang rkang pa brkyang nas 'gyel gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-18: skra rnams zhig cing mdog dang rkub kyi phyogs snang ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-19: sh'akya'i sras kyis gzigs nas rang bzhin skyo bar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-20: tshul dang bral ba'i bud med na chung tshogs 'di dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-21: dur khor 'jigs su rung ba'i rang bzhin 'drar mthong nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-22: sems can byis pa'i spyod pa'i yul la deng dga' na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13a-23: sems dang blo gros dran dang bral ba yin nam ci //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-0: 'dod pa tha chad @13b 'dam dang mda' mdung dug me 'dra //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-1: rmi lam lta bu yin te tsha chu'i ro dang mtshungs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-2: 'dod pa phung me rtsod dang sdig pa'i rgyur gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-3: mtha' ngan sbrul gyi dbang po lta bu bdag gis spangs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-4: bar skabs der skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i rmi lam du bzhi rmis pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-5: zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-6: nyi ma shar phyogs nas shar nas de nyid du nub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-7: skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bdag la phyag byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-8: bdag nyid dgod cing du ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-9: grags 'dzin ma'i rmi lam du brgyad rmis pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-10: bdag nyid kyi khyim gyi gdung chag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-11: bkra shis kyi mal khri chag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-12: lag pa'i gdub bu chag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-13: so'i phreng ba lhags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-14: skra'i lan bu zhig pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-15: dpal khyim nas byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-16: zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-17: nyi ma shar phyogs nas shar nas de nyid du nub pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-18: byang chub sems dpas kyang rmang lam lnga rmis pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-19: sa chen po nyid kyi gzim mal du byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-20: ri rab ri'i rgyal po dbu rten du bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-21: phyag g-yon pa shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'jug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-22: phyag g-yas pa nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'jug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-23: zhabs gnyis rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-24: 'grong ba zhes bya ba'i rtsa'i rigs lte ba nas byung nas nam mkha'i bar du 'phags te 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-25: bya kun nas dkar la mgo gnag pa rnams kyis zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas pus mo'i lha nga la thug gi bar du ldag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:13b-26: bya sna tshogs phyogs bzhi nas 'ongs nas mdun du kha dog gcig tu 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14a-1: gtsang ba'i ri'i steng nas bdag nyid mi gtsang bas ma gos par 'chag pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14a-2: rmis nas kyang thugs dgyes te dgongs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14a-3: nga'i rmi lam 'di 'dra ba rmis pas ring po mi thogs pa kho nar bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14a-4: de nas grags 'dzin mas byang chub sems dpa' la rmi lam gsol ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14a-5: lha da gzod bdag gi g-yar lam du brgyad rmis pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14a-6: bdag gi sdum pa'i gdung chag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14a-7: bkra shis kyi mal khri chag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14a-8: sug pa'i gdub bu chag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14a-9: so'i phreng ba lhags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14a-10: skra'i lan bu zhig pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14a-11: dpal sdum pa nas byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14a-12: zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14a-13: gdugs shar phyogs nas bdal nas de nyid du nub pa rmis lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14a-14: byang chub sems dpas grags 'dzin ma'i yid mi bde ba bsal ba'i phyir rmi lam rnams bshad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14a-15: bdag gis khyim gyi gdung chag go zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi 'dug gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14a-16: bdag gi bkra shis kyi mal khri chag go zhes smras pa gang yin pa de yang ma chag ste 'dug pa'o ni yin mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14a-17: lag pa gdub bu chag go zhes smras pa gang yin pa ci chag gam ma chag rang nyid rtogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14a-18: so'i phreng ba lhags so zhes smras pa gang yin pa de yang so so rang gis rig par bya ba yin pas ci lhags sam ma lhags rtogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14b-0: bdag gi lan bu zhig go zhes gang smras pa de yang khyod kyis so so rang gis rig @14b par bya ba yin pas ci zhig gam ma zhig rtogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14b-1: khyim nas dpal byung ngo zhes smras pa gang yin pa de ni bud med rnams kyi dpal ni khyo yin la nga ni 'dug pa nyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14b-2: zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin ces smras pa gang yin pa de ni zla ba 'di mngon sum du 'dug pa ma yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14b-3: nyi ma shar phyogs nas shar nas de nyid du nub bo zhes smras pa gang yin pa de ni da dung yang nam phyed yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14b-4: re zhig shar kyang ma shar na nub par lta ga la 'gyur zhes de ltar brda sprad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14b-5: btsun mo grags 'dzin cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14b-6: byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14b-7: grags 'dzin ma'i rmi lam de 'dra ba rmis pas gdon mi za bar nga kho na bdag 'gro bar byas 'di la tshig zur gyis bstan no snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14b-8: des de la tshig zur gyis bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14b-10: lha khyod gang du bzhud pa der bdag khrid cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14b-11: byang chub sems dpas mya ngan las 'das pa las dgongs nas bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14b-12: de bzhin du bya ste gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der khyod bkri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14b-13: de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14b-14: lha rnams kyi sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dgongs pa shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14b-15: byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14b-16: byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14b-17: nags kyi spre'u ni spyod yul rgyu 'dra zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14b-18: yan par 'dug pa'i rte'u dang 'dra'i thugs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14b-19: gal te 'dod pa'i yon tan las bzlog na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:14b-20: de nas shin tu gsal ba'i snang ba gzigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-2: sa ni spangs te bzhud mdzod la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-3: thams cad mkhyen nyid brnyes nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-4: 'gro ba dag ni bsgral bar mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-5: byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-6: koo shi ka ma mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-7: nga ni ri dvags bdag po brgyas bskor ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-8: mi ni mthu ldan gzhu mtshon ral gri thogs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-9: rta glang shing rta dpung tshogs mang po yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-10: grong khyer ser skya kun nas yongs su bskor //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-11: zas gtsang la sogs sh'akya'i tshogs 'di dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-12: glang chen rta zhon legs par go bgos lus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-13: mi sdug sna tshogs lag na mtshon thogs te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-14: khyams dang rta babs khang bzang gzhi nang gnas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-15: pho brang dang ni khyim sgo dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-16: de bzhin grong khyer sgo dag kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-17: bcad nas gtan pa dam bcug ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-18: de bzhin kun nas bsrungs par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-19: rva dung pa ta ha sgra rnga sgra yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-20: khyams dang rta babs khang bzang nang gnas shing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-21: glang chen rta dmag 'bad pa'i skye bo'i tshogs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-22: rgyun du nga mi gtang phyir srung bar byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-24: des pa mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-25: sdug bsngal gyis gdungs 'jig rten 'di dang yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-26: khyod kyi sngon gyi dam bcas dgongs mdzod la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-27: khab dag spongs te nges par 'byung bar mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-28: ji ltar khyod ni bgegs med par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-29: deng nyid nags su gshegs 'gyur ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-30: bdag cag tshangs sogs bcas pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15a-31: lha rnams kyis ni de bzhin bgyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-0: byang chub @15b sems dpas legs so zhes gsungs nas thugs dgyes par 'gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-1: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis gnyid kyis myos par byas nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-2: sgrogs po byang chub sems dpa' steng gi khang bzang nas 'babs kyis skas long zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-3: des skas blangs pa la byang chub sems dpa' babs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-4: de nas brgya byin gyis brda byas ma thag tu zhabs 'bring pa 'dun pa gang na ba der gshegs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-5: ji tsam na 'dun pa gnyid stug pos non par gzigs nas byang chub sems dpas bsgrims te bslangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-6: tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-7: 'dun pa longs kye khyim nas myur du ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-8: nga yi rta pho rin chen bsngags ldan long //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-9: sngon gyi rgyal bas longs spyad dka' thub tshal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-10: thub rnams dgyes par mdzad par nga gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-11: 'dun pa gnyid log pa'i mig phye nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-12: lha khyod skyed mos tshal gyi dus ma bab //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-13: des pa khyod dang 'ga' yang khon ma mchis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-14: khyod la dgra bo su yang ma mchis na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-15: dgung phyed khyod la bcibs pas ci zhig bgyid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-16: byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-18: nga yi tshig ni ma bcag na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-19: nga yi deng dus tha ma la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-20: nga yi tshig 'di ma bcag cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-22: gzhon nu mtshan mo 'di ni 'jigs pa dang 'jigs su rung ba mchis pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-23: bdag bcibs pa mi len no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:15b-24: byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16a-0: lan dang yang lan gyis gdon @16a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16a-1: mi za bar skye bo sad par 'gyur gyis bdag nyid song la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16a-2: rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan sta gon bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16a-3: de nas nyid kyis pho brang gi sgo phye nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16a-4: rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan gzung bar brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16a-5: de khros pa'i me rab tu 'bar bas rkang pa 'phra /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16a-6: 'jing kyog byed la phar 'bros tshur 'bros shing 'dug tu mi btub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16a-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i phyag bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16a-8: 'khor lo dang bkra shis dang g-yung drung 'khyil ba mnga' ba skrag pa rnams la dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas mgo la byugs nas gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16a-9: bsngags ldan tha ma yi ni khur long ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16a-10: dka' thub nags su ma thogs nga skyol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16a-11: byang chub thob nas myur du 'gro ba kun //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16a-12: bsam gtan rnam thar char gyis tshim par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16a-13: chos nyid kyis dud 'gro yang gdams na phyi lang mi byed pas rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan mi g-yo bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16a-14: de nas byang chub sems dpa' thugs dgyes pa skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16a-15: rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan bltas nas bzhengs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16a-16: brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyir gshegs pa'i phyir lha'i bu bzhi po bsgo ste gzhag pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16a-17: 'gram dang nye 'gram dang lo ma dang lo ma gyon pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16a-18: byang chub sems dpas de rnams la gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16a-19: shes ldan dag nga sus bkur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16a-21: bdag cag gis bkur lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16a-22: khyed cag la stobs ji tsam yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16b-0: gzhon @16b nu bdag gis ni sa'i rdul ji snyed mchis pa khur du thogs te mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16b-2: bdag gis ni rgya mtsho chen po bzhi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16b-4: lteng ka dang chu mig rnams kyi chab ji snyed mchis pa de thams cad khur du thogs te mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16b-6: bdag gis ni sa la ri ji snyed mchis pa de thams cad khur du thogs te mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16b-8: bdag gis ni sa la rtsva dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16b-10: lo ma ji snyed mchis pa de thams cad khur du thogs te mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16b-11: de nas byang chub sems dpas zhabs sa la bzhag pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16b-12: de rnams kyis bsgul bar yang ma nus nas ngo mtshar skyes te gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16b-13: gzhon nu bdag cag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la stobs 'di 'dra ba mnga' bar ma 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16b-15: bdag cag mi mchis lags pa zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16b-16: gtam de 'dun pa sngar sad pas thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16b-17: byang chub sems dpa'i spyan sngar song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16b-18: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan la bcibs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16b-20: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16b-21: lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus rta rin po che bsngags ldan steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16b-22: pho brang na gnas pa'i lha rnams byang chub sems dpa' dang bral bas du bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:16b-23: de rnams du ba'i mchi ma'i thig pa rnams lus dang sa la bab po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17a-0: gzhon nu char gyi thig pa dag 'bab @17a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17a-1: na ci lhas dgung char phab bam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17a-2: byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17a-3: lhas char phab pa ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17a-4: 'on kyang pho brang na gnas pa'i lha rnams nga dang 'bral bas ngu bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17a-5: de rnams kyi mchi ma'i thigs pa rnams lus la bab pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17a-6: de nas 'dun pa mig mchims gang zhing dbugs dron po'i shugs nar gyis phyung nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go ;byang chub sems dpa' sku thams cad kyis glang po che'i gzigs stangs kyis g-yas phyogs su gzigs te dgongs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17a-7: nga bud med dang lhan cig khyim na nyal ba'i tha ma ni 'di yin no snyam mo; ;yang dgongs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17a-8: gal te nga shar sgo spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17a-9: sgo gzhan nas byung na gzhon nus ni bdag la tha ma'i dus na yang ma bltas so snyam du rgyal po mi dga' bar 'gyur ro snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17a-10: ji tsam na rgyal po zas gtsang gnyid stug pos non pa gzigs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17a-11: des de la bskor ba mdzad de gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17a-12: yab gus pa ma mchis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17a-13: zhe sa ma mchis pas skrag nas 'chi ba ni ma lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17a-14: gzhan du na 'jig rten rga ba dang 'chi bas bcom pa rga ba dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs pa las yongs su 'grol ba'i slad du lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17a-15: ji tsam na sh'akya ming chen 'gram po byed pa skye bo nyul zhing phyogs der phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17a-16: byang chub sems dpa' gshegs par chas pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17a-17: de nas skad 'dzer cing mig mchi mas gang nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-1: gzhon nu 'di ni rigs pa ma lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-2: ming chen gang gi phyir ngas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba brgya stong du mas sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa des na da nga ci khyim na 'dug phod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-3: 'di ni nges te dka' thub kyi tshal du 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-4: de nas gsung tshig drag pos sh'akya ming chen spyos pa dang cho nges btab ste kyi hud /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-5: deng du rgyal po zas gtsang dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-6: sh'akya dag ni thams cad kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-7: yang dang yang du bsams pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-8: re ba 'bras bu med par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-9: deng du rgyal po zas gtsang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-10: sras kyi mya ngan gyis gdungs pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-11: lag bsgrengs shin tu sdug bsngal zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-13: sa mtsho grags 'dzin ri dvags skyes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-14: de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor rgyas pa'ang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-15: don grub dang ni bral ba yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-16: shin tu sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur;/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-18: de sdangs pas grags 'dzin ma bslang ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-19: don grub 'di ni gshegs gyur gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-20: khyim thab sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-21: sdug bsngal nyam thag ngur 'ong gis;/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-22: khyim thab sdug pa de zlog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-23: khyod kyi khyim thab gshegs 'gyur 'di ni mthong dka' ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-24: khyod kyis 'di ltos khyim thab mthong ba'i tha ma yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-25: kyi hud phongs pas bdag gis mtshan mo kus btab kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-26: sus kyang lan ma ster bas bdag gis ma nyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-27: des ni de ltar khus btab kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-28: 'di ltar lha rnams byin rlabs kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:17b-29: dgon par 'o dod bos pa bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18a-2: de nas sh'akya ming chen sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas gdungs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18a-3: de rings par rgyal po zas gtsang gi drung du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18a-4: rgyal po zas gtsang bslang ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18a-5: don grub 'di ni bzhud lags kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18a-6: sa bdag de ni bzlog par mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18a-7: sras kyi mya ngan gyis thebs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18a-8: sdug bsngal gyis gdungs bshums 'gyur mchis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18a-9: ma stes de yang gnyid ma sad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18a-10: de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyang lha brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18a-11: byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18a-12: byang chub sems dpa' bskor cing dong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18a-14: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams spyod lam zhi ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18a-15: g-yon phyogs nas 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng nas lha'i rol mo'i khyad par sna tshogs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18a-17: tshangs pa la sogs pa rang rang gi spyod lam gyis dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18a-18: nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i lha brgya stong phrag du mas ni byang chub sems dpa'i steng nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18a-22: padma dkar po rnams gtor to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18a-23: aa ka ru'i phye ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18a-24: tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18a-25: ta ma la'i 'dab ma'i phye ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18a-26: lha'i me tog manda ra bas kyang gtor to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18a-27: lha'i rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs kyang brdungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18b-0: mkha' la lha rnams ga zha'i sgra chen 'byin byed @18b la; ;dga' ba'i yid kyis gos kyi g-yab mos 'debs byed cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18b-1: kha cig byang chub sems dpa' la ni bstod byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18b-2: nam mkha' la ni sor mo brgya phrag bsgyur bar byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18b-3: kha cig dag ni sgo rnams 'byed byed cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18b-4: me tog manda ra bas 'thor bar byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18b-5: kha cig dag ni bcibs pa'i rkang 'dzin cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18b-6: bde bar gshegs la rtog cing rjes bzhin 'brang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18b-7: kha cig dag kyang g-yas nas rjes bzhin 'brang; ;g-yon nas 'gro ba dag kyang rjes bzhin 'brang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18b-8: brgya byin de bzhin tshangs par bcas pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18b-9: lus ngan bdag nyid shul ni mtshon par byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18b-10: zla ba nya ba rgyu skar tshogs kyis ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18b-11: bdag nyid chen po lha tshogs mdun bdar nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18b-12: dka' thub nags ni thub rnams dgyes byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18b-13: 'phags pa dgyes pa'i nags su thugs dgyes gshegs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18b-14: de nas byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi nas phyir byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18b-15: brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams yid dga' bas spro ba bskyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18b-16: grogs po khyod yun ring po nas nam zhig na nga bgegs las thar te dka' thub kyi nags su 'gro bar 'gyur snyam du dgongs pa bskyed pa gang lags pa de deng du yongs su rdzogs pa lags kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18b-17: nam khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag cag la yang dgongs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:18b-18: byang chub sems dpas de bzhin du bya'o zhes dam bcas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-0: sku thams cad kyis g-yas phyogs su glang po che'i lta stangs @19a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-2: sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-3: lam gyi mchog ni ma thob par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-4: grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir na slar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' thun gnyis kyis dpag tshad bcu gnyis su byon nas bcibs pa las babs te rgyan bkrol nas 'dun pa la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-8: 'dun pa rgyan dang rta khyer la slar song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-10: kha lo sgyur khyod nga yi rta 'di dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-11: rgyan 'di rnams kyang gnyen pa dag la byin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-12: nga ni 'dod pa rgya chen spangs nas su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-13: da ltar 'di nyid du ni rab byung bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-14: de nas 'dun pa gdong la mchi ma char bzhin 'bab pas byang chub sems dpa' la gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-15: sengge stag gis gtams pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-16: phyugs rjes gtams pa'i nags tshal du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-17: 'ba' zhig sku gnyen dang bral nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-19: byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-20: skye dgu 'di ni skye na'ang gcig pu skye //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-21: de bzhin 'chi na'ang gcig pu 'chi bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-22: 'di ni gcig pus sdug bsngal myong 'gyur gyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-23: 'khor ba la ni grogs yod ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-25: kyi hud gzhon nus sdug bsngal ma gzigs te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-26: zhabs 'jam glang chen rta la bcibs goms pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-27: sa gzhi rtsva dang rdo bas gtams rtsub par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-28: ji ltar zhabs kyis gshegs shing nags su rgyu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19a-29: byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19b-0: 'chi bdag 'jigs pa de ni @19b lan 'ga' yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19b-1: skyed la btsam med bde bar goms la min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19b-2: mgon bcas la min rigs btsun la ma yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19b-3: dpa' dang btson min skye bo dga' la min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19b-6: don ma byas shing ma brtsams par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19b-10: rgyal po bgres po ni sras kyi mya ngan gyis 'grongs par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19b-11: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir 'dun pa'i tshig thugs la ma bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19b-12: de nas byang chub sems dpas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19b-13: autpa la sngon po 'dra ba'i ral gri shubs nas phyung nas gtsug phud bregs te steng gi nam mkha' la bor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19b-14: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis blangs nas bkur sti chen po byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19b-15: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du khyer nas gtsug phud kyi mchod pa chen po btsugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19b-16: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis phyogs der dbu skra blangs pa'i mchod rten zhes bya ba brtsigs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19b-17: da dung yang mchod rten la phyag byed pa'i dge slong dag phyag byed do ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19b-20: byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19b-22: gang la 'di lta bu'i brtul ba yod pa de cig yang khyim pa khyim na gnas par 'gyur ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:19b-25: gzhon nu ni rgyal rigs kyi nga rgyal can yin pas 'di phyir bzlog par mi nus so snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20a-1: nas rta'i rgyal po sngags ldan gyis byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la lces bldags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i phyag 'khor lo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20a-3: bkra shis dang g-yung drung 'khyil ba mnga' bas byugs nas gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20a-5: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20a-6: khyod kyi byas pa gzo bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20a-8: khyod kyis bsngags ldan pho brang du ma bkri zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20a-9: de skad ces gsungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20a-10: 'dun pa skad 'dzer cing mig mchims gang nas rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan khrid de yang dang yang du byang chub sems dpa' la lta zhing song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20a-11: de gnyis kyis thun gnyis kyis son pa'i sa gang yin pa de nas zhag bdun gyis phyir 'khor to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20a-13: gal te lhan cig tu dong na smre sngags chen pos bdag shi bar 'gyur ro snyam nas des skyed mos tshal du 'dug nas bsngags ldan btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20a-15: pho brang gi skye bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20a-16: skye bo'i tshogs gzhan gyis kyang skad de shes nas re ste phyir phyung ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20a-17: byang chub sems dpa' ma mthong nas bsngags ldan de'i mgul du 'jus te du bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20a-18: 'di ni chos nyid yin te dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags phal pa gzhan la yang kun rdzob kyi shes pa yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20a-19: rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan la lta smos kyang ci dgos pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20b-0: des skye bo'i tshogs chen po smre sngags 'don pa'i sgra @20b thos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20b-1: dbugs khong du song ba nyid kyis brnangs te shi nas de sgra gcan gyi bram ze las drug la brtson pa zhig gi rigs su nying mtshams sbyor ba blang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20b-2: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par byang chub pa de'i tshe de la dmu rgod kyi gdams pas gtams nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te shin tu mthar phyin pa'i grub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20b-3: bde bar mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jog par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20b-4: byang chub sems dpa' la ngur smrig gi dgos pa byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20b-5: grong khyer dpe med du khyim bdag phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20b-6: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20b-7: rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20b-8: rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20b-9: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20b-11: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20b-14: dga' mgur spyod pa byed pa na khye'u zhig btsas so zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20b-15: de bzhin du khye'u bcu btsas so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20b-16: de dag thams cad rab tu byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20b-17: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20b-18: de dag gi ma rgan mo des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20b-19: de dag la sha na'i gos dag cig byin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:20b-21: yum bdag cag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas 'di dag bdag cag la mi dgos te 'on kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras gzhon nu sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21a-0: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @21a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21a-1: pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba zhig yod kyis 'di dag de la phul cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21a-2: des na khyod kyis 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21a-5: glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21a-6: rgan mo des kyang 'chi khar gos de dag bu mo la gtad nas ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21a-7: de'i bu mo de yang nad kyis thebs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21a-8: 'chi bar shes nas des kyang shing drung zhig tu bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21a-9: shing de la gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa de la khyod kyis 'di dag rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras la phul cig ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21a-10: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21a-11: des de dag shes nas blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21a-12: de nas rngon pa rgas 'khogs pa lta bu zhig tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas de dag bgos te lag na mda' gzhu thogs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21a-13: byang chub sems dpa' gshegs pa'i lam gar bsdad pa dang byang chub sems dpa' yang rim gyi lam der phyin nas rngon pa lag na mda' gzhu thogs shing gos ngur smrig gyon pa zhig gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21a-14: gzigs nas kyang mi de la gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21a-15: kva'i nang rje sha na'i gos 'o ni rab tu byung ba la 'tsham pa yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21a-16: ka shi ka'i ras phran 'di dag khyer la 'o ni bdag la byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21b-0: gzhon nu bdag la gzhan @21b dag khyod kyis rgyal bu gzhon nu dkrongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21b-1: ka shi ka'i ras phran gyi gos 'di dag blangs so zhes gzhi des g-yar mchi bar 'gyur lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21b-3: byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21b-4: kye nang rje nga ni mthu ji lta bu dang ldan pa 'jig rten thams cad kyis shes te su zhig gis nga dkrongs par nus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21b-5: khyod kyis nga dkrongs par su zhig yid ches kyis bag tsha ba med par byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21b-6: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas sha na'i gos dag phul te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21b-8: ka shi ka'i ras phran rnams blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i sku dang sha na'i gos de dag 'tsham par ma gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21b-11: kye ma sha na'i gos rnams bdag gi sku dang 'tsham par gyur cig snyam nas tshig tu smras ma thag tu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21b-12: sha na'i gos de dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21b-13: lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus byang chub sems dpa'i sku dang 'tsham par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21b-14: byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21b-15: da ni bdag rab tu byung zin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21b-16: 'gro ba rnams rjes su gzung bar bya'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21b-17: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i ka shi ka'i ras phran gyi gos de dag lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:21b-18: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du ka shi ka'i mchod pa chen po btsugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22a-0: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad ba can rnams kyis kyang phyogs der ngur smrig @22a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22a-1: blangs pa zhes bya ba'i mchod rten brtsigs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22a-2: da dung yang mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba'i dge slong dag phyag byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22a-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' dbu skra bregs shing na bza' dur smrig mnabs te dka' thub kyi nags su phan tshun rgyu zhing drang srong ngan spong gi bu'i bsti gnas su gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22a-4: de'i tshe drang srong ngan spong gi bu lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa de lta bu de byang chub sems dpas gzigs nas gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22a-5: drang srong chen po ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22a-8: bdag gi bsti gnas 'di na shing ta la rnams gser gyi lo ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22a-10: 'bras bu chags pa las de rnams snga mkho bzhin du ma gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22a-11: byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22a-12: drang srong chen po gang gi mthus bsti gnas 'di na ta la rnams gser gyi lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22a-13: de rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba yang dag par mthong nas yid byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22a-14: dka' thub kyi nags su gnas pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22a-15: gal te des rgas pa dang na ba dang 'chi ba yang dag par mthong nas yid byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22a-16: dka' thub kyi nags su gnas par ma gyur na skyed mos tshal 'di de'i yin par 'gyur ba zhig de skad ces gsungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22a-17: drang srong ngan spong gi bus byang chub sems dpa' la brtag par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22b-0: de nas gzugs @22b bzang zhing zhi ba'i cha byad du mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22b-2: ngo mtshar skyes nas gsol ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22b-3: kye rab tu byung ba de khyod kho na ma lags grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22b-4: byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22b-5: drang srong chen po de ltar nges so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22b-6: de nas ngan spong gi bu ya mtshan skyes pa'i mig bgrad de bltas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22b-7: byang chub sems dpa' thog mar gdan la spyan drangs te me tog dang 'bras bus bstabs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22b-8: de ltar kun tu dgyes par byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22b-9: byang chub sems dpas skad cig gcig bzhes nas gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22b-10: drang srong chen po 'di nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir ji srid yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22b-12: dpag tshad bcu gnyis mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22b-13: byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22b-14: grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi nye'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22b-15: 'dir gnas pa ni rung ba ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22b-16: sh'akya rnams kyis grong khyer gyi 'khrug par byed par 'gyur gyis ma la bdag gangg'a rgal lo snyam nas de gangg'a rgal nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang rgyal po'i khab tu byon to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22b-17: byang chub sems dpa' ni bzo'i gnas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22b-18: las kyi gnas de dang de rnams la mkhas pa yin pas shing ka ra bi ri'i lo ma las lhung bzed byas nas spyod lam zhi bas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22b-19: de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi na 'dug pa des de 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang lta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22b-24: lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:22b-25: bsod snyoms spyod pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-2: rgyal po'i khab na rab tu byung ba ji snyed cig gnas pa la ji ltar rab tu byung ba 'di'i spyod lam de lta bu ni 'ga' yang med do snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-4: ji ltar mig can 'gro ba ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-5: rab tu byung ba bsgrag par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-6: 'dis ni brtag par mdzad nas su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-7: rab tu byung ba yang dag bzhed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-8: khyim gnas 'di ni sdug bsngal te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-9: 'di ni rdul gyi gnas yin zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-10: rab tu byung ba par snang ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-11: mkhyen nas de tshe rab tu byung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-12: rab tu byung nas sku yis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-13: sdig pa'i las ni spangs pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-14: gsung gi sdig pa spangs nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-15: 'tsho ba kun nas dag par mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-16: des na ma gha dha yi ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-17: grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-18: mgon po shes bzhin dran ldan pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-19: bsod snyoms phyir ni gshegs pa de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-20: bzo sbyangs ma ga dha yi bdag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-21: khang bzang na ni 'dug pa mthong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-22: mthong nas sems dad de nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-23: blon po rnams la 'di skad smras //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-24: mtshan mchog gis ni rgyas gyur cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-25: kho lag phun sum tshogs pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-26: gnya' shing gang du lta ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-27: 'di la shes ldan dag ltos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-28: spyan mi 'degs la yid bzhungs shing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-30: gang du gnas par gshegs gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-31: rgyal pos pho nya rjes bzhin btang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-32: de nas pho nya la bsgo ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-33: dge slong de ni gar 'gro zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-34: gang du gnas ni btab pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23a-35: rjes bzhin du ni 'brang bar gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-0: de ni bsod snyoms @23b gshegs pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-1: sgo drug legs par bsdams nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-2: shes bzhin dran dang ldan pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-3: lhung bzed myur du gang bar mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-4: bsod snyoms spyad pa byas nas kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-5: thub pa grong khyer phyir byung nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-6: skya bseng las ni mngon gshegs te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-7: de la gnas ni btab par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-8: gnas btab pa ni shes nas kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-9: pho nya gcig gis bsdad byas nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-10: gzhan ni myur du slar log ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-11: rgyal po la ni tshig smras pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-12: rgyal po chen po dge slong de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-13: sengge'am stag gi phrug gu dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-14: ri sul dag na gnas pa ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-15: skya bseng gi ni steng na gnas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-16: pho nya rnams kyi tshig thos nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-17: sa bdag shing drung zhugs nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-18: de ni blon pos yongs bskor nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-19: myur du kho nar dong bar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-20: bzhon pas bgrod pa'i sar zhon te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-21: de ni bzhon pa las babs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-22: rkang gnyis nye bar song nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-23: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-24: rgyal pos 'dug nas dgyes pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-25: mgu bar 'gyur pa'i gtam gsol nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-26: de ni ma khengs mi bslang bar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-27: don 'di dag ni rab gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-28: dge slong lang tsho dang po la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-29: bab par yang dag gnas gyur cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-31: bsod snyoms spyod pa mdzes ma lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-32: khang pa nyams dga' dag dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-33: bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-34: longs spyod mchog ni khyod gsol na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-35: nyid kyi gdung ni zhu yis gsungs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-36: rgyal po gangs ri nye ba na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-37: yul gyi ljongs ni nor dag dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:23b-38: 'bru dag gis ni gang gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-2: bu ram shing pa nyi ma'i rus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-3: sh'akya dag ni de na gnas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-4: rgyal po nga'i rigs rgyal rigs te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-5: nga ni 'dod pa don mi gnyer //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-6: sa 'di ri dang bcas shing rgya mtshor bcas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-7: rin chen kun dang ldan pa bskyangs gyur kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-8: mi ni nam yang ngoms par mi 'gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-9: so ga tsha dus shing gi me bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-10: 'dod pa rnams ni sha kho na 'brel ces gsungs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-11: mi dbang rgal bar dka' zhing 'dam rdzab 'dra //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-12: sdug bsngal dang ni mya ngan 'jigs pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-13: rtsa ba'i gtso ste blo ngan rnams kyis bstan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-14: rgyal po ngas ni byung ma thag tu yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-15: 'dod pa rnams la mi dga'i blo bskyed na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-16: 'jigs byed chos kyi dgra bor gyur pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-17: bor ba de kho slar yang ji ltar blang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-18: rtse mo sna tshogs yangs par gyur pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-19: lhun po gangs can rlung gis bskyod srid kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-20: nga yi blo ni thar pa la brten pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-21: 'dod pa'i shugs kyis bskyod par mi nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-22: 'jig rten 'di ni 'dod par bying gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-23: 'khor ba'i 'khor los yongs su 'khyams pa la; ;mi dbang nga skyabs yin te gzhan med pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-24: 'jigs pa che las de ni thar par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-25: 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs mkhyen //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-26: mya ngan 'das pa zhib gzigs pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-27: spang phyir gang du nga yi yid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-28: dga' ba dag tu 'gro bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-29: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24a-30: kye rab tu byung ba brtul zhugs 'dis ci zhig don du gnyer /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24b-0: bla na med pa yang @24b dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24b-2: kye rab tu byung ba gang gi tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag la yang dgongs shig ;byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24b-3: de bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24b-5: rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24b-6: bya rgod phung po'i ri dang ha cang yang mi ring bar drang srong rnams kyi bsti gnas der gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24b-7: de rnams spyod pa dang gnas pas bsam gtan la brtson par gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24b-8: de rnams gang tshe rkang pa gcig gis nyin thun gcig 'greng pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24b-9: byang chub sems dpa' thun gnyis su bzhengs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24b-10: gal te de rnams gdung ba lnga'i sbyor ba nyin thun gcig 'dug pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24b-11: byang chub sems dpas kyang sbyor ba des thun gnyis su bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24b-12: de nas de rnams ya mtshan skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24b-13: dge sbyong 'di ni chen po zhig go zhes smras pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24b-14: dge sbyong chen po dge sbyong chen po zhes bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24b-15: byang chub sems dpas de rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24b-16: shes ldan dag khyed brtul zhugs 'dis ci zhig don du gnyer /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24b-17: de na kha cig gis gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24b-20: bdag cag ni tshangs pa nyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24b-23: byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24b-24: drang srong 'di dag ni slar yang lhung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24b-25: lam log par zhugs pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:24b-26: lam de ni dag pa ma yin no snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25a-0: des sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du @25a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25a-1: 'phur gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25a-2: sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur la 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25a-3: ring du 'phur gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na khyod kyi drung du kho bo tshangs par spyod par spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25a-5: tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma bdag la mi bde ba med kyis khyed ci bde ba kho nar bzhugs shib [*shig?]/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25a-6: byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25a-7: ring du 'phur khyod kyis chos ji snyed cig rtogs par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25a-9: tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25a-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25a-11: sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur dad pa de la ni nga yang dad la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25a-12: sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur la brtson 'grus dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25a-15: shes rab yod pa ltar bdag la yang brtson 'grus dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25a-19: sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur gyi ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos de snyed mngon sum du byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25a-20: ci'i phyir bdag gis kyang chos 'di dag mngon du mi bya snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25a-21: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos de rnams kho na ma thob pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25a-22: ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25a-23: mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir gcig bu dben pa bag yod pa brtun pa dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25b-0: bdag nyid gtod par gnas te gcig bu dben pa bag yod pa brtun @25b pa dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25b-1: bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25b-2: ring po ma thogs pa kho nar chos de dag mngon sum du mdzad par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25b-3: chos de dag mngon sum du mdzad nas yang sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25b-4: sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur la 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25b-5: ring du 'phur khyod kyis ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di dag rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25b-7: tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25b-8: mad de bdag gis ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos de dag rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25b-9: byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25b-10: tshe dang ldan pa ring du 'phur bdag gis kyang ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos de dag rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25b-11: tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma de lta na khyod kyi ji tsam bdag gi yang de tsam la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25b-12: bdag gi ji tsam pa khyod kyi yang de tsam pas don 'di la'o skol mtshungs shing mnyam ste 'dra bar thob kyis tshur spyon /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25b-13: 'o skol gnyis kas 'khor 'di yongs su drang bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25b-14: de nas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma'i slob dpon nyid kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25b-15: byang chub sems dpa' la rjed pa'i dam pas rjed cing mchod pa'i dam pas mchod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25b-16: de'i rtogs pa dag la yang dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:25b-18: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26a-0: lam 'di ni shes par nus pa @26a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26a-2: mthong bar nus pa ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26a-3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin no snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26a-4: de nas byang chub sems dpas lam de nus pa med par rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26a-5: rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26a-6: rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26a-7: lhag spyod gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na khyod kyi drung du nga tshangs par spyod pa spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26a-9: tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma bdag la mi bde ba med kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26a-10: khyod ci bde ba kho nar bzhugs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26a-11: khyod kyis chos ji snyed cig mngon sum du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26a-12: tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26a-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26a-14: rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dad pa la ni bdag kyang dad la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26a-15: rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la brtson 'grus dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26a-18: shes rab yod pa lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26a-21: shes rab ni bdag la yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26a-22: rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyis 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di snyed cig mngon sum du byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26a-23: bdag gis kyang ci'i phyir chos 'di dag mngon sum du mi bya snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26a-24: de nas byang chub sems dpas chos de rnams kho na ma thob pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26a-25: ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26b-0: mngon @26b sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa brtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtod par gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26b-1: gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa brtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26b-2: ring po ma thogs pa kho nar chos de mngon sum du mdzad par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26b-3: chos de mngon sum du mdzad nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26b-4: rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26b-5: lhag spyod khyod kyis 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar du chos 'di dag rang gis mngon sum du byas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26b-6: tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma mad lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26b-7: bdag gis 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di dag mngon sum du bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26b-8: byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26b-9: tshe dang ldan pa lhag spyod bdag gis kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di dag rang gis mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26b-10: tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma de lta na khyod kyi ji tsam pa bdag gi yang de tsam la bdag gi ji tsam pa khyod kyi yang de tsam pas don 'di la 'o skol mtshungs shing mnyam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26b-12: 'o skol gnyis kyis tshogs 'di yongs su drang bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:26b-13: de nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma'i slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' la rjed pa'i dam pas rjed cing mchod pa'i dam pas mchod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27a-0: de'i shes pa rnams la yang dga' ba dang @27a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27a-3: lam 'di ni shes par nus pa ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27a-4: mthong bar nus par ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27a-5: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub bar nus pa ma yin no snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27a-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' lam de yang nus pa med par rig nas gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27a-7: rgyal po zas gtsang bu'i mya ngan gyis rtag tu gdungs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27a-8: byang chub sems dpa' btsal ba'i phyir pho nya btang ba las des ji ltar gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27a-9: rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dang lhan cig bzhugs pa las rgyal po'i khab nas phyir byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27a-10: rim gro ba med par 'khyams pa thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27a-11: thos nas rim gro byed pa sum brgya btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27a-12: grong khyer lhas bstan du sh'akya legs par rab sad kyis kyang de bzhin du thos nas des kyang rim gro byed pa nyis brgya btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27a-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rim gro pa lnga brgyas yongs su bskor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27a-14: dka' thub kyi nags su rgyu ba na des dgongs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27a-15: dka' thub kyi nags gang bar spyod cing gnas pas ni bdud rtsi thob par mi nus kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27a-16: ma la bdag gi rim gro byed pa lnga zhig blangs la lhag ma ni dgye'o snyam nas des yum gyi phyogs las gnyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27a-17: yab kyi phyogs nas gsum khrid de de rnams kyis de'i rim gro byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27a-18: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rim gro pa lngas yongs su bskor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27a-19: ga ya'i lho phyogs na lteng rgyas 'od srung gi sde'i grong rdal gang na bar rgyu zhing gshegs te byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27a-20: de phan tshun du chag pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27b-0: phyogs dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa nags @27b tshal tshad tshing mdzes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27b-1: chu klung ne ranydza na bsil bar 'bab pa gser gu can 'jug ngogs bde zhing mtha' rgya che la gsing ma sngon mo dang shing sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa zhig gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27b-2: gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27b-3: kye ma'o sa phyogs 'di ni dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa nags tshang tshing mdzes pa chu klung ne ranydza na bsil bar 'bab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27b-4: gser gu can 'jug ngogs bde zhing mtha' rgya che la gsing ma sngon po dang shing sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27b-5: kye ma'o spong ba don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu nags khrod 'dir brten na spong ba bya bar nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27b-6: bdag spong ba don du gnyer ba yin pas ma la bdag kyang nags khrod 'dir brten la spong ba bya'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27b-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' nags khrod du zhugs te shing zhig gi drung du bzhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27b-10: thugs kyis thugs mngon du bzung mngon du bsdams shin du mngon du bsdams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27b-11: de thugs kyis thugs mngon du bzung mngon du bsdams shin tu mngon du bsdams pas ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas rdul byung bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27b-12: dper na mi stobs dang ldan pas mi stobs shin tu chung ba zhig phying ka log tu bzung mngon du bsdams shin tu mngon du bsdams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:27b-13: de'i ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas rngul 'byung ba de bzhin du de'i tshe /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:33a-4: gnyis pas 'di skad ces smras so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:33a-7: 'di nag po yang ma yin sngo bsangs kyang ma yin gyi mdog dmar smug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:33a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i sku mdog bzang por snang ba ni thams cad kyi thams cad du nub par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:33a-9: de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe gsum zhig snang ba 'di lta ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:33b-6: nye bar skam la bzhag pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34a-0: shing skam khong stong chu med @34a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34a-1: pa zhig chu dang thag ring por skam la bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34a-2: de nas mi me don du gnyer ba me tshol ba zhig 'ongs nas des de la gtsub stan byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34a-3: gtsub shing bzhag nas gtsubs na 'di ltar shing de skam zhing khong stong yin pa'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34a-5: 'bar du btub pa de bzhin du dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig 'dod pa rnams la lus dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34a-6: sems kyis thag sring bar gnas pa de rnams kyi 'dod pa rnams la 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34a-11: 'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa gang yin pa de ni de rnams kyi sems yongs su gtugs te mi gnas pa yin no //
