K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34a-13: 'on kyang de rnams kyis shes par nus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34a-15: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34a-16: de la 'di ni de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe snang ba gsum pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34a-17: 'di ltar de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la dpe gsum pa snang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34a-18: ma la bdag gis til 'bru gcig gi zas bza' bar bya'o zhes de til 'bru gcig za bar gsol te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34a-19: ji srid de'i mdangs de sku las yal bar ma gyur gyi bar du til 'bru gnyis pa'i zas mi gsol te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34b-0: yal nas til 'bru gnyis pa'i zas de gsol @34b bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34b-1: de til 'bru gcig gi zas gsol bas yan lag dang nying lag rnams shin tu bskams par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34b-2: til 'bru gcig ji lta ba 'bras 'bru gcig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34b-3: sran ko la 'bru gcig dang rgya sran 'bru gcig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34b-6: rtsva'i gding ba la mnal bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34b-7: rgyal po zas gtsang gis dka' ba spyod pa'i gnas skabs de thos nas nyi ma re re zhing rtog pa nyis brgya lnga bcu gtong bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34b-8: rgyal po legs par rabs sad kyis kyang nyis brgya lnga bcu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34b-9: de dag nyi ma re re zhing de gnyis la myur ba myur bar gtam skyel bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34b-10: byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di 'dra ba'i dka' ba spyod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34b-16: mon sran sde'u 'bru gcig gi zas gsol zhing rtsva gding ba la mnal to zhes smra'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34b-17: de rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas bu'i mya ngan gyis non pas lhag par dang khar na zhing mig mchig mas bsnangs te gdungs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34b-18: btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas rtsva'i gding ba la nyal bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34b-19: btsun mo grags 'dzin mas khyim thab kyi gnas skabs de thos nas khyim thab kyi mya ngan gyi non te gdong mchi mas rlan cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:34b-20: me tog breng dang rgyan dang sbud pa rnams bor nas dka' ba spyod par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35a-2: mon sran sde'u 'bru gcig gi zas za zhing rtsva'i gding ba la nyal bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35a-3: de'i rum mi bde'o zhes rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35a-4: gal te grags 'dzin mas byang chub sems dpa'i gtam nyi ma re zhing thos nas khyim thab kyi mya ngan gyis non te dka' ba spyad pa 'dis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35a-6: srog chad par 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod pas des na grags 'dzin ma la byang chub sems dpa'i gtam su yang gleng bar mi 'gyur ro snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35a-7: rgyal po zas gtsang gis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi skye bo thams cad la khrims su bcas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35a-8: sus kyang byang chub sems dpa'i gtam grags 'dzin ma la brjod par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35a-9: gtam skyel ba la yang bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35a-10: nga ma gtogs par su la yang byang chub sems dpa'i gtam brjod par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35a-11: rang gis thos na yang grags 'dzin ma la bsams nas mya ngan mnags [?] te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35a-12: gang thos na btsun mo grags 'dzin ma mi 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i gtam gzhan gyis btsun mo'i 'khor la 'drid par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35a-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35a-14: lam 'di yang shes par nus pa ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35a-15: mthong bar nus pa ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35a-16: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin no snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35a-18: ma la bdag gis kha zas shin tu ngan pa bza' bar bya'o snyam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35a-19: de kha zas shin tu ngan pa gsol bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35b-0: de la zas phal ba ni 'di @35b yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35b-1: be'u 'byung nas ring po ma lon pa'i bar ba'i 'o ma 'thung ba gang yin pa de rnams kyi gcin dang lci ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35b-2: ji srid de'i sku las mdangs de yal bar ma gyur pa de srid du zas gnyis pa mi gsol te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35b-3: yal nas kha zas phyi ma gsol bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35b-4: dur khrod chen por gshegs nas kyang mi ro dbu rten du bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35b-5: zhabs la zhabs bzhag ste snang ba'i 'du shes dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35b-6: dran pa dang shes bzhin dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35b-7: ldang ba'i 'du shes yid la mdzad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35b-8: glo g-yas pas mnal bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35b-9: de'i tshe grong khyer gyi gzhon nu rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35b-10: grong khyer gyi gzhon nu ma rnams lhags nas shing bus de'i snyan gnyis kyi bu gar 'jug par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35b-11: rna ba gnyis ka nas 'dren par byed cing 'di skad ces kye phyag dar khrod kyi sha za la ltos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35b-12: kye phyag dar khrod kyi sha za la ltos zhes smra bar yang byed de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35b-13: de'i tshe phyag dar dang bong rdog dang gseg mas kyang 'thor bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35b-14: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni grong khyer gyi gzhon nu rnams sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35b-15: grong khyer gyi gzhon nu ma de rnams la ngan sems bskyed pa'am sdig pa'i tshig dbyung bar mi dgongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35b-16: byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i dka' ba spyod pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35b-18: gang su dag sdug bsngal spang par brtson 'grus brtsams par gnas pa de thams cad ni 'di tsam du zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35b-19: de las lhag pa yang med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35b-20: de'i gong na yang med na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35b-21: lam 'di yang shes par nus pa ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:35b-22: mthong bar nus pa ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36a-0: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin no @36a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36a-2: de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36a-3: lus ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36a-4: rmongs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar bzhag pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36a-5: sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36a-7: shes par nus pa dang mthong bar nus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36a-8: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa'i lam de gang yin snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36a-10: bdag yang sh'akya zas gtsang gi khyim na gnas pa'i tshe zhing blas kyi mtha'i drung du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36a-11: shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36a-13: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36a-14: dpyod pa dang bcas shing dpen pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa de mngon par dran te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36a-19: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36a-20: de bdag gis bskyed du yang 'di ltar rid cing nyam chung la zhan pas bla ba ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36a-21: ma la bdag gis ci bder dbugs rngub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36a-24: zan dron gyi kha zas rags pa bza' zhing lus mar sar dang til mar gyis byugs la chu 'jam pos lus bkru bar bya'o snyam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36a-25: de ci bder dbugs rngub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36b-0: zan dron gyi zhal zas rags pa gsol @36b zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36b-1: sku til mar dang mar sar gyis byugs nas chu 'jam pos sku 'khru bar mdzad do ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36b-4: de nas rim gro pa lnga po de rnams 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36b-6: dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di ni sdom pa lhod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36b-9: spong ba nyams par gyur pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36b-11: zan dron gyi kha zas mang du za la lus zhun mar dang til mar gyis byugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:36b-12: chu 'jam pos lus khrus byed de /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:40b-18: dri med gser 'od 'bar ba 'dra ba de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:40b-19: snang bar mdzad cing kha dog ldan pas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:40b-20: mi mchog deng ni sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:40b-22: sgra dang mthong dang sangs rgyas dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:40b-23: rdzogs dang zhabs dang chos gos dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:40b-24: brtan dang rtsva sha de bzhin rlung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:40b-25: khyod gtogs pa dang de bcu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:40b-26: de nas byang chub sems dpa' klu'i rgyal po dus can gyis yang dag par bstod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:40b-27: rdo rje'i gdan logs su gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:40b-29: rtsva'i gding ba la 'dug par bya'o snyam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:40b-30: de la rtsva'i dgos pa byung bar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:40b-31: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dgongs pa shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41a-1: las shing bal gyi 'dab ma ltar reg na bde ba'i rtsva khur gcig blangs nas rtsva 'tshong bkra shis kyi kha dog tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyan sngar bsdad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41a-3: byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41a-4: bzhin bzang rtsva'i ni dag nga la phul cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41a-5: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas gus pa dang bcas pas phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41a-6: de nas byang chub sems dpas bkra shis kyi rtsva 'tshong las rtsva bzhes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41a-7: lha rnams kyis bstan pa'i lam nas byang chub kyi snying po gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas rtsva rnams ma 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41a-8: stug srab med par dgram par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41a-9: de nas rtsva de rnams bskor thabs su lhung nas byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41a-10: ji ltar rtsva 'di rnams bskor thabs su lhung ba las bdag gis gdon mi za bar deng bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas rdo rje'i gdan la 'dzegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41a-11: brang gis 'gro ba'i rgyal po gnyid log pa'i lus bskyil ba ltar skyil mo krung bcas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41a-13: dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste bzhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41a-14: sems bskyed cing tshig tu yang gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41a-15: ji srid zag pa zad pa ma thob kyi bar du skyil mo krung gzhig par mi bya'o zhes des re zhig zag pa zad pa ma thob kyi bar du skyil mo krung ma bshig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41a-16: bdud sdig can gyi rgyal mtshan gnyis po dga' ba'i gnas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41b-0: @41b dogs pa'i gnas gnyis yod pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41b-1: dogs pa'i gnas kyi rgyal mtshan g-yo bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41b-3: ji ltar rgyal mtshan 'di g-yo ba las gdon mi za bar gnod par byed pa zhig byung ngo snyam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41b-4: de bsams pa la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41b-5: ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41b-7: sh'akya zas gtsang gi bu 'di rdo rje gdan la 'dug gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41b-8: ji tsam bdag gi yul las ma 'das kyi bar du de la bgegs bya'o snyam du bsams nas 'phrin yig skyel ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41b-9: skra gyen du 'greng la sha na'i smad g-yogs bgos pa zhig gi kha dog tu mngon par sprul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41b-10: byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin nas rtab par smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41b-11: grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi ni lhas byin gyis mnan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41b-13: sh'akya rnams ni kha btags na; khyod ci'i phyir gnas btab ste 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41b-14: de nas byang chub sems dpa' la sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa gsum skyes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41b-16: 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41b-17: gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41b-18: rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41b-19: de la 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni grags 'dzin ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41b-22: gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41b-24: rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni de'i rjes su 'tsho ba'i sh'akya rnams la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:41b-25: byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42a-0: ci'i phyir bdag la sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog @42a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42a-2: ji tsam na bdud sdig can 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42a-3: dkrug pa'i las kyi phyir nye bar 'ongs par gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42a-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' la dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa gsum skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42a-5: 'di ltar nges par 'byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42a-6: gnod sems med pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42a-7: rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42a-9: khyod ci'i phyir byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42a-10: byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42a-11: bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42a-13: khyod kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes ga la thob /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42a-14: byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42a-15: sdig can khyod kyis re zhig mchod sbyin gcig byas pas kyang 'dod pa'i dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42a-16: ngas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma byas shing sems can rnams kyi phyir mgo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42a-25: gser la sogs pa yongs su btang bas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42a-26: ngas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par mi 'gyur ba de srid re skan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42a-27: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42b-0: re zhig ji ltar bdag gis mchod sbyin gcig gis 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug thob par gyur pa'i bdag gi dbang ni khyod nyid yin @42b na; ji ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42b-1: sems can rnams kyi phyir mgo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42b-2: lag pa dang; rkang pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42b-9: gser la sogs pa yongs su btang bar khyod la dpang du su yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42b-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag 'khor lo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42b-11: bkra shis dang g-yung drung 'khyil pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42b-12: dra bas 'brel pa bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42b-13: skrag pa rnams la dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas sa la reg par mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42b-14: ngas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma byas shing sems can rnams kyi phyir mgo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42b-23: gser la sogs pa yongs su btang ba'i nga'i dpang ni 'di yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42b-24: de nas sa'i lhas sa brtol nas thal mo sbyar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42b-25: skad phyung nas sdig can bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de de bzhin no zhes de skad smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42b-26: bdud sdig can cang mi smra bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42b-29: spyi bo smad nas spobs pa med la sems khong du chud cing 'dug par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42b-30: de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:42b-31: bdag gis sh'akya zas gtsang gi bu la de ltar byas kyang glags ma rnyed kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43a-0: ma la 'di la bdag gis yang bgegs @43a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43a-1: shig bya'o zhes smras nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43a-2: de nas des bu mo gsum po sred ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43a-6: lang tsho'i rgyags pas dregs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43a-7: lha'i gos dang rgyan gyis klubs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du bud med kyi g-yo rnams bstan par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43a-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43a-10: ji ltar rgan mor gyur pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43a-11: bdud gang na ba der dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43a-12: bdud kyi bu mo rnams de lta bu'i rnam par mthong nas yi chad nas lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de gang gis na sh'akya zas gtsang gi bu dka' thub la bgegs byed par 'gyur ba'i thabs legs pa ci yod snyam nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43a-13: des 'byung po'i dpung tshogs dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43a-25: wa la sogs pa 'dra ba ral gri dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43a-33: lcags kyi ber ka la sogs te mtshon cha can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43a-34: bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug ded nas rang nyid gzhu rna drung du bkang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43a-35: byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bskor nas 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43a-36: de nas byang chub sems dpas gzugs rnam pa du ma can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43b-0: mtshon cha @43b rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dang bcas pa de rnams gzigs nas dgongs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43b-1: re zhig pho phal pa zhig dang lhan cig 'thab par brtson na yang de'i gnyen po'i phyogs la sbyor ba byed na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43b-2: 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug 'di la lta smos kyang ci dgos kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43b-3: ma la bdag gis gnyen po'i phyogs la sbyar bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43b-4: de zhi bar 'gyur ba'i thabs la dgongs par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43b-5: bdud kyang 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i steng nas 'khor lo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43b-9: mda' la sogs te mtshon cha rnams dbab par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43b-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la snyoms par zhugs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43b-11: de'i tshe mtshon cha de rnams lha'i me tog autpa la dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43b-12: padma dang; ku mu ta dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i nye 'khor du 'bab par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43b-15: de nas bdud steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43b-16: phyag dar gyi char dbab par brtsams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43b-17: de yang lha'i me tog manda ra ba rnams su gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i steng nas 'bab par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:43b-19: de nas bdud kyis gdug pa'i rlung dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44a-0: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i steng du lo ma las ma yin pa'i spyil bo mngon par sprul pas rdo'i char dang gdug pa'i rlung du bcas pa des byang chub sems @44a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44a-1: dpa' la cung zad kyang gnod par ma gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44a-3: bdag gis nam du yongs su bskor te 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44a-4: bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44a-5: byang chub kyi shing shel las byas par mngon par sprul la song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44a-6: de'i lo ma rnams rtag par sgra 'byin pas de'i sems rtse gcig par mi 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44a-7: byang chub kyi shing shel las byas par mngon par sprul te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44a-8: rna ba gtad nas bsgrims te bsdad pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44a-9: byang chub kyi shing gi lo ma shel las byas pa rnams myur ba myur bar sgra 'byin par brtsams pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44a-10: bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44a-11: byang chub sems dpas sems rtse gcig pa ma thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44a-12: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44a-13: shel las byas pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi lo ma rnams kyi sgras byang chub sems dpa' sems rtse gcig pa ma thob kyis thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44a-14: de nas de rnams kyis lo ma re re bzung na 'on kyang bdud kyi dpung de bzhin du gnas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44a-15: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44a-16: bdud sdig can ni ring mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par 'tshe bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas bdud kyi dpung de khor yug gi pha rol tu 'phangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44b-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas nas 'bab chu chen po ne ranydza na'i 'gram byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs @44b te; rtag tu bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44b-2: byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos rnams la bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su brtson pas bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44b-3: de nam gyi thun dang po la rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44b-4: de rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44b-6: gcig tu gyur cing mang por gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44b-7: mang por gyur cing gcig tu gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44b-8: snang bar gyur cing mi snang bar gyur pa ye shes gzigs pas nyams su myong bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44b-9: skus rtsig pa dang ri dang ra ba la yang thad kar gshegs par mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44b-10: dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44b-11: sa la yang steng du 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44b-13: dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44b-14: chu'i rgyun la yang mi nyams par gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44b-15: dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44b-16: nam mkha' la yang skyil mo krung gis gshegs par mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44b-17: dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44b-18: nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar gzigs brjid che ba yang phyag gis nom zhing nyug par mdzad cing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sku'i dbang sgyur bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44b-19: yang bdud kyis bsams pa; bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44b-20: ma la bdag gis rgyang ring po kho nar 'dug la sgra dbyung bar bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:44b-21: des 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45a-1: su rung ba'i sgra phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45a-2: byang chub sems dpas kyang de sgrib pa'i phyir dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi bar du shing ka dam pa'i tshal sprul pas des na sgra de rdug pas mi grags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45a-3: byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45a-4: ma la bdag gis lha'i rna ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la sems mngon du bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45a-5: des na lha dang mi rnams kyi sgra gang dang gang dag thos par 'dod pa de dag mnyan par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45a-6: lha'i rna ba shes pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa bzhag pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45a-7: de lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi rnams kyi las 'das pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45a-8: sgra gnyis po mi rnams kyi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45a-9: mi ma yin pa rnams kyi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45a-11: gang dag nye ba yang gsan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45a-12: de nas byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45a-13: bdud kyi 'khor 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug las bdag la su dag ni gnod par sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45a-14: su dag ni ma yin zhes de dag ji ltar shes par bya snyam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45a-16: sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yin no snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45a-17: de nam gyi gung thun la sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45a-18: de'i thugs kyis sems can gzhan dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45a-19: gang zag gzhan dag gi rnam par rtog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45b-0: rnam par dpyod pa'i yid ji lta ba @45b bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45b-1: 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems so zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45b-2: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems so zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45b-3: zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45b-4: zhe sdang dang bral ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45b-5: gti mug dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45b-6: gti mug dang bral ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45b-13: nye bar ma zhi ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45b-15: mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45b-19: sems rnam par ma grol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45b-20: rnam par grol ba zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45b-21: shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sems la shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sems so zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45b-23: bdud kyi mngag gzhug pa 'di rnams las su dag bdag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45b-24: tshe rabs gzhan na mar 'brel ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45b-28: dgrar gyur pa de dag ji ltar shes par bya snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:45b-30: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yin no snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46a-0: de nam gyi gung thun la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du gzhag pa @46a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46a-1: na; des sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46a-19: skye ba brgya phrag du ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46a-20: skye ba stong phrag du ma dang; skye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46a-25: 'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46a-26: chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46a-28: chags pa'i bskal pa du ma rjes su dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46a-29: bdag sngon sems can 'di dag gi nang na gnas pa na ming ni 'di zhes bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46a-32: kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46a-34: sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig nyams su myong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46a-36: yun ni 'di srid cig 'dug 'dug ;tshe 'di srid cig lon te gnas de nas bdag shi 'phos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46a-37: che ge mo zhig tu skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46a-38: de nas kyang shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46a-39: de nas kyang shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba rnam pa dang bcas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46a-40: yul phyogs dang bcas pas sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dgongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46b-0: bdud kyi mngag gzhug 'di @46b rnams las su dag ni ngan song du 'gro /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46b-1: su dag ni mi 'gro ba de dag ji ltar shes par bya snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46b-4: skye ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yin no snyam ste de nam gyi thun tha ma la 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46b-5: de'i lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi rnams kyi las 'das pas gzigs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46b-6: sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46b-7: kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46b-8: dman pa dang gya nom pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46b-9: bde 'gro dang ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i sems can rnams las ji lta ba bzhin gyi rjes su 'gro ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46b-10: ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46b-11: shes ldan sems can 'di zhes bya ba 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan; ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46b-12: 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa log par lta ba ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46b-13: log par lta ba'i chos dang las yang dag par bslangs pa'i rgyus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46b-14: rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song dang ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46b-15: shes ldan sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46b-16: ngag dang yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:46b-17: 'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs shing yang dag par lta ba ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47a-0: yang dag par lta ba'i chos dang las yang dag @47a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47a-2: rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha dang mi rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47a-4: shes ldan sems can 'di dag ni 'dod pa'i zag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47a-6: ma rig pa'i zag pas 'khor ba na 'khor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47a-7: 'di rnams kyi 'dod pa'i zag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47a-9: ma rig pa'i zag pa de ji ltar spang ba ji ltar shes par bya snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47a-11: zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yin no snyam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47a-12: de rtag tu byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47a-14: byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos rnams la bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su brtson par gnas nas zag pa med pa'i shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47a-15: des 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47a-16: zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47a-19: 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47a-20: de de ltar shes shing de ltar mthong na 'dod pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47b-0: ma rig pa'i zag pa @47b las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47b-2: bdag gi skye ba zad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47b-3: tshangs par spyod pa la brten to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47b-5: 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes rnam par grol ba'i ye shes nyid mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47b-6: de ltar de na bcom ldan 'das byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47b-8: byed pa byas nas me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47b-9: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas bdud kyi 'khor 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug byams pa'i mtshon gyis mngon du bcom nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i tshe bdud sdig can gyi lag nas gzhu lhung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47b-12: de nas bdud sdig can nam 'byung po'i 'khor bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba yid la gcags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47b-13: de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47b-14: bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir byang chub sems dpa' sh'akya thub pa ni dka' ba lo drug spyad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47b-16: rtsva'i gding ba la grongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47b-17: zhes bsgrags pa gang yin pa des rgyal po zas gtsang btsun mo dang gzhon nu dang blon po'i tshogs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47b-18: grong khyer ser skya na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas pas thos nas sdug bsngal chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:47b-19: yid mi bde bas gdungs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48a-0: ri dvags skyes dang grags 'dzin ma yang byang chub sems dpa'i yon @48a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48a-1: tan rjes su dran nas brgyal te sa la 'gyel nas chus gtor ba las slar dbugs byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48a-2: btsun mo'i spro bsring ba'i skye bo dag ni mig mchi mas gang la myur ba myur bar dbugs brdzangs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48a-3: dal bu dal bus smre sngags 'don cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48a-4: de dag sdug bsngal ba sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha dga' ba skyes pa rnams kyis mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sh'akya thub pa ma nongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48a-6: 'di ltar des bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes so zhes smras pa gang yin pa rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48a-7: ser skya'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis thos nas mchog tu dga' ba skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na grags 'dzin ma la yang khye'u zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48a-9: bdud rtsi zas kyi yang khye'u zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48a-10: zla ba yang sgra gcan gyis zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48a-11: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis phun sum tshogs pa de mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48a-12: dga' ba dang mgu ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48a-14: rangs pa rgya chen po dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48a-15: des grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48a-16: gseg ma dang g-yo mo rnams bsal nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48a-17: shin tu dri zhim po'i pog phor nye bar bshams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48a-18: dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dpyangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48a-19: rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgrengs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48b-0: me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar bkram nas grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi @48b dang; sum mdo rnams su yang sbyin gtong gi khang pa brtsigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48b-1: de nas grong khyer gyi shar sgor dge sbyong dang bram ze spyod pa pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48b-7: slong mo pa rnams la sbyin pa dag gtong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48b-11: dbus kyi sum mdo rnams su yang sbyin pa dag gtong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48b-13: grags 'dzin ma'i bu ming 'dogs par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48b-14: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi skye bos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48b-15: 'di btsas pa na zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48b-16: de bas na khye'u yi ming sgra gcan zin zhes gdags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48b-18: bdud rtsi zas kyi yang de bzhin du sbyin pa dag btang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48b-20: khye'u yi ming cir gdags shes bu'i ming 'dogs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48b-21: nye du dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48b-22: gang gi tshe 'di btsas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48b-23: grong khyer thams cad dga' bar gyur pas de'i phyir khye'u yi ming kun dga' bor gdags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48b-25: rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48b-26: grags 'dzin ma'i bu gang yin pa 'di ni sh'akya thub pa'i bu ma yin no zhes smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48b-27: grags 'dzin mas thos nas yi chad par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48b-28: de nas des byang chub sems dpa'i pang tshad kyi pha bong la zhon nas rol pa'i rdzing 'gram du 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48b-29: bden pa gsol pa btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48b-30: gal te 'di byang chub sems dpa' las skyes pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:48b-31: de bzhin du rdzing 'dir pha bong dang lhan cig 'phyo bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49a-1: na bying bar gyur cig ces smras nas chur bor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49a-2: de shing bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du pha bong dang lhan cig 'phyo bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49a-3: rgyal po zas gtsang gis ya mtshan du gyur pa de thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49a-4: skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49a-5: byang chub sems dpa' rol pa'i rdzing 'gram du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49a-6: ji tsam na sgra gcan zin pa bzang po byang chub sems dpa'i pang tshad kyi pha bong la zhon nas shing bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du chu na 'phyo ba mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49a-7: mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49a-10: rangs pa rgya chen po dang; yid bde ba skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49a-11: de ma thag tu rdzing der zhugs nas gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po pang du blangs nas langs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49a-12: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi 'khor 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug byams pa'i mtshon gyis mngon du btul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49a-13: bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa de'i tshe sa chen po 'di shin tu g-yos par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49a-14: 'jig rten 'di thams cad kyang snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49a-15: 'di ltar 'jig rten dang 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur ba nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba'i snang bas snang ba nyams su ma myong ba gang yin pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang brgya chen pos gsal bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49b-0: der sems can gang dag skyes pa de rnams kyis snang ba des sems can @49b gcig gis gcig mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49b-1: shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49b-2: shes ldan dag sems can gzhan zhig kyang 'dir skyes pa lta ci zhig ces ngo shes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49b-4: 'khor bzhi dang ni lang tsho dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49b-5: yab dang sras ni mjal ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49b-6: sh'akya de bzhin rang byung dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49b-7: dung skyong khyod la phyag 'tshal ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49b-8: de nas tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis shig tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug pa 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49b-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na chu klung ne ranydza na'i 'gram byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon par me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49b-10: skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49b-11: de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul gyi ma la bdag cag der song la tshigs su bcad pa re res mngon par bstod do snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49b-12: de nas tshangs ris kyi lha de gnyis kyis 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49b-13: skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i dpung ba bskums te brkyang pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49b-14: brkyangs ste bskum pa tsam gyis tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis tshangs ris kyi 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis las gcig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49b-16: ded dpon g-yul las rnam par rgyal ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:49b-17: sdig pa mi mnga' bzhengs shig 'jig rten gzigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-2: bde gshegs chos kyi mchog ni bshad du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-3: cig shos kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-4: nga rgyal bcom zhing g-yul las rnam rgyal ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-5: sdig pa mi mnga' bzhengs shig 'jig rten gzigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-6: bcom lnga lon pa'i dgung zla nya ba ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-7: khyod kyi thugs ni shin tu rnam dag lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-8: zhes gsol nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-11: lha yul byung bde gang yin pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-12: sred pa zad pa'i bde de la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-13: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-14: khur khyer ba ni sdug bsngal te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-15: khur bor ba ni bde ba yin; ;khur ni lci ba rnams bor nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-16: gzhan dag blang bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-17: sred pa thams cad rnam spangs shing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-18: 'du shes thams cad zad nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-19: dngos po thams cad yongs shes na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-20: slar yang sred par mi 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-22: bde ba sku nyams su bstar bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-23: skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-24: de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50a-25: de'i tshe tshong pa ga gon dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50b-0: bzang po gnyis shing rta lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig dong @50b pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50b-1: lam de nyid du zhugs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50b-2: de nas tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po'i sngon gyi grogs po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50b-3: blon po dang nye du dang mdza' bshes su gyur pa'i lha zhig yod pa 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50b-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ldeng rgyas na chu klung ne ranydza na'i 'gram byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50b-5: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang be ba sku nyams su bstar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50b-6: skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad par /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50b-7: de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50b-8: de la tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po gnyis kyis der thog mar bsod snyoms 'bul du bcug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50b-9: de ni tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po de gnyis kyi yun ring po'i don dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50b-10: phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50b-11: ma la bdag rang gis 'di gnyis 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50b-12: bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms 'bul du gzhug pa'i phyir brtson par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50b-13: de nas lha des shing rta dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50b-14: tshong pa thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal ba byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50b-15: tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50b-16: tshong pa tshong pa dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di lteng rgyas na chu klung ne ranydza na'i 'gram na byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50b-17: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:50b-18: bde ba sku nyams su bstar ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51a-0: skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das @51a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51a-2: de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51a-3: de la khyed kyis der thog mar bsod snyoms phul na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51a-4: de ni khyed kyi yun ring po'i don dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51a-5: phan pa dang bde par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51a-6: lha de de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51a-7: de nas tshod pa ga gon dang bzang po gnyis 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51a-8: sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51a-9: chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51a-10: gang gi phyir 'di ltar lhas kyang 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51a-11: bcom ldan 'das de la bsod snyoms 'bul ba'i phyir brtson par byed do snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51a-12: sbrang rtsi dang lde gu mang du khyer nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51a-16: tshong pa ga gon dang bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51a-17: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du 'dir bdag gis sbrang rtsi dang lde gu mang du 'tshal te mchis kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51a-18: bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse bar nye bar bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51a-21: gal te bdag gi phyag gis bsod snyoms bzhes na dper na mu stegs can bzhin du gyur pas de ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51b-0: @51b ma la bdag gis sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis srog chags rnams la phan pa'i phyir bsod snyoms gang du bzhes pa bsam par bya'o snyam pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51b-1: bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyis gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51b-2: btsun pa sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis srog chags rnams la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du lhung bzed du bsod snyoms bzhes lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dgongs shing ye shes gzigs pa bskyed na sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis srog chags rnams la phan pa'i phyir bsod snyoms lhung bzed du bzhes par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed kyis lhung bzed kyi dgos pa byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51b-5: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51b-6: bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed kyis lhung bzed kyi dgos pa byung bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51b-7: ri brag can zhig la rdo las byas pa'i lhung bzed mi ma yin pas byas shing mi ma yin pas zin par byas la gsal ba gtsang ma dri ma med pa bzhi khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51b-8: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51b-10: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po chen po bzhis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:51b-11: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52a-1: la lhung bzed kyis lhung bzed kyi mkho ba byung bar bdag cag gis 'tshal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52a-2: ri brag can zhig la rdo'i las rdo'i lhung bzed mi ma lags pas bgyis shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52a-3: mi ma lags pas legs par bgyis pa gsal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52a-4: gtsang ma dri nga ba ma mchis pa bzhi 'dir 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52a-5: mchis na bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste 'di bzhes su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te gal te bdag gis rgyal po chen po gcig las lhung bzed gcig bzhes na gsum gyi sems mi dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52a-7: gal te gnyis las na ni gnyis kyi sems mi dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52a-8: gal te gsum las na ni gcig gi sems mi dga' bar 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52a-9: ma la bdag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi las lhung bzed bzhi bzhes la lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlab par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi las lhung bzed bzhi bzhes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52a-11: lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlabs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po las srog chags rnams la phan pa'i phyir bsod snyoms bzhes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong ba ga gon dang bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-0: tshong pa dag khyed tshur sangs rgyas la skyabs @52b su deng zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-1: chos la skyabs su deng zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-2: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dge 'dun zhes bya ba gang yin pa de la yang skyabs su deng zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-3: btsun pa bdag cag sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-5: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i dge 'dun gang lags pa de la yang skyabs su mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po'i sbyin pa de la rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang bar mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-7: gang gi don du sbyin pa btang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-8: de yi don du 'gyur pa ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-9: bde ba'i don du sbyin btang na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-10: de nas bde bar 'gyur pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-11: bsod nams rnam smin bde ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-13: myur du zhi ba dam pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-15: pha rol las byung gnod pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-16: lha dang bdud kyi rigs dag gis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-17: bsod nams kho na byed pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-18: bar chad bya bar mi nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-19: gal te 'phags pa'i shes rab phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-20: gtong ldan de ni 'bad byed na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-21: sdug bsngal tha mar byed pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-22: rnam par mthong zhing reg par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-23: de nas tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la ma go bos phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-27: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:52b-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po las bsod snyoms bzhes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53a-1: gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53a-2: chu klung ne ranydza na'i 'gram du bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53a-3: zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53a-4: de nas sbrang rtsi yang rlung slong la lde gu yang rlung slong bas de na; bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun gyis thebs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53a-5: de nas bdud sdig can gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53a-6: bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun gyis thebs par rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53a-7: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53a-8: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53a-9: bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53a-10: bde bar gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53a-12: 'di lta ste dkrugs pa'i las kyi phyir bdud sdig can 'di nye bar 'ongs so snyam du dgongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53a-13: bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53a-14: sdig can ji srid nga'i nyan thos mkhas pa gsal ba yid gzhungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53a-15: pha rol gyi ni rtsod pa byung zhing byung ba rnams chos bzhin gyis tshar gcod nus pa rang gi smra ba gsal bar byed nus pa'i dge slong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53a-18: dge bsnyen ma rnams byung bar ma gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53a-19: nga'i tshangs par spyod pa rgya chen po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53a-21: lha dang mi'i bar la rgya cher yang dag par rdzogs par rab tu ma bstan gyi bar du nga yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' 'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53a-22: de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53b-0: kye ma'o dge sbyong go'u ta @53b ma ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' mi 'dod snyam du bsams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53b-1: sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la 'gyod pas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53b-2: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun gyis thebs par rig nas shing dzambu zhes bya bas dzambu gling du btags pa gang yin pa de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53b-3: aa ru ra chen po'i tshal yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53b-4: de nas kha dog dang dri dang ro dang ldan pa'i aa ru ra blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53b-5: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do; ;phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53b-7: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53b-8: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bser ma'i snyun nad kyi snyun gyis thebs par bdag gis 'tshal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53b-9: shing 'dzam bu zhes bgyi bas 'dzam bu'i gling du btags pa gang lags pa de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53b-10: aa ru ra chen po'i tshal mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53b-11: de nas bdag gis kha dog dang dri dang ror ldan pa'i aa ru ra 'dir 'tshal te mchis kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53b-14: bser ma dang mthun par 'gyur zhing bser ma'i snyun nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53b-16: rlung dang mthun par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:53b-17: rlung nad kyi snyun nye bar zhi bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu bzod cing lhag par 'tsho @54a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das ji tsam dgyes kyi bar du byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54a-3: klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54a-4: shing zhig gi drung du brten te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54a-5: skyil mo krung bcas nas sku drang por bsrang ste dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54a-6: de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas su zhag bdun du dus ma yin pa'i sprin chags par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54a-7: de nas klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gis zhag bdun du dus ma yin pa'i sprin chags par rig nas gnas nas mngon par 'phags te; bcom ldan 'das zhag bdun po 'di la bser bar 'gyur du 'ong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54a-9: sbrang ma dang sha sbrang dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54a-10: rlung dang nyi ma dang sdig sbrul gyi reg pas sku la gnod par 'gyur du 'ong zhes lus kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun du dkris te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54a-11: steng du mgo'i gdengs ka chen po byas nas 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54a-12: de nas klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gis zhag bdun gyi dus ma yin pa'i sprin chags pa med par rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las lus phral te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54a-19: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54a-20: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54a-21: bcom ldan 'das dgung bdun po 'di la bser bar ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54a-22: tsha ba dang sbrang ma dang sha sbrang dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-1: gdugs dang sdig sbrul gyi gnod pas sku la reg par ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-3: dben pa'i dga' ba bden pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-4: chos thos pa la lta ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-5: srog chags rnams la sdom pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-8: 'dod chags rnams las rgal ba bde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-9: nga 'o nga rgyal thul ba gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-10: de nyid bde ba'i dam pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas na bzhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-12: byang chub kyi snying po gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-13: rtsva'i gding ba bshams pa nyid la skyil mo krung bcas sku drang por bsrangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-14: dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-15: skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-16: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis po lugs dang mthun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-17: lugs dang mi mthun pa 'di nyid la gzigs par mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-20: 'di skyes pas 'di skye ba 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-21: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-22: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-23: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-24: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug; ;skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-25: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-26: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-27: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-28: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:54b-29: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55a-0: @55a *// skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55a-6: de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55a-12: 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55a-13: rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55a-14: ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55a-15: skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55a-21: skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55a-25: yid mi bde ba dang; 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55a-26: de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55a-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag bdun po de nyid 'das par mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55a-28: ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55a-29: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55a-30: gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55a-31: brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-0: gang @55b tshe chos rnams rgyu dang bcas shes pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-1: de nas de yi som nyi thams cad 'bral //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-2: gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-3: brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-4: gang tshe sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas shes pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-5: de nas de yi som nyi thams cad 'bral //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-6: gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-7: brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-8: gang tshe tshor ba zad pa thob 'gyur ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-9: de nas de yi som nyi thams cad 'bral //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-10: gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-11: brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-12: gang tshe rkyen rnams zad pa thob nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-13: de nas de yi som nyi thams cad 'bral //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-14: gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-15: brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan gtan tshangs pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-16: gang tshe zag pa zad pa thob gyur nas;/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-17: de nas de yi som nyi thams cad 'bral //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-18: gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-19: brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-20: 'jig rten kun tu snang bar 'dug pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-21: ji ltar nyi ma bar snang shar ba bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-22: gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-23: brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-24: bdud kyi sde rnams rnam par bcom ldan gnas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-25: sangs rgyas kun tu sbyor las rnam par grol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:55b-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56a-0: bdag gis chos zab mo zab par snang ba mthong bar dka' zhing khong du chud par dka' ba rtog ge pa rnams kyi rtog ge'i spyod @56a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56a-2: zhib mo mdzangs pa'i mkhas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56a-3: rig pas rnam par shes pa bya ba rtogs te de bdag gis gzhan la smras kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56a-4: gzhan gyis de mi shes pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56a-7: sems la spro ba med par kho nar 'gyur bar zad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56a-8: ma la bdag gcig pu dgon pa'i nags stug por mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson pas gnas par bya'o snyam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs las chung dus bzhugs pa la thugs gzhol bar mdzad cing chos 'chad pa la ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56a-10: de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56a-11: kye ma'o 'jig rten 'di ma rung ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56a-12: kye ma'o 'jig rten 'di ma rung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56a-13: gang gi phyir de ltar brgya lam na lan 'ga' de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56a-14: dper na au dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56a-15: bcom ldan 'das de da ltar thugs las chung ngus bzhugs pa la thugs gzhol bar mdzad cing chos 'chad pa la ni ma yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56a-16: ma la bdag der song la de la gsol ba gdab bo snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56a-17: de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i dpung pa bskums nas brkyang pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56b-0: brkyangs nas bskum pa tsam gyis tshangs pa mi mjed @56b kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56b-2: de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56b-3: ma ga dhar ni sngon chad chos byung ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56b-4: dag pa ma lags dri mar bcas pas rtogs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56b-5: bdud rtsi chos kyi sgo ni phye mdzod la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56b-6: dri ma med pas rtogs pas bshad pa mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56b-8: tshangs pa da ni tshegs chen gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56b-9: skyon rnams bcom nas rtogs gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56b-10: srid dang chags pas dkris rnams kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56b-11: chos 'di legs par rtogs mi 'gyur; ;rgyun las zlog phyogs 'gro ba'i lam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56b-12: zab cing shin tu mthong dka' ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56b-13: mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56b-15: btsun pa 'jig rten du skyes shing 'jig rten du rgas pa'i sems can rnams la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56b-22: rdul chung ba'i rigs mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56b-23: de dag gis dam pa'i chos ma thos na yongs su nyams par 'gyur lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56b-28: padma dkar po dag chab nas skyes shing chab nas chen por gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:56b-29: chab nas 'phags te mchis pa la kha cig ni chab dang mnyam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57a-0: kha cig ni chab kyi nang du nub cing mchis @57a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57a-2: btsun pa 'jig rten du skyes shing 'jig rten du rgas pa'i sems can rnams la yang dbang po rnon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57a-7: nyon mongs pa chung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57a-8: rdul chung ba'i rigs mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57a-9: de dag gis dam pa'i chos ma thos na yongs su nyams par gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57a-10: chos rin po che 'tshal bar 'gyur ba mchis kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57a-11: bcom ldan 'das chos bshad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57a-12: bde bar gshegs pa chos bshad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57a-14: ma la nga nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la blta bar bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57a-16: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57a-17: 'jig rten du skyes shing 'jig rten du rgas pa'i sems can rnams la dbang po rnon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57a-20: drang sla ba dang gdul sla ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57a-21: nyon mongs pa chung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57a-22: rdul chung ba'i rang bzhin yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57a-23: de dag dam pa'i chos ma thos na yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57a-24: gzigs nas kyang sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po gzhol bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57a-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-0: bdud rtsi sgo mo dag ni dbye @57b bar byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-1: nyan par su 'dod som nyi sol cig dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-2: tshangs pa mi rnams la ni gya nom chos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-3: klan ka mi btsal mdo tsam bshad par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-4: de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-5: kye bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-6: kye bde bar gshegs pas chos bshad par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-7: mgu ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-8: dga' ba rgya chen po dang yid bde ba skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-10: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-11: de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-13: ngas su la thog mar chos bshad snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-15: ma la ngas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur de la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-16: de ni nga'i thog ma'i slob dpon kho na yin bzhin du rjed pa'i dam pas rjed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-17: mchod pa'i dam pas mchod la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-18: rtogs pa dam pa dag la yang yid rangs shing dad par gyur pa yin no snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-19: bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyis gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-20: btsun pa sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur gum nas dgung bdun lon lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dgongs pa la zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:57b-22: ye shes gzigs pa bskyed na sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur shi nas zhag bdun lon no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs @58a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58a-1: te; ae ma'o sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur shi ba de ni te bor ma stes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58a-2: ae ma'o sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur shi ba de ni shin tu te bor ma stes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58a-4: gal te des chos 'dul ba 'di thos nas shes par 'gyur ba zhig snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58a-6: ma la ngas thog mar su zhig la chos bshad snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58a-8: ma la ngas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod de la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58a-9: de ni nga'i thog ma'i slob dpon kho na yin bzhin du rjed pa'i dam pas rjed cing mchod pa'i dam pas mchod la rtogs pa dam pa dag la yang yi rangs shing dad par gyur to snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58a-10: bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyis gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58a-11: btsun pa rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod ma dang gsum srod la gum lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dgongs pa la zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58a-13: ye shes gzigs pa bskyed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58a-14: rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod srod la shi bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58a-16: ae ma'o rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod shi ba de ni te bor ma stes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58a-17: ae ma'o rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod shi ba de ni shin tu te bor ma stes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58a-19: gal te des chos 'dul ba 'di thos na shes par 'gyur ba zhig snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-0: ma la ngas thog @58b mar su zhig la chos bshad snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-1: de nas 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-2: ma la ngas lnga sde'i dge slong de rnams la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-3: de dag gis nga sngon sdug bsngal sbong ba'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su brtson par gnas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-4: bla ma dang gus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-5: sdug pa dang bcas pas gnas pa yin no snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-7: lnga sde'i dge slong rnams da ltar gang na 'dug snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi rnams kyi las 'das pas lnga sde'i dge slong rnams w'a ra n'a si na drang srong sma ba ri dvags kyi nags na 'khod pa gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-9: gzigs nas kyang ci tsam bzhed kyi bar du byang chub kyi drung du zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-10: w'a ra n'a si'i ka shi'i grong rdal gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-11: de'i tshe kun tu 'tsho nyer 'gro lam de nyid du zhugs par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-12: kun tu 'tsho nyer 'gros bcom ldan 'das lam nas gshegs pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-13: mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-14: dge sbyong go'u ta ma khyod kyi dbang po rnams ni dvangs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-15: bzhin gyi mdog ni yongs su dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-16: pags pa'i mdog ni gsal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-17: tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma khyod kyi ston pa ni gang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-18: khyod su las brten te rab tu byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-21: nga dang 'dra ba yod min pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-22: nga la slob dpon 'ga' med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:58b-23: 'jig rten sangs rgyas nga gcig pu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-1: dag byang chub dam pa thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-2: thams cad zil gnon 'jig rten kun mkhyen la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-3: 'di ni chos kun gyis ni nga ma gos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-4: thams cad spangs shing sred bral rnam grol te;/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-5: rang gis mngon par shes na su la brten //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa lha mi'i ston pa po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-7: thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs ni kun ldan pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-8: nyid kyis byang chub rtogs nas rab gsungs pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-9: mi mnyam mtshungs pa med na su la brten //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-10: nga ni 'jig rten dgra bcom ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-11: 'jig rten bla med nga yin pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-12: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-13: nga ni rgyal ba bdud zil gnon //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-14: tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-16: gang gis zag pa zad thob pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-17: rgyal ba nga 'drar shes par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-18: sdig pa'i chos ni ngas bcom pas; ;de bas nyer 'gro nga rgyal ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-19: tshe dang ldan pa go'u tam gang du bzhud /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-20: w'a ra n'a sir gshegs nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-21: ngas ni chos kyi rnga brdung zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-22: 'jig rten na ma bskor gang yin pa'i; ;chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-23: 'jig rten chags las rgal ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-24: kun mkhyen sangs rgyas zhi gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-25: 'jig rten bsgral ba ma byas par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-26: skyes bu dam pa grags mi srid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-27: tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma rgyal ba legs so zhes gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59a-28: kun tu 'tsho nyer 'gro lam nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59b-0: de nas bcom 'das yul ka shi'i ljongs rgyu zhing @59b gshegs pa na w'a ra n'a sir byon to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59b-1: de'i tshe lnga sde'i dge slong rnams w'a ra n'a si na drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags na 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59b-2: lnga sde'i dge slong rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59b-3: bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59b-4: mthong nas kyang phan tshun nas ched du bsams te legs pa 'dug nas khrims su bcas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59b-5: shes ldan dag dge sbyong go'u ta ma mi brtan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59b-8: spong ba nyams pa de da 'bras chan dang zan dron gyi kha zas la mang du za zhing lus mar sar dang til mar gyis byugs nas chu 'jam pos lus khrus byed cing 'ong gis da bdag cag gi drung du 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59b-9: de la smra bar mi bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59b-12: langs te stan bstab par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59b-13: gzhan du na stan nar ma kho na bting la tshig 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59b-14: tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma stan yod kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59b-15: ji ste 'dod na 'dug cig ces brjod par bya'o zhes khrims bcas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59b-16: bcom ldan 'das ji lta ji ltar lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la gzigs pa'i phyir nye bar gshegs pa de lta de ltar lnga sde'i dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi gzi brjid dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59b-18: kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan shom mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59b-19: kha cig ni zhabs bkrus pa'i chu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59b-20: zhabs kyi rten dag mtha' gcig tu 'jog par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:59b-21: kha cig ni bsu ste na bza' chos gos dag blangs nas 'di skad ces shes ldan go'u ta ma tshur spyon /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:60a-2: shes ldan go'u ta ma stan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig ces zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:60a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:60a-4: kye ma skyes bu blun po 'di rnams kyis khrims bcas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:60a-5: rang gis bshig go snyam du mkhyen nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:60a-6: de nas lnga sde'i dge slong rnams lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan nas brjod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:60a-8: tshe dang ldan pas brjod pa kun tu brjod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:60a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:60a-10: dge slong dag khyed lhag par yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nas brjod pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:60a-14: phan pa ma yin pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:69b-16: de ni bram ze dge sbyong dge slong yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:69b-17: de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa drug dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:69b-18: bdun pa ni bcom ldan 'das so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:70a-24: btsun pa gzhon nu grags pas gang gis na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:70a-26: mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:70a-30: lam mngon par rtogs pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:70b-0: thugs @70b brtse ba nye bar bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:70b-1: rigs kyi gtso bo'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs na legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:70b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:70b-7: snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:70b-8: lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:70b-9: phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa grags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:70b-10: khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo'i khyim ga na ba der gshegs so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:70b-12: chung ma gnyis bcom ldan 'das la yang dang yang du bsu ba'i phyir bar sgo na sdod do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:70b-14: chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:70b-15: mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:70b-17: bcom ldan 'das byon pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:70b-18: bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs su gsol zhes gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:70b-19: bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:71a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan @71a *//

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:71a-19: skal ba dang ldan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:71a-20: yang dag phul gyi chos bshad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:71a-21: shes par nus pa gzigs pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:71a-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:71a-23: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:71a-26: lam de rgya cher bshad do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:71a-28: tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /
