K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:71b-4: chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:71b-5: som nyi las rgal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:71b-6: the tshom las rgal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:71b-7: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:71b-8: gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:71b-9: ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:71b-10: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:71b-11: btsun pa bdag cag ni 'phags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:71b-12: bdag cag ni mngon par 'phags lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:71b-13: bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:71b-14: bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:71b-15: deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so; ;btsun pa de'i slad du 'dir zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:71b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:71b-17: chung ma gnyis la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin cing phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar @72a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72a-1: rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang chung ma gnyis la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72a-4: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72a-5: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72a-6: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72a-7: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72a-10: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72a-11: gdan las bzhengs nas gshegs so; ;dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72a-12: the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72a-14: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa grags pas las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72a-15: las de'i rnam par smin pas mchis brang gi 'khor na mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72a-16: rang gi mchis brang la dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyes shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72a-17: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72a-19: dge slong dag grags pa 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pas gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags te; 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72a-20: dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72b-0: chu'i khams la @72b rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72b-2: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72b-4: mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72b-5: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72b-6: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72b-7: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72b-9: dge slong dag sngon wa'a ra n'a si'i grong khyer dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na drang srong byams pa'i bdag nyid snying rje can sems can thams cad la phan par sems pa zhig gnas pa de bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na mi ro zhig mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72b-10: de de la zhen pa'i sems kyis bsod snyoms la zhugs te bsod snyoms spyad nas slar log pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72b-11: ji tsam na mi ro de rnam par sngos shing rnam par bam par 'gyur ba bltas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72b-12: de nyid kyi mdun du zhigs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72b-13: des de nyid du 'dod chags dang bral ba bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72b-14: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72b-15: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de ni gzhon nu grags pa 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72b-16: 'dis des na 'dod chags dang bral ba bskyed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72b-17: des na da ltar chung ma'i nang na 'dug pa na rkyen rnyed pa yin no; ;dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72b-18: gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72b-19: 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72b-20: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72b-22: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:72b-23: dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:73a-2: dge slong de dag yi rangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:73a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:73a-4: w'a ra n'a si na khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:73a-11: rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dag gis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa skra dang kha spu bregs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:73a-12: gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo zhes thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:73a-13: thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:73a-14: kye ma'o sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:73a-15: chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:73a-16: gang gi phyir da ltar rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa re zhig shin tu gzhon pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:106a-20: de la chos kyi brdar btags pa ni 'di yin te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:106a-26: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:106a-27: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:106a-30: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:106a-32: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:108a-3: 'dod chags dang bral na rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:108a-4: rnam par grol na bdag gi skye ba zad do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:108a-8: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:108a-11: ma ga dha'i bram ze dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:108a-13: de nas ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos chos mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:108a-16: chos kyi gting sleb pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:108a-17: som nyi las rgal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:108a-18: the tshom las rgal ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:108b-1: deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:108b-5: snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:108b-6: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:108b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:108b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:108b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:108b-11: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:108b-12: the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:108b-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:108b-14: btsun pa ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po 'khor dang bcas pas las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar bgyid lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:108b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109a-1: las dag byas shing bsags pa ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'khor dang bcas pas las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109a-2: dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109a-5: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109a-6: 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba dag byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109a-7: khams dang skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te; las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109a-8: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109a-9: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109b-0: skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas sa phyogs dben zhing yangs ba zhig tu mchod rten chen po brtsigs @109b so; ;de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po kri kri zhes bya ba khrom gyi ru ba bye ba phrag bco brgyad dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109b-1: steng gi nam mkha' las yul rgyu ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109b-2: mchod rten de dang nye ba zhig tu phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109b-3: sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha rnams kyis de'i 'khor lo rin po che thogs par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109b-4: rgyal po kri kris bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109b-5: 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che 'di thogs pa las na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109b-6: bdag gi bsod nams zad par ma gyur grang snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109b-7: de la lha rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109b-8: rgyal po chen po khyod kyis bsod nams ma zad mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109b-9: phyogs 'di na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtsibs kyi lte ba'i mchod rten bzhugs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109b-10: des na 'khor lo rin po che 'di de'i steng du mi 'gro zhing thogs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109b-11: de nas rgyal po kri kris khrom gyi ru ba bye ba phrag bco brgyad dang lhan cig ba bas na ji tsam na mchod rten gyi dor ma byas pa de mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109b-12: 'khor dang bcas pa des byi dor byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109b-17: rol mo rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas 'khor dang bcas pas drung du btud de smon lam btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109b-18: bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gis yon tan 'di lta bu dag 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109b-19: ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed cing mnyes par mi byed par gyur cig ces btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:109b-20: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110a-0: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi 'khor los @110a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110a-1: sgyur ba'i rgyal po kri kri zhes bya ba 'khor dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110a-2: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110a-3: 'khor dang bcas pa des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtsibs kyi lte ba'i mchod rten la mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110a-4: 'dis bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag mang por lha dang mi rnams kyi bde ba khyad par du 'phags pa nyams su myong bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110a-5: 'di lta bu'i yon tan dag thob par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pa des ni nga'i spyan sngar 'khor dang bcas pa bden pa mthong bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110a-6: ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed cing mi mnyes par mi byed par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110a-7: nga nyid dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtsibs kyi lte bar lhan cig mnyam pas mnyam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110a-11: thob pa mnyam pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110a-12: 'dis ston pa nga mnyes par byas kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110a-13: mi mnyes par ma byas pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110a-14: dge slong dag de lta bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110a-15: las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110a-16: gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni dkar ba yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110a-17: 'dres ma rnams kyi ni 'dres ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110a-18: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110b-1: las gcig tu dkar ba la btsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110b-2: dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110b-3: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110b-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110b-5: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung gis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110b-6: des na cho 'phrul lnga brgyas btul bar gyur lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110b-8: ga ya 'od srung dag ni tshegs chung dus btul bar gyur lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110b-10: dge slong dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110b-11: rkyen yongs su sgyur ba zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110b-12: lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110b-13: dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110b-14: 'jig rten du ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110b-15: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110b-16: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110b-17: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba byung nas w'a ra n'a si'i grong khyer dang nye ba zhig tu brten te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110b-18: drang srong smra ba'i ri dvags kyi nags na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:110b-19: des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111a-0: shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las @111a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111a-2: de'i sku gdung rgyal po kri kris spos kyi shing thams cad spungs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111a-3: spungs pas bsregs nas me'o mas bsad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111a-4: sku gdung de dag ni rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i bum pa'i nang du blugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111a-5: sa phyogs dben zhing yangs par sku gdung gi mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad gcig la rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa zhig brtsig tu bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111a-6: de'i tshe de'i dus na w'a ra n'a si na khyim bdag phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111a-7: rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111a-8: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111a-10: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111a-13: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na rim gyis khye'u gsum btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111a-14: ci tsam na khyim bdag de nad kyis thebs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111a-19: 'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas kyang de'i nad zhi bar ma gyur nas de 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111a-20: de nas de bu rnams kyis ras sngon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111a-21: ser po dang dmar po dang dkar pos khyogs brgyan nas dur khrod du khyer te bsregs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111a-22: de nas pha la pha'i bya ba byas nas mya ngan sangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111a-23: de nas nor so so bgo bar gros bya bar brtsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111b-0: phu bo shos kyis smras @111b pa; nor bgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111b-1: nu bo spun gnyis ma dad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111b-2: des gal gyis gcus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111b-4: gal te de ltar na re zhig 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam rgyags blangs la phyis bgo bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111b-5: des smras pa ci dag bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111b-7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'di la mchod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111b-8: de dad pa chung ba zhig pas des bka' 'khor du khas blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111b-9: de nas de rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la mchod nas smon lam gdab par brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111b-10: gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111b-11: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de'i bstan pa la bdag cag rab tu byung nas khyad par thob par gyur cig ces btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111b-13: de gnyis kyis smon lam btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111b-14: phu bo des thos nas drung du btud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111b-15: smon lam gdab par brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111b-16: bdag ni dad pa chung la dmu rgod yin pas dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa des cho 'phrul lnga brgyas btul nas rab tu phyung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:111b-17: rab tu byung nas kyang khyad par rtogs par gyur cig ces byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112a-1: slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112a-2: phu bo shos dmu rgod dad pa chung ba gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112a-3: lteng rgyas 'od srung 'di nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112a-4: nu bo gnyis po gang dag yin pa de dag ni chu klung 'od srung dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112a-5: ga ya 'od srung 'di dag nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112a-6: smon lam gyi dbang des na lteng rgyas 'od srung cho 'phrul lnga brgyas btul ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112a-8: ga ya 'od srung ni tshegs chung dus btul ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112a-9: gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po gzhon nur gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag cig yod pa de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112a-10: kun dga'i ra ba me tog dang; 'bras bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112a-11: chu phun sum tshogs pa zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112a-12: de de la lhag par chags par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112a-13: ji tsam na gzugs can snying po phyi rol tu byung bas skyed mos tshal de mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112a-14: de yang lhag par chags par gyur nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112a-15: khyim bdag skyed mos tshal 'di nga la byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112a-17: lan gnyis lan gsum du yang smras na yang ma byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112a-18: yang smras pa; rin sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112a-20: gzhon nu nyes na kho bo yul nas spyugs kyang bla'i skyed mos tshal ni mi 'bul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112a-21: gzhon nu gzugs can snying pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112a-22: khyim bdag khyod kyis smras pa dran par byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112a-23: nam nga rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe nga nyid kyis bkur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112a-25: nam khyod rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo yang rgyal po'i khab nas 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112b-0: gzhon nu @112b gzugs can snying pos 'jal to zhes byas nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112b-1: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po padma chen po shi nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112b-2: gzhon nu gzugs can snying po rgyal srid la bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112b-3: des skyed mos tshal de mthus phrogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112b-4: khyim bdag de snying na zhing skyed mos tshal de la lhag par chags pas shi nas de nyid kyi sbrul gdug pa zhig tu skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112b-5: de rgyal po la rgyun du glags tshol ba lhur len cing gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112b-6: ji tsam na rgyal po gzugs can snying po so ga'i dus lab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112b-7: me tog gi shing rnam kha 'bus pa na btsun mo dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal der zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112b-8: de de na skyes pa med par rol mos btsun mo'i bud med dang lhan cig dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar byas nas gnyid log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112b-9: bud med ni me tog dang 'bras bu la dga' ba yin pas kun tu 'khyam du dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112b-10: bud med gcig gi ral gri bskur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112b-11: rgyal po srung du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112b-12: de nas sbrul gdug pa des rgyal po'i drung na sgra mi grag par rig nas rgyal po la gzung ba'i phyir tshang nas byung ste chas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112b-13: rgyal po'i bsod nams kyi mthus bya ka lan da ka zhes bya ba de rnams kyis sbrul gdug pa de kun nas bskor nas tsi tsi'i sgra phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112b-14: bud med ral gri thogs pas thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112b-15: sdangs te sgra chen po phyung nas ral gris bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112b-16: de nas rgyal po yang sdangs te sad nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:112b-19: lha sbrul gdug pa 'di lha la gzung ba'i phyir chas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113a-0: bya ka lan da ka rnams @113a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113a-1: kyis tsi tsi'i sgra phyung nas bdag gis bkum lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113a-2: rgyal po'i gnas skabs de gzhon nu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113a-5: rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113a-6: skyed mos tshal de'i phyi nang du ku co'i sgra chen pos gang bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113a-7: rgyal po de skye dgu la byams pa zhig pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113a-8: phyir zhing btsun mo skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas te mig mchi mas gang zhing 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113a-9: de nas rgyal pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113a-10: shes ldan dag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la srog skyob pa de la mchog ci sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113a-11: skye bo'i tshogs kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113a-15: shes ldan dag bya ka lan da ka rnams kyis nga'i srog byin pas rgyal srid phyed 'di dag la byin no; ;blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113a-17: bya 'di dag ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113a-18: rgyal srid phyed kyi 'di dag la ci bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113a-19: 'di dag 'od ma'i tshal gang du gnas pa der 'di dag gi gnas bca'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113a-22: skyed mos tshal de 'od ma'i tshal gyis yongs su bskor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113a-23: blon po rnams kyis de rnams kyi gnas 'od ma'i tshal gyi nye 'khor du bcas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113a-24: de 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa zhes bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113a-25: rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i zhang po kun tu 'tsho rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113b-0: @113b des skyed mos tshal de de'i gnas kyi phyir byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113b-1: ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das ma ga dha nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113b-2: rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas shing zhig gi drung na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113b-3: ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das ma ga dha nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113b-4: rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas shing zhig gi drung du bzhugs so zhes thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113b-5: thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113b-6: rgyal po'i mthu chen pos rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113b-7: bcom ldan 'das gang ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113b-11: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113b-12: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113b-13: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113b-14: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113b-17: yang dag par rab tu dga' ba mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113b-18: de nas ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po stan las langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113b-19: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:113b-20: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:114a-2: bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi sdum par dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:114a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:114a-4: de nas ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:114a-5: bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:114a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las langs te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:114a-7: de nas ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:114a-8: de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:114a-9: bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:114a-10: gdan bshams nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyi dus tshod gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:114a-11: btsun pa gdugs tshod lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:114a-12: da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:114a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:114a-16: dge slong gi tshogs kyis yong su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:114a-17: ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:114a-18: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:120b-7: de gnyis rin thang bcad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:120b-8: rin thang ma bcad do zhes rtsod par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:120b-9: zhal che gcod pa'i mi gang na ba der dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:120b-10: bar skabs der 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'di snyam du sems te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:120b-17: gzhon nus kun dga' ra ba ni rin thang bcad zin gyis gser long zhig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:120b-25: bong bu rnams la gser mang po bkal te 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:121a-0: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad @121a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:121a-2: sa phyogs 'ga' zhig ma yog pas ma bkram pa nyid du 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:121a-3: de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin don de sems shing yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar 'dug ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:122b-5: 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu na re de bzhin du bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:122b-6: 'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'o zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:122b-8: 'di la rgyu gnyis yod par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:122b-10: yang na ni de phyogs tshol lo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:123a-17: gal te bdag gis byas na 'jig rten lha dang bcas pas kyang 'jig par mi nus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:123a-18: kun tu rgyu mig dmar gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:123a-19: kun tu rgyu mig dmar la 'di skad ces smras so /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:123b-4: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus glang po che bzang po zhig sprul nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:123b-10: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus sngags kyi phur pas btab pa las nyes par spyad pa'i ro langs ni bdag nyid la gsod par byed pas des de nyid bsnyags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:123b-11: de nas de 'jigs skrag phongs shing spu zing zhes byed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:123b-12: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:123b-13: 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu skyabs su mchi lags kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:123b-15: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus sngags kyi phur pa phyung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:123b-16: ro langs de zhi bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:123b-17: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus de la chos bshad de de dad pa skyes nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:123b-18: 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:123b-19: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:123b-20: bdag 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124a-0: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus de rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas gdams ngag byin te des brtson @124a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124a-3: brtsal ba byas pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124a-4: dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124a-5: dgra bcom par gyur nas khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124a-6: bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124a-7: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124a-9: rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral cing rig pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124a-11: so sor yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124a-12: srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa la chags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124a-13: bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124a-14: dbang po dang nye ba'i dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124a-16: mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124a-17: de nas de'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar gyi mig bgrad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124a-18: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la mngon par dad par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124a-21: smra ba'i khyu mchog chen po tshar bcad do snyam du rig nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu'i gdong du lta bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124a-22: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'khor de'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124a-25: rang bzhin shes nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so so yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124a-26: de thos pas sems can brgya phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124a-27: kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124b-0: @124b kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyis byang chub tu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124b-1: kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124b-2: kha cig gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124b-3: kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124b-4: kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124b-5: kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124b-6: kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124b-7: 'khor de phal cher yang sangs rgyas la gzhol ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124b-9: dge 'dun la bab pa la bkod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124b-10: mu stegs can rnams kyis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124b-11: bdag cag gis 'di shags kyis tshar bcad par mi nus kyis thabs shig bsham par byas la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124b-12: de nas glags rnyed nas 'di bgags te gsod par bya'o snyam nas thams cad 'dus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124b-13: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi drung du dong ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124b-14: khyim bdag khyod kyis kho bo cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad ni bcad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124b-15: de bas snying brtse bar gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124b-16: khyod kyis gtsug lag khang du gla mi'i las bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124b-17: kho bo cag 'di na ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bor na mi rung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124b-18: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124b-19: re zhig 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu la brtag go zhes de tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:124b-20: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125a-0: @125a *// 'phags pa mu stegs can rnams kyi mchid nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125a-1: khyod kyis kho bo cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad bcad pas de bas na snying brtse bar gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125a-2: khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du gla mi'i las bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125a-3: kho bo cag 'di na ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bor na mi rung ngo zhes mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125a-4: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu bsam pa la zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125a-5: ci 'di dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125a-6: 'on te med snyam na des yod par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125a-7: su zhig la rag lus snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125a-8: bdag kho na yin snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125a-10: khyim bdag de la 'gal ba ci yod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125a-11: de rnams gtsug lag khang der gla mi'i las byed par brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125a-12: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus lcags thogs kyi mig gtum po zhig sprul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125a-13: des de rnams las byed du gzhug par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125a-14: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125a-15: de dang nye ba'i shing drung zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125a-20: 'di gsad pa'i dus ni 'di yin no snyam nas de rnams kyis de'i drung du dong ste bskor nas 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125a-21: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125a-22: 'di rnams bsam pa ci 'dra bas bdag gi drung du 'ongs snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125a-23: ci tsam na gsad pa'i sems kyis yin par shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125b-0: des lcags thogs @125b sprul pa de sbad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125b-1: des de rnams las byos deng zhes thag bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125b-3: 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu yongs su bskyab tu gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125b-5: tshe dang ldan pa re zhig song la ngal sor chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125b-7: 'di ni 'di lta bur bdag nyid che ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125b-8: bdag cag gis ni 'di gsad par bsams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125b-9: 'di ni bdag cag la byams par sems so snyam du rig nas dad par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125b-10: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125b-12: khams dang rang bzhin shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125b-13: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par byas te de thos nas de rnams kyi 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125b-14: de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125b-15: btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125b-16: bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong gi dngos po gnang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125b-17: bdag cag btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125b-18: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125b-19: de rnams rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125b-21: de rnams kyis brtson pa dang 'bad pa dang brtsal bar byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125b-22: 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g-yo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:125b-23: mi g-yo ba 'di nyid rig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126a-0: 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa @126a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126a-4: rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyi zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126a-5: dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126a-7: khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126a-8: bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126a-9: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa; tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126a-10: rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126a-11: rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126a-12: so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126a-13: srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126a-14: bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126a-15: dbang po dang nye ba'i dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126a-17: mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to; ;de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus gtsug lag khang gi thig skud kyi mtha' gcig nas bzung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126a-18: mtha' gcig nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bzung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126a-19: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'dzum dbyung bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126a-20: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126a-21: 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126a-23: 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'dzum pa mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126a-24: khyim bdag de de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126b-0: de @126b bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126b-2: khyod kyis 'dir thig skud bzung ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126b-3: dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su yang gser gyi khang pa grub par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126b-4: de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ngo mtshar skyes pa'i mig bgrad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126b-5: 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu gal te de lta na de'i slad du yang thig skud brkyang dang lhag par sems mngon par dad par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126b-6: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus yang thig skud de bzung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126b-7: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lhag par dad pa drag po'i shugs kyis sems mngon par dad par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126b-8: dad pa de'i mjug thogs kho nar gser gyi khang pa rin po che sna bzhi las byas par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126b-9: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus kyang de la go bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126b-10: de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gong nas gong du bsod nams rab tu 'phel ba'i rgyud kyis gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126b-11: khang phran drug cu rtsig tu bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126b-12: de gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126b-13: khang phran drug cu brtsigs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126b-14: yo byad thams cad kyis rgyas par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126b-15: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126b-16: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126b-17: 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das gshegs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126b-18: shul sa ji tsam du byon par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:126b-19: khyim bdag dper na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i tsam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127a-1: rgyal po mchi ba'i tshad ji tsam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127a-2: khyim bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni nyin gcig gis rgyang grags bcu'i lam du 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127a-3: de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal po'i khab de'i bar gyi gshegs dgongs brtsis nas gzhes sa dag byed du bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127a-4: sbyin gtong gi khang pa dag byed du bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127a-5: dus tshod gsol ba'i mi dag bkod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127a-9: tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127a-10: shin tu dri zhim po'i pog phor dag nye bar bkod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127a-11: rta babs dag byed du bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127a-12: dus kyi dang thun tshod kyi sman dag kyang 'jog tu bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127a-13: de ltar tshogs bsags nas mi zhig la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127a-15: khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127a-16: son pa dang kho bo'i tshig gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshol la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127a-21: stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127a-23: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127a-27: snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid do zhes kyang gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127b-0: jo bo bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi @127b des khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi ltar mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127b-1: rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der chas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127b-2: rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127b-3: de nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127b-4: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127b-7: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mi des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127b-8: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya ba nas reg par gnas sam zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127b-9: kye mi khyod dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bde bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127b-10: btsun pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mchid nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127b-11: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127b-12: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127b-13: bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127b-16: snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bkur stir bgyid do zhes mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127b-18: de nas mi de bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:127b-21: de nas bcom ldan dul ba 'khor dul ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128a-2: dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128a-3: rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128a-4: dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128a-7: khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128a-8: glang po che'i mchog glang po che phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128a-9: seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128a-10: ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128a-11: nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128a-12: bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128a-13: 'khor lo sgyur ba bu stong gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128a-14: zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128a-15: nyi ma 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128a-16: yul 'khor srung dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128a-17: 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128a-18: mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128a-19: rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128a-20: thags bzang ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128a-21: brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128a-22: tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128a-23: rgya mtsho g-yo ba med pa lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128a-24: sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128b-0: glang po che dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul @128b ma 'khrugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128b-1: sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi kun nas brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128b-2: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par mdzes par byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128b-4: nyi ma'i 'od zer stong bas lhag pa'i 'od can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128b-5: rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128b-8: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128b-9: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128b-10: dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128b-11: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128b-12: mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128b-13: lha brgya stong phrag du mas zham 'bring byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128b-14: mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128b-15: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs nas mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang bcas pas grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la zhabs g-yas pas mnan pa de'i tshe sa rnam pa drug tu g-yos par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128b-16: sa chen po 'di g-yos rab tu g-yos kun tu rab tu g-yos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128b-17: ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128b-18: shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128b-19: nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128b-20: lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128b-21: byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128b-24: dbus mtho na mtha' dma' bar gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128b-25: 'jig rten 'di thams cad 'jig rten gyi bar dang bcas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:128b-26: snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-0: bar snang la yang lha'i rnga rdung @129a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-1: zhing nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lhas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi steng nas lha'i me tog autpal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-6: aa ka ru'i phye ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-7: rgya spos kyi phye ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-8: tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-9: gur gum gyi phye ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-10: ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-11: lha'i me tog manda ra ba rnams 'thor zhing lha'i gos rnams kyang 'thor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-12: bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-13: 'di dag dang gzhan yang ngo mtshar de lta bu dag byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-14: gzhan yang dog pa rnams ni yangs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-15: dma' ba rnams ni mthon por gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-16: mthon po rnams ni mnyam par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-19: khyu mchog rnams kyang skad 'byin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-20: khyim na yod pa'i rol mo cha byad sna tshogs pa rnams kyang rang sgra 'byin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-21: long ba rnams kyis ni mig gis mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-22: 'on pa rnams kyis ni rna bas thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-23: lkugs pa rnams kyis ni smra nus par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-24: dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po rnams yongs su tshang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-25: chang gis myos pa rnams ni myos pa dang bral bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-26: dug 'thungs pa rnams ni dug zhi bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-27: phan tshun 'khon byung ba rnams ni byang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-28: sbrum ma rnams ni bde bar btsas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129a-29: btson du bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa thams cad las thar ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129b-0: nor med pa rnams ni nor rnyed @129b par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129b-1: de dag dang gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na ngo mtshar brgya stong dag byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das bkur sti chen po de lta bus mnyan yod du gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129b-3: gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129b-4: de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mdza' bshes dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129b-6: gnyen gyi skye bos yongs su bskor nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te chu'i rgyun sbreng bar brtsams pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129b-7: de 'dzag tu ma btub pas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yid mi bde ste bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129b-8: bdag gis las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad byas par ma gyur grang snyam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129b-10: khyim bdag khyod kyis las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad kyang byas pa med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129b-11: 'on kyang khyod kyis phyogs 'dir 'dug nas sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyogs 'di nyid phul ba yin gyis phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug la sbrengs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129b-12: des phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug nas sbrengs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129b-13: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsungs dbyangs kyis rgyal byed kyi tshal brjod par mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129b-14: rgyal byed kyi tshal brjod par mdzad pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129b-15: gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:129b-16: kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis der bdag gi ming thog mar smos kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi @130a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130a-1: sems mkhyen nas dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130a-2: zhes der ming thog mar smos pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130a-3: gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis deng bdag gi ming thog mar smos pa mdzad pa thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130a-4: shin tu dga' bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130a-6: mgu ba skyes pa des nor gyi rigs las bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rin po che sna bzhi'i sgo khang byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130a-7: de bzhin du gnas brtan sdud pa byed pa rnams kyis kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130a-8: mdo sde'i nang du bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes gdags pa byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130a-9: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dge sbyong go'u ta ma ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130a-11: mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130a-12: shes ldan go'u ta ma de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid zhal gyis 'che'o zhes thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130a-13: thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130a-14: bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130a-15: yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130b-0: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad @130b ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130b-1: kye go'u ta ma bdag gis shes ldan go'u ta ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid zhal gyis 'che'o zhes thos lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130b-2: go'u ta ma gang dag de skad ces lung ston pa de dag cig dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skur pa 'debs pa ma lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130b-3: thal bar smra ba ma lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130b-4: shes ldan go'u ta mas gsungs bzhin smra ba lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130b-6: chos dang mthun pa'i chos lung ston pa lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130b-7: ci ga de dag gi drung du pha rol po chos dang mthun par rtsod pa'i rjes su rtsod pa mchis na; smod pa'i chos kyi gnas su mi 'gyur lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130b-8: rgyal po chen po gang dag de skad du smra ba de dag ni de skad du lung ston pa bden de nga la skur pa 'debs pa ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130b-9: thal bar smra ba ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130b-10: de ni gsungs pa bzhin smra ba yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130b-12: chos dang mthun pa'i chos lung ston pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130b-13: de dag gi drung du pha rol po chos dang mthun pa'i rtsod pa'i rjes su rtsod pa 'ongs na smod pa'i chos kyi gnas su mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130b-14: rgyal po chen po de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130b-15: ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130b-16: shes ldan go'u ta ma de skad gsung mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130b-17: shes ldan dag go'u ta ma la bdag yid mi ches lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130b-18: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130b-19: kye go'u ta ma re zhig rgan pa'i dge sbyong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:130b-20: bram ze ni 'di dag lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-1: kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-2: smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-3: mi pham skra'i la ba can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-4: ka tya'i bu nog can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-5: gcer bu gnyen gyi bu gang lags pa de dag kyang da dung bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid g-yar gyi mi 'che lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-6: shes ldan go'u ta ma 'khrungs nas ring po ma lags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-7: gsar du rab tu byung bas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-8: rgyal po chen po gzhon nu bzhi po 'di dag la khyad du gsad par mi bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-9: gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-11: rgyal po chen po rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyad du gsad par mi bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-12: gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-13: rgyal po chen po sprul gzhon nu la khyad du gsad par mi bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-14: gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-15: rgyal po chen po me chung du la khyad du gsad par mi bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-16: chung du la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-17: rgyal po chen po dge slong gzhon nu la khyad du gsad par mi bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-18: gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-19: rgyal po chen po de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-20: dge slong gzhon nur gyur kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-21: de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i dgra bcom par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-23: bka' stsal nas ni bder gshegs kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-24: de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131a-25: ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad gsungs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-0: @131b rgyal rigs dpe byad ldan pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-1: rigs btsun grags par ldan pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-2: blo dang ldan pas de gzhon zhes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-3: khyad du mi bsad zil mi mnan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-4: rgyal po rgyal rigs mkhas pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-5: rgyal srid dag ni thob gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-6: chad pas gcod pa'i gnas de yod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-7: de bas de la shin tu gdung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-8: de ltar rang gi srog srung zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-9: rang gi don la lta bas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-10: de ni khyad du mi bsad cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-11: de la legs par bag kyang bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-12: gal te grong ngam dgon pa'ang rung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-13: gang du sbrul ni mthong gyur na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-14: blo dang ldan pas de gzhon zhes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-15: de khyad mi gsad zil mi mnon //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-16: 'di ltar sbrul ni rgyu ba na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-17: rigs ni rnam pa sna tshogs la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-18: glags rnyed nas ni gzhon nus kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-19: skyes pa bud med du ma zin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-20: de ltas rang gi srog srung zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-21: rang gi don la lta bas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-22: de ni khyad du mi gsad cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-23: de la legs par bag kyang bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-24: mang po sreg cing 'bar byed la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-25: lam gnag bsreg bya za ba'i me //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-26: blo dang ldan pas de chung zhes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-27: khyad du mi bsad zil mi mnan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-28: me ni chung ngur gyur pa yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-29: rkyen las chen por gyur pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-30: mes ni ring po mi thogs par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-31: grong rdal dang ni grong khyer sreg /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-32: de ltas rang gi srog srung zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-33: rang gi don la lta bas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-34: de ni khyad du mi bsad cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-35: de la legs par bag kyang bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-36: lam gnag bsreg bya za ba'i mes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:131b-37: nags tshal bsregs pa gang yin de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-2: dge slong tshul khrims ldan pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-3: brten nas gang zhig tshig gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-4: de la bu tsha yod min pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-5: bsgo skal spyod pa 'thob mi 'gyur ta la'i mgo ni bcad pa bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-6: ring por mi thogs rabs kyang 'chad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-7: de bas rang gi srog srung zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-8: rang gi don la lta bas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-9: de ni khyad du mi gsad cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-10: de la legs par bag kyang bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-11: rgyal rigs dpe byad ldan pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-12: de bzhin brang 'gro me dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-13: dge slong tshul khrims ldan de la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-14: blo dang ldan pas brnyas mi bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-15: de bas rang gi srog srung zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-16: rang gi don la lta bas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-17: de la khyad du mi bsad cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-18: de la legs par bag kyang bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-19: de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-20: rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-22: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-23: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la spring yig bskur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-24: lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-25: khyod kyi sras kyis bdud rtsi thob nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-26: bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par byed do zhes spring pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132a-27: rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas pho nya btang ba las de de nyid du rab tu byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132b-0: gnyis @132b pa btang ba dang de yang de nyid du rab tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132b-1: pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132b-2: rgyal po zas gtsang lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung ngo snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132b-3: sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132b-5: lha ci'i slad du khyod phyag la zhal btad nas thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132b-7: 'char ka gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa dka' ba spyod pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132b-8: kho bos 'phrin yig skyel ba'i mi btang ba las de dag kho'i gan du 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132b-9: gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bzhugs pa 'di dang 'dir bzhugs so zhes smra'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132b-10: da ni kho bos 'phrin yig skyel ba'i mi btang na 'ga' yang 'phrin khyer te mi 'ong na ji ltar sems khong du chud par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132b-12: lha bdag mchi ste bka' bzhin 'tshal nas slar mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132b-13: rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132b-14: 'char ka gang dang gang song ba de de'i bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132b-15: de nyid du 'dug pas khyod kyang song na de nyid du 'dug par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132b-18: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang rang nyid kyis 'phrin yig bris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:132b-19: lhums su zhugs pa bzung nas su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-2: nyon mongs me rab 'bar bzhin du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-3: rgyal po ljon shing la bsdad na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-4: da ni khyod kyi slob ma yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-5: yal ga lcug ma 'phel gyur pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-6: gzhan ni bde bas dga' bar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-7: bdag ni sdug bsngal skal ba ldan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-8: gzhan yang gang gis khyod ni ljon shing lcug phran mtshungs tsam na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-9: bdag gi bu ni 'di yin snyam nas chung nas bskrun bskrun te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-10: bu gcig yul mis 'bras bu yongs su spyad thob na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-11: de la yon tan 'bras bu mi ster khyod la snying rje med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-12: gang tshe thog ma bltams pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-13: nyid don bsgrubs nas gnyen rnams ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-14: shin tu che thang phan gdags zhes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-15: khyod kyi dam bca' mdzad nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-16: khyod kyis zhi gnas de rnyed na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-17: bdag dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-18: thugs brtse rjes su gzung mdzod de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-19: gshegs par dgongs pa mdzad du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-20: zhes spring pa'i yi ge 'char kas khyer nas chas te rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-21: lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-22: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-23: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa'i yi ge lags so zhes bcom ldan 'das la yi ge phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-24: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bzhes nas bklags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-25: bklags nas yi ge mtha' gcig tu gzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133a-28: ser skya'i gzhir mi bzhud dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133b-0: bcom ldan 'das @133b kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133b-2: 'char ka sngon bcom ldan 'das dang lhag par 'dris pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133b-3: de sngon gyi 'dris pa kho nas gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133b-4: bcom ldan 'das gal te mi bzhud dang bdag gi mthus bkri bar bgyi lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133b-6: gang zhig yul gyi rgyal por ma chags shing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133b-7: sred 'gag bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133b-8: sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133b-9: gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133b-11: sred 'gag bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133b-14: gang zhig bcom nas brtsegs pa med gyur cing //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133b-17: gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133b-20: sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa yi rtsal mnga' de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133b-21: gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133b-22: lan la spobs pa med nas gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133b-24: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang la rig par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133b-25: 'char ka sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:133b-27: bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba zhig lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:134a-1: gyis khyod kyang rab tu byung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:134a-2: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang la slar mchi bar dam bcas lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:134a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; 'char ka rab tu byung la ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:134a-4: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na yab dang yum dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:134a-8: bla ma'i gnas lta bu rnams kyi chos dang mthun pa'i tshig lan 'ga' yang slar ma bzlog go /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:134a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:134a-12: sh'a ri'i bu 'char ka 'di ni yun ring po'i don dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:134a-14: bde ba'i phyir rab tu phyung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:134a-15: btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'char ka rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:134a-16: kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag de la rgyas par smras nas 'char ka 'di ni khyod kyi bya ba yin te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:134b-2: bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir mchi lags so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:134b-5: gal te nang du spyon cig ces gleng na 'jug par bya'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:134b-10: khyod kyis rgyal po'i khab tu yang gnas par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:134b-11: gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang rgyal po'i khab tu gnas par mi byed dam zhes gleng na mi bzhugs so zhes brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:134b-12: gal te gang du gnas par byed ces 'dri na dgon pa'am gtsug lag khang du'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:134b-13: gal te gtsug lag khang ci 'dra zhes 'dri na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:134b-14: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa bris te bstan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:134b-15: gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam zhes 'dri na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:134b-16: byon no zhes brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:134b-17: ji srid cig na byon zhes 'dri na zhag bdun lon na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:134b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:135a-2: lha rnams bsams pas grub 'gyur zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:135a-3: de bzhin bsam gtan pa rnams kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:135a-4: sems bskyed pas ni thams cad 'grub //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:135a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de ji ltar skad cig de nyid la grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir son pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:135a-6: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la dad pa mi bzod pa skyes pa de rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor bsdad nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:135a-7: shes ldan dag rgyal po la sh'akya'i dge slong mchis so zhes gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:135a-9: ci sh'akya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:135a-11: de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:135a-15: de nang du zhugs pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:135a-19: khyod slar 'ong ngo zhes smra ba yin nam /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:135b-0: 'bras bu brtags pa gtsang sbra byas te zar bcug @135b go ;tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka mchog tu nye bar zhi ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:135b-9: nyi ma dang srin bu me khyer bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:135b-10: nam mkha' dang padma'i rtsa ba'i bu ga bzhin no //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:135b-14: rgyal po zas gtsang rgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:135b-15: chu mang du btab nas dbugs slar byung ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:135b-16: 'char ka gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:135b-21: rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:135b-22: shes ldan dag gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon par 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:135b-23: rgyal po'i khab dang pho brang byi dor gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:135b-25: lha bcom ldan 'das ni pho brang du bzhugs par mi mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:136a-2: 'char ka gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:136a-3: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa ri mor bris te bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:136a-4: de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:136a-5: shes ldan dag n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:136a-6: khang phran drug cu brtsig tu chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:136a-7: lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la mnyan nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:136a-17: tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te yab sras gdan 'dzom na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-0: tsher mar bcas @140b pa'i sa gzhi la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-1: zhabs kyis ji ltar gshegs par mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-3: nga yi shing rta rdzu 'phrul rkang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-4: yang dag rtsol ba'i bzhon pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-5: sa kun rnam par rgyu na yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-6: nyon mongs tsher mas gnod pa med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-7: rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-8: dpa' bo sngon ni ka shi ka'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-9: na bza' mnabs na mdzes pa las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-10: ngur smrig rtsub po'i gos mnabs pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-11: ji ltar khyod kyi sku yis bzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-13: rgyal po nga'i gos ngo tsha shes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-14: nga yi bgo ba rnam sbyar te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-15: de bgos thub pa zhi ba rnams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-16: nags khrod na ni mdzes par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-17: rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-18: 'di ltar khyod sngon gser gyi gzhong pa nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-19: du ma'i ro ldan 'bras chan gsol ba las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-20: 'di ltar gtso bo da lta'i bsod snyoms ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-21: phal ba gsol ba ji ltar mgur du mchi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-23: zas kyi sred pa thams cad spangs nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-24: nges par byung dang mnyam par bzhag ldan pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-25: nga ni chos kyi ro mchog gsol mod kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-26: 'jig rten kun la brtse phyir nga spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-27: rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-28: mgur du bde ba mang bgyid pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-29: rgun skyems kha ra'i chab gsol na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-30: rnyog pa can la dro ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-31: chab ni ji lta zhig tu gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-32: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-33: mi yi bdag po gang 'thungs na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-34: bdag la btung ba thams cad ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-35: dug dang 'dra bar snang gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:140b-36: chos kyi ro mchog nga btung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-0: rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol @141a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-1: pa; 'di ltar khyod sngon bsil khang gzhal med khang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-2: khang bzang steng na ji lta'i dus bzhin bzhugs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-3: da lta gcig pu nags khrod khyod bzhugs pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-4: blo bzang ji ltar bsnyengs pa med par bzhugs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-6: go'u tam 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba gang yin de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-7: dri ma bag chags bcas par ngas spangs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-8: nga ni mya ngan 'jigs pa med gnas te; ;nga la 'di na 'jigs pa cung zad med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-9: rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-10: khyod sngon khrus khang shin tu yid 'ong bar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-11: khrus mchog khyad par 'phags pas rtag bsil na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-12: gcig pu khyod ni nags khrod gnas bsten par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-13: thub dbang da ltar su yis khrus mdzad 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-15: go'u tam chos kyi mtsho bran dri med pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-16: tshul khrims 'jug ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-17: de la rig pa'i yon tan mi bkrus nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-18: lus mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-19: rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-20: gang gis khyod ni khyad du gsod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-21: gang las 'jigs su rung ba ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-22: yid 'byung ba yang gang las skye //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-23: zhus pa de dag bdag la gsungs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-25: gang gis nga ni khyad gsod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-26: gang zhig las ni 'jigs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-27: gang las yid byung skyes pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-28: nyon cig khyod la bshad par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-29: rga dang na dang 'chi ba ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-30: gal te 'di gsum yod min na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141a-31: nga yang shin tu yid 'ong ba'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-0: yul rnams la ni @141b dga' bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-1: rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-2: sh'akya rnams kyi rigs dga' ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-3: legs par 'khrungs pa'i dpa' bo legs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-4: khyod ni 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-5: ji lta bur yang ma gos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-6: de nas rab dga' dad pa rgyas byas nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-7: drang srong dge 'dun bskor ba byas nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-8: thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-9: bde bar gshegs la kun nas rtog cing 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-10: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-11: gang bdag gis bus yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra bar 'khor de'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-14: khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-15: de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad par mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-16: de thos pas zad dkar la sogs pa sh'akya bdun stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-17: rgyal po zas gtsang ni ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-18: lhas byin nga rgyal can las kyang nga rgyal can sdig pa 'dod pa des bden pa mthong bar ma byas pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-19: khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa dang bcas pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-20: gal te bdag gis 'di 'dra'i sgyu mas dbang du byed par shes na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-21: bdag gis kyang 'jig rten thams cad dbang du bya ba zhig //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-22: de la sh'akya rnams kyis bshes pa'i tshig gis smras pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-23: lhas byin bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba yin gyis de skad ma smra zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:141b-24: ces bzlog nas cang mi smra bar 'jug go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142a-1: mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad par mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142a-2: de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par bre bo zas la sogs pa sh'akya drug khri drug stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang lhas byin de kho na bzhin du kha zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142a-3: ro hi ta ka'i skyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142a-4: de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par //
