K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142a-5: bdud rtsi zas la sogs pa sh'akya bdun khri lnga stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang lhas sbyin dang de kho na bzhin du kha zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142a-6: 'khor lhag ma rnams las kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142a-7: kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142a-8: kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142a-9: kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142a-10: kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142a-11: kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142a-12: kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142a-13: kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142a-14: kha cig gis ni chos la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142a-15: kha cig gis ni dge 'dun la ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142a-16: 'khor de dag kyang phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142a-19: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142b-0: sngon ni bcom ldan 'das lha dang lha ma yin gyi 'gro bar @142b bcas pas mchod pa dang brjed pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142b-1: mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142b-2: da lta ni mis mchod kyi lhas ni ma yin no snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142b-3: de nas sh'akya gzhon nu zhig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142b-4: drang srong chen po smra mchog dam chos kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142b-5: char pas 'gro ba 'di ni tshim mdzad de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142b-6: mi bzad lam du ltung ba'i 'jig rten 'di //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142b-7: drongs te thar pa'i lam la sbyar bar mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142b-8: rgyal po zas gtsang ni 'di snyam du bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no snyam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142b-9: lhag par dga' bas bden pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142b-11: rgyal po zas gtsang gis ci'i phyir bden pa ma mthong snyam pa las de 'di snyam du bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no snyam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142b-12: lhag par dga' ba las gyur gyis mdor na de'i dregs pa spong du gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142b-13: rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa mthong bar mi 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142b-16: de la zhum pa'i sems dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142b-17: shin tu dga' ba yid kyis ma la ngas de'i zhum pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142b-18: shin tu dga' ba gnyis spong du gzhug go snyam nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142b-20: mo'u dgal gyi bu rgyal po zas gtsang la soms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142b-21: btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:142b-22: bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas rgyal po zas gtsang gang ba na bder song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143a-0: rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa mo'i dgal gyi bu chen po rgyang ring po nas @143a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143a-2: mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143a-3: btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po tshur spyon //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143a-4: mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po khyod byon pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143a-5: btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143a-6: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143a-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam par gzhag na rang gi stan las mi snang bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143a-8: shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143a-13: me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143a-14: me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143a-15: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u gal gyi bu chen po'i lus las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143a-22: shel gyi kha dog dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143a-23: cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par byed de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143a-24: lus kyi smad nas me 'bar bar byed la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143a-25: lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143a-26: lus kyi stod nas me 'bar bar byed la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143a-27: lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143a-28: shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143a-30: byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-0: phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam @143b pa bzhi bstan nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-1: rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du byas pa bsdus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-2: gdan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-3: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-4: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-5: btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba gzhan yang mchis lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-7: rgyal po chen po mchis so zhes tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-8: mthu che ba dang gsum rig dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-9: sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-10: zag zad dgra bcom pa gang yin pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-11: thub pa'i nyan thos mang du mchis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-12: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-13: bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-14: 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i rab tu byung ba gzhan yang yod do snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-15: de shin tu dga' ba gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-16: skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-18: tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams 'ongs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-19: lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos bshad do snyam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-20: chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-22: srog chags grog sbur rnams kyi sems kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes par 'gyur na brgya byin dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:143b-23: tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144a-0: gang gi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe nyan thos chen po rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs @144a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144a-1: pa mi shes na brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyis lta ci smos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144a-2: srog chags grog sbur rnams kyis lta ga la shes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144a-3: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144a-4: bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144a-5: de 'di snyam du sems te lha'i 'khor dag pa rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed do snyam nas de nas lha'i bu bu bzo thams cad pa la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144a-6: bzo thams cad pa bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad par bzhed kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144a-7: n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna ba bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144a-9: khyod kyi mchog tu bzang ngo zhes lha'i bu bzo thams cad pas lha rnams kyis dbang po brgya byin las mnyan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144a-10: n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul to /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144a-11: de la rgyal po chen po bzhi sgo bzhin nga 'khod pa ni yul 'khor skyong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144a-15: shar sgo na ni yul 'khor skyong dpung rgyan dang rna cha gdub skor dang phreng ba dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144a-16: lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po lha'i brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144a-17: nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144b-0: byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po rgyan thams cad kyis @144b brgyan pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144b-1: de nas lha rnams kyis dbang po brgya byin gyis n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra ba che thang du brgyan du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144b-2: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144b-3: bcom ldan 'das la don de rgyas par gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das brgya byin dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144b-5: tshangs pa la sogs pa lha brgya stong phrag du ma yongs su bskor nas khang pa brtsegs par bzhugs te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144b-6: lha'i 'khor phal po che'i gung la rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144b-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144b-8: rgyal po zas gtsang khrid de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144b-9: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144b-10: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang nang du zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144b-11: rgyal po zas gtsang la rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong gis rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'gro bar sdod cig ces bzlog go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144b-13: bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144b-14: der mir 'gyur ba 'jug tu mi dbang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144b-15: rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144b-17: rgyal po chen po bdag ni yul 'khor skyong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144b-18: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang lho sgor song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144b-19: rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po mthong nas smras pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144b-20: rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144b-21: rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144b-24: rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'phags skyes po'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:144b-26: bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor de dag pa la chos 'chad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-2: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang nub sgor song ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-3: rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis mthong nas smras pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-4: rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-5: rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-7: mig mi bzang gis smras pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-8: rgyal po chen po bdag mig mi bzang ngo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-10: bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-11: der mi 'gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-12: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang byang sgor song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-13: rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-14: rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-15: rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-17: rnam thos kyi bus smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-18: rgyal po chen po bdag ni rnam thos kyi bu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-20: bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-21: der mi gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-22: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang kye ma'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-23: bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-24: bdag gis lha'o snyam pa'i 'dod pa skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-25: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang zhum pa'i rgyud pa gang yin pa de bral bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-27: rgyal po zas gtsang gis gal te nga ma mthong na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-28: khrag dron mo skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur pa'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de yod kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145a-29: de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs pa gang yin pa de @145b shel las byas par sprul pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145b-1: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145b-2: mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145b-9: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145b-10: de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145b-11: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145b-12: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145b-14: lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145b-15: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la phas ma bgyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145b-19: sngon gyi 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145b-20: dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145b-23: gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa de ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145b-25: khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145b-26: rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145b-27: ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bkum /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145b-28: mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145b-29: bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145b-31: pha la lan du phan gdags pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:145b-32: dam pa'i bus ni bgyi ba gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146a-2: sems ni grol bar gzhol bar bgyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146a-3: khyod kyis bdag ni ngan 'gro las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146a-4: drangs te mtho ris thar pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146a-5: bsgrim mi 'tshal bar bzhag lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146a-6: khyod kyis dka' ba mdzad pa legs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146a-7: mgon po byams pa khyod kyis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146a-8: bdag ni tshong pa rnyed ldan ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146a-9: mtho ris rnyed pas srid pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146a-10: longs spyod dag ni rnyed par mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146a-11: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang stan las langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146a-12: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146a-13: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146a-14: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146a-15: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu song bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146a-16: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146a-17: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146a-20: zas dkar gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146a-21: zas dkar la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146a-22: gzhon nu khyod rgyal srid thob kyis rgyal srid khyer cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146a-23: ci'i slad du ngas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146b-0: bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das gang gi nyi ma la n+ya gro dha'i @146b kun dga' ra bar chos bshad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146b-1: de'i nyi ma la sh'akya bdun khri bdun stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146b-2: de bzhin du bre bo zas la rgyal srid khyer cig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146b-4: bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe tshangs pas bskor ba'i skyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe sh'akya drug khri drug stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146b-5: de bzhin du bdud rtsi zas la rgyal srid khyer cig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146b-7: bdag gis kyang gang gis tshe bcom ldan 'das ro hi ta ka'i skyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe sh'akya bdun khri lnga stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146b-8: gal te de ltar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146b-9: da su zhig rgyal srid la bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146b-11: sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis bgyi'o zhes de rnams 'dus nas sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bskur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146b-12: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146b-13: gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146b-14: bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams shing nor bu'i chu'i snod bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146b-15: bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol ba btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146b-16: da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146b-20: dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:146b-21: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147a-0: rgyal po zas gtsang gi bkad sa gang na @147a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147a-1: ba der gshegs te byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147a-2: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147a-3: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147a-4: gtsang zhing gsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147a-5: bca' bas rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147a-6: rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147a-8: lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147a-9: gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147a-10: bcom ldan 'das la n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra ba phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis yon bsngo bar mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147a-12: sbyin pa'i bsod nams gang yin 'dis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147a-13: sh'akya rnams kyi bsams pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147a-14: yid la re ba rdzogs nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147a-15: rtag pa'i gnas ni thob par shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi shing n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147a-17: de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi shing n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes gdags pa byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147a-18: bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi de nyid na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147a-19: nyi ma gcig ni rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147a-20: nyi ma gcig ni btsun mo'i nang du gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147b-0: rgyal po zas gtsang gis ral pa can las rab tu byung ba'i dge @147b slong rnams spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147b-1: dka' thub drag po'i brtul zhugs kyi khyad par dag gis lus gdungs pas lus mi mdzes par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147b-2: mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147b-3: 'di ltar ral pa can 'di dag spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147b-4: lus mdzes pa ma yin na 'khor ci 'dra ba zhig gis bcom ldan 'das mdzes par 'gyur snyam pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147b-6: sh'akya'i 'khor gyis yin no snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147b-7: de nas sh'akya thams cad bsags te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147b-8: shes ldan dag gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rab tu ma byung bar gyur na cir 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147b-9: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147b-10: khyed cag ci zhig byed par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147b-12: da ltar gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal por gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147b-13: khyed cag ci'i phyir g-yog mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147b-20: gang grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir dril sgrogs su bcug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147b-21: rgyal po'i zhal nas nga'i yul na gnas pa'i sh'akya rnams kyis khyim re nas re re rab tu byung zhig ces de skad bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147b-22: bre po zas la bu gnyis yod pa ma 'gags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147b-24: ming chen ni zhing las kyi mtha' la lhag par brtson no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147b-25: ma 'gags pa ni steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi la 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147b-26: skyes pa med pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147b-27: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147b-28: ming chen la mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:147b-29: bu rgyal pos dril sgrogs su bcug pa sh'akya rnams las khyim re nas re re rab tu byung zhig ces bsgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148a-0: bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung gis khyod @148a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148a-1: kyi bu sdug pa bde ba dang ldan par gnas pa gang yin pa de rab tu byung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148a-2: bu bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can gyi sems can de la khyod 'gran ma tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148a-3: yum khyod gang la dgyes pa de bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can lags mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148a-4: de ring de la cung zad kyang ma bskur dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148a-5: ci bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148a-7: bu de bzhin du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148a-9: des gzeb stong pa rdze'u yis bkang nas kha ras dkar pos dkris te rgya skegs la rgyas btab nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148a-10: bu mo mngag gzhug ma'i lag tu bskur nas bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148a-11: gal te de na ci yod ces 'dri dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148a-12: ci yang ma mchis so zhes smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148a-13: des de khyer nas song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148a-14: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148a-15: rang sangs rgyas kun shes la bsod snyoms phul ba gang yin pa de deng ci'i phyir zas kyis phongs par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148a-16: de'i zan sbyar bar bya'o zhes des rje'u de rnams su sran tshod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148a-17: tshod ma sna tshogs ro dang ldan pa dang zas kyis bkang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148a-18: ji tsam na mngag gzhug ma des khyer nas ma 'gags pa'i drung du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148a-20: bu mo'i ni na ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148a-22: gzhon nu ci yang ma mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148a-26: gdon mi za bar 'di ni ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i zas shig bskur gyis re zhig blta'o zhes ci tsam na kha phye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148b-0: skyed mos tshal de thams cad zas kyi dri zhim pos gang bar gyur @148b to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148b-1: de bsnams nas ma 'gags pa mchog tu ya mtshan skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148b-2: de ma la gus pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148b-3: des ma la zas kyi phud bskur nas spring pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148b-4: yum gdugs re re zhing zas ci yang ma yin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di lta bu sha stag bskur pa'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148b-5: des kyang mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148b-6: des ming chen la bstan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148b-9: khyod la kho mos sngar bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po'i sems can mi skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa la khyod 'gran ma tshol cig ces ma smras sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148b-11: yum bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po dang ldan yang rung mi ldan yang rung bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes de ltar ming chen gnas skabs thams cad du rab tu byung bar khas len tu ma btub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148b-12: de nas des ma 'gags pa la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148b-13: bu rgyal pos dril sgrogs su bcug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148b-14: sh'akya rnams las khyim re nas re re rab tu byung zhig ces bsgo na khyod ci rab tu 'byung 'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148b-17: yum rab tu byung ba la phan yon ci mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148b-19: khyim par mchis pa la phan yon ci mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148b-21: bu rab tu byung bas legs par bsgrubs na mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148b-22: legs pa ma bsgrubs na lha dang mi thob par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148b-23: khyim par 'dug par legs par bskyangs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148b-26: ma bskyangs na sems can dmyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:148b-29: yum rab tu byung ba'i nyes dmigs gang lags pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-0: khyim na gnas pa'i phan yon lags @149a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-2: de bas na khyim na gnas pa mi 'tshal gyi gnang bar mdzod cig dang rab tu 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-4: bu legs kyi de bzhin du gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-5: ma 'gags pa'i ne'u zla sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan yin pas de'i drung du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-6: de'i tshe sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan pi wang len te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-7: de pi wang len pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-8: rgyud chad nas sgra gzhan du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-10: pi wang len pa la byang ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-11: des sgra ci 'dra bar gyur pa'i rtags bzung nas de sgor bsdad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-12: sgo srung gi mi la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-13: kye nang rje song la rgyal po bzang ldan la ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong par 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so zhes gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-14: sgo srung song nas sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-15: lha ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas chab sgo na sdod cing mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-17: shes ldan ma 'gags pa la su 'gog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-18: shes ldan ma 'gags pa nang du thong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-19: de nang du zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-20: rgyal pos 'khyud nas 'dug tu bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-24: gang gi tshe khyod pi wang len pa na rgyud chad nas sgra gzhan du gyur pa nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-25: de mchog tu ya mtshan skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-27: khyod pi wang len pa la byang ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-28: sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-29: gzhon nu don ci zhig la 'ongs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149a-31: lha rgyal po zas gtsang gis dril sgrogs su bcug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149b-0: sh'akya rnams la khyim re nas re re rab tu byung @149b zhig par bsgo bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149b-1: de khyod kyis mkhyen par mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149b-4: gal te de ltar na kho bo yang rab tu 'byung ste gros bya ba yod kyis khyod de ring 'di nyid du gnas thob cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149b-5: des de nyid du gnas btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149b-6: mal cha bas rims bag gi dri can gyi gos kyis bting zhing me tog gi sil mas bkram pa'i mal du ma 'gags pa nyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149b-7: de'i 'og na me tog gi rtsa ba yod pa'i reg pa de'i nyams su myong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149b-8: ci 'di'i 'og na rdo phre'u yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149b-9: de rnams kyis brtag par brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149b-10: me tog gi rtsa ba zhig mthong nas de rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149b-11: ma 'gags pas mtshan mo mi bde bzhin nyal nas nam nangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149b-14: cig bde bar gnyid log gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149b-16: lha bde bar gnyid ma log go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149b-20: lha rims bag gi dri can gyi gos bting bar me tog sil ma bkram pa'i me tog gi rtsa bas lus snad lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149b-21: rgyal pos mal 'cha' ba bkug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149b-22: khyod kyis rims bag gi dri can gyi gos bting ste ci bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149b-24: lha bdag la dkor bas gtad pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149b-25: rgyal pos dkor ba bkug nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149b-26: khyod kyis rigs bag gi dri can gyi gos phog ste ci bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149b-28: lha bdag la tha ga pas gtad pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149b-29: rgyal pos thag pa bkug nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:149b-30: khyod kyis ci'i phyir rims bag gi dri can gyi gos dbul /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150a-2: bdag rims kyis thebs bzhin bgyis pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150a-4: gzhon nu khyod kyis ci ltar shes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150a-6: tsha ba'i reg pa nyams su myong bas rims bag gi dri lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150a-7: rgyal po mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150a-8: shes ldan ma 'gags pa ni sh'akya'i skal pa bzang po dang ldan pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150a-9: de nas sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150a-10: gzhon nu gal te kho bo rab tu byung na lhas byin sh'akya rnams kyi rgyal por gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150a-11: de sh'akya rnams la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150a-12: ma la bdag cag thams cad 'dus la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150a-13: lha sbyin spro ba bskyed par bya'o zhes sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis de bkug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150a-14: de nas thams cad 'dus nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150a-15: lha sbyin kho bo cag thams cad rab tu 'byung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150a-18: gal te rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150a-19: sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150a-20: de la thabs shig bsham par bya ste bslu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150a-21: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di nyi ma la n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra bar sgyu ma'i cho 'phul bstan pa de'i tshe bdag blo skyes pa ji ltar 'di'i sgyu mas skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du byed pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang dbang du bya'o zhes bsams so snyam nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150a-22: khyed cag rab tu 'byung na bdag ci ste 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150b-0: sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis @150b bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150b-1: 'di ni brdzun du smra ba yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150b-2: dam 'char bcug la 'gro ba mang pos so sor rig par bya'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150b-3: de nas rgyal pos tshig de glegs bu la bris nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150b-4: grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir dril sgrogs su bcug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150b-5: grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150b-10: sh'akya lnga brgya rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150b-11: thos par gyis la rab tu dga' ba bskyed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150b-13: lhas byin gyis de thos nas sdug bsngal chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150b-14: yid mi bde ba skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150b-15: gal te bdag gis sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan nges par rab tu 'byung bar shes par gyur dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150b-16: bdag khas len par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150b-17: da ni gal te rab tu ma byung na brdzun du smra ba yin no zhes rgyal srid kyang thob par mi 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150b-18: thams cad kyi thams cad du dus 'dir zad dam cis rab tu byung la bdag rab tu 'byung bzhin du rgyal srid bya'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150b-19: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150b-20: sh'akya rnams kyi tha ma'i 'byor pa la blta'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150b-21: des grong khyer de gseg ma dang gyo mo bsal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150b-22: tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150b-25: dar gyi chun 'phyangs mang po dbyangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150b-26: shin tu dri zhim po'i phog phor nye bar bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:150b-27: me tog sna tshogs kyi sil mas dga' dga' ldan byed du bcug go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151a-0: de nas sh'akya brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su @151a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151a-1: bskor nas grong khyer gyi sgo na sengge'i khri la 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151a-2: sh'akya mo dang sh'akya gzhon nu ma ngo mtshar skyes pa rnams kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151a-3: skar khung khol ma can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151a-6: sh'akya rnams kyi 'byor pa la lta bar 'dod pa'i skye bo'i tshogs yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa dag kyang lam po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151a-10: sh'akya las su dag gis ni mnyes par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151a-11: su dag gis ni thugs byung bar 'gyur ba brtag pa'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151a-13: ltas mkhan dag pa bkug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151a-17: rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams kyis pha dang ma dag las bltas nas so so'i shing rtar zhugs te phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151a-18: sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan sna la byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151a-19: mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151a-21: re zhig 'dis ni mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151a-22: de bzhin du nam gru dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151a-23: ma 'gags pa la sogs pa phyir byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151a-24: de rnams kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151a-25: de nas lhas byin phyir byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151a-26: de phyir byung ba na bya khras gtsug gi nor bu phrogs pa mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa; 'di'i rtags dang sbyar na gdon mi za bar ston pa la 'khus nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151a-29: ka ta mo ra ka ti sha dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151b-0: rgya mtshos byin rnams phyir 'byung ba @151b na bong bu'i skad grag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151b-1: de dag kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151b-2: 'di dag gis kyang nyan thos chen po rnams la tshig ngan pa smras nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151b-3: nye dga' glang po che la zhon pas phan tshun du lta bar byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151b-4: mu tig gi do shal lhung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151b-5: de glang po che las babs te blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151b-6: de yang de rnams kyis lung bstan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151b-7: 'di ha cang 'dod chen ches pas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151b-11: lha sbyin la sogs pa sh'akya lnga brgya po de rnams skyed mos tshal du dus ston la 'gro ba bzhin du bzang pos 'gran cing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151b-13: gal te ngas sh'akya rnams la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151b-14: kha cig gis ni mnyes par byed par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151b-15: kha cig gis ni mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151b-16: mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag gzhan du sems la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151b-17: dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba ni thams cad srid pa tha ma yin pas ma la ngas thams cad dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang bzhi'i las kyis rab tu byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151b-18: bsnyen par rdzogs su gzhug go snyam du dgongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151b-19: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151b-20: dge slong dag ser skya'i gzhi'i sh'akya rnams gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:151b-21: btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152a-1: po zas gtsang gis sh'akya rnams kyi 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor zhes bya ba de rnams rab tu 'byin pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152a-3: sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyi skra 'dreg pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152a-4: de ngom zug gnag cing mchi ma 'dzag la skad 'dzer cing dbugs brdzangs por skra 'dreg par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152a-5: sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152a-7: de snying rje rje skad du gcom chung ngur dal bus tshig re nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152a-8: lha bdag 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes bu gtso bo rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152a-9: mi phal pa rnams la yang bsnyen bkur bgyid pa 'gyur ba lta zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152a-10: khyed kyis spangs te gson pas ni gum mi bsngo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152a-11: sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152a-12: nye bar 'khor khyod kyis jo bo la snying nye ba'i mnyes par bya ba bstan zin te chog gis mya ngan ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152a-13: ngas ci lta mi phal pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152a-14: des phyogs gcig tu ras shig bting nas sh'akya gzhon nu rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152a-15: shes ldan gzhon nu dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152a-16: 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor 'dis bdag cag la bkur sti byas la bdag cag kyang slar khyim du mi gnas kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152a-17: rgyan rnams de'i 'tsho ba'i rkyen du ras kyi steng du zhog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152a-18: de rnams kyi se mo do dang do shal dang mgul rgyan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152a-21: rna cha la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152a-22: rgyan khyad par can rnams kyis ras kyi steng du phung po chen por spungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152b-0: nye bar 'khor gyis de rnams @152b mthar gyis skra bregs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152b-1: de rnams khrus la dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152b-3: re zhig gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152b-5: lang tsho la bab cing chung ma dang ldan la mdzod dang bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu 'byung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152b-6: bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152b-7: gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152b-8: bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las rgal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152b-9: sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtsal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152b-10: 'bad pa la brtson par bya ba zhig snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152b-12: ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa de bzhin du nyan thos chen po rnams kyang byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152b-13: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor lhag par skyo ba skyes pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152b-14: mthong nas kyang 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor gang na bder song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152b-15: 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152b-16: nye bar 'khor khyod ci'i phyir shin tu mi dga' bas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152b-19: gang gi phyir da ltar gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152b-21: lang tsho la bab cing chung ma dang ldan la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:152b-22: mdzod dang bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu 'byung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153a-0: bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa @153a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153a-1: ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153a-2: gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing chu bo las rgal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153a-3: sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtsal ba dang 'bad pa la brtson par bgyi ba zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153a-4: bdag ci'i phyir sems khong du chud par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153a-5: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus smras pa; bzhin bzang thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni rigs snying por byed pa ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153a-6: rus snying por byed pa ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153a-7: rgyud snying por byed pa ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153a-8: thos pa snying por byed pa ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153a-9: 'di ltar thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni sgrub pa snying por byed pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153a-10: de bzhin gshegs rnams rigs dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153a-11: rgyud dang rus la rtog mi mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153a-12: 'das nas yun ring lon pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153a-13: las rnams la ni rtog par mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153a-14: gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153a-15: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'dod na tshur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153a-17: khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byin par 'gyur ro ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153a-21: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor 'khrid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153a-22: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153a-24: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-0: btsun pa nye bar @153b 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-1: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-2: thugs brtse bar nye bar gzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di rab tu dbyung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-4: bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-6: dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i mod kho nar skra byi ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-10: bya ma bum gyis 'brel ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-11: skra dang kha spu skyes nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-12: dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-14: de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-15: skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-16: mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-17: sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-18: sh'akya rab tu byung ba rnams ni rgan rabs ji lta ba bzhin du 'dud par byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-19: sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan 'dud par byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-20: nye bar 'khor gyi rkang pa yin par shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-21: de nas des gdong bteg ste gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-22: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni nye bar 'khor lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-23: ci bdag gis 'di'i rkang pa gnyis la yang 'dud par bgyi'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-25: bu nga rgyal spangs pa'i phyir rab tu byung ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-26: 'di rgan gyis khyod kyis nga rgyal gyi dregs pa chog la thud cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:153b-27: des de'i rkang pa la gtugs pa na sa chen po lan drug tu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154a-1: sa chen po 'di g-yos rab tu g-yos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154a-5: kun tu rab tu ldeg ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154a-6: shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154a-7: nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154a-8: lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154a-9: byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154a-11: mtha' mtho na dbus dma' bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154a-12: de ltar thams cad kyis rim bzhin du gtugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154a-13: lhas byin gyis ma btud pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154a-15: bu nga rgyal spangs pa'i phyir rab tu byung ba yin gyis thud cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154a-17: bdag gis de'i rkang pa la ma gtugs na khyod la gnod pa ci mchis zhes de 'dud du ma btub ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154a-18: de thog mar bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lhas byin gyis bcag go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154a-19: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154a-20: btsun pa sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis nye bar 'khor la phyag bgyis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154a-21: sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos par gyur pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154a-24: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154a-25: 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis de'i rkang pa la gtugs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154a-26: sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g-yos pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154a-27: dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154a-28: rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154b-4: skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154b-5: de'i tshe w'a ra n'a si'i grong khyer na smad tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de'i drung du bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga' zhes bya ba song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154b-6: bzang mo dga' mgur spyad kyis tshur shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154b-8: khyod la kar sha pa na lnga brgya yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154b-10: med do; ;song la kar sha pa na lnga brgya khyer te shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154b-11: de la 'byor pa med kyang de de la lhag par chags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154b-12: dus dus su me tog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154b-13: 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs bskyel bar byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154b-14: de de la sdug pa skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154b-15: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na w'a ra na sir dus ston byung nas bud med thams cad gos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154b-18: rang gi khyim na rtse zhing dga' ba mang pos gnas pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154b-19: bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dags thos nas yi chad par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154b-20: smad 'tshong ma bzang mos bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154b-21: de ring w'a ra n'a si'i mi rnams gos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154b-23: rgyan rnams kyis klubs nas rang rang gi chung ma rnams dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154b-24: bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga' su zhig dang dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur zhes de de snyam du sems shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154b-25: bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga' gang na yod pa'i phyogs der 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:154b-27: sngon gyi byas pa drin du gzo bas yid bde ba skyed nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155a-0: bram ze'i khye'u song la shin tu dri zhim pa'i me tog @155a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155a-2: bdag cag lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155a-3: de shi ba las sos pa bzhin du dga' bas sems kyi rgyud ngo mtshar gyis bsdus nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155a-6: g-yer ba'i yon tan la brtags nas myos shing zhen pas mtshan thog thag gnyid ma log pas nam nangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155a-7: mtshan mo gnyid kyis shin tu lci bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155a-8: ji tsam nyi ma shar gyi bar du gnyid log nas gang gi tshe 'jig rten gyi dus ston gyi ched du me tog thams cad btus zin pa de'i tshe sad nas me tog gi ched du phan tshun song ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155a-9: ma rnyed nas des shing shi ri sha zhes bya ba'i me tog gcig khyer nas de'i drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155a-10: tshigs su bcad pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155a-11: g-yang gzhi thogs pa phu pho mdzes dga' ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155a-12: ma sha phyed med rgyud zhan snyoms las kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155a-13: de ring shing rnams me tog rgyas dus na'ang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155a-14: sbyin pa'i me tog shir sha 'di yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155a-16: song la me tog gzhan dag khyer la shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155a-17: 'dod pa rnams la so sor rten par byed pa ni kun tu sbyong ba la sogs te; de'i 'dod chags rab tu 'phel bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155a-18: sos ka'i zla ba tha ma'i nyin par sprin med cing rlung mi ldang bar 'dug pa'i nyi ma phyed kyi dus dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155a-19: grong khyer nas shin tu thag ring ba'i yul dgon pa dag tu mgo 'dren pa dang dkyus ma dag dbyangs su len cing me tog thu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155a-20: rgyal po tshangs sbyin yang ri dvags shor du chas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-0: de nyi ma'i 'od zer rnon pos gdungs nas grib ma'i ched du phyogs der son pa @155b na de'i glu'i sgra thos nas tshigs su bcad nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-1: steng nas nyi mas gdungs byed cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-2: 'og nas bye mas gdungs pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-3: glu len khyod kyi lus la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-4: ci'i phyir nyi ma'i gdungs pa med; ;mdzes dags kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-5: bdag ni nyi mas ma gdungs te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-6: rtog pa yis ni bdag gdungs lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-7: bya ba bya ba ma yin pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-10: bram ze'i khye'u 'di ni gdon mi za bar bsil bar byed pa'i gtam la mkhas pa zhig yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-11: des na nyi ma phyed kyi tshe 'dug nas me tog thu'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-12: des de bkug ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-13: bram ze'i khye'u re zhig bsil bar byed pa'i gtam dag byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-16: rgyal po de ni gdon mi za bar lus gdungs pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-17: des na 'di skad ces smra'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-18: des bsil bar byed pa'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs de la smras pa thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-19: rgyal po lus kyi gdung ba dang bral bar 'gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-20: rgyal po mngon par dga' bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-21: blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-22: shes ldan dag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i srog sbyin pa gang yin pa de la lan du phan ci gdags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-23: lha rgyal srid kyi phyed kyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-24: de nas rgyal po des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-25: bram ze'i khye'u de ring rgyal po'i pho brang du gnas thob cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:155b-26: sang rgyal srid kyi phyed sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156a-0: de rgyal po'i pho brang du mal bzang po byin nas de de la nyal @156a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156a-2: bzang mo rjes su dran par sems shing rgyal srid phyed po de yang smad 'tshong ma bzang mo'i phyir blang ngo snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156a-4: rgyal srid phyed po de la longs spyod pa'i rgyal po de ci 'dra ba zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156a-5: ma la bdag gis de srog dang bral bar bya'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156a-7: rgyal po bsad pa'i rgyal srid gang yin pa des ci zhig bya snyam nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156a-10: ma grub na ni phongs gyur pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156a-11: de bas don ni don ma yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156a-12: ji tsam nam nangs su nye ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156a-13: de 'gyod pa skyes nas mal nas babs te g-yang gzhis la bting nas nyal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156a-14: nam nangs pa na rgyal pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156a-15: shes ldan dag bram ze'i khye'u de khug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156a-16: de la rgyal srid phyed sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156a-17: rgyal po'i pho nya dag 'ongs pa na mal chen po nas babs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156a-18: g-yang gzhis la bting nas nyal ba mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156a-19: mthong nas kyang ma dad pa skyed de rgyal po'i gan du song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156a-20: lha 'di ni rgyal srid kyi 'os ma lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156a-24: lha nyon mongs mal chen po gya nom pa spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156a-25: g-yang gzhi sa la bting nas mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156a-26: nyal ba'i dman pa la mos pa gang lags pa de la rgyal srid stsal te cir rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156b-0: shes rab can de de la rgyu zhig yod @156b bar 'gyur gyis khug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156b-1: de rnams kyis de bkug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156b-3: kye bram ze'i khye'u khyod ci'i phyir mal chen po las babs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156b-4: g-yang gzhi sa la bting nas nyal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156b-5: des ji ltar gyur pa rnams rgyal po la rig par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156b-7: lha gnang bar mdzod cig dang rab tu 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156b-10: gal te khyod rab tu byung nas khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad rtogs pa nga la brjod pa lta na gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156b-11: des de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes khas blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156b-12: de nas des zhi ba'i phyogs su song nas mkhan po dang slob dpon med par rang byang chub rtogs par byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156b-13: rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156b-14: bdag gis rgyal po de la sngon khas blangs pas song la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156b-15: khas blangs pa de rig par bya'o zhes de rgyal po'i drung du song nas steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156b-18: glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156b-19: rgyal pos de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te tshigs su bcad pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156b-20: dge ba ci zhig btsal phyir rab byung ba'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156b-21: bram ze'i khye'u yis rnyed pa legs rnyed de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156b-22: cung zad las kyi rnam smin bskyed pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156b-23: nyer 'gros khyad par chen po 'dir rtogs ltos; ;rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi skra mkhan gangg'a skyong zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:156b-24: des mdzes dgas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa 'dzin du bcug nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157a-0: gangg'a skyong nga la tshigs su bcad pa de @157a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157a-1: yang dang yang du dran par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157a-2: skra mkhan gangg'a skyong rang gi bzo la shin tu byang ba yin pas de gang gi tshe rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi kha spu 'chos pa de'i tshe gnyid log par 'gyur zhing se gol gyis sad par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157a-3: sad nas kyang gangg'a skyong nga la mchog gang 'dod pa gsol cig ces mchog sbyin par byed pa na des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157a-4: lha gsol ba zhig mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157a-5: gang gi tshe gangg'a skyong gis rgyal po la tshigs su bcad pa dran par byed pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157a-6: rgyal po 'dod pa'i gtam la sems kyang mi 'gro na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157a-7: 'dod pa zhen cing spyod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157a-8: btsun mo la lta bar yang mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157a-9: btsun mo rnams nyon mongs pas myos shing zhen nas gangg'a skyong la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157a-10: zhang po gang gi tshe khyod la lhas mchog sbyin par mdzad pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157a-11: lhas gal te bdag la dgyes na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157a-12: tshigs su bcad pa 'di'i don rgyas par bshad du gsol zhes gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157a-13: rgyal pos tshigs su bcad pa de'i don rgyas par rnam par bkrol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157a-14: de skyo ba skyes nas rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157a-15: lha bdag gis bsnyen bkur bgyis lags kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157a-16: khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157a-18: gal te rab tu byung nas yon tan gyi tshigs cung zad thob na nga la rig par byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157a-22: de drang srong rnams kyi nang du song ste rab tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157b-0: des mngon par shes pa lnga mngon @157b sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157b-2: bdag gis rgyal po tshangs sbyin la sngon khas blangs kyis song la khas blangs pa de rig par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157b-3: de rgyal po tshangs sbyin gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157b-4: steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157b-8: glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157b-9: so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas des rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157b-10: 'phags pa khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157b-12: rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis drang srong gangg'a skyong gi rkang pa la gtugs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157b-13: sa rnam pa drug tu g-yos par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157b-14: yang de'i mas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157b-15: tshangs sbyin blo dang ldan pa po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157b-17: bzhag nas rab tu byung 'di la; ;lha khyod 'dud pa'i tshul ma yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157b-18: rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi mas khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157b-19: 'di ltar thub pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157b-20: des ni dka' spyad 'di dag spyad lags te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157b-21: blo rgya chen por gyur pa gang lags pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157b-22: gangg'a skyong la chung zad ma gsungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157b-23: dka' thub zil gyis sdig pa thams cad mnan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157b-24: dka' thub zil gyis 'jig rten thams cad mnan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157b-25: dka' thub zil gyis 'dreg mkhan snod bcom ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157b-26: dka' thub 'bar la cung zad ma gsung shig //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:157b-27: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158a-0: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de bzang ldan 'di @158a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158a-2: drang srong gangg'a skyong zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158a-4: de na yang sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan tshangs sbyin du gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158a-5: nye bar 'khor drang srong gangg'a skyong zhes bya bar gyur pa la phyag byas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158a-6: sa rnam pa drug tu g-yos par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158a-7: da ltar yang bzang ldan gyis nye bar 'khor rab tu byung ba la phyag byas pa na sa rnam pa drug tu g-yos par gyur to; ;sdom la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158a-8: ko'u din+ya dang ril ba'i dbyibs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158a-9: thams cad sgrol nor shing rta dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158a-10: gdugs dang srin bu ki ta ka /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158a-11: byams pa'i dril sgrogs bcug pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158a-12: dga' skyong la du btung ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158a-16: tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u din+ya sa nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158a-18: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158a-19: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158a-20: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+yas las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158a-21: des na bcom ldan 'das kyis snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158a-24: dge slong kun shes ko'u di n+ya 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158a-25: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158b-0: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag @158b byas shing bsags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158b-1: dge slong ko'u din+ya 'di nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158b-2: dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158b-3: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158b-6: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158b-8: mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158b-10: skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158b-11: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158b-12: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158b-13: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158b-15: dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158b-16: 'jig rten du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158b-18: 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158b-19: bla na med pa lha dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158b-20: mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158b-21: de grong khyer w'a ra n'a sir nye bar brten nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158b-22: ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs zhes bya ba la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158b-23: ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158b-24: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158b-25: chos gos dang lhung bzed bsnams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158b-26: w'a ra n'a sir bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:158b-27: dga' 'dun lnga brgya tsam dong ba'i dga' 'dun de rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159a-0: @159a *// sku dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159a-2: 'od zer nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159a-3: rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159a-4: mthong ma thag tu dad pa skyes nas gros bya bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159a-5: shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di las rab tu 'byung bar bya'o zhes de rnams kyis de ltar gros byas pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159a-6: kha cig ni rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159a-7: kha cig ni yul gyi mthar dong ngo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159a-8: kha cig ni shi ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159a-9: skye bo bcu drug cig lus pa de rnams ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs la dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159a-10: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las rab tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159a-11: de rnams de ni bsam gtan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159a-14: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas shing zad pa'i me bzhin du drang srong smra ba'i ri dvags kyi nags su phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159a-15: de rnams la lha rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159a-16: shes ldan dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'das te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159a-17: de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de ring du zhag bdun lon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159a-18: de'i bstan pa yang nub na khyed cag 'bras bu med pa'i sbun pa 'dru zhing 'dug ste ci rung zhes byas pa thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159b-0: bya ba ma byas pa'i sdug bsngal chen pos @159b gdungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159b-1: de nas lnga ni thos ma thag tu ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs las babs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159b-2: w'a ra n'a sir zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159b-3: drug gis ni de nyid du yid byung bas brtson 'grus brtsams nas rang byang chub mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159b-4: phyi nas lnga yang babs nas w'a ra n'a si nyid du 'jug par brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159b-5: ji tsam na shing rtas 'tsho ba'i tshong pa dag 'gro ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159b-6: shing rtas 'tsho ba gcig gis glang dag nyam chung bzhin du de dag la; des lcag gzer bu can gyis yang nas yang du bzhus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159b-7: de rnams nyam chung bas shi la thug cing 'gro mi nus bzhin du shing rtas 'tsho ba'i tshong ba'i sna la 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159b-8: de la dge slong de rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159b-9: kye shing rtas 'tsho ba khyod kyi glang nyam chung ba 'di rnams la lcag gzer bu can gyis yang nas yang du bzhus te cir rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159b-10: gal te 'gro mi nus na dal bus 'gror chug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159b-13: bdag sna la shing rtas 'tsho ba'i tshong pa dang lhan cig mchi mi nus zhes gal te bdag phyi nas chas na gdon mi za bar shing rtas 'tsho ba'i tshong pa 'dis bdag bor nas dong bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159b-14: de rnams kyis shing rtas 'tsho ba de las zur bzung nas mi dga' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159b-16: shes ldan dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'das te bdag cag lus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159b-17: 'dis kyang bdag cag la bskul ma btab kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159b-18: ma la bdag cag gis brtson 'grus brtsams par bya'o zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:159b-19: tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160a-2: gal te chos ni nub gyur kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160a-3: yang dag sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160a-5: bdag cag gi ni zag pa yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160a-6: gal te zad par ma gyur na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160a-8: nyan thos mchog tu 'gyur bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160a-9: de rnams w'a ra n'a sir zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160a-11: slar yang ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs la dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160a-14: rnal 'byor gyis gnas pa na de rnams las bzhi shi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160a-15: gcig cig lus pa de mi dga' ba skyes shing yid byung bas ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160a-16: ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs gang yin pa 'di nyid la bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur byas la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160a-17: de'i dge slong nyi khri yang mthong nad bdag 'ba' zhig 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag na snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa lta zhig snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160a-18: des smon lam gdab par brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160a-19: 'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung las 'di srid du tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad kyang ma rtogs kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160a-20: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba gang yin pa de la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub par 'gyur @160b ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas der thog mar nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160b-1: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa des bdag snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160b-2: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160b-3: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dge slong nyi khri yod pa las dge slong gcig lus pas 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag na snam spyar gyi rgyal mtshan bzung ste ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs gang na ba der song nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160b-4: dge slong kun shes ko'u di n+ya 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160b-5: de'i smon lam gyi dbang gis da ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'i mchog tu bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160b-6: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160b-7: gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu dkar pa yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160b-8: 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160b-9: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160b-10: 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la las gcig tu dkar pa rnams la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160b-11: dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160b-12: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ko'u di n+ya la chos bshad nas yang dag yang du rmed par mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:160b-13: ko'u di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:161a-2: ko'u di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:161a-4: kun 'tshal lags so zhes gsol pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:161a-5: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:161a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:161a-7: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+yas las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:161a-8: des na bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad nas yang dang yang du rmed pa mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:161a-9: ko'u di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam /
