K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165a-16: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud med ma mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165a-17: des ral gri blangs te btsun mo'i bud med rnams btsal bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165a-18: ci tsam na drang srong bzod pa smra ba bskor nas 'khod pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165a-19: mthong nas kyang phrag dog bskyed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165a-20: bdag nyid khros pa'i kun nas dkris pa'i rang bzhin gyis drang srong de'i drung du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165a-21: btsun mo'i tshogs kyis de khros pa'i gnas skabs mthong nas skrag ste byer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165a-22: rgyal po snyems pa can gyis bzod pa smra ba la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165a-23: kye nang rje khyod su zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165b-2: rgyal po 'thab mo skyes kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165b-3: kho bo 'khrugs pa la yang bzod pa smra bar bdag nyid khas 'che ba yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165b-4: da ni khyod bzod pa smra ba yin nam ma yin shes par bya'o zhes des de'i lag pa gnyis bcad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165b-5: yang dris pa khyod su yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165b-8: des de'i rkang pa bcad cing yan lag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165b-9: nying lag rnams kyang bcad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165b-10: des tshigs su bcad pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165b-11: gal te bdag gi lus la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165b-12: til 'bru tsam du gtub pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165b-13: lus ni phye ma brgyar gtubs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165b-14: sa la gtor kyang bzod mi spong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165b-15: gang phyir bdag gis byams dge ba'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165b-16: sems ni rtag tu goms byas pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165b-17: bu sdug lta bu'i skye bo la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165b-18: bzod pa de gtong spro ba med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165b-19: ces tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs de lta bus tshor ba bsal nas smon lam gdab par brtsams pa; ji ltar rgyal po 'di nyid nyon mongs pa la zhen pa'i blos bdag la yang dang yang du rmas nas yan lag dang nying lag rnams gtubs pa de bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165b-22: lhan cig par gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag nyid kyis nyon mongs pa'i tshogs rnams bcom nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165b-23: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165b-24: de la shes rab kyi ral gris yang dang yang du rmed cing thog mar de'i nyon mongs pa gcod par gyur cig ces btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:165b-25: de nas bzod pa smra ba la mngon par dad pa'i lha gang yin pas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166a-1: can 'dis drang srong 'di nyes pa med cing gnod pa ma byas par rkang pa dang lag pa phral te bor gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166a-2: ci nas kyang bdag gis 'di la gnod par bya'o snyam du rig nas khro ba drag po'i kun nas dkris pas bzod pa smra ba'i mdun du 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166a-3: tshigs su bcad pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166a-4: 'thab skyes bu dang bu mor bcas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166a-5: gnyen gyi tshogs bcas grong khyer dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166a-7: thal par bgyi yis bka' stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166a-8: des slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166a-9: gang gis bdag lus lag pa rkang pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166a-10: sna la phral nas ma rung byas gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166a-11: de la'ang sdig pa cung zad mi 'dod na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166a-12: nyes med 'gro ba rnams la smos ci dgos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166a-13: de nas w'a ra n'a sa'i lha gang yin pa des yams kyi nad dang byi ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166a-15: ne tso rnams btang zhing lhas char ma phab pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166a-16: skye bo'i tshogs shi bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166a-17: rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166a-18: shes ldan dag ci'i phyir lha char mi 'bebs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166a-21: ne tso rnams rab tu mang por gyur la skye bo'i tshogs kyang shi bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166a-23: lha drang srong bzod pa smra ba la mngon par dad pa'i lha gang lags pa'i lha de rab tu 'khrugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166a-24: de 'khrugs pas des yams kyi nad 'di btang lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166a-26: shes ldan dag de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166a-27: ltas mkhan rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166b-0: @166b lha gtor ma dang me tog phreng dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166b-1: yo byad rnams kyis lha rab tu 'khrugs pa mnyes par 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166b-4: yo byad rnams sbyar la lha dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166b-5: drang srong de la yang bzod pa gsol bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166b-6: de nas rgyal pos w'a ra n'a sir dril sgrogs su bcug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166b-7: grong khyer w'a ra n'a sir gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166b-8: skyed mos tshal na gnas pa'i lha drang srong bzod pa smra ba la mngon par dad pa des yams kyi nad btang zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166b-12: ne tso rnams rab tu mang por byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166b-13: skye bo'i tshogs kyang shi bar gyur gyis yams kyi nad de nye bar zhi ba'i phyir khyed cag sang gtor ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166b-15: yo byad rnams dang chas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166b-16: skyed mos tshal der deng la de la mchod pa byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166b-17: skye bo'i tshogs kyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtor ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166b-19: yo byad rnams sta gon byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166b-20: skyed mos tshal der rgyal po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166b-21: btsun mo dang lhan cig tu dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166b-22: de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos lha de la brten nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166b-26: phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa dag byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166b-27: lha'i gnas su mchod pa chen po byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166b-28: lha de la yang bzod par gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:166b-29: de nas rgyal po drang srong bzod pa smra ba'i drung du song nas rkang pa la gtugs te bzod par gsol bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-0: drang srong chen po bdag gis yul zhig la lhag par zhen @167a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-1: bas khro bo'i kun nas dkris pa'i blo gros kyis khyod la gnod pa bgyis pa bzod pa gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-2: bzod pa smra bas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-3: rgyal po chen po bzod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-5: des tshigs su bcad pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-6: lus la mtshon gyis 'debs pa na'ang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-7: bdag ni sems can kun la byams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-8: gal te khyod yid mi ches na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-9: bdag gis khrag 'dzag pa la ltos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-10: de'i khrag 'o ma'i thigs par 'dzag pa'i cho 'phrul rgyal po sdig pa'i las byed pa de la bstan na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-11: 'on kyang yid ches par ma gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-13: drang srong chen po bzod par gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-14: rgyal po chen po bzod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-16: de nas byang chub sems dpas yan lag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-17: nying lag gtubs pa rnams gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag nas bden pa gsol ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-18: rgyal po khyod kyis bdag gi lus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-19: gtubs kyang shin tu phra ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-20: zhe sdang 'di ltar yod min na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-21: bdag lus ji ltar sngon bzhin shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-22: des bden pa'i tshig gsol pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-23: lus sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-24: de nas rgyal po ya mtshan gyis mig phye nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-25: kye ma chos la legs gnas pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-26: kye ma brtul zhugs 'di grub ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-27: lus la gtubs par byed pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-28: khyod la mi dga' ci yang med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167a-29: rgyal po 'thab mo skyes btsun mo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167b-0: yul mi dang bcas pas drang srong de'i rkang pa la mgo @167b pos phyag byas te dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167b-1: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167b-2: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong bzod pa smra ba gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167b-3: rgyal po 'thab mo skyes gang yin pa de ni dge slong ko'u di n+ya 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167b-4: ngas de la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing smon lam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gis de la yang nas yang du rmed cing nyon mongs pa gcod par gyur cig ces btab pa'i smon lam gang yin pa de'i dbang gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167b-5: da ltar yang de bzhin gshegs pas de la chos bshad nas yang nas yang du rmas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167b-6: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167b-7: dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167b-9: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha brgyad khri chos kyi ros yang dag par bsdus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167b-10: bden pa rnams la rab tu bkod pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167b-11: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167b-12: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lha brgyad khri chos kyi ros yang dag par bsdus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167b-13: bden pa rnams la rab tu bkod pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167b-15: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167b-16: ji ltar 'das ba'i dus na yang ngas 'di rnams tshong pa brgyad khrir gyur pa na zang zing gis yang dag par bsdus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:167b-17: brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la rab tu bkod pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168a-0: dge slong dag sngon byung ba na ded dpon @168a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168a-1: gnyis shig byung ste thams cad skyob dang legs grub ces bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168a-2: re re la yang tshong pa'i 'khor bzhi khri bzhi khri yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168a-3: de la legs grub nges par 'byung ba la mngon par dga' nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168a-4: de drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168a-5: des mtha' gcig tu brtson 'grus la gnas nas mkhan po dang slob dpon med par rang byang chub mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168a-6: de'i tshong pa de rnams ded dpon ma mthong nas phan tshun du btsal bar brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168a-7: gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad du ma rnyed pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168a-8: ded dpon thams cad skyobs kyi drung du dong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168a-9: ded dpon des ni bdag cag la ma bltas par mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168a-10: bdag cag gis btsal na yang ma rnyed na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168a-12: yi blong bar ma byed par 'khod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168a-14: de nas ded dpon thams cad skyob tshong pa brgyad khris yongs su bskor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168a-15: ded dpon legs grub skyed mos tshal dang 'dug gnas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168a-16: dka' thub kyi nags su btsal bar brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168a-17: des de mthong nas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168a-18: khyod kyis ci'i phyir tshong pa rnams spangs te rab tu byung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168a-19: bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyi chos 'chad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168a-20: ngag gis ma yin pas ded dpon 'khor dang bcas pa de la 'bar ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168a-23: glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul gyis dad par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168a-24: des tshong pa brgyad khri po de zang zing gis bsdu bas bsdus nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168b-0: @168b 'di la bya ba byas na gdon mi za bar 'bras bu sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168b-1: de rnams kyis de la bya ba rnam pa du ma byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168b-2: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168b-3: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ded dpon thams cad skyob gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168b-4: tshong pa brgyad khri po gang yin pa de ni lha brgyad khri po 'di dag nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168b-5: de na yang ngas zang zing gis nye bar bsdus nas brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la rab tu bkod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168b-6: 'di dag da ltar yang ngas chos kyi ros yang dag par bsdus nas bden pa rnams la rab tu bkod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168b-7: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168b-8: gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu dkar ba yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168b-9: 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin pas zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168b-10: dge slong khyod kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168b-16: byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che rnams bgo bsha' mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168b-17: dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168b-18: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168b-19: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168b-20: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168b-21: dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad pa la gzigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:168b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169a-1: dag 'di ltar da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169a-12: 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol nas thams cad mkhyen cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169a-14: shes bya thams cad la dbang brnyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169a-15: lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169a-16: dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad pa de la ngo mtshar ci zhig che /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169a-17: 'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169a-28: 'khrugs pa rnams las yongs su ma grol te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169a-29: ded dpon du gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169a-30: lnga po dag 'brog dgon pa'i lam du chu med pas srog dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dog pa nyam nga ba thob pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169a-31: lha rnams la bden pa gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169a-32: dbang phyug chen pos char phab pa'i chus tshim par byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169a-33: dge slong dag sngon byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169a-34: ded dpon thams cad skyob ces bya ba tshong pa lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu tshong byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169a-35: 'brog dgon pa'i lam chu chung ba zhig tu zhugs nas rim gyis 'bigs byed ces bya ba'i dgon par phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169b-0: @169b tshong pa de rnams der chu thams cad kyi thams cad du zad nas chu dang bral yang mnags te dong ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169b-1: tshong pa lnga tsam chu ma rnyed pas lhag par yi blong bar gyur pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169b-2: ded dpon thams cad skyob kyis mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169b-5: lha rnams la gsol ba bya bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169b-9: khyab 'jug la sogs pa lha shes ldan dag gson cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169b-10: bdag sems can rnams la mnyam par sems pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang yin pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig 'dis dbang phyug chen po'i lhas char 'bebs par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i mthus dbang phyug chen po'i gnas g-yos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169b-12: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169b-14: su zhig gis dbang phyug chen po'i gnas g-yos par byas snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169b-16: des dbang phyug chen po'i char gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag phab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169b-17: des tshong pa de rnams tshim par byas nas 'brog dgon pa'i lam las bsgral to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169b-18: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169b-19: de'i tshe dus kyi ded dpon thams cad skyob pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169b-20: tshong pa lnga po chu dang bral bas lhag par yi blong bar gyur pa de dag ni lnga sde'i dge slong 'di dag yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:169b-21: de na yang ngas 'di dag chus tshim par byas nas 'brog dgon pa nas bsgral to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170a-1: dag dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170a-2: 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las bsgral to /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170a-3: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170a-6: byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che rnams kyi bgo bsha' mdzad pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170a-7: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170a-8: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170a-9: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170a-12: byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che rnams kyi bgo bsha' mdzad pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170a-14: dge slong dag 'di ltar da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170a-16: gti mug dang bral zhing skye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170a-24: 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol nas thams cad mkhyen cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170a-26: shes bya thams cad la dbang brnyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170a-27: lnga de'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170a-30: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi bgo bsha' mdzad pa des ngo mtshar ci zhig che /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170a-31: 'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170b-9: yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams la yongs su ma grol te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170b-10: ded dpon du gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170b-11: rang gi srog yongs su btang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170b-12: 'di dag rgya mtsho chen po nas bton te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170b-13: rin po che rnams kyi bgo bsha' byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig dge slong dag sngon byung ba na ded dpon nor gyi shing rta zhes bya ba zhig byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170b-14: de tshong pa lnga zhig dang lhan cig rgya mtsho chen por dong ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170b-15: de rnams dang ded dpon de phan tshun bshes pa'i gtam smra bar byed pas mdza' bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170b-16: ji tsam na mthar gyis rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170b-17: gru so so sta gon byas nas 'jug pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170b-18: de rnams kyis ded dpon nor gyi shing rta la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170b-19: ded dpon bdag cag ni khyod dang bral na dga' bar mi 'gyur lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170b-21: gal te de lta na 'dir zhugs shig dang gru dor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170b-22: de rnams der zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170b-23: rlung langs nas skrag par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170b-24: nor gyi shing rtas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170b-27: gru zhig par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag gis mgul du 'jus shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170b-28: bdag gis khyed cag gdon to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170b-29: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bzo'i gnas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170b-30: las kyi gnas de dang de dag la mkhas pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:170b-31: de ni rin po che chen po la 'os pa dag mchan khung du btags nas gru zhig pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171a-2: des de rnams lus dub cing srog gi lhag ma cung zad cig lus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171a-3: rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171a-4: de rnams skam la phyin te; de btang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171a-5: de dbugs gtan chad nas shi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171a-6: de rnams kyis de chu nas skam la phyung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171a-7: ji tsam na mchan khung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171a-8: rin po che chen po la 'os pa dag mthong nas de rnams kyis de khyer te dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171a-9: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171a-10: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ded dpon nor gyi shing rta gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171a-11: tshong pa de rnams ni dge slong lnga po 'di dag nyid yin te; de na yang ngas 'di dag rgya mtsho chen po nas bton te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171a-12: rin po che rnams kyi bgo bsha' byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171a-13: de lta yang ngas 'di dag 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171a-16: byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che rnams kyi bgo bsha' byas so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171a-20: tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya rgan pa'i dang la 'dug pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171a-21: 'khor la gdugs lta bur byas te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171a-22: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171a-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171a-24: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+yas las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171a-25: las de'i rnam par smin pas 'khor la gdugs lta bur bgyis te mchis lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171b-0: bcom ldan @171b 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171b-1: dge slong kun shes ko'u di n+ya 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pas tshogs rnyed pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171b-2: lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no; ;dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na khyim bdag sdums byed ces bya ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171b-3: phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171b-4: rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171b-5: de'i tshe grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171b-8: lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171b-9: rgyal srid byed du 'jug pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171b-10: ji tsam na ltas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab bo zhes bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171b-11: rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis rang gi yul du dril sgrogs su bcug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171b-12: nga'i yul na gnas pa'i shes ldan grong mi dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171b-13: ltas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab bo zhes bstan gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171b-14: de la khyed cag las lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171b-15: btung ba yod pa de dag ni nga'i yul du gnas par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171b-16: gzhan ni phyogs sna tshogs su deng la lo bcu gnyis 'das nas slar shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171b-17: de nas khyim bdag sdums byed kyis mang na la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:171b-18: kye nang rje bang mdzod na bdag 'khor dang bcas pa'i lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172a-0: de nas khyim bdag sdums byed 'khor dang bcas pa ni @172a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172a-2: skye bo'i tshogs ni kun tu dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172a-3: mu ge chen po nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo bas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung ba la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba med pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172a-5: rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa la snying brtse ba can bas mtha'i gnas mal brten pa 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172a-6: de'i tshe w'a ra n'a si dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i bsti gnas shig tu rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172a-7: gang gi tshe mu ge'i dus kyi 'chi ba'i 'jigs su rung bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172a-8: skye bo'i tshogs skrag nas kun tu dong ba de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172a-9: de rnams kyi bsod snyoms chad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172a-11: khyim bdag sdums byed gang na ba der dong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172a-12: khyim bdag kho bo cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la bsod snyoms rgyun du sbyor ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172a-15: zhes des mngan byed pa'i mi la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172a-16: kye nang rje bdag cag gi bang mdzod na bdag cag dang rab tu byung ba lnga brgya po gang yin pa 'di rnams kyi lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172a-20: khyim bdag sdums byed kyis rab tu byung ba lnga brgya'i bsod snyoms sbyar to zhes rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gzhan dag gis thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172a-21: khyim bdag sdums byed kyi drung du dong ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172b-0: khyim bdag sdums byed la 'di skad ces @172b smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172b-1: khyim bdag kho bo cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la bsod snyoms rgyun du sbyor ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172b-3: 'phags pa dag phul lags bzhin du yang bslang ci 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172b-4: khyim bdag de rnams kyang gzhan yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172b-5: bdag cag kyang gzhan yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172b-7: 'phags pa gal te de ltar na mngan la smra bar bgyi'o zhes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172b-8: des mngan byed pa'i mi la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172b-9: kye nang rje bdag gi bang mdzod na bdag cag dang rab tu byung ba stong po gang yin pa 'di rnams kyi lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172b-13: des rang sangs rgyas de rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172b-15: khyed kyi gdugs tshod kyi dus gang lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172b-17: khyim bdag nyi ma phyed ma yol bar ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172b-18: de nas khyim bdag sdums byed kyis sbyin gtong gi khang pa brtsig tu bcug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172b-19: sbyin gtong gi zhal ta byed pa'i mi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172b-20: dus tshod sbron pa yang bzhag nas de rnams nyi ma re re zhing lhags nas zas kyi bya ba byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172b-21: dgra bcom pa stong po de'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gang yin pa de lhag par mdzes la mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pas 'khor de la gdugs ltar byas te gnas so; ;khyim bdag sdums byed kyi bu mos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:172b-22: dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan de'i mgo gdugs ltar gdug cing kha dog rgyas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173a-0: mchog dang ldan par mthong nas kyang lhag par dad pa skyes @173a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173a-2: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dro la bab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173a-3: lhas char dbab par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173a-4: de na bu mo des dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi spyi bor gdugs bzung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173a-6: rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smon lam btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173a-7: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ji ltar 'phags pa 'di yon tan gyi tshogs ci 'dra ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag thob pas 'di 'khor la gdugs lta bur byas te gnas pa de bzhin du bdag kyang 'khor la gdugs lta bur byas te gnas par gyur cig ces btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173a-8: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173a-9: khyim bdag sdums byed kyi bu mo gang yin pa de dge slong kun shes ko'u di n+ya 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173a-10: de na 'di gzhon nu mar gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173a-11: rang sangs rgyas kyi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gdugs bzung nas smon lam du yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob nas 'khor la gdugs lta bur byas te gnas par gyur cig ces btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173a-12: des na da ltar nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173a-13: dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173a-14: 'khor la gdugs lta bur byas te gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173a-15: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173a-16: zhes bya ba nas dge slong dag de lta bu la khyed kyis bslab par bya zhes pa'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173a-17: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya la brten nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173b-0: lha brgyad khri @173b dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173b-1: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173b-3: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya la brten nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173b-4: lha brgyad khrid dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173b-6: dge slong dag gang gi phyir da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173b-17: 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol nas thams cad mkhyen cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173b-18: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173b-19: ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la dbang brnyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173b-20: kun shes ko'u di n+ya la brten te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173b-21: lha brgyad khri dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad pa de la ngo mtshar ci zhig che /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173b-22: 'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173b-33: 'khrug pa las yongs su ma grol te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173b-34: dud 'gro byol song gi lus su skyes pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:173b-35: ko'u di n+ya srin bu ki ta kar gyur pa la brten nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-0: srin bu ki ta ka brgyad khri rang gi shas tshim par byas pa @174a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-1: gang yin pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-2: dge slong dag sngon byung ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-3: byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-4: rgya mtsho chen po'i rus sbal rnams kyi nang du skyes nas; de rnams kyi gtso bor gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-5: ji tsam na tshong pa lnga brgyas rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrubs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-6: rgya mtsho chen por zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-7: de nas rin po che sna tshogs blangs nas slar log pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-8: 'di ltar gru bo che de chu srin nya'i rigs kyis tshan gyis phug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-9: de na ku co chen po byung ba'i sgra de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-11: rgya mtsho chen po nas langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-12: de de rnams kyi drung du song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-13: shes ldan dag bag tsha ba bor la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-14: kho bo'i rgyab tu zhon cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-16: de nas tshong pa de rnams shi ba las sos pa bzhin du thams cad rus sbal gyi rgyab tu zhon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-18: rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyogs te chas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-19: khur gyis shin tu btsir kyang brtson 'grus la gnas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-21: de lus dub pas de rnams legs par bsgral te mgrin pa brkyang nas gnyid log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-22: de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-23: srin bu ki ta ka rnams kyi tshang yod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-24: de nas ki ta ka gcig rgyu zhing song ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-25: dri tshor te de'i drung du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-26: de nas lus chen po de gnyid log par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-27: rings pa'i 'gros kyis srin bu ki ta ka'i tshang du son te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174a-28: rang rang gi brdas ki ta ka rnams la go bar byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174b-0: srin bu ki ta ka brgyad khri ded @174b de rus sbal gyi drung du dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174b-1: de gnyid log ste shi ba bzhin du sems med pa la bza' bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174b-2: gang gi tshe de'i sha chen po rnams las zos na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174b-3: ngal bas dub ste gnyid stug pos non pas ma tshor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174b-4: ji tsam na gnad rnams kyi sha rnams za ba de'i tshe sad pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174b-5: srin bu ki ta ka thams cad kyis lus yog par mthong nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174b-6: gal te lus bsgul lam bsgyur na gdon mi za bar 'di rnams 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174b-7: srog chags gzhan la gnod pa byed pa bas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174b-8: srog dang bral yang bla'o snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174b-9: gnad rnams su phub cing tshigs rnams phral ba na smon lam gdab par brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174b-10: ji ltar srin bu ki ta ka brgyad khri po 'di rnams la sha dang khrag gis tshim par byas pa de bzhin du bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na yang de rnams la chos kyi ros tshim par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174b-11: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174b-12: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rus sbal gyi gtso bo gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174b-13: srin bu ki ta ka de rnams la lam ston pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ko'u di n+ya 'di nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174b-14: de la brten nas sha dang khrag gis tshim par byas pa'i srin bu ki ta ka brgyad khri po gang yin pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174b-15: lha brgyad khri po 'di dag nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:174b-16: de na yang ngas rang gi khrag gis tshim par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175a-0: da ltar yang ngas de rnams la @175a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175a-1: dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175a-2: dge slong dag de lta bas na gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175a-3: dge slong dag khyod kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175a-4: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad nas 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175a-5: shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175a-6: bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175a-7: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175a-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175a-9: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175a-10: 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175a-11: shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175a-12: bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175a-14: dge slong dag 'di ltar da ltar 'dod chags dang bral /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175a-25: 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol nas thams cad mkhyen cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175a-27: shes bya thams cad la dbang brnyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175b-0: lnga sde dge @175b slong rnams dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175b-1: 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175b-2: shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175b-3: bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa de la ngo mtshar ci zhig che /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175b-4: 'das pa'i dus nang 'dod chags dang bcas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175b-15: 'khrug pa las yongs su ma grol ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175b-16: 'di dag la rang gis khrag gis tshim par byas nas brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la bkod pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175b-17: dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175b-18: rgyal po rdo rje'i dpung pa zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175b-19: skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175b-20: rgyal po de yang dad pa bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pa can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175b-22: gzhan la phan par zhugs pa snying rje'i bdag nyid chen po chos 'dod pa skye dgu la byams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175b-24: thams cad yongs su gtong ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175b-25: chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175b-26: gtong ba chen po la gnas pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175b-27: de lhag par byams pa la shin tu goms pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175b-28: de nyin gcig la lan gsum byams pa la snyoms par 'jug par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175b-29: de byams pa la snyoms par zhugs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:175b-30: slong ba po'i skye bo phongs par gyur nas des blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176a-1: khyer w'a ra n'a si'i grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi rnams su sbyin gtong gi khang pa brtsig tu bcug la dge sbyong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176a-5: lam du 'jug pa'i slong mo ba gang dag ci don du gnyer ba de dag byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176a-23: g-yas su 'khyil ba la sogs te; nor mang pos slong mo ba'i skye bo tshim par bya ba'i phyir phung por spungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176a-24: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176a-25: rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can nas mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin lnga spyugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176a-26: phan tshun 'phyan pa las w'a ra n'a sir phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176a-27: de rnams kyis ba lang gi rdzi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176a-31: lam gyis 'tsho ba dang; lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176a-32: shes ldan dag khyed cag kho bo cag gis mi 'jigs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176a-33: shes ldan dag gang gi phyir kho bo cag gi rgyal po byams pa dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can sems can la phan pa'i bsam pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176a-34: nyin gcig la lan gsum du byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yod na ci'i phyir 'jigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176b-0: de nas de rnams bram @176b ze'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176b-1: grong khyer w'a ra n'a si'i sgo bzhi rnams su sbyin gtong gi khang pa rnams la brtags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176b-2: rgyal po rdo rje'i dpung pa byams pa las langs par shes nas dul ba'i cha byad kyis rgyal po'i drung du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176b-3: song nas rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag rgyal po la byas nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176b-4: lha bdag cag bkres lags na g-yar zas kyis rjes su gzung du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176b-5: rgyal pos blon po rnams bkug ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176b-6: shes ldan dag bram ze 'di rnams kha zas bsod pas tshim par byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176b-8: bdag cag ni sha dang khrag 'tshal lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176b-9: rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176b-10: shes ldan dag gal te sha dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176b-12: tshong dus nas chos bzhin gyis rnyed pa'i khrag byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176b-14: lha bdag cag ni mod la bkum pa'i sha dang khrag 'tshal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176b-15: mod la bkum pa'i sha dang khrag gis rjes su gzung bar mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176b-17: gzhan la gnod pa ma byas par mod la bsad pa'i sha dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176b-18: khrag ga la rnyed kyis ci nas kyang 'di rnams la bdag gis rang gi khrag sbyin par bya'o snyam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176b-19: de nas dpyad mkhan rnams bkug ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176b-20: shes ldan dag nga'i yan lag gi rtsa thams cad chod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176b-21: slong mo ba'i skye bo tshim par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176b-22: dpyad mkhan rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:176b-23: lha mi phal pa rnams kyi phyir bdag cag lha'i sku la mtshon gyis mi 'debs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177a-0: byang chub sems dpa' ni bzo'i @177a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177a-1: gnas dang las kyi gnas de dang de dag la mkhas pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177a-2: des rang nyid kyis lus kyi yan lag lnga mtshon gyis gtar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177a-3: de nas rang gi khrag gis tshim par byas nas de rnams la de lta bu'i chos bshad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177a-4: de thos pas gnod sbyin de rnams brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la bkod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177a-5: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177a-6: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po rdo rje'i dpung pa zhes bya bar gyur pa ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177a-7: mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin lnga po gang dag yin pa de dag ni lnga sde'i dge slong 'di dag nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177a-8: de na yang ngas 'di rnams rang gi khrag gis tshim par byas nas brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la bkod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177a-9: da ltar yang ngas 'di rnams dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par byas nas 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te; shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177a-10: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad nas 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177a-11: shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177a-12: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177a-14: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-0: 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa @177b nas bton te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-1: shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-3: 'di ltar da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral; zhe sdang dang bral /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-4: gti mug dang bral zhing zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-5: ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la dbang brnyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-6: zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-7: lnga sde'i dge slong rnams dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-8: 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-9: shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-10: bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa de la ngo mtshar ci zhig che /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-11: ngas 'das pa'i dus na 'dod chags dang bcas zhes bya ba nas sdug bsngal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-13: 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol ba na zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-14: 'di rnams rang gi shas tshim par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-15: brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la bkod pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-16: dge slong dag sngon byung ba na grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na rgyal po byams pa'i stobs zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-17: zhes bya ba nas skye bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-18: mi mang po yod pa na rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-19: zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-20: byams pa'i bdag nyid snying rje can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-21: bdag nyid chen po sems can thams cad la byams pa dang ldan pa zhig yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-22: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:177b-23: rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can nas mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin lnga nyes pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir spyugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178a-1: rnams ljongs de nas rgyu zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178a-2: w'a ra n'a sir phyin nas de rnams la sus kyang gtor ma'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178a-4: yo byad dag ma byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178a-5: de rnams khros pas yams kyi nad btang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178a-6: w'a ra n'a si'i skye bo'i tshogs shi bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178a-7: blon po rnams kyis rgyal po byams pa'i stobs la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178a-8: lha w'a ra n'a si'i skye bo'i tshogs te bor 'gum lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178a-9: rgyal pos de rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178a-10: deng la w'a ra n'a si kho nar dril sgrogs su chug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178a-11: shes ldan dag rgyal po byams pa'i stobs kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178a-12: nga sems can thams cad la phan pa'i bsam pa la lhag par brtson pa'i yid kyis nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178a-13: de la khyed cag gis kyang sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i byams pa yid la byos shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178a-14: de lta na zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178a-15: de rnam sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i byams pa yid la zhugs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178a-16: mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin rnams kyis w'a ra n'a si'i nye 'khor du rgyu bar brtsams na 'jug mi nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178a-17: de rnams kyis 'jug ma nus pas glags ma rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178a-24: lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams mthong nas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178a-25: shes ldan dag khyed cag kho bo cag gis mi 'jigs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178b-0: 'di ltar bdag ni rgyal po @178b byams pa'i stobs dgongs pa gang yin pa de sems pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178b-1: rgyal po byams pa'i stobs ci dgongs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178b-2: sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i byams pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178b-4: 'dir rgyu 'dis na da ltar bdag cag gis glags ma rnyed do snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178b-5: de rnams w'a ra n'a si'i sgo nas sgor rgyu zhing rgyal po byams pa'i stobs nam zhig mthong snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178b-6: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po byams pa'i stobs phyi rol tu skyed mos tshal du chas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178b-7: de nas de rnams bram ze'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas spyod lam zhi bas rgyal po'i drung du nye bar dong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178b-8: rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag byas nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178b-9: lha bdag cag bkres lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178b-10: g-yar zas kyis rjes su gzung du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178b-11: rgyal pos blon po rnams bkug ste bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178b-12: shes ldan dag bram ze 'di rnams kha zas bsod pas tshim par byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178b-14: lha bdag cag ni sha dang khrag 'tshal lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178b-15: rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178b-16: shes ldan dag gal te sha dang khrag 'byor pa med na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178b-17: tshong dus nas chos bzhin gyis rnyed pa'i sha dang khrag byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178b-18: lha bdag cag ni mod la bkum pa'i sha dang khrag 'tshal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178b-19: mod la bkum pa'i sha dang khrag gis rjes su gzung du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178b-20: rgyal pos bsams pa; sems can gzhan la gnod pa ma byas par ni mod la bsad pa'i sha dang khrag ga la rnyed kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:178b-21: ci nas kyang 'di rnams la bdag gis rang gi khrag sbyin par bya'o snyam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179a-2: shes ldan dag nga'i yan lag gi rtsa thams cad chod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179a-3: slong mo ba'i skye bo tshim par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179a-5: lha mi phal pa rnams kyi phyir bdag cag lha'i sku la mtshon gyis mi 'debs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179a-6: byang chub sems dpa' ni bzo'i gnas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179a-7: las kyi gnas de dang de dag la mkhas pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179a-8: des rang nyid kyi lus kyi yan lag lnga mtshon gyis gtar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179a-9: de nas rang gi khrag gis tshim par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179a-10: de rnams la de lta bu'i chos bshad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179a-11: gang thos pas gnod sbyin de rnams brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la bkod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179a-12: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179a-13: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po byams pa'i stobs gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179a-14: mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin lnga po gang dag yin pa de dag ni lnga sde'i dge slong 'di dag yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179a-15: de na yang ngas 'di rnams rang gi khrag gis tshim par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179a-16: brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la bkod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179a-17: da ltar yang ngas 'di rnams dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par byas nas 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179a-19: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lo drug tu dka' ba spyad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179a-20: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs nas w'a ra n'a sir gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179a-21: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas lnga sde dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179b-1: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179b-3: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin las ci zhig mdzad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179b-4: 'phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179b-11: zhes bya ba nas skye bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179b-12: mi mang po yod pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179b-13: dge slong dag bee bhee ding ga'i grong khyer gyi grong rdal na bram ze shing s'a la chen po lta bu n+ya gro dha zhes bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba zhig byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:179b-14: bee bhe ding ga'i 'du tang dang bcas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:184a-20: lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:184a-21: gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:187b-3: bzhin bzang de su zhig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:187b-4: de dag gis 'di skad ces kho bo cag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs 'bring pa dge slong rnams yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:187b-5: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gtsug lag khang der thog mar lhas char phab pas zags par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:187b-6: kho bo cag rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi las kyi khang pa g-yogs pa'i rtsva sar pa bshus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:187b-7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gtsug lag khang g-yog go zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:187b-8: de dag la 'di skad ces khyed la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa ni slad rol tu mchis lags kyis 'phags pa dag snoms shig ;bzhin bzang dag snoms shig ces smras pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:187b-9: de rnams kyis las kyi khang pa'i rtsva de dag bshus par gyur grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:187b-10: de nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:187b-11: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis shin tu bag phab cing 'dris par gyur pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam du rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:187b-12: dga' ba dang bde ba nyid kyis skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:187b-13: zla ba phyed kyi bar du yang de'i lhan cig ldan pa'i dran pa rtag tu lus las mi 'dor zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:187b-14: zhag bdun du pha dang ma'i lus la yang de bar chad med par 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188a-1: rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi las byed pa'i khang par 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188a-2: lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus char thig pa gcig kyang ma bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188a-3: rgyal po chen po khyod ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis zla ba gsum du bdag gi na bza' chos gos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188a-6: snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams 'bul na ma gnang ngo zhes sems gzhan du 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188a-7: rdza mkhan dga' skyong ni las byed pa'i khang pa g-yogs pa'i rtsva sar pa bshus kyang sems gzhan du ma gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188a-8: btsun pa rdza mkhan dga' skyong gis ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sdum par shin tu bag phab cing 'dris par mdzad lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188a-10: de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rgyal po kri kri'i sbyin pa de la rjes su yi rang ba 'dis rjes su yi rang bar mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188a-11: sbyin sreg mchod sbyin rnams kyi mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188a-12: sdeb sbyor mchog ni nyi ma'i lha //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188a-13: mi yi mchog ni rgyal po ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188a-14: rgya mtsho chu bo rnams kyi mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188a-15: zla ba rgyu skar rnams kyi gtso //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188a-16: nyi ma snang byed rnams kyi gtso //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188a-17: steng dang 'og dang thad kar yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188a-19: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188a-20: smra ba'i mchog ni rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188a-21: de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188b-0: rgyal po kri kri la chos dang ldan pa'i @188b gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188b-1: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188b-2: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188b-3: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188b-4: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188b-7: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188b-8: de nas rgyal po kri kris yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gshegs nas ring por ma lon par shes nas mi zhig la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188b-10: khyod kyis 'bras sog ma'i sbubs su smin bas shing rta lnga brgya tsam khong la rdza mkhan dga' skyong gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188b-11: rdza mkhan dga' skyong la 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188b-12: des pa dga' skyong khyod la rgyal po kri kris 'bras sog ma'i sbubs su smin pa shing rta lnga brgya tsam po bskur ba 'di dag yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188b-13: de las khyod bdag nyid dang khyod nyid kyi pha ma yang dag pa'i bde bas tshim par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188b-14: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la yang dus dus su bsod snyoms phul cig ces gsung ngo zhes smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188b-15: lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des rgyal po kri kris las mnyan nas 'bras sog ma'i su smin pas shing rta lnga brgya tsam bkang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188b-16: rdza mkhan dga' skyong gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:188b-17: rdza mkhan dga' skyong la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189a-0: des pa dga' skyong khyod la rgyal po kri kris 'bras sog ma'i sbubs su smin pas @189a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189a-1: shing rta lnga brgya tsam po bskur ba 'di dag yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189a-2: de las khyod bdag nyid dang khyod kyi pha ma yang dag pa'i bde bas tshim par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189a-3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la yang dus su bsod snyoms phul cig ces gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189a-4: kye nang rje rgyal po rnams ni bya ba dang sgrub pa mang ngo zhes smras nas len tu ma btub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189a-5: dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189a-6: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze'i khye'u bla ma gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189a-7: ngas dge sbyong mgo reg de la byang chub ga la yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189a-8: byang chub ni mchog tu dka' ba yin no zhes yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la ngag rtsub po phyung ba gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189a-9: da ltar ngas dka' ba lo drug spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189a-10: gal te ngas byang chub la skur pa btab par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189a-11: slar yang ngas byang chub kyi ched du bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du bdag nyid dub par byas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189a-12: dge slong dag de lta bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189a-13: las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin pa zhes bya ba nas las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189a-14: dge slong dag khyod kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189a-15: gang gi nyi ma la byang chub sems dpa' phyir byung ba de nyid kyi nyi ma la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189a-16: grags 'dzin ma sems can dang ldan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-0: gang gi tshe byang chub @189b sems dpa' dka' ba spyod pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-1: btsun mo yang dka' ba spyod pa la zhugs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-2: grags 'dzin ma mngal zhum par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-3: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' ba spyad pa don med par thugs su chud nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-5: ci bder dbugs rngub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-7: zan dron gyi zhal zas mang po gsol zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-8: mar dang til mar gyis sku byugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-9: chu 'jam pos sku 'khru bar mdzad pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-10: btsun mo yang ci bder dbugs 'byin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-11: ci bder dbugs rngub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-13: zan dron gyi kha zas mang po za zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-14: mar dang til mar gyis lus byugs nas; chu 'jam pos lus 'khru bar byed pa de'i tshe mngal de yang slar rgyas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-15: de'i mngal gyi mtshan ma skyes par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-16: sh'akya rnams kyis co dri ba dang bcas pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-17: byang chub sems dpa' dka' thub kyi nags su bzhud nas khyod kyis byi phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-19: kho mo'i sdig pa zhi bas byi ma phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-21: khyed cag yid ches par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-22: ji tsam zhig na de khye'u zhig btsas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-23: de nyi ma gang la btsas pa'i nyi ma de nyid la zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-24: de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-25: khye'u yi ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-26: de'i nye du rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-27: 'di btsas pa na zla ba sgra can gyi zin pas de bas na khye'u yi ming sgra gcan zin du gdags so zhes btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:189b-28: gzhon nu btsas pa na sh'akya rnams la yang dang yang du gleng ba kho nar byed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190a-1: bden pa gsol ba byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190a-2: sgra gcan zin bzang po byang chub sems dpa'i pang tshad kyi rdo la zhon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190a-3: rol pa'i rdzing gi nang du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190a-4: gal te 'di byang chub sems dpa' las skyes pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190a-7: de pha rol tu byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190a-8: des pha rol nas tshu rol tu 'ong bar gyur cig ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190a-9: de pha rol nas tshu rol tu 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190a-10: de rnams ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190a-12: shes ldan dag ji ltar 'di byang chub sems dpa' las skyes pa yin zhing kho mos byi ma phyin par yang yid chos par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190a-13: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi lo drug gis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190a-16: nyi ma gcig ni rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190a-17: nyi ma gcig ni btsun mo'i nang du gsol ba de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190a-18: grags 'dzin ma 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190a-19: gang gis na bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dbang du gyur pa'i thabs legs pa ci zhig yod snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190a-20: ser skya'i gzhi na kun tu rgyu mo dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las rnams la shin tu mkhas pa zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190a-21: grags 'dzin mas de la kar sha pa na lnga brgya byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190a-22: che zhe kar sha pa na 'di rnams las dbang du bya ba byos la skur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190a-23: des dbang du bya ba'i la du zhig grags 'dzin ma la bskur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190b-0: grags 'dzin mas sgra gcan zin gyi lag tu byin nas smras pa @190b bu khyod kyis yab gang yin pa de la phul cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190b-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis de lta bu mi mkhyen pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190b-3: thugs su mi chud pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190b-4: rnam par mi rig pa ci yang mi mnga' bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190b-6: grags 'dzin ma la mi snyan pa grags kyis de spang bar bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas lnga brgya sprul pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190b-8: sgra gcan zin gyis sangs rgyas thams cad la brtags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190b-9: bcom ldan 'das rgan pa'i dang bzhugs pa la phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190b-11: slar yang de la byin te sgra gcan zin gyis zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bsngo bar mdzad nas gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po 'brang nas slar bzlog kyang ngus te slar ldog tu ma btub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190b-15: sems can 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa yin pas 'dis khyim gyi gnas pas gnas mi phod do snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190b-16: sgra gcan zin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal 'tshos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190b-17: rgyal po zas gtsang btsun mo'i bud med dang sh'akya rnams dang bcas pa ngo mtshar skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190b-18: grags 'dzin ma la lhag par mngon par dga' bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190b-19: de nas grags 'dzin ma'i mi snyan pa thams cad kyi thams cad du med par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:190b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po rab tu dbyung bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191a-0: rgyal pos zas gtsang gis thos nas de bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song ste phyin @191a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191a-2: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191a-3: bcom ldan 'das gal te gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po rab tu 'byin par mdzad par nges par lta na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191a-4: deng gi gdugs gcig la mchis su gsol cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191a-5: 'di la de'i bar du bdag gis mchod pa bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191a-6: rgyal po zas gtsang gis sgra gcan zin gyi skye bo'i dus ston chen po byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191a-8: sh'a ri'i bu gzhon nu sgra gcan zin rab tu phyung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191a-9: btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191a-10: gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po rab tu phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191a-11: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191a-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191a-13: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das la dus zhal 'tshos par bgyid pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191a-15: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191a-16: ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang me tog gi phreng bas ngo shes par byas pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191a-17: dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or na khyim bdag gcig gnas pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191a-18: rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191a-20: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-2: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na khye'u zhig btsas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-3: des chung ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-4: bzang mo bdag cag gi bu lon ded pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-6: zong thogs te rgya mtsho chen por 'jug tu 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-8: rje'i sras de bzhin du mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-9: de zong thogs te rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa las de nyid du shi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-10: de nas de'i chung mas mya ngan bsang ba byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-12: gnyen gyi mthus bsnun bskyangs te bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-13: de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na tha ga pa rang gi bzo la mkhas pa zhig gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-14: des rang gi bzos thams cad grub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-15: des de'i rang gi bzos 'byor pa 'grub par mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-16: tha ga pa'i las ni mchog yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-17: rgya mtshor 'jug pa ni de lta ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-18: der song na tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-19: des tha ga pa de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-20: ming po dpon po 'di la yang tha ga pa'i las slobs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-22: rung gis de bzhin du bya'o zhes des de la bslab par brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-23: de sgrin po g-yer ba ga can zhig pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-24: des thung ngu zhig gis tha ga pa'i las rnams lobs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-25: tha ga pa de ni bzang pos 'khru ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-27: kha zas bzang po za nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-29: zhang po khyod kyang las 'di kho na byed la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-30: bdag kyang las 'di kho na byed pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:191b-31: ci'i phyir khyod ni bzang pos 'khru /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192a-1: la yang yongs su longs spyod la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192a-4: tsha bo bdag ni las gnyis byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192a-5: nyin par ni tha ga pa'i las so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192a-6: nub mo ni rkun po byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192a-8: zhang po gal te de lta na bdag kyang rkun po bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192a-9: tsha bo khyod kyis rkun po bya mi nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192a-12: re zhig 'di bgam par bya'o snyam nas des de khrid de tshong dus su song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192a-13: des der ri bong zhig nyos te de la gtad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192a-14: tsha bo re zhig sregs shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192a-15: de'i bar du bdag khrus byas nas 'ong ngo zhes de khrus byed du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192a-16: des de myur ba myur ba zhig tu bsregs nas gzugs gcig zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192a-17: tha ga pa de khrus byas nas 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192a-18: tsha bo ri bong bsregs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192a-22: rkang lag gsum mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192a-23: tsha bo ri bong 'di'i gzugs bzhi pa shos gar song /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192a-25: zhang po ri bong la gzugs bzhi pa yong med na gar 'gro /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192a-27: re zhig bdag kyang rkun ma yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192a-28: 'di ni rkun chen yin snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192a-29: des de dang ri bong gzugs gsum po khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192a-30: chang tshong gi khyim zhig tu zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192a-35: tsha bo chang rin ni gya gyus dgang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192a-37: zhang po sus 'thungs pa de gya gyu byed grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192b-0: bdag @192b gis ni ma 'thungs pas gya gyu byar ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192b-1: tha ga pa des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192b-3: lhan cig rkun ma bya nus so snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192b-4: de de dang lhan cig khyim 'bigs pa'i rkun ma la zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192b-5: de gnyis kyis khyim phug nas tha ga pa des bu gar mgo bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192b-7: zhang po khyod rkun ma byed kyang thabs mi shes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192b-8: thog mar rkang pa gzhug par bya'i mgo ni ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192b-9: gal te mgo bcad par gyur nas ngo shes pas rigs thams cad brlag par 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192b-11: des rkang pa bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192b-12: tshor nas rkun po rkun po zhes ku co bton nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192b-13: skye bo'i tshogs chen pos rkang pa gnyis nas bzung nas 'then to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192b-14: de ni gcig pu yin pas slar 'dren ma nus nas mgo bcad de khyer te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192b-15: blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192b-16: lha rkun po gcig pu gar zhugs pa las zin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192b-17: de'i mgo gcig gis bkum nas 'tshal te mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192b-19: shes ldan dag mgo bcad de khyer te song ba gang yin pa de ni rkun chen yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192b-20: deng la ro mgo rdum de lam po che'i bzhi mdor zhog ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192b-22: de las bzung ste cho nges 'debs pa yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192b-23: de ni rkun po yin gyis de zung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192b-24: de nas rgyal po'i mi de rnams kyis ro mgo rdum de lam po che'i bzhi mdor bzhag nas phyogs dben par bsdad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:192b-25: rkun po cig shos des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193a-2: ngud mos mi gdab pa lta mi srid do snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193a-3: des bdag nyid smyon pa'i cha byad du zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193a-4: bud med kyi mgul nas kyang 'jus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193a-11: khyi'i mgul nas kyang 'ju bar brtsams nas gang gi tshe 'jig rten gyis smyon par shes pa de'i tshe ro mgo rdum pang du blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193a-12: ji tsam 'dod kyi bar du ngus nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193a-13: rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193a-14: smyon pa zhig gis ro mgo rdum de pang du blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193a-15: ji tsam 'tshal gyi bar du ngus nas mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193a-17: shes ldan dag de nyid rkun ma cig shos yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193a-18: de ma bzung ba ma legs pa zhig byas kyis de zungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193a-19: rkun po cig shos kyis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193a-20: bdag gis zhang po la bkur sti mi bya ba lta mi srid do snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193a-21: des shing rta pa'i cha byad du byas nas shing rta shing skam gyis bkang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193a-22: phyogs der 'ongs nas de'i steng du shing rta shing skam gyis bkang ba bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193a-24: shing rta mes btang ste song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193a-25: mes des ro mgo rdum yang tshig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193a-26: rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193a-27: lha rkun po gcig po de bsregs lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193a-29: de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193a-31: shes ldan dag shing rta pa gang yin pa de nyid rkun po cig shos yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-0: de ma bzung @193b ba ni ma legs pa zhig byas kyis zungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-1: rkun po cig shos kyis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-2: bdag gis zhang po la dur khrod du mtshun gyi bya ba ma byas pa ni mi srid do snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-3: de bram ze'i cha byad du byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-4: khyim nas slong zhing brgyus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-5: bslangs pa de las de'i phangs sha lnga byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-6: dur khrod du bzhag ste song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-7: rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-8: lha bram ze zhig gis khyim nas slong zhing brgyus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-9: phyogs gang du ro mgo rdum bsregs pa der /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-10: des phangs sha lnga bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-13: shes ldan dag de nyid rkun po cig shos yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-14: de ma bzung ba ni ma legs pa zhig byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-15: rkun po cig shos kyis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-16: bdag gis zhang po'i rus pa rnams gangg'ar mi 'dor ba lta mi srid do snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-17: des thod pa can gyi cha byad du byas te phyogs der song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-18: des der lus thal bas byugs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-19: rus pa dang thal bas thod pa bkang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-21: rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis rgyal po la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-23: shes ldan dag de nyid rkun po cig shos yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-24: de ma bzung ba ni ma legs pa zhig byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-25: mdor na khyad ni 'dug cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-26: ngas de gzung ngo zhes rgyal pos gangg'a'i gru'i nang du skyed mos tshal byed du bcug ste 'gram gnyis su srung ma'i mi dag bkod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-27: rgyal po'i bu mo gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:193b-28: blta na sdug pa zhig chu'i skyed mos tshal der bzhag ste bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-0: gal te khyod la 'ga' zhig gis @194a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-3: srung ma'i mi rnams la yang bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-4: gang gi tshe skad 'byin pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-5: khyed cag chu'i skyed mos tshal du dengs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-6: de na gal te mi 'ga' zhig yod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-7: de bzung la nga la phul cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-8: rkun po cig shos kyis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-9: bdag gis rgyal po'i bu mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur ma spyad du mi gtong ngo snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-10: de gangg'a'i 'bab phyogs shig tu 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-11: des der rdze'u stong ba zhig chur bskur bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-13: srung ma'i mi rnams kyis rkun po'o snyam nas bsnyags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-14: de dag gis de la thal mo gcig bsnun nas bcag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-15: gnyis pa shos bskur ba dang de yang bcag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-16: gsum po shos bskur ba dang de yang bcag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-18: 'di dag ni rdze'u stong pa chus khyer ba yin no zhes bag bor te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-19: de nas rkun po cig shos po des rdze'u zhig gi nang du mgo bcug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-22: de nas gru la 'dzegs nas bu mo la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-23: khyod bsad da re sgra ma 'byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-24: de skrag nas cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-25: de de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-27: shes ldan dag rkun po cig shos kyis kho mo la dga' mgur spyad nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-28: srung ma rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194a-29: gang gi tshe dga' mgur spyad pa de'i tshe cang mi smra bar 'dug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-0: gang gi tshe dga' mgur spyad nas @194b song pa de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-1: da gang du btsal bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-2: srung ma rnams kyis rgyal po la ji ltar gyur pa smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-4: de ma bzung ba ni ma legs pa zhig byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-5: bu mo de rkun po dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad pas sems can dang ldan par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-6: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-7: khye'u zhig btsas so zhes rkun po cig shos kyis thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-9: bdag gis bu btsas pa'i dga' ston ma byas par mi gtang ngo snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-10: des nang kor ma'i cha byad du byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-11: rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyir byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-12: zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-13: shes ldan dag lha'i zhal nas tshong rdal du phrog rlom gyis shig ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-15: rgyal po'i dbon po btsas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-16: des na bdag cag tshong rdal du phrog rlom byed du bcug go snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-17: de rnams kyis phrog rlom bya bar brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-18: sgra mthon po dang sgra chen po byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-21: blon po rnams kyis rgyas par smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-23: gal te de lta na nga yang des bslus par gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-24: rgyal srid dor ba'am de chad pas bcad pa zhig bya'o snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-25: de 'khor gyi khyams brtsig tu bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-26: dus chung ngu zhig bsdad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-27: des blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:194b-28: shes ldan dag yul 'khor du dril 'di skad du sgrogs su chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-0: yul 'khor na skyes pa ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad snyad ma 'dogs bar 'khor gyi khyams su @195a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-2: su ma 'dus pa de ni chad pas bcad do zhes sgrogs shig /
