K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-3: blon po rnams kyis dril sgrogs su bcug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-4: yul 'khor na gnas pa'i skyes pa thams cad 'dus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-5: de nas rgyal pos khye'u de la me tog gi phreng ba zhig byin nas bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-6: khyod kyi pha gang yin pa de la byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-7: srung ma'i skyes pa rnams la yang bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-8: khye'u 'dis su la me tog gi phreng ba byin pa de la khyed cag gis bzung la nga la phul cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-9: de nas khye'u de me tog gi phreng ba de khyer nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-10: skye bo'i tshogs la rtogs cing rgyu ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-11: des rkun po'i cig shos de mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-12: sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-13: bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-14: des de la me tog gi phreng ba byin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-15: rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis rkun po cig shos po de bzung nas rgyal po la phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-16: rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-17: shes ldan dag 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-21: shes ldan dag skyes bu 'di lta bu'i dpa' bo ga la bsad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-22: 'di la spyan ras kyis btsa' bar bya'o zhes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-23: des bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas de la chung mar byin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-24: rgyal srid phyed kyang bgos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-25: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-26: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rkun po cig shos gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-27: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi de'i bu gang yin pa de ni sgra gcan zin 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195a-28: de na yang nga la 'dis me tog gi phreng bas ngo shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195b-0: da ltar yang @195b 'dis nga la dus ngo shes par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195b-1: dge slong dag de lta bas na sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas las kyi gnas pa la goms par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195b-3: gal te sgra gcan zin gyi yab pho brang du gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195b-4: ji ltar yang slar gshegs par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur spyad par bya'o snyam nas de nas bdag nyid dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195b-6: ri dvags skyes la sogs pa bud med drug khri rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195b-7: shin tu dri zhim po'i me tog gi phreng ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195b-8: bdug pas bsgos pa'i gos rnams kyis klubs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195b-12: dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195b-13: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195b-14: 'dul ba'i skye bo la gzigs nas pho brang gi nang du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195b-17: sa 'tsho ma la sogs te bud med drug khri gzugs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195b-19: dregs pa'i rgyags pas zin cing yid la gcags pas g-yen spyo zhing bskyod pan gser gyi 'og bag lhod par bcings pa mang po 'khrol zhing sgra 'byin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195b-20: 'dzum pa'i glu dbyangs snyan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195b-21: mig dang smin ma bskyod cing nu ma dang yan lag rnams gsal bar ston pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195b-22: bud med kyi tshul gyi stegs chos rnams ston to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:195b-24: gal te gdugs tshod gsol na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196a-0: gdul ba'i skye bo'i dus las @196a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196a-2: bud med 'di rnams kyang 'dod chags kyis gdungs pas bden pa'i snod du mi 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196a-3: 'di ltar so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196a-4: ma la ngas pho brang du rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan pas dad par dad par bya'o snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196a-5: shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196a-6: spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196a-12: me'i khams la yang snyoms par 'jug pa mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196a-13: me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196a-21: shel gyi kha dog dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196a-22: gzhan yang cho 'phrul zung du ston par mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196a-23: sku'i smad nas me 'bar bar mdzad la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196a-24: sku'i stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196a-25: sku'i stod nas me 'bar bar mdzad la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196a-26: sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196a-27: shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196a-29: byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196a-30: phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhis bstan nas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa slar bsdus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196a-31: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196b-0: de @196b nas bud med de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dag mthong nas dad par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196b-1: shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196b-2: chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan snga na 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196b-5: khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196b-6: gang thos pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor yang dag par khong du chud par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196b-8: ri dvags skyes la sogs pa bud med drug khri rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196b-9: grags 'dzin ma ni lhag par 'dod chags kyis zil gyis non pas bden pa mthong bar ma byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196b-11: ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das ro'i sred pas dbang du bya'o snyam bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196b-12: rang nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du bza' ba dang btung ba dag g-yos nas bdag rang gi lag nas bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya'o zhes pa dge slong rnams kyis thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196b-15: grags 'dzin ma ni rang gi lag nas bgyis pa'i ro'i sred pas dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196b-17: dge slong dag nga sngon 'dod chags dang bcas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196b-19: gti mug dang bcas pas ro so sor nyams su myong zhing ro so sor chags pa nyams su myong ba las da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:196b-21: gti mug dang bral te ro so sor nyams su myong yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197a-1: la so sor chags par 'gyur ba'i nyams su myong ba med na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197a-2: da nga la grags 'dzin mas ro'i sred pas ji ltar dbang du bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197a-3: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197a-5: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das grags 'dzin mas dbang du bgyi ba'i slad du la dus dbang du bgyi bar brtsams pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197a-7: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197a-8: ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang nga dga' bar 'gyur bas dbang du byas pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197a-9: dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong rdal med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas me tog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197a-12: rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197a-13: drang srong dka' thub drag po rtsa ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197a-17: lo ma gyon pa zhig gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197a-18: des mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197a-19: de la ri dvags gdug pa rnams kyang 'dris pa'i gnas pas bsti gnas na gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197a-20: de phyogs gzhan zhig tu gci ba'i phyir song ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197a-21: ri dvags mo zhig rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197a-22: de khu ba dang bcas par gcis pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197a-24: lces mo mtshan la bldags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197a-25: sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197a-26: sems can dang ldan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197a-27: de 'byung ba'i dus su phyogs der 'ongs nas khye'u zhig byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197b-0: ris mi @197b mthun pa'i sems can yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197b-1: skrag nas gcin stug shor nas bor te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197b-2: ji tsam zhig na drang srong de phyogs der phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197b-3: des khye'u de mthong nas 'di su'i bu yin snyam pa'i bsams pa la zhugs pa ni bdag nyid kyi yin par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197b-4: des de bsti gnas su khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197b-6: de chen por gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197b-7: mgo la ri dvags kyi rva skyes par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197b-8: de la ri dvags kyi rva 'dra ba yod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197b-9: drang srong rva can drang srong rva can zhes bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197b-10: ji tsam na yang drang srong de nad kyis thebs par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197b-11: drang srong de dang mthun pa'i sman rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas kyang de'i nad zhi bar ma gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197b-12: gang gi tshe de 'chi ba la thug pa'i tshor ba skyes nas ring por mi thogs par 'chi bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197b-13: des bu de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197b-14: bu bsti gnas 'dir phyogs sna tshogs na gnas pa'i drang srong rnams dus dus su 'ong gis khyod nga la dga' bas de rnams la kun tu spyod pa'i chos kyis 'ongs pa legs so zhes brjod pas yang dag par dga' bar bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197b-15: stan la mgron du bos la rtsa ba dang 'bras bu ci nus par stobs shig ces smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197b-16: bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197b-17: mthon po kun gyi mtha' ltung 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197b-19: gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197b-20: zhes bya ba yin pas dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur te; ;des de drang srong gi chos bzhin du bsregs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:197b-21: de pha dang bral ba'i mya ngan gyis non pas skyo ba skyes nas mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-0: des dus gzhan zhig na chu'i don du bum pa khyer @198a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-2: lhas char dbab par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-3: de chus bum pa bkang nas khyer te 'ong ba 'gred nas rdeg 'chos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-4: drang srong rnams ni myur du khro ba yin pas; de chu nyung zhig blangs te gtor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-5: dmod pa por ba spyod pa ngan pa can khyod kyis bum pa chus bkang ba chag par byas kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-6: de lta bas na khyod nyi ma 'di nas bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-7: lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bebs par gyur cig ces byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-8: lha char mi 'bebs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-9: w'a ra n'a sir mu ge chen po byung nas skye bo'i tshogs phyogs kun tu dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-10: rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-11: shes ldan dag su zhig gi mthus na lhas char mi 'bebs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-13: drang srong khros pas lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-14: ji ste drang srong de dka' thub de las bskyod par nus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-15: lha de bzhin du char 'bebs kyis gzhan du na ni ma lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-16: rgyal po sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-19: gzhon nu rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-20: lha ci'i slad du thugs mi dgyes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-22: drang srong khros pas lha char mi 'bebs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-23: ltas mkhan rnams kyang 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-24: gal te drang srong de dka' thub de las bskyod nus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-25: de bzhin du lha char 'bebs kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-26: gzhan du na ma yin no zhes zer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-27: dka' thub de la su zhig gis bskyod par nus mi shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198a-28: rgyal po de'i bu mo zhi ldan ma zhes bya ba des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198b-0: @198b gal te de lta na thugs las chung ngur mdzod cig dang bdag gis drang srong de dka' thub de las ci nas kyang g-yos par gyur pa de ltar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198b-4: bdag dang bud med gzhan rnams bram ze rnams la gsang tshig 'don du stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198b-5: gru zam gyi bsti gnas me tog dang 'bras bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198b-6: chu phun sum tshogs pa bgyid du stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198b-7: des de dang bud med gzhan dag kyang bram ze la gsang tshig slob tu bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198b-8: gru zam gyi bsti gnas kyang byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198b-9: de nas de dbang du bya ba'i rdzas dang chang gis bkang ba'i 'bras bu de dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198b-10: gzhan yang 'bras bu rnam par bkra ba sna tshogs byed du bcug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198b-11: drang srong gi cha byad du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198b-14: bud med rnams dang lhan cig bram ze rnams la gsang tshig 'don cing de'i bsti gnas su lhags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198b-15: drang srong la slob ma rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198b-16: mkhan po khyod kyi bsti gnas su drang srong mang du lhags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198b-17: drang srong rnams lhags pa legs kyis nang du shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198b-18: de rnams nang du zhugs pa des mthong nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198b-19: brtags pa med par 'gying zhing 'gro ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198b-20: bzhin yang kha spu rnams dang bral gyur cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198b-21: 'di rnams brang ni mtho dman gyur pa ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198b-22: ae ma drang srong cha byad sngon ma byung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198b-23: de de rnams la the tshom gyis kun nas dkris pa'i blos rtsa ba dang 'bras bu bstabs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:198b-24: de rnams kyis de dag zos nas drang srong de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199a-0: khyed kyi 'bras bu 'di dag ni rtsub pa kha ba @199a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199a-2: bdag cag gi chu nang gi bsti gnas de na yod pa'i 'bras bu rnams ni bdud rtsi dang 'dra ba yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199a-3: 'di ltar khyod bdag cag gi bsti gnas su spyan 'dren to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199a-4: des khas blangs nas de de rnams dang gru zam gyi skyed mos tshal du zhugs nas des de la dbang du bya ba'i rdzas chang gis bkang ba dang ldan pa'i na li ke re'i 'bras bu rnams dang gzhan dag kyang byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199a-5: de chang gis myos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199a-6: dbang du bya ba'i rdzas kyi sbyor bas de de dang lhan cig mi tshangs par spyad pas rdzu 'phrul yongs su nyams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199a-7: char la mngon par dga' ba'i lhas sprin kun nas bsdus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199a-10: da dung khyod kyis bdag nyid su yin pa mi shes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199a-11: des de 'dod chags kyi zhags pas bcings nas rgyal po la phul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199a-12: lha drang srong de ni 'di lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199a-13: de nas lhas char dbab par brtsams nas lo legs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199a-14: rgyal pos zhi ldan ma 'khor dang bcas te drang srong de la chung mar byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199a-15: des zhi ldan ma spangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199a-16: gzhan dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod pa la zhugs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199a-17: de la zhi ldan mas phrag dog gi kun nas dkris pa'i snying gis de la bkur sti ma yin pa bya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199a-18: de nas phar cig tshur cig rtsod pas mchil lham dang bcas pa'i rdog pas mgor bsnun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199a-20: sprin gyi 'brug sgra yang bdag gis mnags par mi bzod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199b-0: da ni 'dod @199b chags kyi zhags pas bcings nas bud med tsam gyis kyang brnyas sam snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199b-1: des brtson 'grus la gnas pas slar yang mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199b-2: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199b-3: de'i tshe de'i dus drang srong gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199b-4: zhi ldan ma gang yin pa de ni grags 'dzin ma 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199b-5: de na yang 'dis nga ro'i sred pas dbang du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199b-6: da ltar yang 'di la dus dbang du bya ba la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199b-7: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199b-8: phyi rol tu byung ba de'i tshe grags 'dzin ma khyim thab kyi byams pa dang bral lo snyam ste re thag chad nas khang thog tu 'dzegs te bdag nyid mchongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199b-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyel pa mi mnga' ba'i chos can yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis de blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199b-11: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199b-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199b-13: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du grags 'dzin ma khang thog nas bdag nyid 'chongs pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199b-15: dge slong dag de ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang nga'i phyir bdag nyid bor ba de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199b-16: dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba zhig byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199b-17: de dus gzhan zhig na ri dvags 'chor zhing rim gyis song ste ri sul zhig tu phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:199b-18: des de na mi'am ci pho dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200a-2: mi'am ci mo ni ma nyal ba zhig mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200a-3: rgyal pos gzhu rna drung du bkang ba'i mdas mi'am ci'i gnad du bsnun nas srog dang phral te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200a-4: rgyal pos mi'am ci mo chung ma'i don du bzung nas khrid de song ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200a-6: lha re zhig bzhed la de'i bar du bdag gis mi'am ci'i ro la mchod pa bgyid na gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200a-9: ro de la mchod pa ji ltar byed pa blta'o snyam nas des de la gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200a-10: de nas des mi'am ci'i ro de la shing gi phung po byas nas me spar te bdag nyid mchongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200a-11: lhas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200a-12: mi'am ci mo dga' spyad ces //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200a-13: don gzhan du ni bsam pa las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200a-14: gzhan du yongs su rgyur byas pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200a-15: srog chags gnyis ni bsad par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200a-16: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200a-17: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi mi'am ci gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200a-18: mi'am ci mo gang yin pa de ni grags 'dzin ma 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200a-19: de na yang 'dis nga'i phyir bdag nyid me phung du mchongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200a-20: da ltar yang 'dis nga'i phyir khang thog nas bdag nyid mchongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200a-22: da ni grags 'dzin ma gdul ba'i dus la babs kyis ma la 'di ngas 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bsgral bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200b-0: de la gang thos pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par khong du chud par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos @200b bshad pa mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200b-1: grags 'dzin mas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200b-2: de dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas ji tsam na dgra bcom par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200b-3: de rang gi rigs rgyud dang mthun par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200b-4: 'phags pa'i lam thob pas dge slong ma rnams kyi nang du dgos pa byung ba rnams la shin tu 'dzem pa dang ldan no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200b-6: dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ma rnams la 'dzem pa dang ldan pa'i mchog ni 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200b-7: sgra gcan zin gyi ma grags 'dzin ma 'di yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200b-8: yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200b-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200b-10: btsun pa grags 'dzin mas las ci zhig bgyid na las de'i rnam par smin pas mngal du lo drug bzung lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200b-12: dge slong dag grags 'dzin ma 'di nyid kyi sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las byas shing bsags pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200b-13: lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200b-14: dge slong dag sngon byung ba gnag lhas zhig na phyugs rdzi ma dang bud med gnyis zhig gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200b-15: de gnyis dar ba'i bum pa thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200b-16: rgyun du grong mthar 'gro ba na de gnyis las bu mo ni ngan g-yo'i rang bzhin can yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:200b-17: ma ni drang ba zhig yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201a-0: @201a *// yum re zhig dar ba'i bum pa snoms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201a-3: de ni ngan g-yo'i rang bzhin can yin pas phyi na sdod cing de'i rjes su slebs par ma song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201a-4: de de ltar byed pa na ma des dar ba'i bum pa rgyang grags drug gi bar du khyer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201a-5: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201a-6: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi phyugs rdzi mo gang yin pa de ni grags 'dzin ma 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201a-7: de na 'dis ma la ngan g-yo'i spyod pas rgyang grags drug tu dar ba'i bum pa bskur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201a-8: las de'i rnam par smin pas 'dis sgra gcan zin lo drug tu mngal du bzung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201a-9: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201a-11: dge slong dag khyed kyi de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201a-12: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201a-14: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201a-15: las de'i rnam par smin pas lo drug tu ma'i mngal du mchis lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201a-17: dge slong dag sgra can zin 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201a-18: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas sgra gcan zin nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-0: dge slong dag las byas shing bsags @201b pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-3: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-5: mi dge ba dag byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-6: khams dang skye mched la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-7: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-8: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-9: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-11: dge slong dag sngon byung ba w'a ra n'a si dang ha cang mi ring ba na me tog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-12: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'i bsti gnas bya sna tshogs pa'i skad 'byin cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-14: ri dvags 'dris par brten pa zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-15: de na drang srong 'bras bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-16: rtsa ba dang chu la longs spyod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-18: lo ma gyon pa dung dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-19: bris pa zhes bya ba spun gnyis shig gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-20: dung ni mkhan po byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-21: bris pa ni slob ma byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-22: de gnyis w'a ra n'a si'i 'jig rten thams cad la yang grags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-23: rgyal po tshangs byin gyis kyang skyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhes bya ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-25: bris pa spun gnyis gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-26: de la dung ni mkhan po byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-27: bris pa ni slob ma byed do zhes thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-28: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dung gis ril ba chus bkang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-29: rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'i ched du nags khrod du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-30: bris pa de yang de nyid kyi nang par sngar langs te song na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-31: des me tog dang 'bras bu dag blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:201b-32: rings par 'ongs nas rang gi ril ba la brtags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-1: de skom pas nyen pas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-2: mkhan po'i chu btung ngo snyam nas des 'thungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-3: ji tsam na drang srong dung rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dag blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-4: skom pas nyen pa'i rang bzhin gyis bsti gnas su phyin nas ril ba la brtags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-5: stong par mthong na de mi bzod pa skyes te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-6: kho bo'i chu rkun ma su zhig gis brkus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-8: mkhan po rkun ma ni bdag lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-10: bdag la chad pas dgum du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-12: khyod ni kho bo dang spun yin la slob ma yang yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-13: gal te 'thungs na 'thungs pa legs kyis ji bder spyod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-15: mkhan po 'gyod pa 'di bdag gis bsal bas rngo mi thog gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-16: chom rkun pa la gcod pa'i chad pa lci ba gang lags pas bdag la dgum du gsol zhes de skad smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-17: drang srong dung khros nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-18: kho bo chad pa mi gcod kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-19: ci ste khyod chad pa don du gnyer na rgyal po'i drung du song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-20: yang de'i tshe rgyal po ri dvags 'chor ba'i phyir chas pa de las des rgyal ba dang tshe spel bdag byas nas tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-21: rgyal chen gang phyir ma stsal chab //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-22: 'tshal bas bdag ni rkun ma lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-23: chom rkun chad pa gang lags pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-24: chad pa lci bas bdag la khum //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-26: chu la ni ma byin par len pa med na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-27: 'on kyang sus dbang ba'i chu khyod kyis brkus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202a-28: des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202b-0: rgyal pos smras pa @202b khyod dang nga spun yin zhing mkhan po yang yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202b-1: chad pas gcad par mi 'os kyis song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202b-3: lha bdag gi 'gyod pa bsal bar rngo mi thog gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202b-4: chom rkun pa la dgum pa'i chad pa lci ba gang lags pas bdag la dgum du gsol zhes de skad smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202b-5: rgyal po khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa la gnas pa'i kun nas dkris pa drag pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202b-6: gal te de ltar na 'di nyid du 'dug la re zhig nga slar ma log gi bar du khyod ma 'gro zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202b-7: rgyal po des ri dvags bshor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202b-9: sgo gzhan nas nang du zhugs nas phyir yang ma byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202b-10: blon po rnams kyis zhag drug gi nyin par rgyal po la smras par lha drang srong de phyogs de kho na nyid na mchis nas deng du dgung drug lags kyis bka' stsal pa'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202b-11: rgyal pos smras pa chad pa nas phyung la de'i chad pa ni de kho na yin gyis song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202b-12: blon po rnams kyis drang srong de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202b-13: drang srong lha'i zhal nas chad pa nas phyung la de'i chad pa ni de kho na yin gyis song zhig ces gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202b-14: de 'gyod pa dang bral te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202b-15: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202b-16: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po tshangs byin gang yin pa de ni sgra gcan zin 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202b-17: de na 'dis sems gdug pas drang srong la phyogs 'di nyid du 'dug la ma 'gro zhig ces smras pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas ma'i mngal du lo drug 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:202b-18: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203a-0: dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong @203a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203a-4: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203a-5: the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203a-7: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan gyis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203a-8: las de'i rnam par smin pas mi gtso bo rnams kyi rgyal por gyur lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203a-10: dge slong dag bzang ldan 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203a-11: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203a-12: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203a-13: bzang ldan gyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203a-14: dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203a-17: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203a-19: mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203a-20: khams dang skye mched la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203a-21: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203a-22: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203a-23: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203a-25: dge slong dag sngon byung ba mu lto ba zhig ljongs shig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203a-26: w'a ra n'a sir 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203a-27: de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i mu lto ba phrag dog gi rang bzhin can rnams kyis de ltag dbyug dang thal lcag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203b-0: @203b dbyug pa la sogs pas shin tu brdegs nas bskrad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203b-1: de w'a ra n'a si'i phyi rol na rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal zhig yod pa na gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203b-2: ji tsam na rgyal po tshangs sbyin sos ka'i dus la bab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203b-3: me tog gi shing rnams kha 'bus shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203b-10: shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags tshal stug po'i skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir btsun mo dang lhan cig song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203b-11: de skyed mos tshal de na btsun mo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203b-12: lhan cig bde ba nyams su myong bar byas nas gnyid log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203b-13: bud med ni me tog dang 'bras bu la dga' ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203b-14: me tog dang 'bras bu tshol zhing phan tshun 'khyams pa la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203b-15: ji tsam na rgyal po tshangs sbyin gnyid kyis dub pa sangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203b-16: rings pa rings par w'a ra n'a sir zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203b-17: btsun mo bud med rnams kyang rings pa rings par dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203b-18: ji tsam na bud med gzhan zhig brtabs pas mu tig gi do shal bor te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203b-19: ji tsam na mu lto ba de skyed mos tshal der rgyu bar brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203b-20: des mu tig gi do shal de mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203b-23: 'di'i phyir gnod pa 'thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203b-24: des de su'i yin pa de len par 'gyur grang zhes de skyed mos tshal nyid du shing gi yal gzhig la btags te gzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203b-25: ji tsam na btsun mo rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203b-26: lha btsun mo che ge mo zhes bgyi ba'i mu tig gi do shal skyed mos tshal du lus lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:203b-27: rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204a-0: @204a *// shes ldan dag mu tig gi do shal skyed mos tshal du lus pa tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204a-1: de rnams skyed mos tshal du dong nas btsal bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204a-2: ji tsam na shing gi yal ga zhig la btags pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204a-4: re zhig 'di sus btags dpyad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204a-6: de rnams skyed mos tshal na rgyu bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204a-7: ji tsam na mu lto ba zhig mthong nas de rnams kyis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204a-8: kva'i nang rje mu tig gi do shal 'di su zhig gis yal ga la btags te bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204a-9: des ji ltar gyur pa de rnams la smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204a-10: blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la mu tig gi do shal phul nas ji ltar gyur pa smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204a-12: shes ldan dag mu lto ba de bltas khug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204a-15: kva'i nang rje khyod kyis ci'i phyir mu tig gi do shal shing gi yal ga la btags te bzhag nas rang gir ma byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204a-17: lha 'di'i skal ba bdag la ma mchis kyi lha kho na la 'os pa'i slad du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204a-18: rgyal po dga' bar gyur nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204a-19: kva'e nang rje khyod ni dam pa 'os pa yin pas dam pa gang 'dod pa gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204a-22: gal te lha bdag la dgyes par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204a-23: mu lto ba rnams 'tshal ma stsal cing de rnams re re la ras zung re bskon nas bdag dpon por bsko bar gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204a-24: rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204a-25: shes ldan dag khyed cag gis mu lto ba thams cad zan byin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204b-0: re re la ras zung re bskon te mi @204b 'di de rnams kyi dpon por chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204b-1: de rnams kyi w'a ra n'a sir dril sgrogs su bcug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204b-2: lhas bka' stsal gyi w'a ra n'a si'i mu lto ba ji snyed pa thams cad skyed mos tshal che ge mo zhig tu 'dus shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204b-3: ngas mu lto ba rnams la zan sbyin zhing re re la yang ras zung re bskon no zhes bsgrags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204b-4: de dag thams cad 'dus nas blon po rnams kyis kha zas bsod pas tshim par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204b-5: re re la yang ras zung re bskon te bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204b-7: deng phan chad khyed cag gi rgyal por mu lto ba 'di bskos kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204b-8: khyed cag gis 'di'i tshig bzhin du byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204b-9: de rnams zas bsod pas tshim par byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204b-10: ras zung re bskon pas yi rangs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204b-11: lhas ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes mu lto ba de dpon por gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204b-12: mu lto ba rnams ni rang bzhin gyis bkres skom pas zil gyis non pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204b-13: tshong dus nas bza' ba dang btung ba 'phrog par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204b-14: de rnams rgyal pos bkur nas ni lhag par yang 'phrog par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204b-15: tshong rdal gyis 'tsho ba'i skye bo'i tshogs 'khrugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204b-16: des rgyal po la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204b-17: rgyal pos smras pa khyed cag srung ba la bag yod par byos la de rnams la ni ma brdegs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204b-18: ji tsam na mi zhig snum khur dag khyer nas tshong 'dus kyi dbus nas song ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204b-19: mu lto pa'i dpon po des de las phrogs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204b-20: des khyer te phyogs dben pa zhig tu song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204b-21: mu lto ba rnams kyi phyir 'brang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:204b-22: de rnams kyis de la glags ltas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205a-0: 'bab chu ba ri ka rgal nas shing zhig gi @205a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205a-2: sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205a-3: 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa la snying brtse ba can pas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205a-4: 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205a-5: ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas zhig stes te phyogs der 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205a-6: des de lus mdzes shing sems dang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205a-7: spyod lam zhi bar mthong nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205a-8: gdon mi za bar bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba ma byas pa des na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205a-9: bdag mi'i lus thob na yang mu lto bar skyes kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205a-10: gal te bdag nyid chen po 'di bdag las snum khur bzhes par gyur na bdag gis de dbul lo snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205a-11: de nas rang sangs rgyas de'i sems kyis de'i bsam pa shes nas pha rol rjes su bzung ba'i ched du de la lhung bzed bzed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205a-12: des de la gus pas snum khur phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205a-13: bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyis chos ston gyis ngag gis ma yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205a-14: de steng gi bar snang la 'phags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205a-15: 'bar ba dang gsal ba dang char 'bebs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205a-16: glog 'byin pa'i chos 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205a-17: so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205a-18: de shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi rkang pa la gtugs nas smon lam gdab par brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205a-19: bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'di bdag mi gtso bo rnams kyi rgyal por gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205b-0: @205b 'di las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed kyi mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205b-1: de nas mu lto ba rnams lhags nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205b-2: bdag cag la yang snum khur stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205b-4: ngas de bdag nyid chen po'i drang srong de la phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205b-6: phul nas khyod kyis smon lam ji skad btab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205b-8: mi gtso bo rnams kyi rgyal por gyur cig ces byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205b-10: bdag cag kho na khyod kyi mi gtso bo rnams su gyur cing de rnams kyi rgyal por khyod gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205b-12: legs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205b-13: khyed cag gis ci drang srong gi zhabs la gtugs te smon lam mi gdab bam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205b-14: de rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas de'i rkang pa la gtugs te smon lam btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205b-15: bdag cag khyod kyi mi gtso bo rnams su gyur cing de rnams kyi rgyal por khyod gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205b-17: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205b-18: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi mu lto ba'i dpon po gang yin pa de ni sh'akya'i rgyal po bzang ldan 'di nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205b-19: mu lto ba de rnams ni sh'akya lnga brgya po 'di dag yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205b-20: 'di dag dang bzang ldan mu lto bar gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205b-21: rang sangs rgyas la smon lam btab pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas sh'akya lnga brgya po 'di rnams kyi rgyal por gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205b-22: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rna par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:205b-23: dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206a-1: rgyas bcom ldan 'das sgra gcan gyi drang srong kun rdzi ka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206a-2: de'i tshe lhung bzed rab tu mang po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed bla gab med par bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206a-4: de nas spre'u zhig shing s'a la las babs nas lhung bzed rnams gang na yod pa der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206a-5: dge slong rnams kyis lhung bzed rnams bcag tu 'ong zhes de bzlog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206a-7: dge slong dag spre'u 'dis lhung bzed rnams bcag par mi 'gyur gyis 'di ma bzlog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206a-8: de nas spre'u de bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed khyer te shing s'a la de la 'dzeg nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206a-10: sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi dvangs mas bkang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206a-11: rim gyis dal bu dal bus shing s'a la las babs nas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis de srog chags dang bcas pa yin pas ma bzhes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206a-13: de nas spre'u de mtha' gcig tu song nas srog chags bsal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206a-14: bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis de brtags pa ma yin no zhes ma bzhes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206a-16: de nas spre'u de mtha' gcig tu song ste chu grang mos btab nas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis de brtags pa byas so zhes bzhes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206a-18: de nas spre'u de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi sbrang rtsi'i lhung bzed bzhes so snyam du rig nas dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206a-20: dga' ba rgya chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206b-0: yid @206b bde ba skyes nas thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206b-1: phyi nur du gar byed cing phyag 'tshal ba las de bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206b-2: bcom ldan 'das la rtog cing rgyab tu ma bltas pas khron par lhung nas shi ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206b-3: sgra gcan nyid kyi bram ze las drug la brtson pa zhig gi khyim du skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206b-4: gang gi nyi ma kho na la nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs pa de kho na'i nyi ma la sbrang rtsi'i char bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206b-5: de'i phas ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206b-8: ji tsam na bram ze mo de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas khye'u zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206b-9: gang gi nyi ma kho na la btsas pa de kho na'i nyi ma la sbrang rtsi'i char bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206b-10: de'i nye du rnams 'tshogs shing 'dus nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206b-11: khye'u yi ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206b-12: nye du rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206b-13: khye'u 'di gang gi nyi ma kho na la ma'i rum du zhugs pa de kho na'i nyi ma la sbrang rtsi'i char bab la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206b-14: gang gi nyi ma kho na la btsas pa de kho na'i nyi ma la yang sbrang rtsi'i char bab la gnas 'jog dang yang rus gcig pas de lta bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206b-15: khye'u yi ming gnas 'jog gi bu sbrang rtsi can zhes bya bar gdags so zhes de'i ming gnas 'jog gi bu sbrang rtsi can zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206b-16: de bsrings bskyed nas chen por gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:206b-17: gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207a-0: de rab tu byung nas kyang nyi ma re re zhing sbrang rtsi lhung @207a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207a-1: bzed gsum gsum grub par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207a-2: des de rnams las gcig ni bcom ldan 'das la 'bul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207a-4: gsum pa ni grogs bshes dang lhan cig longs spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207a-5: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207a-6: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207a-7: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog gi bu sbrang rtsi can gyis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207a-8: las de'i rnam par smin pas gdugs re re zhing sbrang rtsi lhung bzed gsum gsum grub par gyur lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207a-10: dge slong dag gnas 'jog gi bu sbrang rtsi can nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207a-11: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207a-12: lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207a-13: dge slong dag khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la sbrang rtsi'i lhung bzed 'bul ba'i spre'u gang yin pa de mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207a-15: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi spre'u gang yin pa de ni gnas 'jog gi bu sbrang rtsi can 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207a-16: de na 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la sbrang rtsi'i lhung bzed phul ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas bram ze las drug la brtson pa'i khyim du skyes shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207a-17: nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs pa dang btsas pa na yang sbrang rtsi'i char bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207a-18: 'di ltar da ltar yang nyi ma re re zhing sbrang rtsi lhung bzed gsum gsum 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207b-0: @207b dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207b-1: las gcig tu dkar ba la brtsal bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207b-3: gal te dge slong gnas 'jog gi bu sbrang rtsi can gyis shar gyi rgya mtsho chen po la sbrang rtsir mos shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207b-6: byang gi rgya mtsho chen po dag sbrang rtsir mos na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207b-7: de dag kyang sbrang rtsir 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207b-8: dge slong dag de lta na yon gnas de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag tu med pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207b-9: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207b-10: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207b-11: las de'i rnam par smin pas rgyal po'i 'dreg mkhan du gyur lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207b-13: dge slong dag nye bar 'khor 'di nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las byas shing bsags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207b-14: tshogs rnyed pa ni zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207b-15: lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207b-16: dge slong dag sngon byung ba rgyal po'i 'dreg mkhan zhig yod pa'i drung du rang sangs rgyas shig song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207b-17: bzhin bzang nga'i skra bregs shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207b-18: khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207b-19: de yang rgyal po'i pho brang du chas pas des tsha bo la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207b-20: tsha bo rab tu byung ba 'di'i dbu regs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207b-21: kho bo rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro dgos kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:207b-22: ji ltar rgyal po la bya ba de bzhin du regs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208a-1: po ji skad smras pa las gdon mi za bar 'di la bsod nams yod do snyam nas des gus par byas te de'i skra dang kha spu bregs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208a-2: rang sangs rgyas kyis bsams pa sems can 'dis bsod nams mang du bskyed kyis 'di dge ba bskyed par bya'o snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208a-3: de la rjes su snying brtse ba'i phyir steng gi bar snang la 'phags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208a-6: glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208a-7: so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208a-8: de shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smon lam gdab par brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208a-9: dge ba'i rtsi ba 'dis ji ltar bdag gi zhang po rgyal po'i 'dreg mkhan byed pa de bzhin du bdag kyang rgyal po'i 'dreg mkhan du gyur cig ces byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208a-10: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems rgyal po'i 'dreg mkhan gyi tsha bo gang yin pa de ni dge slong nye bar 'khor 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208a-11: de na 'dis rang sangs rgyas kyi skra dang kha spu bregs nas smon lam btab pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas rgyal po'i 'dreg mkhan du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208a-12: gzhan yang 'dis smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208a-13: dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri bor zhig na khyim bdag gcig gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208a-14: des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208a-15: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208a-16: dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208a-18: dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208b-0: @208b dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas so zhes bya ba nas rim gyis khye'u bdun btsas so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208b-1: de'i ne'u zla rgyal po'i 'dreg mkhan zhig yod pa de bu med pas lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208b-2: bdag la bu pho yang med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208b-3: bu mo yang med pas bdag shin bdog pa thams cad bu med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208b-4: zhes rgyal pos mnga' mdzad par 'gyur ro snyam du sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa de khyim bdag des mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208b-5: ne'u zla ci'i phyir sems khong du chud /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208b-6: des smras pa ne'u zla kho bo la nor gyi rigs 'di snyed cig yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208b-7: bu pho yang med bu mo yang med pas kho bo shi nas 'di dag thams cad rgyal po'i mnga' mdzad par 'gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208b-8: ci'i phyir sems khong du chud par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208b-10: gal te de lta na kho bo'i bu 'di dag thams cad kyi nu bo shos de kho bos khyod la sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208b-12: ji tsam na khyim bdag de shi ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208b-13: de'i bu de rnams gang gi tshe kha cig dang lhan cig 'thab mo 'gyed pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208b-14: des gang dag gi spu 'dreg mkhan yin pa khyed kyang 'thab mo rgol lam zhes kha zer bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208b-15: de rnams yid mi bde ba skyes nas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208b-16: bdag cag brnyas pa ci yang rung ba gang yin pa de thams cad ni nu bo 'di'i skyon las gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208b-17: thams cad du dbrog go snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208b-18: de rnams kyis de 'phrogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:208b-19: 'dreg mkhan khros na des 'dreg mkhan thams cad la khrims su bcas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209a-0: khyim bdag ga ge mo zhes bya ba'i bu rnams kyi kha spu bcos pa'i las sus kyang mi bya'o @209a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209a-2: de rnams skra dang kha spu dang sen mo ring por skyes pa de rnams rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209a-3: shes ldan dag khyed cag ci'i phyir skra dang kha spu dang sen mo ring por 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209a-5: lha 'dreg mkhan 'dis 'dreg mkhan thams cad la de rnams kyi kha spu bcos pa'i las su yang ma bgyid ces bkag lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209a-6: ci'i phyir de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209a-8: phas bu byin na khyed cag gi ci'i phyir dbrog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209a-10: de rnams kyis mi 'dod bzhin du slar btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209a-11: de rnams yid mi bde ba skyes te 'jig rten gyi smad pas 'jigs nas de gsad par 'dod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209a-12: 'jig rten la ni mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba dang bar ma yod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209a-13: de la gzhan dag gis sbran pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209a-14: des 'dreg mkhan de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209a-15: de rnams bdag la gsod par 'tshal gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang rab tu 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209a-17: de rnams kyis srog dang phral ba bas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209a-18: rab tu byung ba bla'o snyam du bsams nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209a-19: bu gal te de ltar na song la rab tu byung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209a-20: gang gis tshe yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad thob pa de'i tshe bdag la smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209a-21: de gnang ba thob nas drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209a-22: des mkhan po med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209a-23: slob dpon med par rang byang chub mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209a-25: bdag gi pha de la sngon khas blangs pa'i dam bcas pa de ston du 'gro'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209a-26: de de'i drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209b-0: 'bar ba dang @209b gsal ba dang char 'bebs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209b-1: glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209b-2: so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209b-3: de shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam gdab par brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209b-4: bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag rgyal po'i 'dreg mkhan du gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209b-5: gzhan yang 'dis rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya la bya ba byas nas smon lam btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209b-6: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag rgyal po'i 'dreg mkhan du gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209b-7: gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhi la bya ba byas nas smon lam btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209b-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag rgyal po'i 'dreg mkhan du gyur cig ces btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas lan mang du rgyal po'i 'dreg mkhan du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209b-9: yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209b-10: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209b-11: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209b-12: las de'i rnam par smin pas 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209b-14: smon lam btab pa nyid kyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209b-15: gang du smon lam btab lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209b-16: dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:209b-17: de grong khyer w'a ra n'a sir nye bar brten te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210a-1: ri dvags kyi nags na bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210a-2: de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210a-3: rab tu 'byin pa'i dge slong gang yin pa de yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210a-4: de la 'dis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210a-5: de na 'di 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa na smon lam btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210a-6: bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la tshe ji srid bar tshangs par spyod pa spyad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210a-7: yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba gang yin pa de la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan par gyur pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu rab tu byung zhing nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210b-0: ji ltar bdag gi mkhan po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa des 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces btab pa de'i smon lam gyi dbang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba @210b 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210b-1: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210b-2: dge slong dag de lta bu la khyed kyis bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210b-3: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud 'byung po 'khor dang bcas pa bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug bcom nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210b-4: bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa de'i tshe bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir rgyal po btsun mo dang blon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210b-5: grong mi dang yul mi dang bcas pa la dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni de ring shi'o zhes bsgrags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210b-6: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang btsun mo dang gzhon nu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210b-9: yul mi dang bcas pas mya ngan bya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210b-10: lha rnams kyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210b-11: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210b-13: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210b-14: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis kun dga' ba bya ste kun dga' bar gyur pa de'i tshe bdud rtsi zas kyi khye'u zhig btsas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210b-15: de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210b-16: khye'u yi ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210b-17: nye du dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210b-18: khye'u 'di kun dga' bar gyur ba na btsas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210b-19: khye'u yi ming kun dga' bo zhes gdags so zhes de'i ming kun dga' bo zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:210b-20: khye'u kun dga' bo ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211a-0: @211a *// nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211a-1: dri ma phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211a-2: rtsed grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211a-3: de ma ma'i pang du 'tsho ba na mtshan mkhan rnams kyis khye'u 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i rim gro byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211a-4: bdud rtsi zas kyi khye'u mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan to zhes thos nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211a-5: gal te de lta na bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu phyung du 'ong ngo zhes spyan sngar mi 'bab par bya'o snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211a-6: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211a-7: de yangs pa can du skyel lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211a-8: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du gshegs pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211a-9: slar yang ser skya'i gzhir khyer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de lta bu mi mkhyen pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211a-13: rnam par mi rig pa cung zad kyang mi mnga'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211a-14: chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211a-15: 'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211a-17: nyag gcig dpa' ba zla med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211a-19: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis bzhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211a-20: dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211a-21: chu bo bzhi las rgal ba rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs legs par gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211a-22: bsdu pa'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas goms pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211a-25: yan lag drug dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211b-0: pha rol tu @211b phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211b-1: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211b-2: lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211b-3: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211b-4: stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211b-5: phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211b-6: brgya phrag bcu la dbang bsgyur las khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211b-10: gang ni nyam nga bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211b-11: gang ni mi bde bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211b-12: gang ni gnod pa dang nyam nga ba dang mi bde bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211b-13: gang ni ngan song la gzhol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211b-15: gang ni ngan song la bab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211b-16: ngas gang ni ngan song las bslang ste mtho ris dang thar pa la gzhag par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211b-17: gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa dag ni bskyed par bya gang gis bskyed pa dag ni yongs su smin par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211b-18: gang gi smin pa ni grol bar bya zhes mkhyen pas gzigs pa 'jug to /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211b-20: chu srin gnas kyi dug can pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211b-22: sangs rgyas gdul la byams pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211b-25: gzhon nu kun dga' bo ni srid pa tha ma pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211b-26: de'i nga'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ste rab tu byung nas nga'i rim gro byed cing gsung rab 'dzin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:211b-27: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bdud rtsi thob par 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212a-0: ma la ngas gzhon nu kun dga' bo bstan pa la gzhug par bya'o snyam nas ma tshor ba kho nar grong @212a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212a-1: khyer ser skya'i gzhir byon nas bdud rtsi zas kyi gnas khang du gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212a-2: gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212a-3: bdud rtsi zas kyis gzhon nu kun dga' bo khang phran gzhan zhig gi nang du bcug ste bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis na sgo rang 'bye bar 'gyur bar de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas thog ma kho nar bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212a-5: bsil yab blangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na bcom ldan 'das la g-yob cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212a-6: de nas bdud rtsi zas kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi zas la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212a-9: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212a-10: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212a-11: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212a-12: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212a-15: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te bzhud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212a-16: rgyu'i stobs che yang rkyen gyi stobs la ltos dgos pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212a-17: srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin 'brang ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212a-18: bdud rtsi'i zas chung ma'i 'khor dang bcas pas bzlog par ma nus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212b-0: 'di @212b ni srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can yin pas khyed kyis bzlog par mi nus kyis ma bzlog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212b-1: bdud rtsi zas kyis gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212b-2: bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212b-6: de nas bdud rtsi zas kyis dge sbyong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212b-10: 'gro bar chas pa'i slong ba po rnams kyis phyir sbyin pa dag gtong du bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212b-11: bsod nams dag byed du bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212b-12: rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams la yang gzod pa gsol du bcug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212b-13: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212b-14: glang po che la zhon nas skye bo du mas yongs su bskor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212b-15: n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra ba logs su phyogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212b-17: de yang srang gi dbus nas 'gro ba na glang po ches autpa la'i chun po zhig zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212b-18: mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212b-19: gzhon nu 'di ni thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212b-20: de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas bzhon pa las babs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212b-21: rkang pa kho nas n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra bar zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212b-22: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od srung gzhon nu rab tu phyung shig ces 'od srung stobs bcu ldan la gtad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:212b-26: des de rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir ji tsam bzhed kyi @213a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213a-1: bar du bzhugs nas rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213a-2: rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213a-3: rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213a-4: rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ka gnas pa na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213a-5: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i spyi bor phol mig byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tsho byed la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213a-7: dge slong kun dga' bo la dpyad byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213a-8: btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas chos 'chad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213a-10: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir de nyid na 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213a-11: 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed kyis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213a-12: 'di chos la dad pa bde bar gyur pas mi tshor gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213a-13: dpyad bya ba'i dus la bab bo snyam nas des de'i phol mig smin par 'gyur ba dag bskus nas de nyid du bral te de nyid du sos bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213a-14: de na chos bshad pa rdzogs nas 'tsho byed kyis gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213a-15: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'phags pa kun dga' bo 'di nyid na mchis bzhin du phol mig smin par bgyis te brtol nas sos par bgyis lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213a-16: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213a-17: gal te bdag gi lus til 'bru tsam du btubs par gyur kyang bdag gis mi tshor lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi chos las byung ba'i dad pas bsam pa bsdus pa la 'tsho byed mchog tu ya mtshan skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213b-0: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes @213b nas the tshom thams cad gcod pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213b-1: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213b-2: des na spyi bor phol mig byung bar gyur lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213b-4: dge slong dag dge slong kun dga' bo 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213b-5: lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213b-6: dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul mtha' 'khob cig na rgyal po ki ra ta zhes bya ba gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213b-7: sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213b-8: 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa la snying brtse ba can pas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213b-9: 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213b-10: de nas rang sangs rgyas zhig de dang der rgyu ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213b-11: ki ra ta'i grong khyer du phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213b-12: de der bsod snyoms kyis phyir ki ra ta'i rgyal po'i khyim du zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213b-13: de de la mi bzod pa skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213b-14: sems gdug pas 'jim ril gyi ngan kong gis rgyab tu bsnun pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213b-15: bdag nyid chen po de dregs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213b-16: nga rgyal bcom pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213b-17: de snod du ma gyur par shes nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213b-18: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213b-19: ki ra ta'i rgyal po gang yin pa de ni dge slong kun dga' bo de nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213b-20: gang 'dir rang sangs rgyas la mi bzod pa bskyed de sems gdug pas 'jim ril gyi ngan kong gis rgyab tu bsnun pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:213b-21: tshe rabs lnga brgyar gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der spyi bor phol mig byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214a-0: 'di ltar da ltar 'di'i srid pa tha ma la @214a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214a-1: yang spyi bor phol mig byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214a-2: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig 'gro ba de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214a-3: de bcom ldan 'das la lhag par dad pa dang gus pa dang khrel yod pa dang ngo tsha shes pa dang 'dzem pa nyid kyis nye bar gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214a-4: gang gi tshe sprul pa yin na ni dad pa dang gus pa dang ngo tsha shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214a-5: khrel yod pa dang 'dzem pa de 'dra ba dag gis mi gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214a-6: ji tsam na khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rang gi khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214a-7: bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214a-8: lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214a-9: dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214a-10: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun gyis bltas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214a-11: khyim bdag de'i khyim du gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214a-12: gdugs tshod gsol nas slar gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214a-13: dge slong rnams kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214a-14: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ci de ring khyod bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig song ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214a-17: bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig song gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214a-18: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dang ni ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214a-20: gang gi tshe kho bo bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig 'gro ba de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214a-21: bdag bcom ldan 'das la lhag par dad pa dang gus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214a-24: 'dzem pas nye bar gnas pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214b-0: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa yin pa de'i tshe de ltar @214b mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214b-1: dge slong dag phan tshun smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214b-2: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni mtshan ma la mkhas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214b-3: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214b-4: dge slong kun dga' bo mtshan ma la mkhas so zhes bya ba'i sgra bsgrags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214b-6: mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214b-7: rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang mnyan yod du byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214b-8: mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214b-9: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo snga dro sham thabs bgos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214b-10: chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa bram ze zhig gis mthong nas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214b-11: dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyan thos dge slong kun dga' bo mtshan ma la mkhas so zhes thos pa gang yin pa de ni 'di yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214b-12: re zhig shing sha pa zhes pa 'di la 'dam ma du yod pa dri'o snyam nas des de la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214b-13: 'phags pa shing sha pa 'di la 'dab ma ji snyed mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214b-15: brgya dang stong dang khri phrag 'di snyed yod do zhes smras nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214b-16: bram ze des de la lo ma dag cig btogs nas bgrangs te bor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214b-17: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsod snyoms spyad de slar log pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214b-18: bram ze des yang smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214b-19: 'phags pa da ltar shing sha pa 'di la 'dab ma ji snyed mchis mkhyen tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:214b-21: sngar ni brgya dang stong dang khri phrag 'di snyed yod pa las de las 'di snyed cig btogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215a-1: pa ni rtsis la yang de ltar mkhas pa lta zhes mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215a-2: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215a-3: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215a-4: des na mtshan ma la mkhas par gyur lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215a-7: dge slong dag sngon byung ba w'a ra n'a si na bram ze zhig yod pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215a-8: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215a-10: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215a-13: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215a-14: zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu de btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215a-15: rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags nas de bsos bskyed de chen por gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215a-16: de yul gzhan du song ste mtshan ma'i bstan chos drug khri bslabs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215a-17: de bzhin du tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe mtshan ma'i bstan chos drug khri bslabs shing gzhan la yang bstan pa'i rgyu de dang rkyen des gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der mtshan mkhan rnams kyi mchog tu byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215a-18: 'di ltar da ltar gyi srid pa tha ma la yang mtshan mkhan rnams kyi mchog tu byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215b-0: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la nyi ma @215b re re zhing dro ka'i dus su gzhong bar 'bras s'a lu'i chan dang /
