K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215b-2: de gnyis las gcig ni gzhong pa'i steng du 'bab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215b-4: des tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rig par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215b-5: des kyang dge slong rnams la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215b-6: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215b-7: btsun pa ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215b-8: des na 'tshal ma'i dus su gzhong par 'bras s'a lu'i chan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215b-9: bu ram shing gi sdong bu zhig dang sreg pa gnyis lhung la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215b-10: de gnyis las cig ni gzhong pa'i steng du 'bab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215b-11: cig shos ni sa la lhung bar gyur lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215b-14: des na 'di'i zas kyi dus su gzhong par 'bras s'a la'i chan dang bu ram shing gi sdong bu sreg pa gnyis lhung la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215b-15: de gnyis las gcig ni gzhong pa'i steng du 'bab /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215b-18: de'i mngag gzhug pa rnams kyis zhing pa'i grong nas 'bras s'a lu sar pa zhig dang sreg pa gnyis dang bu ram shing zhig khyer te 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215b-19: sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:215b-20: 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216a-0: ngan pa la snying brtse ba can bas mtha'i gnas mal la @216a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216a-2: 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216a-3: de nas rang sangs rgyas zhig w'a ra n'a sir 'ongs nas de snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216a-4: chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te bsod snyoms la khyim bdag de'i khyim du zhugs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216a-5: des de lus mdzes pa dang sems dang par mthong nas des der de la thog mar lo tog sar pa 'on cig ces smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216a-6: 'bras s'a lu'i chan dang bu ram shing gi sdong bu zhig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216a-7: sreg pa gnyis phul ba las de las gcig ni lhung bzed du lhung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216a-10: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216a-11: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag gang yin pa de ni rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216a-12: 'dis rang sangs rgyas la 'bras s'a lu'i chan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216a-13: bu ram shing gi sdong bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216a-14: sreg pa gnyis phul ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas lo mang po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216a-15: lo brgya phrag mang po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216a-16: lo stong phrag mang po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216a-17: lo brgya stong phrag mang por mi'i bde ba nyams su myong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216a-18: da ltar yang 'di'i zas kyi dus su gzhong par 'bras s'a lu'i chan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216a-19: bu ram shing gi sdong bu dang sreg pa gnyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216a-20: de las gcig ni gzhong pa'i steng du lhung la cig shos ni sa la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216a-21: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi las kyi rgyu ba gcig lung bstan pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216a-23: sngon gyi mtha'i las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni yod do snyam du rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216b-0: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la mngon par dad cing de de ltar @216b las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa'i blo gros kyis gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216b-1: ltas mkhan rnams kyis 'phags pa kun dga' bo ni cod pan gyis bcings par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pas ji tsam nam nangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216b-2: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i dpral bar phol mig byung ngo zhes ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216b-4: yon gnas rnams la bya ba byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216b-5: bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'i khyad par med par mi 'gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216b-6: ma la bdag gis 'di la rang nyid kyis bkur sti bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216b-7: des sman pa thams cad bkug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216b-8: 'phags pa kun dga' bo'i dpyad gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216b-9: de'i dpyad gsal ba na bya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216b-10: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216b-11: che dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rang nyid kyis rtsibs brgya yod pa'i gdugs gzung zhing phral ba'i rtsa 'bebs pa na cod pan gyis bcings so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216b-12: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216b-13: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216b-14: las de'i rnam par smin pas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rang nyid kyis rtsibs brgya mchis pa'i gdugs gzung zhing rang nyid kyi cod pan dkar pos bcings te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:216b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; dge slong dag dge slong kun dga' bo 'di nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan dag tu las byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217a-0: lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin @217a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217a-2: dge slong dag sngon byung ba w'a ra n'a sir sman pa zhig gnas pa'i drung du rang sangs rgyas nad pa zhig song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217a-3: des de la yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs te rang nyid kyis sman dpyad dang bkur sti byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217a-4: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217a-5: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi sman pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong kun dga' bo 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217a-6: de na 'dis rang sangs rgyas la bya ba byas nas smon lam btab pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas lo brgya phrag du ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217a-7: lo stong phrag du mar rgyal po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217a-9: bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis 'di la bkur sti byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217a-10: ji ltar da ltar yang 'di la ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rtsibs brgya yod pa'i gdugs spyi bor bzung zhing rang nyid kyis bsnyen bkur byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas shing s'a la can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217a-12: rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217a-13: s'a la can du byon nas s'a la can gyi bram ze'i grong khyer na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217a-14: de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i nyan thos chen po gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi nye 'khor na nye bar rten cing 'dug pa 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217a-15: tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217a-16: tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217a-25: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217b-0: tshe @217b dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217b-1: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217b-2: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217b-3: tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217b-4: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217b-5: dga' yod dang; kim phi la dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217b-6: sa la na gnas pa'i gnas brtan grags ldan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217b-7: yul chu mig can na gnas pa'i gnas brtan gang po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217b-8: de dag dang gzhan yang gnas brtan nyan thos chen po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi nye 'khor na nye bar brten te gnas so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217b-12: dge slong dag da ni nga rgas 'khogs gtugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217b-16: dge bsnyen ma la gdams ngag dpog tu dub kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217b-17: dge slong dag nga'i rim gro pa thugs la mi 'thad pa ma yin gyi thugs la 'thad pas rim gro byed cing bka' stsal pa 'dzin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217b-18: rang gi don yang nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i dge slong zhig spro bskyed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217b-19: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217b-20: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217b-21: btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das la thugs la mi 'thad pa ma lags kyi thugs la 'thad pas rim gro bgyid cing bka' stsal pa 'dzin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:217b-22: rang gi don yang nyams par mi 'gyur ba lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218a-0: ko'u di n+ya khyod re zhig rgas 'khogs gtugs pas khyod nyid @218a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218a-1: la rim gro pa dgos kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218a-2: re zhig ko'u di n+ya khyod nyid kyi stan ji lta ba bzhin la 'dug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218a-3: tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218a-4: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218a-13: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang; tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218a-14: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218a-15: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218a-16: tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218a-17: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218a-22: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218a-23: bcom ldan 'das gang na bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218a-24: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218a-25: btsun pa bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la thugs la mi 'thad pa ma lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218a-26: thugs la 'thad pas rim gro bgyid cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218a-27: bka' stsal pa 'dzin pa dang bdag gi don yang nyams par mi 'gyur ba lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218a-28: gang po khyod kyang rgas 'khogs gtugs te khyod nyid la rim gro pa dgos kyis re zhig gang po khyod nyid kyi stan ji lta ba bzhin la 'dug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218a-29: tshe dang ldan pa gang po rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218b-0: de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'di @218b snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218b-1: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gang zhig rim gro bar bzhed par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218b-2: ma la bdag gis ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs la lta bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218b-4: de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs la lta bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218b-6: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs la bltas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218b-7: nga'i rim gro dge slong kun dga' bos byas na thugs la mi 'thad pa ma yin gyi thugs la 'thad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218b-9: rang gi don yang nyams par mi 'gyur pa yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la gtad par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218b-10: mthong nas kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs te tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218b-11: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu shes par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs la bltas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218b-13: dge slong kun dga' bos nga'i rim gro byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:218b-14: thugs la mi 'thad pa ma yin gyi thugs la 'thad pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:219a-0: dper na khang pa brtsegs pa'am khang pa brtsegs pa'i khyams byang phyogs su ring ba shar phyogs su skar khung gtod pa shar phyogs kyi skar khung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer shar ba nub phyogs kyi rtsig pa'i ngos @219a *//

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:219a-7: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:219a-9: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:219a-16: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:219a-19: 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyen par dka' zhing bzod par dka' ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:219a-21: dper na me 'bar ba'i me phrag ni bsnyen par dka' zhing bzod par dka' ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:219b-0: de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang bsnyen @219b par dka' zhing bzod par dka' bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:219b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro par bdag mi spro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:219b-3: dper na gcan gzan gyi rgyal po seng ge ri phug na gnas pa'i so phrag ni bsnyen par dka' zhing bzod par dka' ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:219b-4: de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang bsnyen par dka' zhing bzod par dka' ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:219b-6: dper na ma tang ga'i glang po che'i rgyal po lo drug cu lon pa dar la bab pa grags pa mche ba gshol mda' tsam yod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:219b-7: brang gi phel ka che ba g-yul myong ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:219b-8: g-yul ngor son pa'i mche ba'i phrag ni bsnyen par dka' zhing bzod par dka' ba yin no //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:221b-12: bza' ba dang bca' ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:221b-14: 'di ni bde ba bskyed pa ma yin no zhes shes pa gang yin pa 'di ni mo'u dgal gyi bu dge slong kun dga' bo'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:221b-15: mo'u dgal gyi bu legs so legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:221b-16: dge slong kun dga' bo ni mkhas pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:221b-17: de sems kyi rnam grangs la mkhas pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:221b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa phye ma bred nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs pa mtshan ma'am gsungs bstan pas shes par 'gyur zhing bde ba'i gnas pa 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:221b-19: 'di bcom ldan 'das mang du bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:221b-20: gnas pa 'di dang 'dis bde bar gshegs pa mang du bzhugs so zhes ston par 'dod na ji skad bstan pa de dag thams cad de bzhin du 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222a-0: gzhan du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni mo'u dgal gyi bu dge slong kun dga' bo'i rmad du byung ba'i chos yin @222a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222a-2: des de bzhin gshegs pa'i rim gro byas na thugs la mi 'thad pa ma yin gyi thugs la 'thad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222a-4: rang gi don yang nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222a-5: mo'u dgal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rim gro dge slong kun dga' bos byas na thugs la mi 'thad pa ma yin gyi thugs la 'thad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222a-7: rang gi don yang nyams par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni dge slong kun dga' bo'i rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222a-8: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222a-9: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro par spro ba bskyed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bsngags pa mdzad pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222a-11: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222a-12: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222a-13: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222a-14: las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi mched du gyur cing thos pa mang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222a-16: thos pa bsags pa'i rim gro bar gyur lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222a-18: dge slong dag dge slong kun dga' bo 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222a-19: lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222b-0: dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na rgyal po 'od zer zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang zhes bya ba nas skye bo dang mi mang po @222b yod pa na rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222b-1: de btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222b-3: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222b-4: de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222b-6: de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222b-7: khye'u yi ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222b-8: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222b-9: 'di'i yab 'od zer lags pas de'i slad du khye'u yi ming 'od zer can du gdags so zhes de'i ming 'od zer can du btags nas bsrings bskyed de chen por gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222b-10: phas rgyal tshab tu bskur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222b-13: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222b-14: khye'u zhig btsas nas de'i yang btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222b-15: 'od zer ldan zhes bya ba'i ming btags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222b-16: gzhon nu 'od zer can nges par 'byung ba la mngon par dga' zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222b-17: de pha chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug pa mthong nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222b-18: bdag kyang yab 'das nas rgyal por 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222b-19: bdag gis kyang chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du bcug nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222b-20: de pha'i drung du song nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222b-21: lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222b-23: des smras pa bu gang gi don du mchod sbyin mchod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:222b-25: dka' thub kyis gdung bar byed pa'i rgyal srid de khyod kyi lag tu 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223a-0: ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung zhes de bzlog kyang ma btub @223a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223a-2: rgyal pos gdon mi za bar gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas gnang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223a-3: de drang srong rnams kyi nang du song ste rab tu byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223a-4: rgyal pos gzhon nu 'od zer ldan rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223a-5: 'od zer can drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223a-6: mtha' gcig tu song nas mkhan po med pa dang slob dpon med par rang byang chub mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223a-7: de dus gzhan zhig na nad kyis thebs par gyur nas phan tshun 'khyams pa na w'a ra n'a sir phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223a-8: rgyal po 'od zer gyis 'od zer can rang byang chub mngon sum du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223a-9: de der 'ongs so zhes thos nas de de'i drung du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223a-10: drang srong chen po khyod ni bsod snyoms don du gnyer ba lags la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223a-11: bdag ni bsod nams 'tshal ba lags kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223a-12: bdag gi skyed mos tshal 'di nyid du bzhugs shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223a-13: khyod la bdag gis yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223a-15: rgyal pos de'i rim gro par gzhon nu 'od zer ldan byin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223a-16: des de'i rim gro bya ba la zhugs pa na rang sangs rgyas kyis de zhag bdun na 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan smin pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223a-17: des de la smras pa nu bo ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223a-19: drang srong chen po rab tu 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223a-20: gal te de ltar 'gyur na song la yab la rtogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223a-21: de rgyal po'i drung du song nas lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223b-0: @223b khyod kyi phu bo rab tu byung bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223b-1: nga 'das nas khyod kho na rgyal po yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223b-2: ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung zhes de rab tu 'byung bar ma thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223b-3: rang sangs rgyas de nyid rgyal po'i drung du song nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223b-7: 'di ltar rgyal ba rnams kyis bsngags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223b-9: drang srong chen po khyod rab tu byung bas de ni bdag 'das na rgyal por 'gyur te 'di nyid du sbyin pa dag stsol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223b-10: bsod nams dag bgyid par 'gyur na ci'i phyir rab tu dbyung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223b-11: rang sangs rgyas kyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223b-12: 'od zer tshe ni cung zad de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223b-13: re ltar thogs na zhag bdun nyid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223b-14: don gzhan ched du bsams bsam pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223b-15: gzhan nyid du ni yongs su 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223b-16: drang srong chen po 'di'i tshe zhag bdun lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223b-17: rang sangs rgyas kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223b-20: drang srong chen po gal te de lta na gnang bar bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223b-22: de bdag la tshe cung zhig yod par shes nas dad pa drag pos de la bkur sti bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223b-23: rang sangs rgyas de rlung nad can zhig pas des lhung bzed lag tu blangs nas za ba na rlung gis lag pa 'dar bar gyur to /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223b-24: de nas rgyal po gzhon nu des gdu bu phyung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223b-25: lhung bzed kyi gzhir bzhag pa dang; de la lhung bzed mi g-yo bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:223b-26: des de mthong nas smon lam gdab par brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224a-0: ji ltar 'di la lhung bzed 'di mi g-yo ba de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi rgyud la chos ci yod @224a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224a-1: pa de dag mi g-yo bar gnas par gyur cig ces btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224a-2: de de la sngon yi ge dang tshig ran par chos 'chad pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224a-4: khyod sngon khyim par gyur pa na yi ga dang tshig ran pa ran par chos 'chad pa lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224a-5: da rang byang chub mngon sum du bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gang yin pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni tshig dang yi ge ran pa ran par chos 'chad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshig dang yi ge ran pa ran par chos 'chad pa gang yin pa de'i mched dang rim gro par bdag gyur cig ces btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224a-14: rang sangs rgyas des de rab tu phyung nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224a-15: khyod zhag bdun 'das nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba de kho na khyod kyis yid la byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224a-17: cung zad kyang ma rtogs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224a-18: des 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam btab pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas thos pa mang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224a-20: thos pa bsags par gyur cig ces btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224a-21: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224a-22: rgyal po gzhon nu rang sangs rgyas kyi nu bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong kun dga' bo 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224b-0: de na yang 'dis rang sangs @224b rgyas phu bo shos kyi rim gro byas nas smon lam btab pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi mched du gyur cing thos pa mang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224b-2: thos pa bsags pa'i rim gro par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224b-3: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224b-4: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis thos pa mang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224b-7: thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224b-9: dge slong dag dge slong kun dga' bo 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224b-10: tshogs rnyed pa ni zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224b-11: lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224b-12: dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224b-13: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224b-14: de grong khyer w'a ra n'a sir nye bar bsten nas drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224b-15: de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung na de na 'dis yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad kyang ma thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:224b-16: 'di rab tu 'byin pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis thos pa mang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225a-0: thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi @225a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225a-1: mchog tu lung bstan pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225a-2: de 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam btab pa bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung la tshe ji srid tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad kyang ma thob kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba gang yin pa de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225a-3: bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225a-5: zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225a-6: dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas ji ltar bdag gi mkhan po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'od srung gis thos pa mang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225a-8: thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sh'akya'i rgyal po'i yang rgyal po bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa des thos pa mang ba thos pa 'dzin pa thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan par gyur cig ces btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225a-9: smon lam de'i dbang gis da ltar ngas thos pa mang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225a-11: thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225a-12: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225b-0: dge slong dag khyod kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o @225b zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225b-2: rdzu 'phrul ston pa gsum smra dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225b-3: gtum byed rig pa ga ya dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225b-4: gang gi phyir ni gnod pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225b-5: sems can rna ba khyi yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225b-6: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225b-7: de'i tshe mu ge'i dgon pa nyam nga ba slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225b-8: de na dge slong rdzu 'phrul thob pa gang yin pa de rnams ni 'dzam bu zhes bya ba'i ming gis 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya bar btags pa gang yin pa de las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225b-9: shing 'dzam bu'i snye ma kha dog dang dri dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225b-10: ro phun sum tshogs pa rnams las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225b-11: bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la 'ged par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225b-12: gzhan yang 'di'i nye 'khor na bil ba'i tshal lam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225b-14: skyur rtsi'i tshal gang yin pa de las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225b-15: skyur rtsi'i 'bras bu kha dog dang dri dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225b-16: ro phun sum tshogs pa rnams las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225b-17: lhag ma yang dge slong rnams la 'ged par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225b-18: byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du dong nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras s'a lu'i 'bru las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225b-19: bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225b-20: lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la 'ged par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:225b-22: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:226a-0: lha'i bdud rtsi las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams @226a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:226a-2: yul ljongs 'byor pa dang zhes bya ba nas skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba'i bar gang yin pa de nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la 'ged par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:226a-3: de nas lhas byin 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:226a-4: da ltar mu ge'i dgon pa nyam nga ba slong mo bas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:226a-5: dge slong rdzu 'phrul thob pa gang yin pa de rnams ni 'dzam bu zhes bya ba'i ming gis 'dzam bu gling zhes bya bar btags pa gang yin pa de las shing 'dzam bu'i snye ma kha dog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:226a-7: ro phun sum tshogs pa rnams las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:226a-8: bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la 'ged par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:226a-9: gzhan yang 'di'i nye 'khor na bil ba'i tshal lam /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:244a-22: rgya mtshos byin rnams yin pas so zhes lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:244b-0: ma la kho bos lhag par yang dge 'dun dbye bar bya ba'i phyir rtul bar bya'o zhes de dge slong lnga brgya dang lhan cig kun dga' ra ba'i nang du tshogs shing za bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das @244b la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:244b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:244b-2: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:244b-3: de bzhin gshegs pas ci'i phyir gsum ni za bar rjes su gnang la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:244b-4: tshogs shing za ba ni bkag pa mdzad ce na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:244b-5: rigs 'bar ba la brten pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:244b-6: gang zag sdig pa 'dod pa rnams kyi phyogs gzhom pa'i don gnyis gzigs pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:244b-7: gang zag sdig pa 'dod pa rnams dge 'dun kho na la brten /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:244b-8: dge 'dun kho na'i ched du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:244b-9: dge 'dun kho na ma shes shing ya mtshan can lta bur byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:244b-10: dge 'dun kho na dang lhan cig rtsod pa bzung nas gnas par 'gyur du 'od snyam pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:244b-11: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu ldan gyis lhas byin la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung phog pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:244b-12: de la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:244b-13: gnas brtan khyod kyis ci'i phyir lhas byin la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung phog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:244b-15: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis de sdig pa 'dod par ma shes mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:244b-16: gal te bdag gis shes na de la bdag gis rdzu zhes bya ba tsam gyi lung yang mi dbog na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:244b-17: rdzu 'phrul gyi lam lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:244b-18: de nas lhas byin la dge slong rnams kyis gcugs pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:244b-19: lhas byin khyod kyi dpal dang skal pa phun sum tshogs pa ci yod pa de thams cad ni gnas brtan 'od srung stobs bcu ldan la brten te yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245a-0: de'i drung du 'gro zhing des 'di slar bzlog @245a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245a-2: de la de ltar bskul ba na smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245a-3: kho bo la des ci zhig byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245a-4: kho bos brtson 'grus la gnas te nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor rjes su brtson pas gnas nas bsam gtan dang po la brten te rdzu 'phrul bsgrub pa ma byas sam zhes de'i tshig smras ma thag kho nar byas pa mi gzo bas rdzu 'phrul las nyams par gyur to; ;dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245a-6: btsun pa lhas byin byas pa mi gzo bas rdzu 'phrul las nyams pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245a-8: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245a-9: ji ltar 'di 'das pa na yang byas pa mi gzo bas rig sngags las nyams pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245a-10: dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor ba dang zhes bya ba nas skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245a-11: de la rig sngags dang gsang sngags 'chang gdol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245a-12: rig sngags dang gsang sngags su mkhas pa zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245a-13: de sa 'dzin gyi rig sngags sbyar nas rdzu 'phrul gyis ri bo spos kyi ngad ldang las dus ma yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245a-14: dus tshigs ma yin pa'i me tog dang 'bras bu dag blangs nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin la dbul bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245a-15: rgyal po tshangs sbyin de la mngon par dga' nas bya dga' sbyin par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245b-0: ji @245b tsam na bram ze'i khye'u zhig gsang sngags don du gnyer zhing gsang sngags tshol ba na brgyud pa las thos nas yul nas w'a ra n'a sir son to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245b-1: de nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245b-2: rig sngags dang gsang sngags 'chang gdol pa de'i drung du song ste phyin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245b-3: mkhan po la bdag bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245b-6: des tshigs su bcad pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245b-7: rig sngags su la'ang mi sbyin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245b-8: rig sngags dang ni lhan cig 'chi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245b-9: yang na rig dang bsnyen bkur dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245b-10: nor gyis rig sngags sbyin par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245b-11: des smras pa mkhan po gal te de lta lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245b-12: bdag cag bsnyen bkur bgyi na dus ji tsam gyi bar du bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245b-14: lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du bsnyen bkur byas na sbyin nam mi sbyin du zad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245b-15: de shin tu rig sngags don du gnyer ba zhig pas khas blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245b-16: de nas mgu bar bya ba lhur blangs nas gus par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245b-17: bsnyen bkur bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245b-18: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na gdol pa de chang gis myos nas khyim du 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245b-19: bram ze'i khye'u des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245b-20: mkhan po 'di ma 'os par chang gis myos kyis 'di'i glor nyal bar bya'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245b-21: ji tsam na gdol pa de mal nas 'gro bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245b-23: khri'i ngos chags pa bram ze'i khye'u des thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:245b-25: mkhan po sdug bsngal zhing nyal bar 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246a-0: ma la bdag gis khri'i ngos su rgyab gtad do snyam nas des khri'i ngos su rgyab @246a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246a-2: 'di ni chos nyid yin te ra ro ba rnams las gang stobs dang ldan pa de ni thun dang pos myos pa bsangs par 'gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246a-3: de chang lci ba'i shugs kyis bram ze'i khye'u yi rgyab la skyugs pas gtor to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246a-5: gal te bdag gis lus bsgul tam tshig phyung na mkhan pos thos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246a-6: sad nas slar gnyid ldog par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas 'di yod do snyam nas de mnags nas 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246a-7: ji tsam na gdol pa de rang nyid sad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246a-8: de lta bu'i ngan pa de mthong nas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246a-11: mkhan po bdag ni bde ba'i zla ba lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246a-13: des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246a-14: de yang lhag par dga' nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246a-15: bu kho bo mgu bar gyur gyis song la khrus byas te shog cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246a-16: khyod la rig sngags sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246a-17: des khrus byas te 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246a-18: des de la rig sngags byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246a-19: bram ze rnams ni rgod pag can yin pas de nogs ma thub ste bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246a-20: re zhig rig sngags 'di 'di nyid du sad la de nas gzhan du 'gro'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246a-21: des rig sngags de sbyar te nam mkha' la 'phags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246a-22: myur bar ri bo spos kyi ngad ldang la song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246a-23: dus ma yin pa dang dus tshigs ma yin pa'i me tog dang 'bras bu dag blangs te 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246a-24: de de dag rgyal po'i mdun na 'don la byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246a-25: des kyang rgyal po tshangs sbyin la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246b-2: yul thag ring po nas bram ze'i khye'u zhig mchis te des 'di dag bdag la stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246b-3: de ni lhag par rig sngags dang gsang sngags 'chang zhing bram ze 'dod pa chung ba lags kyis gdol pa 'jig rten thams cad kyis smad pa 'dis ci zhig bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246b-4: de dbang pa'i 'tsho ba bkum ste bram ze'i khye'u 'di la stsal du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246b-7: de nas mdun na 'don gyis gdol ba'i 'tsho ba bcad nas bram ze'i khye'u de la byin no /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246b-8: de byas pa mi gzo ba des rig sngags de las yongs su nyams par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246b-9: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246b-10: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi gdol ba gang yin pa de ni 'od srung stobs bcu ldan 'di nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246b-11: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze'i khye'u gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246b-12: de na yang 'di rig sngags las yongs su nyams par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246b-13: da ltar yang 'di rdzu 'phrul las yongs su nyams par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246b-14: dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246b-15: ci nas kyang byas pa gzo ba dang byas pa tshor ba can du bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246b-16: chung du byas pa yang chud mi gzan na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246b-17: mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246b-18: dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du rgyal po'i khab tu bzhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:246b-20: dge slong rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247a-0: ga ya gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa @247a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247a-1: dang ga yar byon nas ga ya na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247a-2: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'bras s'a lu sog ma'i sbubs su smin pa shing rta lnga brgya tsam 'bul ba btang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247a-3: lhas byin gyis ma skyes dgra la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247a-4: rgyal po bgres po dge sbyong go'u ta ma la ci 'dra bar byed pa gzigs la bdag cag ljongs rgyu zhing mchi ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247a-5: bdag cag la yang bsod snyoms kyis ma brel bar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247a-6: lhas byin yang 'khor lnga brgyas bskor te ljongs rgyu zhing dong pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247a-7: lhas byin la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'bras s'a lu sog ma'i sbubs su smin ba shing rta lnga brgya lam du bskur ba dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas bsams pa shing rta lnga brgya tsam po 'di su zhig las 'ongs snyam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247a-8: de rnams ngo mtshar skyes nas lam nas 'gro ba'i mi dag la dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247a-9: de rnams kyis rgyas par smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247a-10: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247a-12: btsun pa rgyal po ma skyes dgra snod ma lags pas snod ma lags par char phab pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247a-14: dge slong dag rgyal po ma skyes dgra snod ma yin pas snod ma yin par char phab pa da ltar gyi 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247a-15: ji ltar 'dis 'das pa na yang snod ma yin pas snod ma yin par char phab pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247b-0: dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong rdal med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas @247b shig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247b-1: drang srong rnams kyi bsti gnas me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247b-2: de na drang srong zas su rtsa ba dang chu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247b-4: ral pa can shing shun gyon pa 'bras bu lhung ba la longs spyod pa dag gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247b-5: ji tsam na bsti gnas de na yod pa'i shing aa mra'i yal ga 'bras bu can dag 'bras bu smin pas g-yur za zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247b-6: drang srong rnams kyis 'bras bu blangs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247b-7: shing de la gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa de ser sna'i zil gyis non pas ma byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247b-8: de nas drang srong de rnams kyis drang srong gcig bsti gnas su 'dug tu bcug nas rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'i phyir 'khyams sa dong ma thag tu chom rkun pa lnga brgya bsti gnas su lhags nas de rnams kyis shing de mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247b-10: bdag cag gis 'bras bu ji ltar longs spyad par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247b-11: chom rkun pa'i sde dpon gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247b-12: sta res shing rtsa ba nas bcad la 'bras bu rnams bza'o zhes de skad smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247b-13: lhas 'bras bu thams cad sa la blags nas chom rkun pa rnams kyis ji tsam 'dod pa zos nas dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247b-14: drang srong rnams lhags nas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247b-15: shing aa mra'i 'bras bu rnams su zos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247b-16: drang srong des tshigs su bcad pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247b-17: zhi ba tshangs par spyod rnams pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247b-18: shing gi 'bras bu ma byin gyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247b-19: rkun po sdig byed de dag la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247b-20: 'bras bu rnams ni byin par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247b-22: drang srong de ji lta bu yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:247b-23: des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248a-2: ser sna'i zil gyis non pa'i lhas 'bras bu drang srong rnams la ma byin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248a-3: snod ma yin pa'i rkun po rnams la byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248a-5: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248a-6: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi lha gang yin pa de ni ma skyes dgra 'di nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248a-7: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chom rkun pa'i sde dpon gang yin pa de lhas byin 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248a-8: de'i tshe na yang ma skyes dgra 'di ltar gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248a-9: snod ma yin pas snod ma yin par char phab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248a-10: da ltar yang snod ma yin pa 'dis snod ma yin par char phab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga dha nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248a-12: rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248a-13: lhas byin ni rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la rgyun kho nar 'tshe bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248a-14: gang dang gang gtses pa de bcom ldan 'das kyi snyan du gsol ba gtong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248a-16: kun dga' bo snam sbyar khyer la phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong dge slong zhig dang song la rgyal po'i khab kyi lam po che dang srang dang bzhi mdo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248a-17: sum mdo rnams su khyim bdag dang bram ze rnams lhas byin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248a-18: lhas byin gyi phyogs kyis 'tshor bcug pa gang yin pa de rnams ni sangs rgyas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248b-1: dge 'dun gyi dang 'brel ba ma yin no zhes bsgo zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248b-2: gal te lhas byin ni rdzu 'phrul che la mthu che ba yin no zhes zer na mthu chen por gyur pa las da ni rdzu 'phrul de las yongs su nyams so zhes smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248b-3: de song nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi lam po che dang srang dang sum mdo dang bzhi mdo rnams su bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la bsgo nas de rnams phyin chad bcom ldan 'das kyi snyan du gsol ba mi btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248b-4: bcom ldan 'das snyun gyis thebs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248b-5: 'tsho byed kyi sman mar lcags mda' zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das la phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248b-8: bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248b-10: bcom ldan 'das ya mtshan che lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248b-14: bde bar gshegs pa ma 'tshal lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248b-15: 'tsho byed ngo mtshar che ba ci yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248b-16: bcom ldan 'das rnams ran spyod cing chab 'tshal ba de las bdud rtsi 'di 'byung la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248b-17: de las kyang bsgral ba'i sman mar lcags mda' zhes bgyi ba 'byung lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248b-18: 'tsho byed ya mtshan che ba ci yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248b-19: bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248b-20: dam ba'i chos bshad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248b-21: dge 'dun legs par bsgrub pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:248b-23: bcom ldan 'das skye ba mchis na gdon mi 'tshal bar 'gum lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249a-1: ldan 'das gang zhig gang du 'gum pa de ma 'tshal lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249a-2: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249a-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249a-4: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs te bka' stsal pa 'tsho byed kyis 'tshal pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249a-6: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249a-7: ji ltar 'das pa na yang 'dis nga'i dgongs te bka' stsal pa shes par gyur pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249a-8: dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri bor zhig na khyim bdag phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249a-9: des de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249a-10: de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249a-11: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249a-12: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249a-13: bu mo zhig btsas nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas gdu bu can zhes bya bar ming btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249a-14: de yang rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249a-15: de yang rigs dang mthun par ming btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249a-17: bdag cag la bu lon ded pa dang nor 'phrog pa btsas kyis zong khyer te yul gyi mthar 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249a-19: bdag gi chung ma 'di dar la bab pa'i gzugs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249b-0: lang tsho @249b la bab pas bdag gis 'di la kor sha pa ni mang po gtad de song na skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig tu chud gzon par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249b-1: ma la bdag gis 'di la kar sha pa na nyung zhig byin la 'gro'o snyam nas des de la kar sha pa na nyung zhig byin nas lhag ma rnams gser gyi bum pa'i nang du blugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249b-2: de'i mgrin pa mu tig gi phreng bas bcings nas dur khrod kyi shing rta rna zhes bya ba'i drung du sbas nas zong thogs te yul gyi mthar song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249b-3: de de na rnyed pa mang po dang ldan pas des de nyid du bud med gcig blangs te 'dug nas de la bu yang mang du btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249b-4: de nas chung ma snga ma des gdu bu can dang khye'u gnyis lag las dang gnyen gyi mthus gsos bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249b-6: bdag cag gi pha gar mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249b-8: bu yul che ge mo zhes bya ba'i grong ga ge mo zhes bya ba de na de nor chen po dang ldan zhing 'dug go zhes thos kyis song dang gal te cung zad byin na khyod kyi 'tsho ba'i rkyen du 'gyur ro ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249b-11: de pha tshol zhing rim gyis de'i drung du phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249b-12: de srang na 'khyams pa na phas bzhin ras las ngo shes nas bos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249b-15: des rgyas par smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249b-17: bdag gi bu de ni 'di kho na yin no zhes des de bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:249b-18: bu khyod su la yang 'di bdag gi pha yin no zhes ma smra zhig ces smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-0: de de la shin tu sdug @250a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-2: de nas bu gzhan rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-5: 'di nga'i grogs po zhig gi bu yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-7: ji ltar 'di la shin tu sdug par byed pa las na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-8: gdon mi za bar 'di nyid kyi bu yin no snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-9: de rnams kyis phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-10: 'di ni mas dben gyi spun yin no snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-12: sha khon rnams kyi nang na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-13: 'di lta ste chen chun ni tha chad yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-14: 'di gsad par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa 'di yod kyis gtang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-15: gal te cung zad brdzangs na nor la sogs pa'i phyir lam kar gsad par 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-16: ma la bdag gis 'di la brjed byang gcig byin te gtang ngo snyam du bsams nas bris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-17: grong khyer gyi ni grong rdal rta rna'i drung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-18: sa yi shar du dpag tshad kyis bcad pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-19: mkhas pas bag yod par ni brkos byas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-20: bdag gi nor gyi skal ba thob 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-21: mgul chings gang yin pa de ni gdub can byin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-22: des brjed byang de khyer te song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-23: lam kar mas dben gyi spun rnams kyis bzung nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-24: khyod kyis yab las ci thob /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-26: 'di ni brjed byang yin te ci yang med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-28: phas 'di brid nas gtang ngo zhes de rnams kyis de btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250a-29: rim gyis rang gi khyim du phyin nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos pa dang mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250b-0: khyod @250b kyis pha las cung zad ci thob /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250b-2: 'di ni brjed byang yin te ci yang med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250b-5: lam gyi tshegs chung bar zad kyi cung zad kyang ma rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250b-7: yum bdag nyid chen po de bdag la mi 'drid do zhes byas nas des brjed byang de dpyad par brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250b-8: grong khyer zhes bya ba ni gang du btsas pa de ni grong khyer du 'dod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250b-9: grong rdal zhes bya ba ni gang du ro bsregs pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250b-10: rta rna'i drung du zhes bya ba la rta rna zhes bya ba ni rta rnams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250b-11: de'i rna ba zhes bya ba'i shing ni rta rna ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250b-12: de'i drung na zhes smras pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250b-13: sa'i shar du zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs su'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250b-14: dpag tshad kyis bcad par zhes bya ba ni gnya' shing gang tsam gyis bcad par ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250b-15: des de ltar tshigs bcad kyi don dpyad nas mun tshab tshub tsam na dur khrod du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250b-16: de'i nye 'khor du des bltas na shing rta rna zhig yod pa de'i shar phyogs kyi ngos su gnya' shing gang bcal te brkos pa dang ji tsam na gser gyi bum pa mgul du mu tig gi phreng bas bcings pa zhig mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250b-17: de mgu bas de blangs nas khyim du song ste mu tig gi phreng ba ni bkrol te gdu bu can la byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250b-18: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250b-19: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250b-20: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi de'i bu gang yin pa de ni 'tsho byed 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250b-21: de na yang 'dis nga'i bsams te smras pa shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:250b-22: da lta na yang 'dis nga'i dgongs te bshad pa shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251a-1: ldan 'das ni rdo rje'i sku mnga' la sku che ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251a-2: de la mar nyung ngus ni gdangs par bya mi nus so snyam du brtags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251a-3: des mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis srang la btsal te lhung bzed zed nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed kyi lhag ma dge slong rnams la 'drim du bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251a-5: 'tsho byed dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed kyi lhag bor ro zhes byas nas phyag byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251a-7: bdag gis kyang mar btung ngo snyam nas des 'tsho byed la dris ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251a-8: 'tsho byed dge sbyong go'u ta mas mar ji tsam gyi tshad cig gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251a-10: mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251a-12: kho bos kyang srang sum cu rtsa gnyis btung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251a-14: bcom ldan 'das ni rdo rje'i sku mnga' la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251a-15: sku che bas 'di tsam yang 'ju bar spyod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251a-16: khyod kyis ni 'ju bar mi nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251a-18: kho bo yang rdo rje'i lus can yin na ci'i phyir mi 'ju /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251a-19: des mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis lhung bzed nas 'thungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis ni legs par zhu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251a-21: lhas byin gyis ni ma zhu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251a-22: phyi de nyin par 'tsho byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'jams gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251a-23: lhas byin gyis nga rgyal bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsol to zhes mar ma zhu bzhin du thug pa 'thung pas spos gzer nas gnad du gnod pa'i tshor ba nyams su myong bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251b-0: de rgyu des @251b na sdug bsngal nyam nga ba rtsub pa dog pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong zhing nyin dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251b-2: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni gnyen la gdung ba yin pas de gleng gzhi de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu 'khor lo dang bkra shis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251b-4: g-yung drung 'khyil pa can bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251b-5: 'jigs pa rnams kyi dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa'i phyag mngon du brkyang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251b-6: bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i phug nas lhas byin gyi spyi bor bzhag ste bden pa gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251b-7: ji ltar nga bu gcig pa sgra gcan zin bzang po la dgongs pa de bzhin lhas byin la yang lhag chad med pa yin zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251b-8: bden pa des nad zhi bar gyur cig ces bden pa'i tshig gsungs ma thag kho nar lhas byin gyi nad zhi bar gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251b-9: de dbugs chad pa las slar dbugs byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag la brtags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251b-11: des shes nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251b-12: dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i lag pa yin no snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251b-13: de bskal pa mi nyung bar ngan g-yo'i kun tu spyod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251b-14: dregs pa'i mthus bsgrubs pa'i bsams pa can yin pas de ltar sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen pos tshor ba zhi bar mdzad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251b-16: don grub khyod sman dpyad khong du chud pa ni legs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:251b-18: kun tu bcom ldan 'das ni bden pa gsung gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-0: lhas byin tshor ba drag pos nyen pas srog dang 'bral ba na sos par mdzad do zhes sgra @252a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-1: grags pa de lhas byin gyi phyogs shin tu zhen pa rnams kyis kyang thos nas bcom ldan 'das la kye ma'o 'di ni byams pa yang dag pa dang ldan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-2: kye ma 'di ni sems can rnams la thugs rje legs par bsgoms pa yin no zhes ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-3: dge slong rnams kyis lhas byin la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-4: lhas byin khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sos par mdzad kyi gzhan du srog dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-6: de ni dbang du byed pa'i sgyu ma shes te des 'jig rten dbang du byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-7: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-8: lhas byin khas blangs de thong la rang gi sems gtan la phob cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-9: khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-10: des smras pa mar zhu nas nang zhi bar zad mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-11: des kho bo la ci zhig byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-12: 'di ni byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no zhes bya ba nas de rnams chas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-13: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas lhags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-14: the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-16: btsun pa lhas byin byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-18: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-19: ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-21: ko'u shi dbang phyug chen po'i sde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-22: aa mra dang ni shing rta mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-23: dom gnyis shi ba'i rgyal po dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252a-24: nyams par byas dang dzu dzu ka /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252b-0: dge slong @252b dag sngon byung ba grong rdal med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas skyed mos tshal me tog dang 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang chu phun sum tshogs pa zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252b-1: de na ko'u shi ka dang rus gcig pa'i drang srong 'bras bu lhung ba la longs spyod pa zas su rtsa ba dang chu dang 'bras bu za ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252b-2: pags pa dang shing shun gyon pa zhig gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252b-3: de'i bsti gnas kyi nye 'khor du ri dvags dang bya rnams 'dris pas ci bder 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252b-4: de dang ha cang yang thag mi ring bar bal glang mo zhig phru gu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252b-5: de bu byung ma thag tu seng ge'i sgra sgrogs nas de 'jigs sdangs nas phru gu bor te gcin rtug shor nas bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252b-6: re zhig gcig na drang srong de bsti gnas nas byung nas bsti gnas de'i nye 'khor gyi phyogs su lta zhing song ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252b-7: ji tsam na glang po che'i phru gu gsar du byung ma thag pha ma dang bral ba de mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252b-8: de nas drang srong de snying rjes bskyod pa'i snying gis de'i ma btsal ba'i phyir sgrim pa'i mig gis kun tu blta bar brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252b-9: gang gi tshe gnas thams cad na ma snang ba de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252b-10: de khyer nas bsti gnas su zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252b-11: des de bu bzhin du bsnun bsnyod de bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252b-12: de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe drang srong de'i bsti gnas su gnod pa byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252b-13: me tog gi shing rnams 'byin par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252b-14: 'bras bu'i shing rnams kyi yal ga gcog par byed cing de dag dang gnod pa gzhan yang stong phrag dag byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252b-15: drang srong des de la bsdigs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252b-16: drang srong des bsdigs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:252b-17: de zhum zhum por byas te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-0: gang gi tshe 'dod chags skyes par gyur @253a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-1: pa de'i tshe bsdigs kyang brnyas thabs byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-2: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong des drag tu bsdigs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-3: drang srong de nyid gsad par brgyugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-4: drang srong des spyil bo'i glo phug nas bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-5: lhas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-6: sems can rab gdug byas pa chud gzon pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-7: skyes bu ngan dang 'grogs pa bzang po min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-8: ji ltar ko'u shi ka yi bsti gnas su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-9: yun ring bskyed pa'i glang chen sdig byed bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-10: gus pas zas dang skom dang gnyi ga yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-11: skye bo ngan bsten khyod la ci zhig dgos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-12: nges par ko'u shi ka yi bsti gnas su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-13: glang chen bzhin du de yis mthar grogs gsod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-15: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-16: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-17: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang po che dam pa gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-18: de'i tshe de'i dus na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo zhing byas pa mi tshor ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-19: da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo zhing byas pa mi tshor ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-20: gzhan yang ji ltar 'di byas pa mi gzo zhing byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-21: dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer w'a ra n'a sir rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i sde zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-22: mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253a-23: de'i btsun mo zla 'od ma zhes bya ba rmi lam rno ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253b-0: rmi lam du gang @253b ci mthong ba de thams cad de bzhin du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin pa zhig yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253b-1: rgyal po de'i yul du byang chub sems dpa' ri dvags rnams kyi nang du skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253b-2: gser gyi glo zhes bya ba ri dvags rnams kyi dpon por gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253b-3: de yang lus kyi gzi brjid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan zhing 'jig rten thams cad kyi yid dang mig tu sdug par byed pas 'dod pa skyed par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253b-4: gang gis de mthong na de rtog cing de nyid du sdod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253b-5: de lhag par rtog pa na yid gnyis su gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253b-6: de rngon pas 'jigs pa dang 'jig rten pa gzhan gyis 'jigs pas 'tsher zhing skrag pas spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253b-7: 'di ni chos nyid yin te 'jig rten chags nas ring por ma lon pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253b-8: dud 'gro rnams kyang mi'i skad du smra nus pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253b-9: de nas bya rog gcig de'i drung du 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253b-10: des de dang lhan cig bshes shing 'dris pa'i gtam byas nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253b-11: kye zhang po khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar 'tsher zhing skrag pas spyod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253b-13: tsha bo bdag gi lus skal ba dang ldan pa 'di la 'jig rten thams cad 'dod pa skyed pas kho bo 'jig rten gyis 'jigs shing rngon pas 'tsher zhing skrag pas spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253b-14: des smras pa zhang po bdag kyang de bas kyang 'ug pas 'jigs pas gcig la gcig bsrung bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253b-15: bdag gis ni khyod nyin par bsrung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:253b-16: khyod kyis ni bdag mtshan mo srungs shig ces de gnyis kyis de ltar dam bcas nas gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254a-0: ji tsam na mi zhig dgras lag pa phying ka log tu bcings pas dam du bcings @254a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254a-1: nas chu gzar du bab pa shugs drag po'i dba'i nang du bor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254a-2: de des khyer ba na nyam thag pa'i nga ros snying rje rje'i skad du smre sngags 'don par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254a-3: gang gis de ring bdag gi srog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254a-5: bdag gis de yi bran bya zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254a-6: de yi go re long yang bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254a-7: stes dbang gis ri dvags kyi dpon po de chu'i bsam pas ri dvags kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254a-8: 'bab chu'i 'gram du nye bar song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254a-9: de nas mi'o dod 'bod pa thos nas ri dvags de rnams ni kun tu bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254a-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus kyis log par lhung ba yin yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254a-13: ri dvags dpon po de snying rjes brlan pa'i snying gis mod la 'bab chu de'i nang du 'jug par brtsams pa na bya rog kyang de dang sngon dam bcas pa'i yid kyis kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir de'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254a-14: des mi de dbyung ba'i phyir 'bad pa byed par rig nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254a-15: ri dvags kyi dpon po thong thong gzu lums ma byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254a-16: mi 'di dag ni byas pa mi gzo zhing byas pa mi sems pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254a-17: byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid chen po rnams ni mi bzlog pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254a-18: des de'i tshig ma nyan par 'bab chu de'i nang du zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254a-19: bu gcig pa sdug pa bzhin du mi de rgyab tu skyon nas chu'i 'gram du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254b-0: bcings pa rnams bkrol zhing yud tsam zhig dbugs phyung nas @254b smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254b-1: bu lam 'di nas ci dga' bar song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254b-2: de nas mi des thal mo sbyar te ri dvags kyi dpon po'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254b-3: khyod kyis bdag gi srog gang lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254b-4: 'jig rten rnyed dka' stsal bas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254b-5: yab cig khyod kyi 'bangs bdag ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254b-6: de bzhin go re long yang bgyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254b-8: deng khyod bdag gi bran dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254b-9: go re long yang ma byed par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254b-10: pags pa'i phyir ni bsad 'ong gis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254b-11: khyod kyis bdag gzhan ma bstan cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254b-12: bu khyod kyis mdor bya ba ni 'di yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254b-13: kho bo'i lus 'di 'jig rten thams cad kyis shin tu chags par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254b-14: 'dod par bya ba yin pas khyod kyis kho bo su la yang ma bstan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254b-15: byas pa la lan du phan btags pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254b-16: de nas mi des de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes khas blangs nas ri dvags kyi dpon po la lan gsum bskor ba byas te rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254b-17: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo zla 'od ma rtsed mos dub nas mal chen por legs par gnyid log pa las mtshan mo'i thun tham la rmi lam du ri dvags kyi dpon po gzugs mchog tu sdug pa zhig seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas rgyal po'i 'khor mang po la chos 'chad par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254b-18: mthong nas kyang mngon sum du gyur pa bzhin du rmi lam rmis pas yid bde ba skyes nas myur ba myur bar mal nas langs te rgyal po la smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:254b-19: rgyal pos thos nas kyang de'i bden pa'i rmi lam gyi khyad par la mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255a-1: 'dod pa'i 'gro bar skyes pa des ko ji ltar seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas rgyal po'i 'khor mang po la chos 'chad par 'gyur snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255a-2: de nas btsun mo zla 'od mas dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255a-4: g-yer bag gi gtam dang ldan pa'i kun tu spyod pas rgyal po yud tsam zhig dga' bar byas nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255a-5: lha ri dvags de khugs par bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255a-6: de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255a-7: shes ldan dag nga'i yul na rngon pa ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad nga'i spyan sngar khug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255a-8: blon po rnams kyis yul so sor rgyal po'i mi rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255a-9: lhas bka' stsal pa nga'i yul na rngon pa gnas pa rnams 'dir khug cig ces byung gis khyed kyis rngon pa thams cad 'dir thong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255a-10: de rnams kyis yul rnams na gnas pa'i rngon pa thams cad rgyal po'i drung du btang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255a-11: blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255a-13: shes ldan dag nga'i yul na ri dvags kyi dpon po gzugs shin tu rab tu sdug pa zhig yod do zhes nga'i thos kyis khyod kyis de snyi 'jam zhing lhod pas bzung la ma snad pa rang la phul cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255a-15: lha bdag cag ni 'di nyid kyis 'tsho ba lags pas bdag cag gis dus 'di tsam gyi bar du lha'i yul du brgyus pa las ri dvags kyi dpon po mchog 'di lta bu ni sngon chad lan 'ga' yang mthos na mthong ba lta ci smos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255b-0: lha gcig nas gcig tu smras te phyogs ga ge mo zhig @255b na mchis so zhes gsan nas bdag cag la bka' stsal pa'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255b-1: de lta na bdag cag gis kyang lha'i bka' stsal pa nges par 'grub par mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255b-2: de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255b-3: shes ldan dag w'a ra n'a sir dril sgrogs su chug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255b-4: lhas bka' stsal pa nga'i yul na ri dvags kyi dpon po gzugs shin tu rab tu sdug pa zhig yod kyis sus de'i gtam nga'i snyan du gsol na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255b-5: de ngas bkur sti chen pos bkur sti byas la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255b-6: de la grong rdal mchog lnga sbyin no zhes bsgo zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255b-7: blon po rnams kyis rgyal po las mnyan nas w'a ra n'a sir dril bsgrags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255b-8: w'a ra n'a si na gnas pa'i grong mi dang yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyi shes ldan dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255b-9: lhas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255b-10: nga'i yul na ri dvags kyi dpon po gzugs shin tu rab tu sdug pa zhig yod kyis sus de'i gtam nga'i snyan du gsol na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255b-11: de ngas bkur sti chen pos bkur sti byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255b-12: de la grong rdal mchog lnga sbyin no zhes byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255b-13: de nas de mthong ba'i mi nges 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255b-14: ci re zhig 'khor rjes su bskyang bar bya'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255b-15: 'on te byas pa gzo bar bya snyam pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255b-16: 'dod pa la so sor brten pa ni sdig pa'i las mi byed pa ci yang med pas de 'dod pa'i rgyus bslang ba'i zhe sdang gi me drag pos snying gdungs nas pa bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255b-17: byas pa gzo ba re zhig zhog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:255b-18: dgra la sha glan pa'i dus la bab po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256a-0: ci bdag gis kyang de 'dra ba'i gnas skabs thob @256a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256a-2: re zhig de la sha glan par bya'o snyam nas de nam nangs pa dang rgyal po'i dgos pa sgrub pa'i 'khor gyi nang du 'dug nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo lhug par 'dug pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256a-3: de me tog shin tu dri zhim pa sna tshogs dag khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256a-4: sgo ba dang blon po rnams las gcig nas gcig tu nga rgyud de rgyal pos thos par byas nas 'khor gyi nang du zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256a-5: thog mar bkur sti rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256a-7: lha phyogs ge mo zhig na zhugs shing sna tshogs kyi nags bya dang ri dvags 'dris pas mdzes par bgyis pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256a-8: ri dvags kyi dpon po gser gyi glo zhes bgyi ba ri dvags kyi tshogs stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256a-9: bdag gis lha la ri dvags dam pa gzugs mchog tu sdug pa de bstan par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256a-10: de nas rgyal pos de thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256a-12: blon po brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing ya mtshan skyes pa yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa gzhan rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256a-13: w'a ra n'a si na gnas pa'i grong mi dang yul mi rnams kyis kyang mdun du bdar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256a-14: mi des lam bstan pa bzhin du rim gyis phyogs der phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256a-15: ci tsam na bya rog byang chub sems dpa' dang dam bcas pas phyogs su blta ba'i phyir nags tshang tshing de'i shing khan 'dug pas skye bo'i tshogs chen po nags tshang tshing du phyogs te 'ongs pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256b-0: de rings par ri dvags rnams kyi dpon @256b po'i drung du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256b-1: ri dvags kyi rgyal po khyod la bdag gis sngar mi rnams ni phan pa byas pa mi sems shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256b-2: byas pa mi gzo la byas pa mi tshor ba yin no zhes smras pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256b-3: mi des skyes mang du khyer te 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256b-4: sgra de ri dvags rnams kyis thos nas skrag ste kun tu bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256b-5: ri dvags kyi dpon po byang chub sems dpas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256b-6: gal te bdag gis ri dvags 'di dag ma bsrung na de ring nyid du kha btag par 'gyur gyis sems can yal ba 'dor ba bas ni rang gi srog chud gzon pa sla'o snyam nas rgyal po bsur song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256b-7: de nas mi snying rje med cing 'jig rten pha rol la mi lta ba de ri dvags la blta bar brtun pa'i blos ri dvags kyi mchog de la lag pa gnyis kyis bstan te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256b-8: lha ri dvags kyi dpon po ni 'di lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256b-9: las shin tu drag po yongs su rdzogs pa dag ni rnam par smin pa'i dus la mi ltos pa yin pas tshig smras ma thag kho nar mi de'i lag pa gnyi ka sa la lhung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256b-10: de nas rgyal po de skyo ba skyes nas mi de la dris pa kva'e nang rje 'di ci las gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256b-11: de sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen cing nga ro mi gsal bas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256b-12: rgyal chen gang zhig bkum nas nor //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256b-13: 'phrog de chom rkun ma lags kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256b-14: rgyal chen byas pa mi gzo ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256b-15: gang lags de ni chom rkun lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256b-17: kva'e nang rjes smras pa de'i don ci yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:256b-18: des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad rgyas par rgyal po la smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257a-1: pos byas pa chud gzon pa'i mi de la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257a-2: ci phyir tha chad sar ni bying ma gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257a-3: ci phyir lce ni dum bu brgyar ma gas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257a-4: ji ltar khyod kyi lus 'di gsad pa bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257a-5: rdo rje char mdung mda' chen brdegs ma gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257a-6: de nas rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po de shes nas blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257a-7: shes ldan dag ri dvags kyi dpon po bdag nyid chen po 'di ni bsnyen bkur bya bar 'os kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257a-8: deng la grong khyer dang lam byi dor byed du chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257a-9: de rnams kyis grong khyer de'i rdo ba dang gseg ma dang gyo mo rnams bsal cing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257a-10: shin tu dri zhim pa'i phog phor dag bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257a-12: dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dag dpyangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257a-13: me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar bkram ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257a-14: lha rnams kyi dga' tshal gyi skyed mos tshal bzhin du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257a-15: de bzhin du lam yang mdzes par byed du bcug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257a-16: w'a ra n'a si na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis me tog gi phreng ba dag thogs te bsur dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257a-17: de nas rgyal pos ri dvags kyi dpon po gzugs shin tu sdug pa de 'byor pa chen pos grong khyer w'a ra n'a sir zhugs nas seng ge'i khri la 'dug tu bcug go /
