K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257a-18: de nas rgyal pos rgyal po'i 'byor pa dang mthu chen pos btsun mo dang gzhon nu dang blon po dang grong mi dang yul mi dang bcas pas yongs su bskor cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257b-0: de nas @257b ri dvags kyi dpon po byang chub sems dpas 'khor la bltas nas rgyal po dang 'khor de la de lta bu'i chos bshad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257b-1: de thos pas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas bslab pa lnga'i gzhi blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257b-2: sems can du ma dag gis ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dag thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257b-3: de nas rgyal pos nags de ri dvags rnams la byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257b-4: srog chags 'byung po thams cad la yang mi 'jigs pa byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257b-5: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257b-6: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ri dvags kyi dpon po gser gyi glo gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257b-7: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi mi gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257b-8: de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257b-9: da lta yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257b-10: gzhan yang ji ltar lhas byin 'di byas pa mi gzo zhing byas pa mi tshor ba 'di nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257b-11: dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri por zhig na me tog phreng rgyud mkhan zhig gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257b-12: de'i me tog gi ra ba chu'i pha rol na yod pas de nyi ma re re zhing chu rgal zhing me tog thu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257b-13: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257b-14: chu rgal ba na dus tshigs ma yin pa'i aa mra'i 'bras bu chus khyer ba zhig mthong nas des de blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257b-16: sgo bas gsol ka ba la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257b-17: gsol ka pas rgyal po la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257b-19: btsun mos de myangs te myangs pa na rol zhen nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257b-20: rgyal po la gsol pa btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257b-21: lha aa mra'i 'bras bu 'di 'dra ba gzhan yang stsal pa'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:257b-22: rgyal pos gsol ka pa la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258a-3: sgo srung gis stsal lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258a-4: sgo srung la smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258a-6: me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyis stsal lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258a-8: shes ldan dag me tog phreng rgyud mkhan khug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258a-9: rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis bkug nas rgyal pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258a-10: kva'e me tog phreng rgyud mkhan khyod kyis aa mra'i 'bras bu 'di ga las rnyed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258a-11: des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258a-12: rgyal pos de nyid la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258a-13: aa mra'i 'bras bu 'di 'dra ba gzhan yang khyer te shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258a-14: mi'i dbang po rnams kyi tshig ni gcig tu mi rung bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258a-15: de bag tsha bas snying la zug cing aa mra'i 'bras bu btsal bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258a-16: des rgyags khyer nas thog ma aa mra rnyed pa logs su song ba dang ri'i phyogs gcig na aa mra'i shing spre'u rnams kyi bgrod par gyur gyi mi rnams kyi ni ma yin pa de mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258a-17: de nas me tog phreng rgyud mkhan de shing de la phan tshun nas brtags nas g-yang sa chen por skyes pas mi rnams kyis bgrod pa ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258a-19: de de na aa mra'i 'bras bu 'dod pa'i phyir zhag mang du lon pas rgyags zad par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258a-21: bdag 'di bzhin du 'dug na rgyags med pas 'chir cha bas gcig gis ci byung ba byung gzeg go zhes rdo ba rnams la 'jus te gzeg par btsams pa las aa mra'i 'bras bu ma thob par g-yang du lhung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258a-22: ri de la byang chub sems dpa' spre'u ru gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258b-0: spre'u rnams kyi @258b dpon por gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258b-1: stes dbang gis der ri de la tshogs bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258b-2: phyogs der phyin pa dang ji tsam na des me tog phreng rgyud mkhan de sdug bsngal dog cing nyam nga bar gyur pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258b-3: byang chub sems dpa' ni bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas de dang de dag la mkhas pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258b-4: de de la phan pa bskyed pa lhur len pas rim gyis ma sad na dbyung bar mi nus so zhes rdo rnams kyis goms par bya bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258b-5: gang gi tshe de bdag gis dbyung bar nus so snyam du rig pa de'i tshe des de g-yang sa nas rim gyis phyung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258b-6: rdo 'deg pa dang me tog phreng rgyud mkhan phyung bas shin tu dub par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258b-7: de'i tshe dud 'gro yang mi'i skad du smra ba yin pas des de la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258b-8: khyod ci'i phyir nyam nga ba 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258b-9: des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258b-10: byang chub sems dpas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258b-11: 'di aa mra'i 'bras bu med par song na gnod pa 'thob par 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258b-12: bdag gis 'di la aa mra'i 'bras bu sbyin no snyam nas bdag nyid chen po de spro ba dang gzhan la phan par bya ba la brtson pa ma bor bas dub bzhin du yang shing de la 'dzegs nas aa mra'i 'bras bu glag par brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258b-13: mi de ji tsam 'dod kyi bar du aa mra'i 'bras bu zar bcug nas thu ba yang bkang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258b-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad la bag 'bebs pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:258b-15: de nas spre'u yi dpon po de babs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259a-0: des mi de la smras pa kva'e nang rje kho bo dub pas yud tsam zhig nyal @259a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259a-1: gyis re zhig phyogs su byar gyis shig des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259a-2: bka' bzhin 'tshal de gnyid log pa dang mi des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259a-3: bdag rgyags chad pas gal te aa mra rnams zos na ni bdag gis rgyal po la yang ci dbul /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259a-4: de bas na spre'u 'di bsad la sha skam du byas te lam du 'jug go snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259a-5: snying rje med pa 'jig rten pha rol yal bar bor ba des de rdo ba chen pos bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259a-6: lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259a-7: phan 'dogs pa yi mtshan nyid dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259a-8: de bzhin drin gzo grogs por brjod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259a-9: mi rnams la yang kha cig ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259a-10: phan par byas pa mi shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259a-11: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259a-12: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi spre'u yi dpon po gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259a-13: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259a-14: de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259a-15: byas pa mi tshor ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259a-16: da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo zhing byas pa mi tshor ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259a-17: gzhan yang ji ltar 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259a-18: dge slong dag sngon byung ba byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na grong rdal med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas ri bor dang ri phug chu dang me tog dang 'bras bus rgyas pa zhig tu bya rnams kyi nang du skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259a-19: bya shing sta mo zhes bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259b-0: ri de nyid kyi phyogs zhig na ri dvags kyi rgyal po seng ge zhig ji ltar 'dod pa'i spyod pa @259b dang gnas pas ri dvags bsad cing bsad cing za bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259b-1: de dus gzhan zhig na sha zos pa las so'i bar du rus pa chud nas de 'jigs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259b-2: bag tsha ba dang bral ba yin yang so'i nad kyi tshor bas lus la gnod par gyur nas blong bar gyur pas kha zas za ma nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259b-3: stes dbang gis shing sta mo de shing kha gcig nas gcig tu rgyu ba la goms pas de phyogs de nas ri dvags kyi dpon po 'dug pa'i phyogs der 'ongs pa na des seng ge sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen par mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259b-4: zhang po ci'i phyir blong bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259b-6: tsha bo bdag sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259b-7: khyod kyi sdug bsngal ci lta bu zhig gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259b-8: des rgyas par smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259b-10: zhang po khyod la bdag gis dpyad byas khyod ni seng ge yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259b-11: rkang bzhi pa thams cad kyi dpon po yin pas phan gdags par nus kyis khyod kyis bdag la dus dus su phan pa byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259b-15: ji ltar 'dis byed pa yang ma tshor ba de ltar 'di'i dpyad byas nas sos nas shes par 'gyur bar bya'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259b-16: de phan par bya ba lhur len pas de'i spyod pa dang gnas la rtog cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259b-17: ji tsam na ri dvags kyi dpon po de rlung bde ba'i reg pas nad rtse zhil nas rdo ba cha zhing yangs pa zhig la kha gdangs nas gnyid log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:259b-18: de nas shing sta mo de ri dvags kyi dpon po de'i drung du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260a-0: de ltar bsod par gnas par mthong nas des @260a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260a-2: 'di'i dpyad bya ba'i dus la bab po snyam du rig nas legs par brtags te so'i bar du chud pa'i rus pa 'dab mas bskyod pa'i rim pas mod la phyung ste skyes shing gnyid kyi snyoms pa gsal ba'i mig gis langs nas 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260a-3: de nas shing sta mo des ri dvags kyi dpon po de sdug bsngal dang mid mi bde ba dang bral bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260a-4: rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis de'i drung du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260a-5: zhang po khyod kyi sdug bsngal gyi rgyur gyur pa ni rus pa 'di yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260a-6: de nas ri dvags kyi dpon po de mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260a-7: tsha bo la phan pa 'di'i lan khyod la bdag gis nges par slar phan par byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260a-9: legs so de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas shing sta mo de song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260a-10: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ri dvags kyi dpon po sha la za ba na shing sta mo de yang bya khra zhig gis zin te de'u shi ba las shor te bkres pas gdungs pa'i mig gis ri dvags kyi dpon po de'i drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260a-11: nyam thag pa dag rig par byas nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260a-12: zhang po bdag bkres pas gzir gyis sha la cung zad byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260a-13: des tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260a-14: da ltar kho bo srog gcod cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260a-15: gtum po mi dge byed pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260a-16: mche ba'i bar du khyod 'ongs pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260a-17: gson pa'i drin chen mi sems sam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260a-18: des kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260a-19: rgya mtshor lhung ba phung ba ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260a-20: rmi lam bsams pa don med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260b-0: pho ngan @260b bsten pa gang yin dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260b-1: byas min gzo la byas don med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260b-3: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260b-4: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi shing sta mo gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260b-5: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ri dvags kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260b-6: de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260b-7: da ltar na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260b-8: gzhan yang ji ltar 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260b-9: dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na mi dbul po zhig gnas pa de shing btsongs te btsongs pas 'tsho bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260b-10: de dus gzhan zhig na nang par sngar langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260b-11: sta re dang khur shing dag thogs te shing gi phyir nags khrod du song ba dang dus ma yin pa'i char sprin chen po sna la rlung ldang ba langs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260b-12: mi de 'di rung ngam mi rung ngam zhes gnas kyi khyad par tshol zhing shing nas shing gzhan gyi drung du song na 'on kyang gsher bar 'gyur ba nyid pas des shing drung brgyus te rim gyis brag phug gcig tu zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260b-13: des brag phug de na dom zhig gnas pa de mthong nas sngangs te 'bros par btsams pa las dom gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260b-15: bu ma 'jigs par kho bo'i drung na 'dug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:260b-16: de bag tsha bzhin du bred nas 'gro ma nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261a-0: de nas dom des dbugs phyung ste lag pa gnyis kyis pang du 'khyud nas rtsa ba dang 'bras bus @261a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261a-2: yul ngan yang zhag bdun du byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261a-3: lhas kyang char pa ma bcad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261a-5: zhag brgyad pa'i nyin par char sprin sangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261a-6: dom gyis phyogs bzhir bltas te rtsa ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261a-7: 'bras bu rab tu mang po byin nas mi de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261a-8: bu char sprin sangs te yul ngan med kyis ci bder song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261a-9: mi des rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261a-10: yab mchi na bdag gis khyod la lan ci zhig glan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261a-12: bu ci nas kyang kho bo su la yang ma smras na de nyid kyis lan glan pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261a-14: yab de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes des de la bskor ba byas nas rkang pa la phyag byas te chas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261a-15: de w'a ra n'a sir zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261a-16: rngon pa zhig ri dvags 'chor du chas pa des de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261a-17: grogs po khyod dus 'di srid cig lon na gang nas 'dir 'ongs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261a-18: khyod kyi bu smad ni khyod dus ma yin pa'i char zhag bdun bab pas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261a-19: gcan zan gyis bsad par ma gyur grang zhes skrag par gyur nas shin tu smre sngags 'don to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261a-20: dus ma yin pa'i char zhag bdun bab pas bya dang ri dvags kyang du ma shi na khyod ji ltar shor /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261a-21: des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261a-23: grogs po dom de gang na 'dug pa'i phug de smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261a-26: slar nags khrod du ni mi 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261a-27: des de la ji ltar khas len par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sha'i skal ba sum nyis sbyin pas bslus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261b-0: lam mtshon pa'i @261b phyir song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261b-1: ji tsam na rim gyis bdag nyid chen po'i dom de gang na gnas pa'i phug der phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261b-2: de nas snying rje med pa la gnas pa byas pa mi gzo bas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261b-4: de nas rngon pa pha rol gyi srog la gnod pa byed pas phug der me btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261b-5: de nas bdag nyid chen po'i dom de du bas subs pa'i yid dang mig mchi mas gang bas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261b-6: bdag ni ri'i sul gnas bcas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261b-8: sems can la ni phan blo yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261b-9: su la gnod pa ci zhig byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261b-10: 'chi ba'i dus la bab gyur pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261b-11: da ni ci yang byar med de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261b-13: las kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261b-15: de nas de rnams kyis bshas te sha bgos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261b-16: byas pa chud gzon pa'i mi de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261b-17: sha'i skal ba sum nyis long zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261b-18: des blang ngo zhes lag pa gnyis brkyang pa dang sa la lhung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261b-19: de nas rngon pa de rnams kyis de ltar ma rung ba de mthong nas kyi hud kyi hud ces smras te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261b-20: rang rang gi skal ba yang bor nas dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261b-21: shin tu ya mtshan du gyur pa de skye bo'i tshogs chen pos thos nas phyogs der 'dus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:261b-22: rgyal po tshangs sbyin yang ya mtshan skyes nas de nyid du 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262a-0: ri de'i phyogs gcig cig na dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang yod pas de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis de'i pags pa blangs te ya mtshan gyi mig phye nas don de dge slong gi dge 'dun la rig par bya'o zhes dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang der song nas pags pa dag @262a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262a-2: rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262a-3: dge 'dun la don de rgyas par smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262a-4: de na gnas brtan dgra bcom pa zhig yod pa des tshigs su bcad de rgyal po de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262a-5: rgyal chen 'di ni dom ma lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262a-6: byang chub sems dpa' gzi 'chang ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262a-7: rgyal chen 'jig rten gsum po dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262a-8: khyod kyis kyang ni mchod 'os lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262a-10: 'di la mchod pa bya'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262a-11: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262a-12: lha 'di ni bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' lags kyi 'di la mchod pa mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262a-13: de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin btsun mo dang gzhon nu dang blon po dang yul mi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262a-14: grong mi dang bcas pas dri'i shing thams cad blangs te phyogs der dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262a-15: de'i sha dang keng rus thams cad phung po gcig tu byas nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262a-16: shes ldan dag dri'i shing thams cad spungs la spungs zin nas sregs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262a-17: de dri'i shing thams cad kyis spungs te spungs nas bkur sti chen po byas te bsregs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262a-18: phyogs de nyid du mchod rten chen po byed du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262a-21: ba dan btags nas dus mchod chen po btsugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262a-22: de la bya ba byas pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyang mtho ris su gzhol bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262a-23: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262a-24: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dom gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262b-0: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi mi byas pa chud gzon pa gang yin pa de ni lhas byin @262b 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262b-1: de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262b-2: da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262b-3: byas pa mi tshor ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262b-4: gzhan yang ji ltar 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tsher ba de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262b-5: dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na mi dbul po zhig yod pa de shing btsongs shing btsongs pas 'tsho bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262b-6: de dus gzhan zhig na nang par sngar langs te sta re dang khur shing blangs te shing gi phyir nags khrod du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262b-7: ri de'i phyogs shing rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nags stug po me tog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262b-8: 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis rgyas pa zhig yod pa de na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262b-9: byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa dom rnams kyi nang du skyes pa zhig yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262b-10: ji tsam na shing thun de shing 'tshol ba na phyogs gzhan zhig nas stag gis gtses te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262b-12: stes dbang gis shing gang la byang chub sems dpa' dom de gnas pa'i shing de la 'jegs pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262b-13: des de mthong nas lhag par skrag par gyur pa dang bdag nyid chen po des dbugs phyung nas bzung ste pang du bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262b-14: stag de yang kha zas la zhen pas shing drung de nyid mi gtong bar smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262b-15: kye bdag nyid chen po mi mgo nag 'di rnams ni byas pa mi gzo ba yin gyis 'or cig dang de zos te 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262b-16: mi gzhan phal cher skyabs su 'ong ba la byams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:262b-17: byang chub sems dpa' rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263a-1: 'on kyang stag de sha dang khrag 'dod pas de nyid du 'dug gi ma song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263a-2: de nas dom des mi de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263a-3: bu kho bo ngal gyis re zhig khyod 'dug cig dang kho bo ngal sos par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263a-4: de de'i phang du 'dug nas ngal bas dub pas gnyid log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263a-6: kva'i mi khyod dus ji srid du 'dir 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263a-7: 'o ni mar 'or cig dang zos la 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263a-8: de nas khyod ci bder song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263a-9: snying rje med pa sdig pa'i las can 'jig rten pha rol yal bar bor ba des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263a-10: bdag gis dus ji srid cig tu gnas par bya'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263a-12: legs kyis dor snyam nas des de bor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263a-13: bdag nyid chen po de bor ba na smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263a-25: stag gis tshul ma yin pas bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263a-26: mi des bsams te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263a-28: 'dis bdag la ji zhig bgo bsha' bya bar 'dod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263a-29: gang gi phyir 'di skad ces smras so snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263a-33: te dang de dag tu 'khyam pa na 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263a-44: de gnyen rnams kyis khyim du khrid na de bzhin du bla zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263a-45: de rnams kyi 'byung po'i dpyad bya ba'i rig sngags dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263b-2: rtsa lag rnams la dris na de rnams rnam pa phal po cher smra zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263b-3: dpyad ni cung zad kyang mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263b-4: de'i tshe w'a ra n'a si dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i bsti gnas shing rnam pa sna tshogs kyi nags stug po 'bras bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263b-7: bya du ma skad 'byin pas mdzes par byas pa zhig yod pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263b-8: drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263b-9: mi de'i gnyen rnams kyis mi de khrid de drang srong de'i gan du dong nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263b-10: drang srong chen po bdag cag gi gnyen 'di yang dang yang 'di skad du bla ba 'di la ji ltar bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263b-12: sems can 'di ni sdig pa byed pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263b-13: rang bzhin ngan pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa' phan 'dogs 'dogs pa stag gi mdun du bor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263b-14: bdag nyid chen po des ni 'di la chos bshad par bya'o snyam du bsams na 'dis de bor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263b-15: de bor ba na mya myo khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263b-16: tshigs su bcad pa bcu las yi ge re re shig dran pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263b-26: gro zhes bya ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263b-27: drang srong de'i slob ma zhig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263b-28: mkhan po re zhig tshigs su bcad pa de rnams ji lta bu lags pa gsungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263b-29: drang srong des rim bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa de rnams smra bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263b-31: chos ma yin pa mi bzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263b-32: tshogs par mi 'byung mi rnams la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:263b-33: grogs po gsod par byed pa yod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-0: grogs bsod gnas skabs gang du @264a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-2: bde bar 'gyur ba ma yin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-3: stan la ma yin lam du min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-5: de lhung snying ni rje rje skad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-6: 'di la tshig tu smras pa gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-7: des ni sems can blo ngan po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-8: ji ltar khan da 'bar zhing sreg /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-9: shin tu mi bzad las byas pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-10: des khyod 'jig rten pha rol tu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-11: sdug bsngal reg pa'i tshor ba ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-12: sim pa ma yin myong bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-13: tha shal bas tha shal khyod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-14: du 'bod shin tu mi bzad par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-15: kyi hud kyi hud ces sgrogs pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-16: sdug bsngal ngan pa chen po 'thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-17: mi dge'i las can gtum de la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-18: de yis ci zhig byas gyur na; ;tshogs par mi 'byung mi rnams la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-19: grogs po gsod par byed pa yod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-20: chos 'jig byed pa mi bzad pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-21: sems ni sdig pa yin par shes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-22: khyod kyis dom la sdig pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-23: stag la gang byas dran par gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-24: blo ngan khyod kyi ji lta bur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-25: grogs la bya ba mi shes te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-26: bzod par byed pa bzod 'thob la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-27: sha khon can gyis khon rnams mthong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-28: stag gi 'jigs chen byung ba na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-29: khyod ni yun ring bsten byas shing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-30: nyal ba na yang khyod bsrungs na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-31: khyod kyis de ni ma bsrungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-32: grogs 'khu kha na ma tho cher //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-33: chos smra ba rnams rjod byed de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-34: blo ngan lus ni zhig gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-35: dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-36: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264a-37: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dom gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264b-0: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi byas pa chud gzon pa'i mi gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di @264b nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264b-1: de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264b-2: byas pa mi tshor ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264b-3: da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264b-4: byas pa mi tshor ba yin no ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264b-7: gzhan yang ji ltar 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264b-8: byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264b-9: dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul shi bi'i dbyings kyi rgyal po'i pho brang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264b-10: rgyal po shi bi zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264b-12: bde ba dang lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264b-13: rgyal po de yang dad pa bzang ba dge ba'i rtsa ba can bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa snying rje can bdag nyid chen po chos 'dod pa skye dgu rnams byams pa thams cad la rab tu sbyin pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264b-14: de 'di lta ste dge sbyong dang bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264b-17: 'gro bar chas pa'i slong ba po rnams la sbyin pas yongs su mi gtong ba ci yang med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264b-18: lhag par yang nad pa rnams la sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264b-19: rgyal po de'i kun tu spyod pa ni nang par sngar langs nas pha dang ma gnyis la phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264b-20: nad pa la bltas nas dgos pa'i ched kyi phyir 'dug par byed do /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:264b-21: ji tsam na mi nad pa sman pa thams cad kyis bor ba 'tsho ba'i re ba med la 'chi ba la mngon du phyogs pa zhig de dang de dag tu 'khyam zhing shi bi'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265a-1: sos ka'i dus la bab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265a-2: me tog gi shing rnams kha 'bus shing ngang pa dang khrung khrung dang rma bya dang ne tso dang ri skegs dang khu byug sgra 'byin pa'i nags tshal stug po'i skyed mos tshal gyi sar btsun mos yongs su bskor te chas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265a-3: nad pa de yang tshor ba drag pos gdungs pas yid mi bde ba skyes shing lus kyi dbugs ni brdzangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265a-4: mig ni mchi mas gang bzhin lag pa 'khar ba la brten nas dal bus rgyal po'i drung du song nas mgo bos phyag byas te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265a-5: lha bdag bro nad 'di las yongs su bskyab tu gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265a-7: de nas shi bi'i rgyal pos nad pa de'i tshig snying rje rje skad du dal bus yi ge re re nas smras pa thos nas snying rjes kun nas bskyod pa'i sems kyis de nyid nas slar log ste blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265a-8: shes ldan dag nga'i yul na gnas pa'i sman pa rnams khug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265a-9: de rnams kyis sman pa thams cad bkug ste rgyal po la phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265a-10: de nas rgyal pos mi de bkug nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265a-11: shes ldan dag mi 'di dpyad gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265a-12: sman pa rnams kyis dpyad de blo gros gcig tu byas nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265a-15: shes ldan dag de'i sman ci 'dra ba zhig yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265a-16: sman pa rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-0: lha skyes pa thog ma btsas pa nas su la yang khro ma myong ba gang lags pa de'i khrag gis nas thug sbyar nas gal te 'tshal du stsal na 'di sos par 'gyur lags kyi gzhan @265b du ma lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-1: rgyal pos thos nas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-2: bdag gis ni 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa gzhan dag zhi bar byed mi nus pa'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-3: 'tsho ba 'di lta bu bdag la ci dgos zhes de snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-4: rgyal po rang gi rgyud la brtag par brtsams nas des ma ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-5: ngas sngon su la lan 'ga' khros pa yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-7: lha gang gi tshe khyod bdag gi pang du blangs pa de'i tshe nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-8: bdag kyang su la yang khro ma myong na khyod lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-9: de nas ma'i drung du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-10: yum bdag sngon su la yang lan 'ga' khros pa mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-11: des smras pa; bu khyod gang gi tshe kho mo'i rum du zhugs pa de'i tshe nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-12: bdag kyang su la yang khro ma myong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-15: da ni sman rnyed do snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-16: des sman pa de rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-17: nga'i lus kyi yan lag lnga'i rtsa gtubs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-19: lha bdag cag ni mi phal pa'i ched du lha'i sku la mtshon gyis mi 'debs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-20: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas de dang de dag la mkhas pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-21: des rang nyid kyis lus kyi yan lag lnga'i rtsa gtar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-22: khrag gis rdze'u bkang nas des nas thug sbyar te blud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-23: rgyal po de la rjes su chags pa'i btsun mo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-24: gzhon nu dang blon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-26: yul mi rnams du ba la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:265b-27: yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis kyang 'phya bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266a-1: gcig gi phyir 'di snyed kyi sems can 'dor ba lta ci tha tshig ces gleng ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266a-2: de nas rgyal pos skye bo'i tshogs de dbugs phyung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266a-3: thabs des zla ba drug tu lus kyi yan lag lnga'i rtsa gtar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266a-4: gtar nas nas thug blud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266a-5: rgyal po shi bi'i lus de tshags 'dra bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266a-6: gzi byin yongs su nyams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266a-7: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266a-8: 'di ni bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266a-9: gal te yongs su nyams na ma legs so snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266a-10: de rnams la de nyi ma re re zhing gzi byin sgrub par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266a-12: gang gi tshe mi de'i nad de zhi bar gyur pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266a-13: rgyal po shi bis grong rdal mchog lnga byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266a-14: w'a ra n'a si na gtso bor bkur bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266a-15: mtha' dag tu sgra grags pa rgyal po shi bi'i lus kyi yan lag lnga'i rtsa gtubs pa'i khrag gis nad pa'i rim gro dus 'di srid cig byas pas de yang sos par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266a-16: gang yang ya mtshan skyes pa'i sems can rnams lhags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266a-17: mi de la dris pa kye nang rje khyod la rgyal po shi bis dus 'di srid cig rim gro byas so zhes grags na bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266a-19: bdag la des ci zhig byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266a-20: ngan khrag lta zhig sa la pho'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266a-22: de la ngo mtshar ci zhig che /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266a-23: de skad ces smras ma thag kho nar de'i khyim du me byung nas des de'i khyim dang nor thams cad tshig par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266a-24: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266b-0: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal @266b po shi bi gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266b-1: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi byas pa chud gzon pa'i mi gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266b-2: de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266b-3: da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266b-4: gzhan yang ji ltar 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266b-5: byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266b-6: dge slong dag sngon byung ba rgyal po'i pho brang zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266b-10: lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266b-11: de dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266b-12: dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266b-15: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266b-16: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266b-17: khye'u gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266b-20: dpral ba'i dbyes ches pa smin ma 'dzar ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266b-22: yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266b-23: de btsas pa na dge ba stong phrag du ma byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266b-24: de btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266b-25: khye'u yi ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266b-26: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:266b-27: lha 'di btsas pa na dge ba stong phrag du ma byung bas khye'u yi ming dge byed du gdags so zhes de'i ming dge byed du btags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267a-1: ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267a-2: nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267a-3: dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267a-4: rtsed grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su btad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267a-5: de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267a-7: gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i padma bzhin myur du skyed par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267a-8: rgyal po de yang btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267a-10: dga' mgur spyod par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267a-13: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267a-14: btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267a-15: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa na khye'u zhig btsas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267a-16: de btsas pa na mi dge ba stong phrag du ma byung nas de'i ming sdig byed ces bya bar btags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267a-17: de yang bsrings bskyed chen por gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267a-18: gzhon nu dge byed ni byams pa'i bdag nyid snying rje can sems can thams cad la brtse ba can sbyin 'dod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267a-19: sbyin pa la dga' ba yin pas de dge sbyong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267a-22: phongs pa'i slong ba rnams la sbyin pa gtong bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267a-24: bu khyod rtag tu sbyin pa ma gtong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267a-25: de ltar gtang na re zhig 'u bu cag la nor gyi rigs de snyed ga la yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267a-26: 'di ni chos nyid yin te sbyin pa po'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267a-27: sbyin bdag la skye bo mang po dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267b-0: phyogs @267b dang phyogs mtshams rnams su yang de'i grags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267b-1: sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa bzang po 'byung ba yin pas yul gzhan gyi rgyal po zhig gis de'i yon tan gyi bdag nyid chen po thos nas bu mo byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267b-2: rgyal pos de dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bsu bar byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267b-4: re zhig nor ma bsgrubs kyi bar du bdag mchis brang mi 'tshal gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267b-5: yab rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par gnang ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267b-8: de zong thogs te rgya mtsho chen por chas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267b-9: de'i nu bo sdig byed gang yin pa des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267b-10: 'di skye bo mang po sdug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267b-12: gal te yang rgya mtsho chen po'i gru grub ste slar 'ongs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267b-13: lhag par yang skye bo mang po sdug pa dang yid du 'ong bar 'gyur zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267b-14: des na pha 'dug bzhin du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa 'di yod kyi 'dir yang ci'i dus la bab ce na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267b-15: bdag kyang de dang lhan cig rgya mtsho chen por zhugs la der 'di srog dang phral na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267b-16: bdag mi 'dod bzhin du yang rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267b-19: lha dge byed rgya mtsho chen por mchi na bdag kyang de dang lhan cig mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:267b-22: de nas dge byed kyis rang gi yul du dril sgrogs su bcug pa grong khyer na gnas pa'i tshong pa shes ldan dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268a-0: gzhon nu dge byed zong thogs te @268a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268a-1: rgya mtsho chen por 'jug gis ded dpon dge byed dang lhan cig rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par khyed cag las su spro ba de sho gam dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268a-2: la gcan dang gru btsas med par 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268a-3: rgya mtsho chen por 'dod pa'i zong sta gon gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268a-4: tshong pa brgya phrag du mas rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba'i zong sta gon byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268a-5: de nas ded dpon dge byed nu bo sdig byed dang lhan cig dge mtshan dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dag byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268a-6: tshong pa brgya phrag du mas yongs su bskor te shing rta dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268a-8: pang tshad dang rnga mo dang ba lang dang bong bu dag gis rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa'i zong mang po khyer nas chas te de rim gyis grong rdal dang grong khyer dang yul dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268a-9: rgyal po'i pho brang dang tshong rdal rnams la lta zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268a-10: rgya mtsho chen po'i 'bram du phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268a-11: des nas kar sha pa na lnga brgyas gru nyos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268a-12: zho shas 'tsho ba lnga po stobs par byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268a-16: rlung yor thogs pa khrid nas lan gsum du dril bsgrags te rgya mtsho chen por zhugs nas gru spangs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268a-17: nu bo sdig byed la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268a-18: gal te rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su gru chag par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268a-19: ma rtabs par nga'i mgul du 'jus shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268a-21: legs kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268a-22: ji tsam na gru de rjes su mthun pa'i rlung gi rin po che'i gling du phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268b-0: rlung yor thogs pas @268b smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268b-1: 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshong pa shes ldan dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268b-2: rin po che'i gling zhes bya ba rdo rje dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268b-5: margad la sogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'byung gnas shig yod do zhes thos pa gang yin pa der yu bu phyin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268b-6: rin po che ci 'dod pa long zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268b-7: de nas de rnams dga' ba dang mgu bas brtags shing brtags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268b-8: rin po che rnams kyis gru de dper na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268b-12: sran ma la sogs pa bzhin du bkang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268b-13: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni shin tu brtag pa dag mkhas pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268b-14: gzhon nu dge byed kyis chen po la 'os pa'i nor bu chen po rnams rked la btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268b-15: ji tsam na gru de slar bsgyur ba las 'gram dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu chu srin nya'i rigs kyis tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268b-16: de nas sdig byed kyis dge byed kyi mgul nas 'jus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268b-17: des de 'bad pa chen pos 'gram du phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268b-18: de khur gyis dub nas gnyid kyis log pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268b-19: de 'gres pa'i rked pa la rin po che btags pa dag sdig byed kyis mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268b-20: des bsams pa 'di ni rin po che 'di lta bu dag khyer te 'gro bar 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268b-21: bdag ni lag pa stong par 'gro bar 'gyur ba lta zhes bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268b-22: des de gnyid stug pos non pa na rin po che de rnams kyang 'phrogs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268b-23: mig gnyis kyang tsher mas phyung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:268b-24: des de long ba rgya mtsho 'gram du bor te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269a-1: rdzi dag phyugs skyong zhing phyogs der phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269a-2: de rnams kyis de mthong nas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269a-3: kye nang rje khyod su zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269a-4: des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa de rnams kyis thos nas snying rje skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269a-5: de rnams kyis de phyugs rdzi dpon po'i khyim du khrid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269a-6: de de na pi wang blang bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269a-7: phyugs rdzi dpon po de'i chung ma gzugs dang lang tsho'i dregs pas rgyags pas pi wang gi sgra thos nas bgugs pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269a-8: de byas pa chud gzon pa'i spyod pa rjes su dran nas rna ba bkab ste 'dug nas ma btub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269a-9: 'dod pa la zhen pa rnams ni mi bya ba ci yang med pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269a-10: des khyim thab la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269a-11: mi long ba 'di bdag la sgugs na khyod 'di 'dra ba dag sdud par byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269a-12: sha 'khon rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste bud med kyi sha 'khon ni tha chad yin pas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269a-13: 'di chad pas ni bcad zin pas spang pa ma gtogs par 'di la ci byar yang med do snyam nas des de khyim nas spangs te lam po cha dang srang dang bzhi mdo dang sum mdo rnams na pi wang gis 'tsho bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269a-14: de'i pha shi nas de'i nu bo sdig byed rgyal srid la bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269a-15: de yang rim gyis mtshams gzhan gyi rgyal po sngon bu mo byin pa gang yin pa de'i grong khyer du phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269a-16: de yang chen mor gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269a-17: de slong ba yul sna tshogs na gnas pa rgyal po'i bu dang blon po'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269b-0: mdun na 'don gyi bu dag lhags @269b nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269b-2: bu mo khyod gang la byin pa'i gzhon nu dge byed de ni rgya mtsho chen por song ba las de nyid du tshul ma yin pas shi bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269b-3: da ni khyod slong ba dag lhags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269b-4: gang la khyod ma byin pa de mi dga' bar 'gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269b-5: 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269b-7: yab gal te de lta na grong khyer byi dor bgyid du stsol cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269b-8: bdag nyid kyis khyim thab 'dam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269b-11: de nas rgyal pos yul sna tshogs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269b-12: grong khyer sna tshogs rnams su rang nyid khyim thab 'dam par bsgrags nas grong khyer de yang gseg ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269b-13: rdo ba dang gyo mo bsal cing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269b-14: dri zhim pa'i pog por dag bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269b-16: rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269b-17: dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dpyangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269b-18: me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lha rnams kyi dga' tshal gyi skyed mos tshal bzhin du dga' dga' ltar byas nas dril sgrogs su bcug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269b-19: grong khyer na gnas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269b-20: grong mi dang yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyi shes ldan dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269b-21: sangs rgyal po'i gzhon nu ma rang nyid khyim thab 'dam gyis khyed cag 'byor pa ji lta ba bzhin 'du bar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269b-22: nam nangs nas rgyal po'i gzhon nu ma de rgyan sna tshogs kyis klubs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:269b-23: gzhon nu ma du mas yongs su bskor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270a-0: nags tshal gyi lha me tog rgyas pa'i nags tshal gyi nang na shin tu mdzes pa de bzhin du dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos grong khyer gyi dbus na sreg chags brgya stong @270a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270a-1: phrag mang po 'dus pa'i nang du rang nyid kyis khyim thab 'dam du 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270a-2: dge byed de yang de'i phyogs gzhan zhig na pi wang len cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270a-3: sems can rnams ni las rnams kho nas phan tshun sbyor bar byed pa yin la rgyu'i stobs che yang rkyen gyi stobs la ltos pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270a-4: de nas rgyal po'i gzhon nu ma de pi wang gi sgras sems bsdus pas dge byed pi wang len pa la chags nas des de la 'di bdag gi khyim thab bo zhes me tog gi phreng ba bor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270a-5: skye bo'i tshogs yid mi bde bar gyur cing kha cig snying na nas mod la 'phya bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270a-6: rgyal po'i gzhon nu ma 'di ltar gzugs bzang ba dar la bab pa sgyu rtsal phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas yul sna tshogs nas lhag pa'i rgyal po dang blon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270a-7: mdun na 'don gyi bu rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270a-8: gzhan yang grong khyer na gnas pa'i skyes pa gtso bo rnams spangs te long ba la khyim thab 'dam pa ci tha tshig zho shas 'tsho ba rnams yid mi bde zhing mi dga' bas rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270a-9: lha gzhon nu ma rang nyid kyis khyim thab 'dams lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270a-10: rgyal pos smras pa ci 'dra ba zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270a-11: lha long ba zhig lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270a-12: de yang thos nas yid mi bde bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270a-13: de nas de bkug nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270a-14: bu rgyal po dang nor can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270a-15: tshong dpon dang ded dpon dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270a-16: blon po'i bu dang mdun na 'don gyi bu gzugs bzang ba dar la bab pa 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa dag yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270a-17: khyod kyis ci'i phyir 'di 'dra ba zhig khyim thab tu 'dams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270b-2: bu gal te de lta na de nyid kyi thad du song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270b-4: de de'i drung du song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270b-5: bdag gi khyim thab tu khyod 'dams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270b-6: des smras pa; khyod kyis ma legs pa zhig byas te de lta mod kyi 'di ni long ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270b-7: bdag skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams pa lta zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270b-9: bdag ni de lta bu'i las byed pa ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270b-11: ci mngon des bden pa gsol bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270b-12: bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis rgyal bu gzhon nu dge byed de dang khyod la 'dod chags skyes kyi gzhan su la yang ma yin zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270b-13: bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des khyod kyi mig gcig sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur cig ces bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs ma thag kho nar de'i mig sngon ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270b-15: dge byed de nyid nga yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270b-16: nu bo shos sdig byed kyis 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270b-18: gzhon nu dge byed de kho na khyod yin par ci mngon /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270b-19: des kyang bden pa gsol bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270b-20: bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis sdig byed kyis bdag gi mig phyung ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270b-21: de la ngan sems cung zad kyang ma byung zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:270b-22: bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi mig cig shos kyang sngon bzhin gyur cig ces byas pa dang bden pa gsol bas de'i mi gcig shos kyang sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271a-0: de nas rgyal po'i gzhon nu ma des dge byed dbang po ma tshang ba @271a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271a-1: ma yin pa de khrid nas rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271a-2: yab dge byed ni 'di nyid lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271a-3: rgyal po yid ma ches pa las ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271a-4: rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271a-5: de nas des bu mo de dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos byin nas dpung chen po dang chas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271a-6: grong khyer der dong ste sdig byed rgyal srid las phyung nas dge byed de yang pha'i rgyal srid la bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271a-7: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271a-8: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dge byed gang yin pa de ni nga yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271a-9: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi sdig byed gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yin te de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271a-10: byas pa mi tshor ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271a-11: da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271a-12: gzhan yang 'di ji ltar byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271a-13: dge slong dag sngon byung ba rgyal po'i pho brang zhig na rgyal po zhig 'byor pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271a-14: rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271a-15: de btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271a-17: dga' mgur spyod par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271a-20: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271a-21: rim gyis bu bzhi btsas te yal ga dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271a-23: rjes su mthun pa'i lcugs ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271a-25: de rnams bsrings bskyed de chen por gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271a-26: yul gzhan gyi rgyal po'i bu mo dag las chung ma blangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271b-0: de rnams rgyal po la @271b brnyas thabs byed par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271b-1: de nas rgyal pos spyugs te rang rang gi chung ma khrid de dong ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271b-2: ji tsam na dgon pa'i lam zhig tu phyin pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271b-3: de rnams lam rgyags chad nas de rnams phan tshun du nang khrims bcas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271b-4: chung ma re re bsad la de'i shas dgon pa'i lam rgal bar bya'o zhes byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271b-6: gzhan gyi srog gcod pa bas rang gi srog chud zos pa sla'i 'dir yong ci'i dus la bab ce na chung ma khrid de bros te 'gro'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271b-7: des chung ma khrid de bros pa las de'i chung ma bza' ba dang btung ba dang bral ba dang lam gyi dub pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271b-8: blong blong por gyur te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271b-9: rje'i sras srog dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271b-11: bdag gis 'di srin po rnams kyi nang nas yongs su bskyabs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271b-12: da gal te shi bar gyur na ma legs so snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271b-13: des brla'i sha las bcad de de zar bcug cing lag pa gnyis kyi rtsa btubs pa'i khrag blud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271b-14: des de khrid de rim gyis ri zhig drung du phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271b-15: de na rtsa ba dang 'bras bus 'tsho bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271b-16: ri de'i drung na 'bab chu zhig 'bab pa de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271b-17: mi zhig dgras lag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271b-18: rkang pa gtubs nas chur bskyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271b-19: de chus khyer ba na nyam thag pa'i nga ro'i skad 'byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271b-20: sa ga yang phyogs gzhan zhig na rtsa ba dang 'bras bu rko ba las des mi de'i 'o dod 'bod pa thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:271b-21: de sems kyi rgyud snying rjes brlan pas ri de la 'dzegs te kun tu blta bar brtsams pa las ji tsam na mi de chus khyer ba de mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272a-1: myur ba myur bar ri las bab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272a-2: 'bab chu'i nang du zhugs nas mi de khur du blangs nas 'bab chu'i 'gram du phyung ste bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272a-3: de'i sdug bsngal gyis snying gdungs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272a-5: des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272a-6: de nas des de dbugs phyung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272a-7: rtsa ba dang 'bras bus tshim par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272a-9: de'i rim gro byas nas sos par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272a-10: de de'i rim gro byed pa na gcugs pa'i bde bas yang dang yang du drung du song nas gtam rnam pa sna tshogs smra zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272a-12: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags chung ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272a-13: sa ga de dang lhan cig res 'ga' dga' mgur spyod la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272a-14: res 'ga' dga' mgur spyod par mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272a-15: byang chub sems dpa'i mthus sdong bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272a-16: rtsa ba dang 'bras bu de dag lhag par mthu dang ldan pa yin pas des de dag longs spyad pas nyon mongs pa bdo nas mi rkang lag rdum po de la bsgugs par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272a-17: de ma btub nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272a-18: re zhig bdag shi zin pa dang 'dra ba las da ltar sos pa yang stes te gson na gal te yang 'di 'dra ba byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272a-19: khyod kyi khyo des bdag thams cad kyi thams cad du srog dang phral bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa 'di yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272a-20: de la des yang dang yang du bsgugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272a-21: nyon mongs pa rnams ni thul bar dka' ba yin pas de dang lhan cig nyal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272b-0: de de dang lhan cig kun tu dga' ba dang yid du 'ong ba @272b dang lhag par chags par gyur pas mngags kyang de'i drung du mi 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272b-3: sha khon rnams kyi nang na ni 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272b-4: bud med kyi sha khon tha chad yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272b-5: da ni bdag ma rung ngo snyam nas des de dang lhan cig gros bya bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272b-6: khyod kyi khyo 'dis gal te bdag cag nyal bar shes par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272b-7: gdon mi za bar khyod la gnod pa byed cing bdag kyang srog dang phral bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272b-9: smras pa 'di ni legs kyis thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272b-10: bud med ni ma bslabs par mkhas pas ngas mgo gos kyis dkris nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272b-11: ri'i brag ka zhig na nyal te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272b-12: ji tsam na sa ga rtsa ba dang 'bras bu khyer de 'ongs na de de ltar nyal ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272b-13: de nas dris pa bzang mo 'di ci zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272b-15: rje'i sras bdag klad pa bro 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272b-18: de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272b-19: des ri'i bya skyibs na rdo dreg cig mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272b-21: rje'i sras bdag sngon yang klad pa'i bro nad 'di lta bus thebs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272b-22: smras pas rdo dreg bstan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272b-23: des sos par gyur lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272b-26: des smras pa rje'i sras ri'i bya skyibs 'di la mchis kyis bdag gis dpyang thag gzung gis khyod kyis phyung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272b-27: bdag nyid chen po de drang po yin pas de'i ngan g-yo ma shes pas de bzhin du byas zung zhig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272b-28: dbyung ngo zhes khas blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:272b-29: des de thag pa las dpyang la btang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273a-1: lag pa gcig gis thag pa btang ba na des kyang btang nas chur lhung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273a-2: sems can tshe ring ba rgyal srid kyi bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba ni mi 'chi ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273a-3: chu'i rgyun phyogs su khyer nas rgyal po'i pho brang zhig tu phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273a-4: de'i rgyal po yang bu med par shi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273a-7: yul mi dang bcas pa thams cad 'dus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273a-8: gros byed de shes ldan dag rgyal po nongs na nga su zhig rgyal srid la gzhag par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273a-9: de rnams kyis mtshan mkhan gyi mi rnams bskos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273a-10: shes ldan dag sems can bsod nams kyi skal ba chen po dang ldan pa tshol cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273a-11: de rgyal srid la gzhag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273a-12: de rnams kyis phyogs kun tu btsal bar brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273a-13: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273a-14: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273a-15: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273a-17: sa ga la rgyal srid 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa nyid nye bar gnas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273a-18: 'bab chu nas byung nas phyogs gzhan zhig na 'dug pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i mthus phyogs de rgyan gyis brgyan pa bzhin du 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273a-20: ji tsam na mtshan mkhan gyi mi rnams phyogs der lhags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273a-21: bdag nyid chen po de rgyal srid kyi mtshan dang ldan par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273a-22: de rnams dga' ba dang yid bde bas blon po rnams kyi drung du dong ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273b-0: sems can bsod nams kyi skal pa @273b chen po dang ldan pa zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273b-2: de nas blon po rnams kyis lam byi dor byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273b-3: grong khyer byi dor byas nas dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos grong khyer du khrid de nyi ma dang tshes grangs dang yud tsam dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273b-4: rgyu skar rnams rim bzhin du sbyar te rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273b-5: de la btsun mo med nas blon po rnams dang mdun na 'don rnams dang yul gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams dang gzhan yang nor can dang tshong dpon dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273b-6: ded dpon rnams rang rang gi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis klubs nas khrid de rgyal pos khab tu bzhes par bya ba'i phyir grong khyer der lhags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273b-7: rgyal po de bud med kyis sun phyung ba yin pas khas ma blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273b-8: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273b-9: lha rgyal po rnams ni btsun mo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273b-10: gzhon nu dang blon po dang grong mi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273b-11: yul mir bcas pa lags kyis btsun mo gzhag tu gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273b-12: yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i mi'i gtso bo rnams dang yul gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273b-13: mi gtso bo de rnams kyi bu mo rnams de'i mngon sum du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir sta gon byas te bzhag na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273b-14: 'on kyang de khas len du ma btub ste bud med rnams yang dang yang du smod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:273b-15: sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi mthus longs spyod rnams mthu dang ldan zhing phun sum tshogs pa yin pas gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas bud med byas pa chud gzon pas ri de las bor ba de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274a-0: ri de'i rtsa ba dang 'bras bu rnams srabs par gyur cing mthu med pa @274a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274a-2: de nas bud med de mu ge'i dus kyi 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas skrag nas rkang lag ma tshang ba de khur du thogs te grong mthar song nas lam po che dang srang dang bzhi mdo dang sum mdo rnams su sprang zhing rgyu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274a-5: bud med gang zhig khyim thab las mi 'phyo ba de 'jig rten gyis mchod pa'i chos de yod pas de gang du zhugs pa der slong mo 'thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274a-6: ji tsam na de rim gyis rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274a-7: 'jig rten gyis thos nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274a-8: kha cig dag ni ngo mtshar skyes nas de la blta ba'i phyir byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274a-9: grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis glags rnyed nas de dag 'phya bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274a-12: rgyal po 'di ni bud med thams cad la smod par byed na khyim thab las mi 'phyo ba mi rkang lag ma tshang ba khur du khyer nas 'khyam pa dam pa 'di ma mthong ba lta /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274a-13: gtam de mdun na 'don gyis rgyal po la smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274a-14: rgyal pos bsams nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274a-15: bud med de ltas khug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274a-16: de bkug nas rgyal pos mthong ba dang 'dzum dmul te tshigs su bcad pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274a-17: nga yi brla yi sha dag dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274a-18: khrag kyang zos shing 'thungs nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274a-19: rdum po khur du thogs pa khyod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274a-21: rdo dreg dag gi ched du ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274a-22: nga ni g-yang sar phor nas su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274a-23: rdum po khur du thogs pa khyod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-0: @274b de ngo tsha bar gyur pa'i snying gis gdong smad de 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-1: blon po rnams kyis don de rgyal po la dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-2: des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras nas de la smad pa'i tshig gis grong khyer gyi phyi rol du bskrad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-4: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-5: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal bu gzhon nu sa ga gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-6: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bud med gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-7: de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-8: byas pa mi tshor ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-9: da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-10: byas pa mi tshor ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-11: gzhan yang ji ltar 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-12: byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-13: dge slong dag sngon byung ba thams cad kyi grong rdal gyi grong khyer na rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bya ba zhig rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-14: 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-15: 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang khrag khrug dang 'gyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-16: chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-17: 'bras dang bu ram shing dang ba glang ma he phun sum tshogs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-18: chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-19: rgyal po de yang dad pa bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-20: dge ba'i bsam pa can bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa snying rje can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-21: bdag nyid chen po chos 'dod pa skye dgu rnams la byams pa zhig yod pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:274b-23: btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275a-2: dga' mgur spyod par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275a-5: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275a-6: btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275a-7: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275a-8: khye'u gzugs bzang po mdzes pa blta na sdug pa phags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275a-9: mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa dang dpung ba ring ba dpral ba'i dbyes che ba smin ma 'dzar ba sna'i gzangs mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275a-11: nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275a-12: btsas nas de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275a-13: khye'u yi ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275a-14: nye du rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275a-15: khye'u 'di rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen gyi sras yin pas de bas na khye'u yi ming thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags nas khye'u thams cad sgrol ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275a-16: nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275a-17: dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275a-18: rtsed grogs kyi ma ma gnyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275a-19: ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad nas de 'o ma dang zho dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275a-22: mar gyi snying khu dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275a-23: skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i padma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275a-24: gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge dang grangs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275b-0: rtsis dang lag rtsis la nye bar zhugs shing rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yul gyi 'byor pa dang @275b mthu dang brtson 'grus thob pa sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor mngon par zil gyis mnan te gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275b-1: las kyi gnas tha dad par gyur pa gang dag yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275b-3: glang po che'i gnya' bar zhon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275b-7: gzhu'i 'dzin stangs dang mdun du bsnur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275b-13: dral ba dang dbug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275b-16: sgra grags par phog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275b-19: tshabs che ba ste gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275b-20: gzhon nu thams cad sgrol dad pa bzang ba dge ba'i bsam can bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa snying rje can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275b-21: bdag nyid chen po chos 'dod pa skye dgu rnams la byams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275b-22: thams cad rab tu gtong ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275b-23: thams cad yongs su gtong ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275b-24: chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275b-25: gtong ba chen po la zhugs pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275b-26: de'i gtong ba rgya chen po thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275b-27: dpag tshad ba rgya nas kyang don du gnyer ba'i skye bo 'ong ste thams cad kyang yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas nas gtong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:275b-28: de nas re zhig cig na byang chub sems dpa' shing rta nor bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276a-2: tsan dan mchog gi snying po las bsgrubs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276a-4: stag dang gung gi pags pas g-yogs pa rta rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276a-6: dngul gyi dril bu g-yer ka'i sgra 'khrol ba bzhi dang ldan pa mchog gi nang du zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276a-7: grong khyer dam pa nas skyed mos tshal du mngon du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276a-8: de nas bram ze rig byed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276a-9: rig byed kyi yan lag shes pa kha cig gis thams cad sgrol bsu nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276a-10: rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276a-12: khyod ni 'jig rten thams cad du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276a-13: thams cad gtong zhes rnam par grags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276a-14: bram ze rnams la shing rta 'di //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276a-15: khyod kyis sbyin par gtang bar rigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276a-16: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276a-17: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol shing rta de las myur ba myur bar babs te snying dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rab tu dga' bas bram ze dag la shing rta de byin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276a-18: bdag gis ji ltar bram ze la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276a-19: mchog tu dga' bas shing rta btang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276a-20: de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276a-21: btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276a-23: glang po che'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes bya ba me tog kun da dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276a-27: sprin dkar po lta bu'i mdog can bdun legs par gyur pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276a-28: rkang lags legs par gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276a-29: glang po che sa srung gi bu ltar 'gying zhing 'gro ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276a-30: skal pa mchog gi mtshan can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276b-0: bsod nams @276b byas pas mthong ba la zhon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276b-1: shin tu sdug pa'i bran dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276b-2: mdza' bshes dang g-yog 'khor rnams phyi bzhin 'breng zhing zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba bzhin du sos ka'i dus la babs pas shing rnams me tog kha 'bus shing ngang pa dang khrung khrung dang rma bya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276b-3: ne tso dang ri skegs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276b-4: khu byug dang shang shang te'u sgra 'byin pa'i nags tshal gyi skyed mos tshal gyi sar song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276b-5: de nas phyir rgol bas sbad pa'i bram ze kha cig gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gyi drung du rings par 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276b-6: gzhon nu thams cad sgrol la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276b-7: rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276b-9: lha min lhar bcas 'jig rten du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276b-10: khyod ni thams cad gtong zhes grags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276b-11: khyod kyi glang po mchog 'di ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276b-12: bdag cag rnams la stsal pa'i rigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276b-13: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276b-14: byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i mchog de las myur ba myur bar babs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276b-17: rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis de dag la glang po che'i mchog de byin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276b-18: bdag gis ji ltar bram ze la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276b-19: mchog tu dga' bas glang chen btang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276b-20: de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276b-21: btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276b-22: rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen gyis bu thams cad sgrol gyis glang po che'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes bya ba phyir rgol bas sbad pa'i bram ze rnams la byin zhes thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:276b-23: thos nas kyang rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen shin tu khros 'khrugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-0: gzhon nu thams cad sgrol bkug @277a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-2: gzhon nu khyod da nga'i yul na ma 'dug par song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-3: de nas gzhon nu thams cad sgrol phas spangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-5: bdag gis byang chub kyi phyir 'bad pa byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-6: 'jig rten thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi go cha ba gos pas glang po che de yang btang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-7: de bas khyim na gnas pas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-8: ci nus pas ni sbyin pa btang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-9: dka' thub nags su brten nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-10: nges pa mchog dag bya ba yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-11: bslangs nas mi sbyin zhes bya ba'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-12: tshig ni smra bar mi phod kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-13: de bas bdag ni khyim spangs te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-14: dka' thub nags su rab tu 'gro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-15: de nas byang chub sems dpas de ltar snying la mna' mtho bcad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-16: chung ma rgyags byin ma'i drung du song ste de dag rgyas par smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-17: de nas rgyags byin mas thos ma thag tu sdug pa dang bral bar dogs pa'i snying gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-18: thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-19: rje'i sras gal te de lta na bdag kyang dka' thub kyi nags su mchi ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-20: bdag ni rje'i sras dang bral na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-21: skad cig tsam yang 'tsho bar rngo ma thag lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-23: nam mkha' zla bas stongs par gyur pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-24: ji ltar sa ni lo tog gis stongs dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-25: padma chu yis stongs par gyur pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-26: bud med khyim thab kyis stongs de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-27: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-28: bdag cag mthar gdon mi za bar 'bral ba 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-29: 'di ni 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277a-30: khyod ni bza' ba dang btung ba dang mal cha dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-0: bgo ba mchog la @277b goms pas lus shin tu skyid de ba yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-1: dka' thub kyi na gos ni rtsva dang lo ma bting bar ni nyal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-2: rtsa ba dang me tog dang 'bras bu ni za /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-3: rtsa dur ba dang zug rdo dang rtsa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-4: tsher mas gang ba'i sa la ni rgyu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-5: yang dang yang du za gcig pa la ni sten /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-6: bdag nyid skye bo thams cad la ni bsten dgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-7: glo bur du 'ongs pa thams cad mchod pa la ni 'bad dgos la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-8: de na yang nga gdon mi za bar ci nus kyis sbyin pa gtong ste de la khyod kyis cung zad kyang mi 'gyod par bya dgos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-9: de bas na re zhig da dung yang legs par som zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-11: rje'i sras bdag rngo ci thog gis rje'i sras kyi rjes su sgrub lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-12: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-13: gal te de lta na dam bcas pa de dag khyod kyis dran par byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-14: de nas byang chub sems dpa' pha'i drung du song nas mgo bos phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-15: yab cig bdag gis byin par glang chen stsal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-16: nongs par gang lags sa bdag bzod par gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-17: bdag ni grong nas dgon par mchis lags kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-18: mi yi dbang po phyag mdzod stongs ma gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-19: de nas rgyal po bu dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis dbugs kyis brnangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-21: bu sbyin pa'i blo bor la 'dug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-22: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-23: sa ni ri dang bcas par yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-24: gal te ldog par 'gyur gda' yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-25: sa bdag bdag ni sbyin pa las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:277b-26: sems ni ldog par mi bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278a-0: de nas bu dang bu mo dang chung ma dang @278a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278a-1: lhan cig shing rta'i nang du zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278a-2: grong khyer dam pa de nas byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278a-4: yul mi mya ngan byed pa brgya stong rjes su 'brang bzhin du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278a-5: de nas mi zhig gis ngu zhing smre sngags 'don pa'i sgra de yang thos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278a-6: skye bo'i tshogs chen po grong khyer gyi sgor byung ba yang mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278a-8: kye nang rje skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'di cho nges 'debs pa ci las gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278a-10: shes ldan ci mi shes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278a-11: 'di ltar mi yi dbang po nyid kyi sras po mche ba bzang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278a-12: brtan pa'i ngang tshul rab tu sbyin la dga' ba 'di nas spyugs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278a-13: de ni bu dang chung mar bcas te nags mthar chas pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278a-14: pho brang 'khor ba rnams 'dus shin tu snying rjes cho nges 'debs //
