K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278a-15: de nas byang chub sems dpas grong khyer dam pa de nas byung ba'i pho brang 'khor ba rnams la ci rigs par mngon du song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278a-16: shes ldan dag slar deng zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278a-17: slar deng zhig 'di ltar shin tu yun ring po nas sdug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278a-18: 'grogs pa yang mjug tu gdon mi za bar 'bral ba'i mtha' can du 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278a-19: gnyen gyi skye bo dang 'grogs pa ni lam ka'i ngal bso ba'i bsti gnas kyi shing dang 'dra bas gdon mi za bar sdug pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278a-21: 'jig rten kun na skye bo dbang med de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278a-22: mdza' ba rnams dang 'bral bar 'gyur bsams nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278a-23: khyed kyis sa steng 'bad pa thams cad kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278a-24: zhi phyir blo gros mi g-yo brtan par gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278b-0: de nas dpag tshad @278b nyis brgya 'das pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278b-1: byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas bram ze zhig mngon du 'ongs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278b-2: kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu bdag ni khyod kyi yon tan thos nas 'di nas dpag tshad sum brgya tsam gyi yul nas 'dir mchis lags kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278b-3: khyod kyi shing rta mchog 'dis bdag ngal ba 'bras bu mchis par bgyi ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278b-4: de nas rgyags byin ma mi bzod pa skyes te tshig brlang pos bram ze de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278b-5: ae ma'o nags na'ang mi dbang sras la slong ba gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278b-6: bram ze 'di ni shin tu brtse ba med pa'i blo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278b-7: mi dbang sras po mi dbang dpal las nyams gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278b-8: 'di la 'dir ni snying rje ci ga mi skye 'am //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278b-9: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278b-10: khyod kyis bram ze ma spyo zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278b-12: rgyags byin gal te nor 'dod len pa 'di dag med gyur na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278b-13: kun sbyin med par mi gang zhig gis sa steng byang chub 'thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278b-14: sbyin sogs pha rol phyin drug tshul gyis yon tan mchog can gyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278b-15: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kun mkhyen nyid mchog rtag tu 'thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278b-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dpa' bas rta dang ldan pa'i shing rta de bram ze de la byin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278b-17: bram ze ser sna dri ma sel byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278b-18: shing rta rab tu byin pa 'di yis 'dir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278b-19: bdag ni drang srong che mchog gis bskor ba'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:278b-20: zag med chos kyi shing rta che skor shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-0: de nas thams cad sgrol gyis snying rab tu dga' bas shing rta'i mchog de yang bram ze la byin nas gzhon nu mdog gnag phrag @279a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-2: rgyags byin mas ni gzhon nu ma dra ba can khyer nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-3: dka' thub kyi nags logs su chas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-4: rim gyis dka' thub kyi nags su phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-5: de nas thams cad sgrol dka' thub kyi tshal der rang gi snying mgu bar byed pa'i brtul zhugs blangs te gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-6: ji tsam na rgyags byin ma rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'i phyir dka' thub kyi nags nas song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-7: bram ze zhig thams cad sgrol gyi drung du 'ongs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-8: rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-9: bdag cag bkol ba ma mchis pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-10: spa shug lhan cig 'khyam bgyid na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-11: de yi don du bus pa gnyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-12: khyod kyis bdag la sbyin pa'i rigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-13: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-14: de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-15: bu sdug pa gtong ba la cung zhig sems shing 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-16: de nas bram ze des byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-18: bdag gis khyod thams cad ster ba'o zhes thos na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-19: 'di ltar khyod la bdag gis bslangs pa de la ci zhig dpyad du yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-20: khyod ni kun ster snying rje yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-21: bdag nyid can dus steng grags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-22: ji ltar grags pa de bzhin du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-23: khyod kyis rtag tu bya ba'i rigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-24: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-25: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis bram ze de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-27: rang gi srog ni gtong ba la'ang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-28: lan 'ga' spyod pa ma myong na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279a-29: rang gi bu ni gtong ba la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-0: bdag blo gzhan du 'gyur @279b ci smos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-1: bram ze chen po de lta mod kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-2: bdag gis nags su skyed bskyed pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-3: bus pa 'di gnyis yongs spangs na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-4: ma dang bral ba'i nyon mongs pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-5: 'di dag ji ltar gnas snyam mod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-6: gzhon nu shin tu brtse med pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-7: bus pa btang la bdag min zhes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-9: bram ze bdag ni khrid na legs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-10: de nas bram ze des thams cad sgrol la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-11: kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-12: sa 'di thams cad du yon tan grags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-13: srog chags thams cad la snying brtse bas 'o byams par zhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-14: sbyin pa dang mchod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-15: bkur stis spos kyi glang po lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-16: dge sbyong dang bram ze dang glo bur ba'i skye bo la mchod pa byed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-19: mgon med pa dang ltogs pa yongs su sdug pa thams cad kyi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-20: mthong na don yod pa khyod kyis bdag 'ongs pa nom pa med pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-21: lam gyis dub pa 'bras bu med pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-23: re ba dang yun ring po nas brnag brnag pa'i 'dod pa 'bras bu med par bya ba gang yin pa de ni cha ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-24: khyod kyis med do zhes bya ba'i tshig kho bo'i yid la re ba kun tu rtog pa'i rta bstabs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-26: de bas na khyod kyis bdag gi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas nas btang ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-28: chu gter gos su gyon zhing bza' mig mtshungs med pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-29: ri bo mchog rgyas nu mar ldan pa'i ro stod can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:279b-30: grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa'i sa la btsal byas kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-1: bzad khyod dang mtshungs par gtong phod yod ma yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis bram ze'i tshig de thos nas bu la chags pa'i slong bas 'di dag sems par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-3: gal te re zhig bu gnyis po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-4: bram zer byin na bu dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-5: bral ba las byung sdug bsngal dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-8: brtul zhugs las kyang nyams gyur cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-9: bram ze 'di ni tshi chad de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-11: nyis na bu bral nyam thag pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-12: mya ngan sa steng bdag gis blang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-13: de bzhin ma byas dam bcas pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-14: zhig cing brtul zhugs nyams par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-15: de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis sdug pa'i bu gnyis nges par btang bar chad nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-17: dka' spyad brgya yis 'jig rten sdug bsngal gyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-18: rgya mtsho chen po so sor 'jigs byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-19: gting mi dpogs par rab tu bying ba dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-20: pha rol bsgral phyir lam gyi zam stegs bca'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-21: zla ba dri med nya ba'i bzhin ras can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-22: ma zhum kha nas de skad tshig smras nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-23: mchi ma'i rlan chus mig ni gang gyur ba'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-24: byis pa gnyis po bram ze de la byin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-27: rgya chen bdag gis thob gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-28: des ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-29: 'jig rten rnams ni bsgral bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280a-30: byis pa gzhon nu dag byin ma thag tu sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-0: de nas g-yos pa des nags de @280b na gnas pa'i dka' thub can rnams sdangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-2: sa ni mi bzad g-yos gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-3: 'di ni su yi mthu ltas yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-5: shin tu gsal bar shes par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-6: de na gnas 'jog dang rus gcig pa rgan po dka' thub can ltas shes pa la mkhas pa zhig yod pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-7: drang srong de rnams la don de go bar byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-8: gdon mi za bar dka' thub kyi nags na 'dug pa'i bu byis pa 'bras bu dang chu 'thung ba yid du 'ong ba mig tu sdug par byed pa gnyis thams cad sgrol gyis skye bo sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-9: yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir btang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-10: des na sa g-yos par gyur to ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-13: de nas bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis kyis phas snying nas yongs su btang ba'i blo rigs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-14: snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing thal mo gnyis sbyar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-15: thams cad sgrol gyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-16: yab cig yum ni ma mchis par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-17: khyod ni bdag cag stsol bzhed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-18: re zhig de ni mthong gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-19: de nas bdag cag stsal du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-20: de nas byang chub sems dpa' yid la gcags pa'i sdug bsngal gyis ngom zum gnag cing mchi ma 'dzag bzhin de gnyis la 'khyud nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-22: nga yi snying du mi sdug min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-23: snying rtse snying rje med min te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-24: 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-25: yon tan mthong nas btang ba yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-26: ci nas nga yi byang chub mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-27: zhi ba rang gis thob nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:280b-28: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281a-2: de nas byis pa gzhon nu de dag gis phas snying nas yongs su btang ba'i blo rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281a-3: pha'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281a-4: snying rje rje skad dang sma bab pa'i tshig gis dal gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281a-5: gal te khyod kyis thag bkum na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281a-6: ma la bdag cag gnyis kyis 'phrin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281a-7: khyod kyis bzod pa mdzod cig ces //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281a-8: yab cig khyod kyis gsung du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281a-10: byis par gyur pas bla ma khyod la nongs par bgyis pa gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281a-11: gal te la lar thugs la mi 'bab tshig 'ga' smras pa'am //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281a-12: gus par mnyan pa sa yongs su mnyes pa nyid du ma bgyis pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281a-13: de ni byis pa'i nongs pa lags zhes bzod pa mdzad du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281a-14: de skad ces smras nas pha la phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281a-15: lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas mig mchi mas gang bzhin bla ma la smra bar yid la gcags pas yang dang yang phyir lta zhing bsti gnas de nas byung ste song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281a-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa' byis pa gzhon nu'i tshig shin tu snying rjer rung ba de dag gis snying blong nas yid kyis byang chub tu smon lam btab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281a-17: de dka' thub kyi tshal gyi lo ma'i spyil bur zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281a-18: byis pa gzhon nu dag dong ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281a-19: lha stong phrag du ma yang bar snang la ca co dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281a-21: ae ma'o rab sbyin bdag nyid che //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281a-22: byis pa 'di gnyis btang nas kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281b-0: @281b gang gi yid ni 'gyur med pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281b-1: de ni nges pa rmad cig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281b-2: de nas rgyags byin ma rtsa ba dang 'bras bu rnams khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281b-3: bsti gnas logs su chas chas pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281b-4: sa che thang du g-yos pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281b-5: myur ba kho nar bsti gnas de nyid du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281b-6: lha gzhan zhig gis rgyags byin mas byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad thar bar bya bar brtson par byas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam nas seng ge mo zhig gi gzugs su bsgyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281b-8: rgyags byin mas ri dvags kyi rgyal po'i chung ma de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281b-9: ri dvags rgyal po'i chung ma sgeg sgeg ma //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281b-10: kho mo'i lam 'di bkag nas ci ste 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281b-11: ji ltar bdag ni mi 'phyo nges gyur na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281b-12: lam las gzur te myur du 'gro bar gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281b-14: khyod kyang ri dvags rgyal po'i chung ma la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281b-15: bdag kyang mi yi dbang po seng ge yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281b-16: btsun mo yin pas chos kyi spun gyur gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281b-17: ri dvags rgyal mos bdag gi lam phye zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281b-18: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281b-19: lha seng ge mo'i gzugs su bsgyur ba de yang lam de nas logs shig tu song ngo; ;de nas rgyags byin mas bkra mi shis pa'i ltas dag mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281b-21: ji ltar bar snang la dud mo'i sgra grags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281b-22: ji ltar yang tshal na gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams mya ngan byed pa'i sgra grags pa las na gdon mi za bar bsti gnas su ma legs pa zhig byung bar gyur to snyam nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281b-23: ji ltar bdag mig 'gul ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:281b-24: ji ltar bya skad 'byin pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282a-2: bus pa de gnyis btang bar des //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282a-3: ji ltar sa 'di g-yos pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282a-4: bdag gi snying ni 'dar ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282a-5: ji ltar lus kyang rmya ba las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282a-6: bus pa de gnyis btang bar nges //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282a-7: zhes de lta bu'i mi legs pa brgya stong dag sems shing bsti gnas su song nas bsti gnas su zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282a-8: mi dga' bzhin du bltas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282a-9: bu de gnyis ma mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282a-10: de nas rmongs shing snying 'dar bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282a-11: bsti gnas kyi gzhi de'i rjes bzhin du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282a-12: phyogs 'di na ni gzhon nu mdog nag sring mo dang lhan cig ri dvags kyi phru gu dang lhan cig rtag tu rtse rtse /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282a-13: 'di ni de gnyis kyis sa rdul las byas pa'i khyim yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282a-14: 'di ni de gnyis kyi rtsed mo'i cha byad yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282a-15: de gnyis ni mi snang na gal te zhig na bdag gis ma mthong gi lo ma'i spyil bur zhugs nas nyal lta srid dam snyam du de ltar snying la re zhing bu mthong bar 'dod pas rtsa ba dang 'bras bu phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas mig mchi mas gang bzhin du khyim thab kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282a-16: rje'i sras khye'u dang bu mo gnyis gang du mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282a-17: thams cad sgrol gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282a-18: kho bo'i drung du bram ze zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282a-19: re bas yang dag 'ongs par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282a-20: bus pa de gnyis de la byin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282a-21: de la rjes su yi rang gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282a-22: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282a-23: rgyags byin ma ri dvags mo mda' dug can gyis phog pa bzhin du sa la 'gyel nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-0: nya chu'i gnas nas phyung ba bzhin @282b du 'gre ldog par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-1: khrung khrung bu stor ba bzhin du ni snying rje rje skad du du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-2: ba be'u shi ba bzhin du ni 'bab sgro sna tshogs 'don cing smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-3: padma gzhon nu lta bu'i byad bzhin can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-4: lag pa padma'i 'dab ltar gzhon sha can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-5: bdag gi bu gnyis sdug bsngal ma myong ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-6: 'gro ba gang du song nas sdug bsngal gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-7: ri dvags bu ltar drang zhing ri dvags mig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-8: ri dvags lhan cig bsti gnas dga' dga' na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-9: de ring bdag gis bu gnyis ji lta bur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-10: gzhan gyi dbang gis dong zhing sdug bsngal gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-11: mig ni mchims gang ba'i mig gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-12: snying rjes du bas shin tu sdug bsngal ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-13: de ring bdag gis legs par ma mthong bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-14: skye bo bkren pa'i nang na sdug pas 'tsho //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-15: de gnyis bdag gi pang na bskyed bskyed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-16: zas su rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu za //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-17: bzod dang gnas pas bla ma rtag dga' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-18: bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-19: de gnyis ma dang nye du bral ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-20: rtsa lag rnams kyis gzu lums spangs pa las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-21: skye bo sdig can ngan dang phrad gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-22: bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-23: skom zhing bkres pas bdag nyid rtag gdungs na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-24: de gnyis su yi dbang gis 'gro bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-25: bran du gyur pas gdon mi za bar ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-26: de gnyis nyam thag sdug bsngal yongs su gzir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-27: bdag gis nges par tshe rabs gzhan dag tu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-28: srog chags sdug pa brgya dag phral ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:282b-29: sdig las shin tu mi bzad 'dir byas pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-0: des na ba be'u med bzhin cho @283a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-2: bden tshig gang gis bdag ni rtag tu yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-3: sems can kun la yid ni mnyam gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-4: bden tshig des ni bdag gi bu gnyis po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-5: bran du gyur pa las ni thar bar shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-6: de nas rgyags sbyin mas bus pa gzhon nu de dag gis bskyed cing bsrungs ba'i shing gang yin pa de dag lo ma thib be 'dug par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-7: snying du sdug pas 'khyud de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-8: bus pas ril ba chung du'i chus bcus te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-9: lo ma rnams las chu thigs 'dzag pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-10: ljon shing rnams ni sems dang bcas pa bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-11: bus pa nu zho ma blud lta bur ngu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-12: yang bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis dang rtse rtse ba'i ri dvags kyi phru gu bsti gnas na 'dug pa rnams mthong nas mi dga' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-13: snying rje rje skad kyi tshig gis dal bus smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-14: de yi ne'u zla mthong bar 'dod pa gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-15: gnas su sa tshugs mtshon cing tshol byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-16: ri dvags phru gu rgyu ba 'di dag kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-17: bdag gi sdug bsngal mi chung gzhan yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-18: de nas bus pa gzhon nu de dag lam gang nas dong ba'i lam der rjes bcad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-19: bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis rjes drang por ma byung gi gya gyus gang bar mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-20: lhag par yang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-21: ji ltar then po'i rjes byung dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-22: la lar myur du song ba las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-23: brdegs te khrid par gdon mi za //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-24: kye ma bram ze brtse med mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-25: mgul ni dbugs kyis brdzangs shing skad kyang 'dzer //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283a-26: ma mchu mdzes pa 'dar zhing bdag gi bu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-0: ri dvags bzhin du mig kyang @283b rig rig ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-1: rkang pa 'jam pos ji ltar song zhig gu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-2: de nas byang chub sems dpas de ltar smre sngags 'don pa'i bdag nyid de mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-3: mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshig de dang de dag gis rnam grangs mang por go bar byas nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-4: kho bos bu gnyis grags pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-5: btang ba ma yin sdang ba min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-6: sems can kun la phan don du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-7: btang bar rab dka' bu de btang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-8: mchog tu btang dka' bdag nyid dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-9: bu dang chung ma rnams btang nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-10: sems dpa' chen pos tshul bzhin du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-12: rgyags sbyin bdag gis gtong ba la brten btang dka' ba'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-13: bus pa de gnyis 'jig rten thar pa'i don du btang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-14: bdag dang chung ma gzhon nu nor yang gtang bya ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-15: kun la thams cad gtong ba'i blo gros nga la yod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-16: de nas rgyags sbyin mas sems brtan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-17: byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-18: khyod la bar chad mi bgyid kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-19: khyod blo gzhan du ma 'gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-20: gal te bdag kyang stsol bzhed na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-21: dogs pa ma mdzad bdag stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-23: dpa' bo gang phyir nyid kyi mi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-24: sdug pas chags pa gtang ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-25: don de myur du thob nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-26: srid las 'gro ba bsgral bar mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-27: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-28: rgyags byin ma brtson 'grus shin tu rmad du byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-29: shin tu bya dka' bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:283b-30: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284a-1: nam mkha' las bsti gnas der lhags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284a-2: snang ba rgya chen pos nags de gsal bar byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284a-3: nam mkha' la 'dug bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284a-4: 'di ltar 'jig rten rmongs pa blo ngan gzhung gis bcings pa'i blo gros can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284a-5: longs spyod la chags snying gi zhags pa bu yis bcings pa'i nang na yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284a-6: khyab bdag khyod cig chags pa med pas dga' ba skyed pa'i bu gtong bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284a-7: nges par go 'phang bde dang zhi ba dri med dka' ba med pa 'thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284a-8: de skad ces byang chub sems dpa' spro ba bskyed nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284a-9: 'di gcig pu g-yog dang bral na nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284a-10: ma la bdag gi rgyags byin ma blang ngo snyam nas de nas bram ze'i cha byad du bsgyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284a-12: yang byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284a-13: yan lag kun bzang khyim thab las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284a-14: 'phyo ba med cing snying nye ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284a-15: rigs na bsngags pa'i sring mo 'di; ;bdag la bran mo'i don du stsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284a-16: de nas rgyags byin ma mi bzod pa skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284a-18: ngo tsha med cing brkam pa khyod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284a-19: 'di ni bram ze'i tha shal te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284a-20: khyod lta 'byon ma mi byed cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284a-22: de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol snying rje dang ldan pa'i snying gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284a-23: rgyags byin ma la brtag par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-0: @284b de nas rgyags byin mas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-1: bdag ni bdag la g-yar ngan med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-2: de bzhin bdag la lta ma lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-3: gcig pu ji ltar bzhugs 'gyur zhes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-4: de ltar khyod slad g-yar ngan bgyid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-5: de nas byang chub sems dpas rgyags byin ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-6: go 'phang mi bzad mya ngan med pa tshol bdag la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-7: sa steng 'dir ni rgyags byin mya ngan bya mi dgos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-8: khyod ni mya ngan med par bram ze 'di rjes 'brengs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-9: bdag ni ri dvags mchi ba bzhin du bsti gnas 'then //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-10: de skad ces smras nas dga' ba dang mgu ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-11: yid rab tu dga' bas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-13: bdag gi sbyin pa tha ma yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-14: rgyags byin 'di yang yongs btang nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-15: yongs su gzung ba med par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-16: snyam du rig nas rgyags byin ma lag pa nas bzung ste; bram ze de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-17: bdag gis mchis brang sdug pa 'di //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-18: snying nas snying nye bsgo ba nyan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-19: ya rabs tshul can snyan par smra //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-20: bram ze'i mchog khyod bzhes su gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-21: de nas mche ba bzang po yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-22: chung ma byang chub 'dod phyir btang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-23: chu la gru ni ji lta bar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-24: sa ni mtha' dag rnam drug g-yos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-25: de nas rgyags byin ma bram ze'i dbang du gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-26: khyo dang bu dang bu mo dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag nas dbugs brdzangs pas mgul sgra ngar ngar por 'gag bzhin 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:284b-27: bdag gis tshe rabs snga ma la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-2: des na ba be'u shi ba bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-3: skye bo med pa'i nags na ngu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-4: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i cha byad mi snang bar byas te; rang bzhin gyi cha byad du gnas nas rgyags byin ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-5: bskal bzang bdag ni bram ze ma yin mi yang ma yin gyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-6: bdag ni lha yi dbang po brgya byin lha min 'joms byed de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-7: khyod kyi 'dul ba mchog tu gyur pa 'di yis bdag mgu yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-8: bdag las dam pa gang zhig 'dod pa de 'dir smra bar gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-9: de nas de'i tshig gis rgyags byin ma yid bde ba skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-10: brgya byin la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-11: spyan stong ldan pa bdag gi bu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-12: bran gyur pa las thar mdzad cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-13: mes po'i drung du phyin par yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-14: sum cu rtsa gsum bdag pos mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-16: yang dbang po chen po bsti gnas su zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-18: rgyags byin ma lag pa g-yon pas bzung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-19: byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-20: bdag gis khyod la rgyags byin 'di //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-21: g-yog gi phyir ni sbyin par byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-22: khyod kyis su la'ang ma sbyin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-23: bzhag pa byin na smad par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-24: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze khye'u dang bu mo khyer ba de ji ltar grong khyer gzhan yin no snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-25: grong khyer de nyid du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285a-26: bus pa gzhon nu de dag btsong bar brtsams pa de lta bu rmongs par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-0: ji tsam na blon po @285b rnams kyis mthong nas rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-2: khyod kyi dpon po mdog gnag dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-3: dra ba can dang de gnyis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-4: bram ze shin tu ma rungs pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-6: de skad thos nas rgyal po de sems mi dga' nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-7: gzhon nu gnyis myur du ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-8: blon po rnams kyis skad phyung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-9: grong khyer ba rnams myur du rgyal po'i mdun du nye bar lhags nas; ;ji tsam na blon po gzhan zhig gis rgyal po'i drung du khrid pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-10: mi yi dbang po mngon phyogs khrid pa'i tsha bo gos med cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-11: lus rbeg dri ma can gyi lus de de yis mthong nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-12: mod la seng ge'i khri las sa yi steng du lhung gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-13: pho brang 'khor mi blon tshogs bud med dag kyang du bar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-14: de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-15: gang zhig nags na gnas na yang; ;sbyin pa mngon par dga' ba'i yid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-16: mig bzang de ni myur du 'dir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-17: chung ma dang bcas dgug par gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-18: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas rang gi gnas su song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-19: phyi zhig na rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen 'das pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-20: bram ze de dang blon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-21: grong mi rnams dang lhan cig tu bsti gnas der song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-22: byang chub sems dpa' la gsol ba btab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-23: rang gi grong khyer du bos nas rgyal por bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:285b-24: de nas rgyal po thams cad sgrol thams cad gtong zhes bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-0: des dge slong dang bram ze @286a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-7: zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa du ma dag byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-8: tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-9: byang chub don du gnyer ba yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-10: rgyal rigs bram ze rje'u rigs dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-11: dmangs rigs rdol pa g-yung po la'ang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-12: 'jigs pa med par sbyin pa btang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-13: gser dang dngul dang ba lang dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-14: rta dang nor bu'i rna rgyan dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-15: de bzhin las dag byed pa'i bran //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-16: tshul khrims phun sum tshogs la sbyin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-17: chags pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-18: bu dang bu mo yongs btang bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-20: mi yis dag pa thob par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-21: gang gi tshe rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-22: thams cad sgrol gyi ched du bram ze dzu dzu ka la nor mang po byin pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-23: de 'byor pa rgya chen por gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-24: de la snying du sdug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-26: grogs po dag 'ongs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-27: khyod kyi 'byor pa dang dpal dang skal ba phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa ci yang rung de dag thams cad ni gzhon nu thams cad sgrol de la brten te yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-29: gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gyis kho bo la ci zhig byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-30: rigs mchog gi nang du skyes pas kho bo 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-31: des na kho bo skal pa dang ldan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286a-32: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286b-0: dge slong dag ji snyam du @286b sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286b-1: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gang yin pa de ni nga yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286b-2: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dzu dzu ka gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286b-3: de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286b-4: byas pa mi tshor ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286b-5: da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286b-6: byas pa mi tshor ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286b-7: de lta bas na dge slong dag 'di ltar bslab par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286b-8: byas pa gzo ba dang byas pa tshor bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286b-9: cung zad byas pa yang chud mi gzan par bya na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286b-10: mang po la lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286b-11: dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286b-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286b-13: de'i tshe yul tsam pa na khyim bdag gru 'dzin zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod che ba yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286b-14: des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286b-15: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286b-17: dga' mgur spyod par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286b-20: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286b-23: de yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra cung zad kyang ma thos shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286b-24: grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286b-25: dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:286b-26: sman pas bcas pa'i kha zas ha cang yang kha ba ma yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-1: skyur ba ma yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-2: ha cang lan tshva che ba ma yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-3: ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-4: ha cang tsha ba ma yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-5: ha cang bska ba ma yin pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-6: de ltar kha ba dang skyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-10: bska ba spangs pa'i kha zas kyi bsnyen bkur byed cing do shal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-11: se mo dos lus brgyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-12: lha'i bu mo dga' tshal na rgyu ba bzhin du khri'u nas khri'u dang khri nas khrir rgyu ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-14: de'i tshe khyim bdag gru 'dzin dgos pa 'ga' zhig la rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-17: rgyu skar gro bzhin la bab pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-18: khye'u gzugs bzang po blta na sdug pa mdzes pa de'i rkang pa'i mthil gnyis la spu gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba sor bzhi tsam skyes pa zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-19: btsas nas ji tsam na khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyi mi zhig rings pa rings par rgyal po'i khab tu song nas khyim bdag gru 'dzin la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-20: khyim bdag dgyes pa skyed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-21: khyod kyi khye'u zhig bcas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-22: de dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-23: kye nang rje khyod ci zhig smra /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-25: khyim bdag khyod kyi khye'u zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-27: yid bde ba skyes nas yang dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-28: kye nang rje ci zhig smra /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-30: khyim bdag khyod kyi khye'u zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-32: kye nang rje ci zhig smra /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287a-33: de nas mi de 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287b-0: ci khyim bdag @287b 'di yang nas yang du 'dri ba bdag la kyal ba smra bar mi 'dod grang snyam du bsams nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287b-2: kye nang rje khyod kyis nyes te gal te khyod kyis lan brgyar smras par gyur na yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287b-3: ngas kyang khyod kyi kha gser gyis lan brgya bkang bar 'gyur ba zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287b-4: de nas khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyis mi de'i kha gser gyis lan gsum bkang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287b-5: dkor ba la khye'u dkan dbab pa'i rin gser bye ba nyi shu byin cig ces spring ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287b-6: khyim bdag gru 'dzin dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287b-7: yid bde bas rgyal po'i drung du song nas lha bdag gi khye'u zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287b-10: ngas de la tsam pa gzhi dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287b-11: glang po che bdun gyi tshogs sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287b-12: khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bltas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287b-14: de nas khyim bdag gi gnyen rnams kyis nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287b-15: khye'u yi ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287b-17: khye'u 'di rgyu skar gro bzhin la btsas la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287b-18: 'di btsas pa na phas kyang dkan dbab pa'i rin du gser bye ba nyi shu byin pas de bas na khye'u yi ming gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa zhes bya bar gdags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287b-19: de'i ming gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa zhes bya bar btags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287b-20: khye'u gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287b-21: pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:287b-22: nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288a-2: rtsed grogs byed pa'i ma ma gnyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288a-3: de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar gyi snying khu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288a-4: gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis skyed par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288a-5: sring par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i padma bzhin myur du skyed par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288a-6: de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288a-10: gzhug pa dang gzhag pa la nye bar zhugs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288a-11: brtag pa brgyad po gzhi brtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288a-13: rin po che brtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288a-15: glang po che brtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288a-18: gzhon nu ma brtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288a-20: klog pa la mkhas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288a-22: de bsod nams kyis skal ba chen po dang ldan pa yin no zhes rigs mnyam pa mang pos thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288a-24: de'i phas 'dug pa'i khang pa gsum po dgun gyi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288a-26: dbyar gyi rtsig tu bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288a-27: chung ma gsum po chen ma dang bar ma dang chun ma bzhag nas de steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir song ste skyes pa med pa na rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288a-29: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288a-30: de nyi ma re re zhing lnga brgya'i ston mo snod nas 'tshed cing sbyor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288a-31: lhas byin gyis gzhon nu ma skyes dgra la sbad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288a-32: gzhon nu rgyal po thams cad ni gang gi tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288a-33: skra skya bo skyes par gyur pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288b-0: gzhon nu'i thu bo shos rgyal @288b srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag nas rab tu 'byung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288b-1: khyod kyi yab ni skra kha dog rnam pa gsum pa'i mthar phyin na 'on kyang 'dod pa rnams la zhen bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288b-7: pha rol gnon pa gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288b-8: 'dod pa don du gnyer ba rnams ni mi byed pa ci yang med pas ji tsam na rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das mar gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288b-9: 'jams gsol bar bzhed pa'i 'jams kyi zhal ta byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288b-10: 'od ma'i chal du song ba ma skyes dgras mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288b-11: des rdo rje rtse gcig pa zhig 'phangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288b-12: rgyal po sgra la mkhas pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288b-13: des g-yon phyogs su thug pa'i rdze'u chags par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288b-14: de nyid nas slar log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'di lta bu mi mkhyen pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288b-18: rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288b-20: mo'u dgal gyi bu ma skyes dgra mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lhas byin gyis zin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod snyoms ma rung bar byas kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288b-22: tsam par gru 'dzin gyi bu'i drung du song la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288b-23: bsod snyoms khyer te shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:288b-24: btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na mi snang bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289a-0: tsam par phyin pa de lta @289a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289a-1: bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289a-2: gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa nyi ma la dad pas de nyi ma re re zhing nang par sngar langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289a-3: nyi ma la phyag byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289a-4: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brtol nas babs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289a-5: tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289a-6: mthong nas kyang bdag gis mngon sum kho nar nyi ma nyid kyi gzugs mthong ngo snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289a-7: mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289a-8: mthong nas kyang tshigs su bcad pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289a-9: nyi ma brtol nas sa steng mngon phyogs myur nyid du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289a-10: bdag gis gnas su byon pa 'di ko su zhig lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289a-11: 'di ci nyi ma'am nor sbyin zla ba'am brgya byin nam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289a-12: 'on te lha yi bdag po mod la gshegs zhig gu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289a-13: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i sems kyis kyang de'i bsam pa shes nas kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289a-14: kho bo 'od zer stong gi 'od 'bar nyi ma ma yin rgyu skar bdag po min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289a-15: kho bo rnam thos ma yin mchog ldan ma yin legs pa'i brtul zhugs dbang phyug min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289a-16: kho bo thugs zhi gzi brjid kyis 'bar sangs rgyas sras po yin par shes par byos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289a-17: kho bo thub la bsod snyoms dgos nas bslang ba'i phyir ni khyod kyi drung du 'ongs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289a-18: gro bzhin skyes kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289a-19: ci shes ldan nyid thub pa yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289a-20: des tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289b-0: ji ltar gser gyi ri bo lhun po'i zlar ni yungs kar khyer te 'ong ba @289b dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289b-1: ji ltar nyi ma'i zlar ni sa steng srog chags srin bu me khyer 'jal ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289b-2: rin chen gyis phyug rgya mtsho'i zlar ni 'di ni gnag gi rmig rjes sgrun pa ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289b-3: de bzhin mi mchog bla ma sangs rgyas la ltos ston pa'i sras bdag rig par gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289b-4: gro bzhin skyes kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289b-5: rjes su dpag pa 'di yis na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289b-6: bdag gis khyod kyi 'dren pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289b-7: ji ltar dka' thub rab che ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289b-8: gsal bar rab tu rtogs lags so /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289b-9: dgos pa ci la byon bka' stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod snyoms phul cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289b-13: dge sbyong go'u ta ma sh'akya'i sras sh'akya'i rigs las skra dang kha sbu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289b-14: de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhig yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289b-16: de ni sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289b-17: des sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos nas ba spu'i khung thams cad g-yos shing mngon par dad pa des snod du btsos pa lnga brgya po de nyid che dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289b-18: de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos de las bsod snyoms blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289b-19: ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na tsam pa nas mi snang bar gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:289b-20: rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas par phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:290a-1: bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms phul te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol bar brtsams pa na ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos snod nas btsos pa phyi ma shos khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:290a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:290a-3: ji tsam na 'od ma'i tshal thams cad kha zas kyi dri zhim po rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khyab par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:290a-5: gdon mi za bar lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:290a-6: lha gzhan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms phul te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:290a-7: 'di ltar 'od ma'i tshal 'di kha zas kyi dri zhim po rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khyab par gyur to snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:290a-8: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:290a-9: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:290a-10: lha gzhan dag gis bsod snyoms phul ba'am ci lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:290a-11: 'di ltar 'od ma'i tshal 'di zhal zas kyi dri bda' ba sna tshogs kyis khyab par gyur lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:290a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:290a-13: rgyal po chen po lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang ma yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:290a-14: lha gzhan rnams kyis kyang ma phul te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:290a-15: de lta mod kyi khyod nyid kyi yul tsam pa na gru 'dzin gyi bu nyi ma re re lnga brgya'i ston mo snod nas 'tshod cing sbyor ba yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:290a-16: de nas dge slong mo'u dgal gyis bus blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:290b-0: bcom ldan 'das de'i bsngags pa gsungs par @290b brtsams pa thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:290b-1: de yang mthong bar 'dod pa skyes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:290b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs kyis de'i bsam pa mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:290b-3: rgyal po chen po sems can de ni bsod nams kyi skal pa chen po dang ldan pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:290b-4: khyod bsod nams yongs su zad par 'gyur du 'ong gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:290b-5: de la bka' ma stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:290b-6: de lta mod kyi rgyal po chen po lhung bzed kyi lhag ma la longs spyod cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:291a-3: shes ldan dag yul tsam par 'dong gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:291a-4: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go skon cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:291a-8: de ni sems can bsod nams kyi skal pa chen po dang ldan pa yin pas de la bka' mi stsol to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:291a-19: rgyal po yang mi gshegs gzhon nu yang mi gshegs te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:291b-0: shes ldan dag gdon mi za bar rgyal po ni bdag cag la chad pas bcad par bzhed pas @291b de na yi ge 'di skad spring mod ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:291b-1: de rnams kyis blon po rnams la don de spring ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:291b-4: shes ldan dag 'di ni bden pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:291b-5: rgyal po dang gzhon nu yang mi gshegs la gangg'a'i gags brtsigs pa yang dgos pa cung zad kyang med do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:291b-7: de rnams kyis nyan rna ba'i mi zhig mngags so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:291b-22: khyim bdag gru 'dzin gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu ba gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:291b-23: gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:292a-0: @292a *// bu grong mi 'di dag 'di skad ces zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:292a-2: yab gal te de lta na mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:292a-3: bu gdon mi za bar rgyal po de khyod kyi rkang pa'i mthil gyi spu gser gyi kha dog can dag blta bar 'dod kyis /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:292a-7: phyag byas nas de'i spyan sngar skyil mo krung chos te 'dug cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:292a-8: des ni spu rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:292a-9: khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:292a-10: gro bzhin skyes bzhon pa gang gis btang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:292a-11: ci glang po che'i bzhon pas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:292a-14: 'on te gru'i bzhon pas snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:292a-15: 'di dag gi nang na gru'i bzhon pa mchog yin pas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:292a-21: 'byor pa des chu'i nang nas btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:292b-0: de rim gyis rgyal po'i khab der @292b nye bar phyin pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:292b-2: de nas rgyal po'i khab nas gangg'a'i 'bab chu'i bar der 'obs brkos nas chus bkang ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:292b-6: dri zhim po'i pog por bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:292b-7: dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po btags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:292b-8: rgyal mtshan dang ba dan btsugs /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:292b-23: de la bzhon pas ci bya /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:293a-7: gding ba med par bzhud do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:299b-4: de la'ang zad par rjes su lta //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:299b-5: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:299b-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:299b-7: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:299b-8: rkang pa'i mthil gnyis su spu gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba skyes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:299b-9: gdugs re re zhing lnga brgya'i ston mo snod nas sgrol zhing sbyor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:299b-10: 'di nas bzung ste bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du lan 'ga' yang gding ba ma mchis pa'i phyogs su rkang pa ma bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:299b-11: btsas ma thag tu dkan dbab pa'i rin gser bye ba phrag nyi shu thob cing bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:299b-12: dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:299b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:299b-14: dge slong dag gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:299b-15: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas gro bzhin skyes 'di nyid kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:299b-16: las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300a-0: dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par @300a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300a-4: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300a-6: skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300a-7: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300a-8: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300a-9: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300a-11: dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na 'jig rten du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300a-14: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300a-15: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300a-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300a-17: de dge slong drug khri nyis stong gis yongs su bskor nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rgyal po'i pho brang bshes ldan zhes bya bar gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300a-18: rgyal po'i pho brang bshes ldan na dga' sde rab tu mang po gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300a-19: de rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dge slong drug khri nyis stong gis yongs su bskor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300a-20: ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na 'dir byon to zhes thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300a-21: thos nas kyang thams cad 'dus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300b-0: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs gang na ba der dong ste lhags @300b nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300b-1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300b-4: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis dga' sde rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300b-5: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300b-6: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300b-7: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300b-10: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300b-11: de nas dga' sde rab tu mang po stan las langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300b-12: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300b-13: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300b-14: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300b-15: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag cag dgung zla gsum du na bza' dang chos gos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300b-18: snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300b-19: yo byad rnams sbyor zhing mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:300b-21: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis dga' sde rab tu mang po rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301a-0: de nas dga' sde rab tu mang pos yang dag par @301a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301a-1: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las langs te dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301a-6: shes ldan dag bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gdugs tshod gsol bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301a-9: de na kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301a-10: nyi ma re re zhing 'dus te gdugs tshod gsol na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301a-11: bdag cag gi zhing las kyi mtha' rnams bar chad du 'gyur bas shes ldan dag gal te 'dod na re mo re mos gdugs tshod gsol bar bya'o zhes de rnams kyis re mo re mos spyi bungs las ston mo bya bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301a-12: 'byor ba ji lta ba bzhin bdag nyid kyi yang snon par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301a-13: de nas dga' sde rnams kyi nang na bram ze'i khye'u bkren pa zhig yod pa de ma'i drung du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301a-14: yum dga' sde rnams kyis khrims su bca' ba re mo re mos bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol bar bya'o zhes dam bcas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301a-15: de la bdag gi 'byor pa ni nyung na bdag gis ji ltar gdugs tshod gsol bar bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301a-16: des smras pa; bu gal te de lta na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301a-17: khyod kyis nyi ma tha ma bzung la dus de'i bar du cung zad sgrubs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301a-18: tshogs kyi rgyu lhag kyang cung zad rnyed grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301b-0: des nyi ma tha ma bzung nas de na tshogs kyi rgyu lhag @301b pa rab tu mang po yod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301b-1: des kyang cung zad bsgrubs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301b-2: de nas des gnas khang brtsigs tu bcug ste der gos rnams bting nas grva rnams su kar sha pa na lnga lnga bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301b-3: de la dom lpags shig bdog pa yang gnas khang gi sgor bting ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301b-4: de nas lnga brgya'i ston mo snod du btsos shing sbyar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301b-5: bkur sti chen pos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs gdugs tshod gsol te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301b-6: zhabs la gtugs nas smon lam btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301b-7: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes shing lan 'ga' yang gding ba ma mchis pa'i sa phyogs su rkang pa mi 'jog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301b-8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi zhabs kyi mthil gnyis la spu gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba sor bzhi tsam 'khrungs pa ji 'dra ba de lta bur bdag gi yang de 'dra ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301b-9: yon tan 'di lta bu dag kyang thob cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301b-10: ston pa 'di 'dra ba mnyes par bgyid kyi mi mnyes par ma bgyid cig ces byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301b-11: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dga' sde'i bram ze'i khye'u gang yin pa de ni gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu ba 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301b-12: 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la bya ba byas shing smon lam btab pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pas phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:301b-13: rkang pa gnyis la spu gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba sor bzhi cam skyes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302a-1: nas bzung ste bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du lan 'ga' yang gding ba med pa'i sa phyogs su rkang pa ma bor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302a-2: btsas pa na yang dkan dbab pa'i rin du gser bye ba phrag nyi shu thob cing nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302a-3: dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302a-4: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302a-5: gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302a-6: 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302a-7: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302a-8: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302a-9: dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302a-11: ma skyes dgra mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lhas byin gyis zin pas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phangs pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302a-12: rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i grong mi rnams kyis 'phya bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302a-13: de na kha cig ni rgyal po la mi snyan par sgrogs par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302a-14: 'di ma btsas pa nyid nas yab la dgrar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302a-15: ci'i phyir ma btsas pa nyid du mi bsad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302a-17: shes ldan dag rgyal pos ma nyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302a-18: ci thams cad kyi lung bstan pa bden par 'gyur ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302a-19: gzhon nu nyid dul ba yin mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302b-0: 'on kyang @302b lhas byin mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bslus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302b-1: des na bya ba ngan pa la shin tu zhugs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302b-3: shes ldan dag rgyal po dang lhas byin gyis kyang ma nyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302b-4: 'on kyang lhas byin khrid de 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du mi gzhag par 'di ltar rab tu 'byin par mdzad pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302b-5: bcom ldan 'das kho nas nongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma nongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302b-8: de gang gi phyir gnas nas dbyung ba'i las ma byas pas dge 'dun gyis nyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302b-9: de na gang dag rgyal po la mi snyan par sgrogs pa des rgyal po ngo tsha bar mi byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302b-10: sngon gyi tshe rabs rnams su bdag gis las 'di dag byas shing bsags pa yin no snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302b-11: gang dag bcom ldan 'das dang dge 'dun la mi snyan pa sgrogs pa des ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302b-12: rgyal po shin tu ngo tsha bar byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302b-13: bdag gis lus ngan pa gang yin pa des 'jig rten na bcom ldan 'das dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302b-14: dge 'dun la mi snyan pa brjod do snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302b-15: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302b-16: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302b-17: btsun pa nongs pa gzhan gyis bgyis la skyon gzhan la bsgo ba la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302b-19: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:302b-20: ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang nyes pa gzhan gyis byas la skyon gzhan la bsgos pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303a-0: dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer w'a ra @303a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303a-1: n'a si na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303a-3: lo legs pa skye bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303a-4: mi mang pos gang ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303a-6: de la khyi gnyis shig yod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303a-9: de gnyis kyis rgyal po'i rta khrab kyi cha spyad 'chos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303a-10: ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po tshangs sbyin dra ma la cha ba na des blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303a-11: shes ldan dag rta khrab kyi yo byad ltos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303a-12: de rnams kyis blta bar brtsams pa na thams cad bcad cing rab tu gtubs par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303a-13: de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303a-14: lha rta khrab kyi cha byad zhes rnams khyis 'tshal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303a-16: shes ldan dag gal te de lta na ngas khyi rnams yongs su spangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303a-17: de nas kha cig ni bsad do /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303a-19: ji tsam na yul gzhan gyi khyi zhig yul nas w'a ra n'a sir 'ong ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303a-20: des de rnams 'bros pa mthong nas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303a-21: shes ldan dag ci'i phyir khyed 'di ltar skrag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303a-22: de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303a-24: khyed ci'i phyir rgyal po la gsol ba ma byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303a-27: kho bo cag ni bros na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303a-28: rgyal po la gsol ba byas pa'i gtol ga la yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303a-30: 'dug cig dang khyed kyi don du kho bos rgyal po la gsol ba bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303a-31: des de rnams dbugs phyung nas slar log pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303b-0: de @303b nas des rgyun lugs chad tsam na thos pa'i nye 'khor du 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303b-1: rgyal po'i khab na zhes gnyis mchis pa 'gram dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303b-2: nye 'gram stobs dang kha dog ldan pa gang lags pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303b-3: de 'dir dgum rgyu bdag cag dgum pa'i rgyu ma lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303b-4: lhan cig dgum rgyu ma lags dgum pa rigs pa min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303b-6: de nas nam langs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303b-7: blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303b-8: shes ldan dag mdang sum nga la tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba byed pa gang yin pa de tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303b-9: de rnams kyis sku srung rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303b-10: shes ldan dag mdang sum lha la tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba byed pa de tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303b-16: 'on te khyi gzhan rnams kyis yin pa rtogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303b-17: blon po rnams 'dus nas gros bya bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303b-18: shes ldan dag lhas 'di skad ces khyi rnams rtogs shig ces bka' stsal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303b-19: de rnams la ji ltar brtag par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303b-21: de la gzhan pa rtag tu ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303b-22: skra'i thum po byin te skyug tu gzhug mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303b-23: de rnams kyis skra'i thum po byin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303b-26: nye 'gram gnyis ko ba'i dum bur skyugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303b-27: rgyal po la rigs par byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303b-28: rgyal pos de gnyis spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:303b-29: lhag ma rnams la mi 'jigs par byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304a-2: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi 'gram dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304a-3: nye 'gram gang yin pa de gnyis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304a-4: lhas byin dang ma skye dgra 'di gnyis yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304a-5: de na yang 'di gnyis kyis nyes pa byas la skyon gzhan la bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304a-6: da ltar yang 'di gnyis kyis nyes pa byas la skyon gzhan la bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304a-7: gzhan yang ji ltar lhas byin byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304a-8: byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304a-9: dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug go ji tsam na mi zhig sta re dang khur shing thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304a-10: shing gi phyir nags khrod du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304a-11: de de na shing tshol bar byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304a-12: seng ges skrag nas gros pa las sur khung zhig tu lhung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304a-13: seng ges kyang de bza' ba'i bsam pas de nyid du lhung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304a-14: sbrul gyis byi ba zhig skrag nas bros pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304a-15: khras byi ba bza' ba'i phyir snyegs pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304a-16: ji tsam na thams cad sur khung du lhung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304a-17: de dag thams cad gcig la gcig bsad par 'dod pa'i gnod sems dang ldan par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304a-19: shes ldan dag khyed thams cad kho bo'i bgrod pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304a-20: de lta mod kyi bdag cag sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dog pa thob pas 'di na gnong ba bya ba'i dus ma yin gyis ma 'gul bar 'khod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304a-21: stes dbang gis rngon pa zhig ri dvags rnams tshol zhing phyogs der phyin pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304b-0: des sur khung der blta bar brtsams @304b pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304b-1: de rnams kyis rtabs pa'i tshig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304b-2: kye nang rje skyabs gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304b-3: de nas rngon pa des shes nas thog mar seng ge phyung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304b-4: des rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304b-5: khyod kyi drin gzo bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304b-6: 'on kyang 'di na mgo nag po gnas pa de ni byas pa chud gzon pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304b-7: khyod kyis ma dbyung zhig ces smras nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304b-8: ci tsam na rngon pa des thams cad mthar gyis phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304b-9: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na seng ges ri dvags shig bsad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304b-10: rngon pa de yang phyogs der phyin pa seng ges de ngo shes nas rngon pa'i rkang pa la gtugs te ri dvags de byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304b-11: dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po tshangs byin btsun mo dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal gyi sar song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304b-12: des skyed mos tshal der bde ba nyams su myong bar byas nas gnyid kyis log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304b-13: btsun mo bud med rnams kyang bag yangs su gnas pas gos dag phud de skem /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304b-14: rgyan dag bkrol nas phyogs dag tu bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304b-15: skyed mos tshal na 'chag par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304b-18: gnyid kyis log par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304b-19: ji tsam na btsun mo zhig rgyan rnams bkrol te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304b-22: khras de blangs nas rngon pa de la byas pa gzo bar bya ba'i phyir byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:304b-23: rgyal po tshangs sbyin gnyid kyis snyoms pa bsal nas myur ba myur bar w'a ra n'a sir zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305a-2: yul mi rnams kyang rings par dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305a-3: ji tsam na btsun mo des rgyan btsal ba las ma rnyed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305a-4: des rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305a-5: lha skyed mos tshal du bdag gi rgyan stor lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305a-6: rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305a-8: de rnams kyis btsal bar brtsams pa na; mgo nag po de rngon pa'i drung du dus dus su 'gro bas de de'i khyim du song ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305a-9: mtshan ma las de la rgyan yod par shes nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305a-11: de nas rgyal po mchog tu khros te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305a-12: rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis rngon pa bkug nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305a-13: kva'e nang rje khyod kyis skyed mos tshal nas rgyan brkus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305a-14: de nas de skrag nas ji ltar gyur pa smras te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305a-15: rgyan de rgyal po la phul na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305a-16: 'on kyang mi de bcings nas btson rar bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305a-17: byi bas song nas sbrul la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305a-18: mgo nag po sdig pa byed pa des bya ba byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305a-19: bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen rgyal pos bcings nas btson rar bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305a-22: de ring bdag gis rgyal po la zin par byas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305a-24: sman 'di dag gis gsos shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-0: de lta na rgyal po de dga' nas khyod gdon mi za bar btang nas longs spyod kyang bgo bsha' byed par @305b 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-2: legs kyis de bzhin gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-3: sbrul gyis rgyal po zin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-5: sngags dang sman dag gis gsos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-6: de nas rgyal po mgu nas btson las btang ste longs spyod dag gis bgo bsha' yang byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-8: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-9: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rngon pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-10: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi byas pa chud gzon pa'i mi gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-11: de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-12: byas pa ma tshor ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-13: da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-14: byas pa mi tshor ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-15: gzhan yang ji ltar 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-16: byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-17: dge slong dag sngon byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-18: dus ma yin par zhag bdun du sprin chags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-20: ne'u le zhig byi ba'i tshang du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-21: sbrul zhig kyang char pas skrag nas phan tshun du rgyu ba na de nyid du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-22: ji tsam na ne'u le des byi ba de bsad par brtsams pa na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-25: de nas sbrul gyi ming ni dga' sde zhes bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-26: ne'u le'i ming ni dga' bo zhes bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-27: byi ba'i ming ni gangg'as byin zhes bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:305b-29: dga' bos gangg'as byin la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306a-0: khyod 'jab cing song la bdag cag gi kha zas @306a *//

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306a-4: dga' bos dga' sde la smras pa gal te gangg'as byin kha zas med par 'ongs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306a-5: de nyid bdag gis bza' bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306a-7: sdug bsngal mi bzang pa dog pa thob pa na yang 'di de la gsod par rtsom na; gal te de zas med par 'ongs na lta smos kyang ci dgos pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306a-8: ye de la spring bar bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306a-10: dga' bo na re 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306a-11: gal te gangg'as byin kha zas med par 'ongs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306a-12: de nyid bdag gis bza' bar bya'o zhes zer ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306a-15: gdon mi za bar des bdag zos par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306a-16: des dga' sde la spring ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306a-17: mi bkren ltogs pa'i shugs kyis yongs dub nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306a-18: nyam thag snying rje med par 'gyur bas khyod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306a-19: byas pa chud gzon sems can de la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306a-20: gangg'as byin pa phyir mi 'ong zhes gsungs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306a-22: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306a-23: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi gangg'as byin gang yin pa de ni nga yin no //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306a-25: de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306a-26: da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306b-18: da dung yang pha rol gnon pa gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306b-19: khyod kyis mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306b-24: rgyal po la pho nyas bzlubs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306b-25: lha gzhon nus tsam pa'i skye bo gtses te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306b-27: lha gzhon nu de las bzlog par mdzad pa'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306b-29: gzhon nu ci'i phyir yul mi la gnod pa byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306b-31: lha dpung rgyas par mi 'gyur lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306b-33: gzhon nu gal te de lta na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:306b-34: rgyal po'i khab pa 'ba' zhig ma gtogs par yul ma ga dha khyer cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:307a-17: des rgyal po'i khab kyang blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:307a-18: lhas byin gyi drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:307a-20: 'phags pa bdag gis mdzod gcig ma gtogs par longs spyod thams cad thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:307a-22: pha rol gnon pa'i 'bras bu de yin mod kyi /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:307a-25: gang la mdzod yod pa de rgyal po yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:307a-26: mdzod kyi phyir pha rol gnon pa gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:307a-27: des rgyal po'i khab kyang brlag par bya bar brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:307b-0: rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye @307b bo'i tshogs dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:307b-2: tsam pa thams cad skrag par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:307b-3: ji ltar ma skyes dgras mi mthong ba de ltar pho nya btang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:307b-5: lhas bdag cag bu bzhin du so sor bskyangs na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:307b-7: lha'i yul mi phal cher bros lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:307b-8: bdag cag kyang 'bros par 'tshal lags so;/

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:307b-14: bu ngas khyod la yul thams cad byin na ci'i phyir yi chad par byas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308a-6: de phyag sbal du bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308a-7: rgyal po de la grong mi rnam dga' bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308a-8: yul de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis thos nas yid mi bde bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308a-9: ma skyes dgra gtum pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308a-11: gzu lums che bas de la su yang kha zer mi phod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308a-12: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos phyag sbal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308a-13: las kho na la rten cing 'dug pa de la /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308a-15: ma skyes dgras btson srung rnams la dris pa /
