K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308a-23: gang zhig skyel na de chad pas gsod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308a-24: de zhe gnag pa'i las can yin par shes pa su yang kha zas sbyor bar yang mi byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308a-25: skyel ba lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308b-0: de nas lus 'phags ma khyim thab la sdug par 'chums pa'i snying gis phye'i 'deg gus lus byugs shing rkang gdub kyi @308b sbubs chus bkang nas bskyal bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308b-2: brtson srung gi mi rnams kyis de'i thabs shes mod kyi rgyal po de la dga' bas mthong yang ma skyes dgra la ma sbran to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308b-3: ji tsam na yang ma skyes dgras btson srung gi mi rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308b-4: shes ldan dag rgyal po bgres po ji ltar 'tsho bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308b-5: de rnams kyis rgyas par smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308b-7: shes ldan dag lus 'phags ma ji ltar phyis skyel bar mi 'gyur bar khog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir skar khung gi drang thad kyi bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'chag par brtsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308b-9: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos skar khung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308b-10: drang thad kyi bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bcom ldan 'das gang na ba la bltas nas dga' ba bskyed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308b-11: des na srog dang bral bar ma gyur to; ;ma skyes dgras yang btson srung gi mi rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308b-12: shes ldan dag bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308b-13: btung ba ni bkag na da ltar rgyal po bgres po ji ltar 'tsho bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis de rjes su gzung ba'i slad du skar khung gi drang thad kyi bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'chag par mdzad pa de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308b-16: de gdugs re re zhing bzhengs nas gzigs lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308b-19: de'i rkang pa gnyis kyang spu gris dros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308b-20: de rnams kyis skar khung dag bkag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:308b-21: de'i rkang pa gnyis kyang spu gris dras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309a-0: @309a *// de sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas gdungs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309a-1: mchi mas brnangs shing skad 'gag la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309a-2: mig mchi mas gang bas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309a-3: bdag sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dog pa thob na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma dgongs pa lta zhig snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de lta bu mi mkhyen pa'am mi gzigs pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309a-7: rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci yang mi mnga'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309a-8: chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309a-9: 'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309a-14: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis bzhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309a-15: dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309a-16: chu bo bzhi las rgal ba rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil legs par gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309a-17: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309a-19: 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309a-20: yan lag drug dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309a-21: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309a-22: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa; lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309a-23: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309a-24: stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309b-0: phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par @309b rgyas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309b-1: brgya phrag bcur dbang bsgyur ba las khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas gang ni nyams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309b-3: gang ni mi bzad par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309b-5: gang ni sdug bsngal bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309b-6: gang ni mi bzad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309b-9: gang ni ngan song la gzhol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309b-11: gang ni ngan song la bab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309b-12: ngas gang ni ngan song las drangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309b-13: mtho ris dang thar pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309b-15: gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ma skyes pa ni bskyed par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309b-16: gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag ni yongs su smin par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309b-17: gang gi yongs su smin pa ni rnam par grol bar bya zhes ye shes gzigs pa 'jug par mdzad do; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309b-18: mo'u dgal gyi bu song la nga'i tshig gi rgyal po gzugs can snying po la nad med par gyur cig ces byos la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309b-19: 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bya ba gang yin pa de ngas khyod la mdzad zin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309b-20: khyod sems can dmyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309b-22: yi dvags rnams nas ni rkang pa drangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309b-23: lha dang mi rnams su ni rab tu bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:309b-25: khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310a-2: ngan song rnams kyi sgo ni bcad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310a-3: mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310a-4: 'on kyang khyod nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba; 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310a-5: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag khyod nyid kyis byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310a-6: rgyal po chen po las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310a-9: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310a-10: skye mched rnams kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310a-11: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310a-12: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310a-13: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310a-15: rgyal po chen po de lta bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310a-16: las kyi skyabs can du gyis shig ces gsung ngo zhes byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310a-17: btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310a-18: ji ltar sems gnyam par bzhag na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las mi snang bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310a-19: phyag sbal du rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i mdun du 'dug pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310b-1: rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310b-2: khyod nad med par gyur cig ces gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310b-3: btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310b-4: rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310b-6: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bya ba gang yin pa de ngas khyod la mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310b-7: khyod sems can dmyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310b-9: yi dvags rnams nas ni rkang pa drangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310b-11: mi rnams su ni rab tu bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310b-13: khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310b-14: rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310b-15: ngan song rnams kyi sgo ni bcad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310b-16: mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310b-17: 'on kyang khyod nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310b-18: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag khyod kyis byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310b-19: rgyal po chen po las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:310b-24: mi dge ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dag ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311a-0: @311a *// rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311a-2: rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis las kyi skyabs can du gyis shig ces gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311a-3: de phyag sbal du bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311a-4: spu gris rkang pa dras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311a-6: btung ba dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311a-7: btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gang na kha zas bzang po 'tshal lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311a-9: rgyal po chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams na'o zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311a-10: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311a-11: phyag sbal de nas mi snang bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311a-12: bya rgod kyi phung po la phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311a-13: ma skyes dgra'i bu 'char byed bzang po'i mdzub mo la phol mig byung bas de ngu bar gyur nas ma skyes dgra drung du song ste des de phang par bzhag nas mgul nas 'khyud /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311a-14: 'o byas kun tu 'khyud na 'on kyang de ngu ste 'dug tu mi btub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311a-15: de nas ma skyes dgras de'i mdzub mo khar bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311a-16: phol mig khar rdol nas ma skyes dgras rnag khrag sa la pho'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311a-17: gzhon nu 'char byed bzang pos rnag khrag de mthong nas lhag par ngu bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311a-18: btsun mo lus 'phags mas mdzub phyung ba ma skyes dgras mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311a-21: bu nad 'di ni khyed kyi yab mes brgyud de 'ongs pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311b-0: khyod @311b kyang de ltar gyur pa na khyod kyi yab kyis mdzub mo khar bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311b-1: phol mig rdol nas khyod mi du bar bya ba'i phyir rnag khrag sa lam pho bar khong du mid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311b-3: yum bdag gi yab 'di 'dra bar byams par gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311b-6: de nas ma skyes dgra pha la zhe sdang gi kun nas dkris pa dang bral zhing rjes su chags pa skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311b-7: des blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311b-8: shes ldan dag gang zhig nga la rgyal po bgres po gson no zhes zer ba de la ngas rgyal srid phyed sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311b-9: rgyal po de la grong mi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311b-10: yul mi rnams dga' ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311b-11: skye bo'i tshogs chen pos phyag sbal logs su brgyugs pa'i sgra /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311b-12: rgyal pos thos nas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311b-13: de ni gnod pa mi bzad pa ci zhig byed par 'gyur ro snyam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311b-14: skrag nas shugs nar zhes phyung ste shi ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311b-15: rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i bur skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311b-16: pang du 'dug nas lha'i bdud rtsir longs spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311b-17: rnam thos kyi bus smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311b-19: des bdag ni rgyal ba khyu mchog lags so zhes smras pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311b-20: de'i ming rgyal ba khyu mchog rgyal ba khyu mchog ces grags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311b-21: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311b-22: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:311b-23: btsun pa rgyal po gzugs can snying pos las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes par gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas bden pa mthong bar @312a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312a-2: sbu [*spu] gris sug pa rkang pa dras te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312a-3: phyag stsal du stsal cing bkres pa dang skom pas gzir nas gum par 'gyur lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312a-5: dge slong dag rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312a-7: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312a-8: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312a-9: gzugs can snying pos las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312a-10: dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312a-13: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312a-15: mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312a-17: skye mched rnams kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312a-18: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312a-19: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312a-20: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312a-22: dge slong dag sngon byung ba sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312a-23: ngan pa la snying brtse ba can pas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312a-24: 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312b-0: ji tsam na rang sangs @312b rgyas zhig ljongs rgyu zhing spyod pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312b-1: w'a ra n'a sir phyin nas w'a ra n'a si'i rdza mkhan zhig gi las khang du nub mo nye bar brten te gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312b-2: mgron pa zhig kyang las khang de nyid du gnas btab pa las der mgron pa des bshang ba byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312b-3: nub mo nyid langs te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312b-5: rang sangs rgyas rnams ni mi bsams par ye shes mthong ba mi 'jug pa yin pas rang sangs rgyas kyis 'di nyid du bsod snyoms spyad par bya'o snyam nas de nyid du 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312b-6: ji tsam rdza mkhan nam nangs nas las kyi khang par zhugs na mi gtsang bas ma rung bar byas pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312b-7: mi phal pa rnams ni mi rtog pa yin pas de rang sangs rgyas la sems rab tu gdug par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312b-8: de sems rab tu sngar bas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312b-9: rab tu byung ba khyod kyi rkang pa gnyis la spu gris dras sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312b-10: ci na gang gi phyir khyod kyis las khang du bshang ba byas kyi phyi rol du ma song /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312b-11: des de sgo bcad nas 'di nyid du skom pa dang bkres pas shi zhig ces bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312b-12: bdag nyid chen po des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312b-14: gal te bdag gis sgo phye ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312b-15: song bar gyur na lhag par yang nyams par 'gyur ro snyam nas de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312b-16: ji tsam na rdza mkhan dro'i dus la bab nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312b-17: de'i zhe sdang gi kun nas dkris pa dang bral nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312b-19: kye rab tu byung ba gdugs tshod gsol gyis tshur spyon /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:312b-20: rang sangs rgyas kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313a-0: bzhin bzang kho bo dus su longs spyod @313a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313a-1: pa yin pa las dus las yol zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313a-3: gal te de lta na 'di nyid du bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313a-4: sang bshos gsol la gshegs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313a-5: des de la snying brtse ba'i phyir khas blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313a-6: des de phyi de nyin par kha zas bsod pas tshim par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313a-7: bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyis chos ston gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313a-9: des steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313a-13: glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313a-14: so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas des shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313a-15: yon gnas chen po mar spyon mar spyon bdag 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba lag nas drang du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313a-16: de babs pa dang des de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smon lam btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313a-17: bdag gi sa yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa bgyis pa'i las gang lags pa de'i skal ba can du ma gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313a-18: bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag phyug cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313a-19: nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313a-20: 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par bgyid kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313a-21: mi mnyes par mi bgyid par 'gyur zhing 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob par gyur cig ces byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313a-22: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313b-0: de'i tshe @313b de'i dus kyi rdza mkhan gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313b-1: gzugs can snying po 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313b-2: rang sangs rgyas la sems rab tu gdug pas ngag rtsub pa'i las phyung ba gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas spu gris rkang pa gnyis dras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313b-3: phyag sbal du bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313b-4: skom pa dang bkres pas shi ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313b-6: smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas phyug ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313b-7: rgyal po'i rigs su skyes nas kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313b-8: nga'i spyan snga nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du thob par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313b-9: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313b-10: gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313b-11: 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313b-12: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs te las gcig tu dkar ba la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313b-13: dge slong dag khyed kyi de lta bu la bslab par bya'o ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313b-16: blon po rnams kyis ma skyes dgra la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313b-17: lha rgyal po bgres po ni nongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313b-18: des thos nas brgyal te sa la 'gyel ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313b-19: chus gtor nas dbugs slar phyung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:313b-20: mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314a-0: de'i mya ngan bsal bar sus kyang mi @314a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314a-2: blon po rnams kyis de'i mya ngan bsal bar btsal bar brtsams pa las ji tsam na lho phyogs nas gar mkhan zhig 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314a-3: blon po rnams kyis de de'i mdun du gar byed du bcug kyang ma skyes dgra yid mi bde ba nyid pas sus kyang de la legs so zhes bya ba ma byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314a-4: gar mkhan phyir byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314a-6: des bcom ldan 'das mthong nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314a-7: skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu dag la byas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314a-8: des bdag la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa zhig snyam se /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314a-9: de bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad pas rdza rnga chen po brdungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314a-11: chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314a-12: zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314a-16: btsod ka dag byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314a-17: kha cig ni steng du 'gro la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314a-18: gang dag 'og tu dong ba de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314b-0: padma ltar gas pa chen @314b por song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314b-1: sems can dmyal ba tsha ba dag gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314b-3: sems can dmyal ba grang ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314b-4: des sems can dmyal ba de dag gi gnod pa'i bye brag de dag rgyun gcod par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314b-5: de dag 'di snyam du shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314b-6: 'on te gzhan du skyes snyam du sems so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314b-7: de dag dad pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa gtong bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314b-9: de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314b-10: shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin la gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314b-11: 'di ltar sems can sngon ma mthong ba 'di'i mthus bdag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun bcad par gyur to snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314b-12: de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314b-13: sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314b-14: gang du bden pa dag gi snod du gyur par 'gyur ba'i lha dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314b-15: mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba len par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:314b-16: gang dag steng du 'dong ba de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315a-11: 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315a-15: bdag med pa zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315a-16: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315a-17: brtsams par bya zhing 'byung bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315a-18: sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315a-19: 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315a-20: 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315a-21: gang zhig rab tu bag yod par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315a-23: skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315a-24: sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315a-25: zhes bya ba yang sgrogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315a-26: de nas 'od zer de dag gi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315a-27: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'gro ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315a-28: de la gal te bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315a-29: ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315a-31: sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315a-32: zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315a-33: dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315b-0: yi dvags su skye bar @315b lung ston bar bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315b-1: zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315b-2: mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315b-4: stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315b-5: phyag mthil g-yon par nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315b-6: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315b-7: phyag mthil g-yas par nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315b-8: lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315b-10: nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315b-12: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315b-14: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315b-15: de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spur nub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315b-17: kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315b-18: tshogs rnams zhal gyi sgo nas byung gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315b-19: ji ltar gdugs ni shar bar gyur pa bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315b-20: de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315b-21: yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315b-22: rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315b-23: sangs rgyas 'gro nang mchog gi rgyur gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315b-24: rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:315b-25: rtsa lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316a-0: de slad brtan pa nyid blos dus @316a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316a-2: rgyal ba'i dbang po thub pa skyes kyi mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316a-3: nyan par 'tshal ba nyan pa po rnams kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316a-4: the tshom skyes pa gsung tshig bstan pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316a-5: dam pa bzang po dag gis bsal du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316a-6: tsha chu ri dbang lta bur brtan pa'i mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316a-7: rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams glo bur 'dzum mi ston //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316a-8: brtan pa ci slad 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316a-9: skye bo phal chen 'di dag de nyan 'tshal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316a-10: kun dga' bo khyod kyis gar mkhan nga la sems mngon par dad par byas nas rdza rnga chen po rdung bar byed pa de mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316a-11: btsun pa de mthong lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316a-12: kun dga' bo gar mkhan de sems bskyed pa des rang sangs rgyas rnga sgra zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316a-13: de'i sbyin pa'i chos ni 'di yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316a-14: nga la sems dad par byas pa gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316a-15: lhas byin gyis ma skyes dgra la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316a-16: kho bos khyod rgyal srid la bzhag pa yin gyi khyod kyis kyang kho bo sangs rgyas nyid du skos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316a-18: bcom ldan 'das ni sku gser gyi kha dog nyid du 'dug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316a-19: re zhig dang por gser gyi kha dog nyid med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316a-21: kho bo yang gser gyi kha dog tu snang bar 'gyur ro zhes des gser mgar bkug nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316a-22: kho bo'i lus gser gyis g-yogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316a-24: 'phags pa gal te tshor ba mnags phod na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316a-26: khyod kyis g-yogs shig dang phod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316b-0: des tsan tsu @316b zhes bya ba'i 'bru mar gyis lus byugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316b-1: gser gyi gyim phag gis lus g-yogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316b-2: de sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha ba rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316b-3: dge slong rnams kyis ko ka li ka la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316b-6: phyogs che ge mo zhig na gser gyi kha dog tu snang bar bsgyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316b-7: dge slong rnams phyogs der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316b-8: de rnams kyis de sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen te ku co 'don pa thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316b-9: de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316b-10: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316b-12: btsun pa lhas byin gyis gser gyi kha dog don du gnyer ba sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha ba rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316b-14: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316b-15: ji ltar 'di 'das pa'i dus na yang gser gyi zhva don du gnyer ba'i phyir tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316b-16: dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316b-17: khyo lam ring por song ba'i bud med cig yod pa de'i mdun du bya rog cig skad snyan par 'byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316b-21: gal te bdag gi khyim thab bde bar 'khor na gser gyi zhva zhig sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:316b-22: ji tsam na de'i khyim thab de yang bde bar slar 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317a-1: rog de gser gyi zhva'i ched du de'i mdun du 'dug nas skad snyan par phyung ba dang de nas de la gser gyi zhva zhig byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317a-2: des de gyon nas phan tshun du lding ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317a-3: de gser gyi zhva'i phyir bya khras mgo bcad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317a-4: lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317a-5: don med gzhi dang ldan pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317a-6: nor ni phung bar 'gyur ba ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317a-7: gang gi mgo la gser yod pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317a-8: bya rog gis ni phung byed btsal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317a-10: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317a-11: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bya rog gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317a-12: de na yang 'di gser gyi rgyus tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317a-13: da ltar yang 'di gser gyi kha dog don du gnyer ba'i phyir sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha ba rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317a-14: gzhan yang lhas byin gyis ma skyes dgra la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317a-15: kho bos ni khyod rgyal srid la bzhag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317a-16: khyod kyis kyang kho bo sangs rgyas nyid du chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil la ni 'khor lo'i mtshan gyis mtshan pa'i rtags yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317a-19: khyod kyi rkang pa'i mthil la ni 'khor lo'i mtshan gyis mtshan pa'i rtags med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317a-21: kho bos kyang rkang pa'i mthil la 'khor lo'i rtags bsgrub par bya'o zhes des lcags mgar rnams bkug nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317a-22: kho bo'i rkang mthil la 'khor lo 'dri nus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317b-0: de rnams kyis smras @317b pa; 'phags pa gal te tshor ba mnags phod na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317b-4: 'di mthu dang ldan pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317b-5: gal te 'di bzhin du bris na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317b-6: rdog pas bdag cag srog dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de ni yod do snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317b-7: de rnams kyis rtsig pa 'bigs su bcug nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317b-8: 'phags pa rtsig pa'i bu gu 'dir rkang pa gnyis chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317b-9: des rtsig pa'i bu gar rkang pa gnyis bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317b-10: lcags mgar rnams kyis 'khor lo me'i kha dog tu 'dug par byas nas rkang pa bsregs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317b-11: de sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha ba rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317b-12: dge slong rnams kyis ko ka li ka la dris pa lhas byin gang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317b-13: phyogs ga ge mo zhig na rkang pa'i mthil la 'khor lo'i rtags bsgrub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317b-14: dge slong rnams phyogs der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317b-15: de rnams kyis sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen cing ku co 'don pa thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317b-16: de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317b-17: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317b-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317b-19: btsun pa lhas byin rkang pa'i mthil la 'khor lo'i rtags don du gnyer bas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha ba rtsub pa yid du mi mchi ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:317b-21: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318a-1: dus na yang 'di rkang rjes kyi phyir tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318a-2: dge slong dag sngon byung ba gangs can la glang po che zhig yod pa chu 'thung du 'babs pa de'i phyi bzhin wa zhig kyang babs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318a-3: des glang po che'i rjes mthong nas bdag nyid kyi gom pas gzhal bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318a-5: rjes 'di ni bdag gi yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318a-6: zhes de mchong zhing mchong zhing rjes kyi steng du rkang pa 'jog pa na sdong dum khye'u ka zhig gi steng du rdeg 'chos par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318a-7: lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318a-8: mdor na glang chen rkang rjes dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318a-9: blun po khyod rjes mi 'dra yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318a-10: don med blo 'di spong byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318a-11: ngal ba thob par gyur ta re //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318a-12: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318a-13: de na yang 'di rkang rjes kyi phyir tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318a-14: da ltar yang 'di rkang mthil la 'khor lo'i rtags don du gnyer ba'i phyir sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha ba rtsub pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318a-15: yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318a-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la gnod sbyin kum bhi ri'i gnas na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318a-17: lhas byin gyis yang ma skyes dgra la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318a-18: kho bos khyod ni rgyal srid la bzhag na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318b-0: khyod kyis kho bo sangs rgyas su gzhug ma nus kyi da ni kho bos dge sbyong go'u ta ma srog dang bral gyis khyod @318b kyis sus bsad dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318b-1: gang du bsad ma smra shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318b-4: ji tsam nas lho phyogs nas 'khrul 'khor gyi sgyu rtsal gyi slob dpon zhig 'ongs nas lhas byin gyis de bkug ste; smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318b-5: kye slob dpon khyod kyis mi lnga brgyas 'phen pa de lta bu'i sgyogs nus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318b-8: des de la mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba byin zhing mi stong gi gla yang byin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318b-9: gnas gang na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de'i drang thad kyi bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i steng der sgyogs chos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318b-10: sgyogs 'phen pa'i mi lnga brgya po de dag kyang 'khod du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318b-11: gnas gzhan zhig tu nyis brgya lnga bcu 'khod du bcug nas bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318b-12: khyed cag gal te dge sbyong go'u ta ma sgyogs kyis ma gsod na khyod kyis gsod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318b-13: de'i don du gnas gzhan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318b-15: mi rnams 'khod du bcug nas thams cad la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318b-16: khyed cag gang gi sgor dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'ongs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318b-18: bdag nyid kyang phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug nas 'di rnams kyis shor dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318b-19: bdag nyid kyis gsod snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318b-20: ji tsam na mi lnga brgyas sgyogs 'phang bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318b-23: ci tsam na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shod na bzhugs pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:318b-25: shes ldan dag bdag cag rang gi srog btang ba ni bla'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319a-0: lha dang mis mchod pa'i sangs @319a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319a-1: rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrongs pa ni de lta ma yin gyis sgyogs por ro zhes de rnams kyis sgyogs por nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319a-2: bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la phan tshun du rgyu zhing gnas gang zhig nas babs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319a-3: lhas byin gyis mi mthong bar 'gyur snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319a-4: de rnams kyis bsams pa bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs su chud nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319a-5: them skas shig sprul pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319a-6: de rnams kyis them skas de mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319a-8: shes ldan dag them skas 'di sus btsugs snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319a-9: de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus yin no snyam nas de rnams lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319a-10: them skas de las babs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319a-11: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyang de dag gdul ba kho na la bltos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319a-13: bya rgod phung po'i ri la 'chag cing bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319a-14: de nas de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319a-15: chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan snga na 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319a-17: khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas gang thos pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319b-0: de rnams kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i @319b 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319b-2: lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319b-3: btsun pa bdag cag la pas ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319b-5: rgyal pos ma lags lha rnams kyis ma lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319b-8: gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319b-9: sngon gyi 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319b-11: bram ze rnams kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319b-14: yi dvags rnams nas ni rkang pa drangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319b-15: lha dang mi rnams su ni rab tu bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319b-17: khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319b-18: rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319b-19: ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bkum /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319b-20: mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319b-21: thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319b-22: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319b-23: btsun pa bdag cag ni 'phags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319b-25: bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319b-27: deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:319b-28: skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so zhes gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams blang @320a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320a-2: 'khrul 'khor gyi sgyu rtsal gyi slob dpon yang 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrongs par byed pa yin no snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320a-3: de rnams kyi phyi bzhin them skas las babs nas mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba khyer te bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320a-4: lhas byin ni rngo ba 'phen par dga' bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320a-5: yang dang yang du lta ba na ma 'phangs so snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320a-6: rang nyid kyis mi lnga brgya po gzhan khrid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320a-7: bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dzeg par brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320a-8: mi lnga brgya po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos nyan par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320a-9: mthong nas kyang lhag par yang mi bzod pa skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320a-10: phyogs gzhan zhig nas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dzeg pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320a-11: ji tsam na 'khrul 'khor gyi slob dpon yang bros par mthong nas de rang nyid kyis 'khor lnga brgya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320a-14: nga nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su sgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320a-15: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320a-16: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320a-17: nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320a-18: gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur snyam du dgongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320a-19: mi lnga brgya po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320a-20: shes ldan dag lhas byin kun nas dkris pa drag po la gnas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320a-21: bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dzeg gis deng zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320a-22: 'di dag ni nga'i las yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320b-0: de nas mi lnga @320b brgya po de dag bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320b-1: lha rnams kyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320b-2: de nas gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320b-3: lhas byin ni bcom ldan 'das bgrongs pa'i phyir pha rol tu gnod pa byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320b-5: gnod sbyin kum bi ra gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320b-6: gnod sbyin kum bi ra la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320b-7: lhas byin ni bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la sgyogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la rdo 'phen par rtsom pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320b-8: bcom ldan 'das ni khyod kyi gnas na bzhugs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320b-9: de la kho bos 'bad de rdo ba bar snang la rdo rjes phye mar brlag na gal te na phye mar brlags pa'i dum bu bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du 'bab par 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis ni bla gab med pa na bzhugs bzhugs nas ri'i phug tu gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320b-14: lhas byin 'khor lnga brgya pos sgyogs drangs te bcom ldan 'das la rdo ba 'phang so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320b-15: gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje'i rdo rjes phye mar byas pa las de'i phyed bcom ldan 'das kyi gnas su lhung du cha ba gnod sbyin kum bi ras legs par ma zin pas des bsad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320b-16: rdo ba'i dum bu yar ba zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la rma byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320b-18: gang du gnas na las kyis mi rdzi ba'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320b-19: sa phyogs de ni yod pa ma yin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:320b-20: bar snang nyid min rgya mtsho'i nang min zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321a-1: po'i phug tu zhugs pa'ang ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321a-2: gnod sbyin kum bi ra yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321a-3: dge ba'i sems kyis shi ste shi nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321a-4: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gya nom pa rnams kyi nang du skyes so;/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321a-6: lha'i bu mo ni skyes nas ring po ma lon par sems gsum skye bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321a-10: des gnod sbyin las shi 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gya nom pa rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321a-11: bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par byas pas yin par mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321a-12: de nas sngon gnod sbyin byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321a-13: zhag lon nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321a-14: bdag gi cha ma yin gyis ma la bdag gis zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321a-15: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321a-16: de nas sngon gnod sbyin byed pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dri ma med cing g-yo ba thogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321a-17: do shal dang se mo dos lus brgyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321a-18: de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha rnams kyi me tog autpa la dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321a-22: manda ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321a-23: bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321a-24: bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321b-0: @321b bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321b-2: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad pas sngon gnod sbyin byed byed pa'i lha'i bu 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321b-3: bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321b-4: btsun pa bdag la phas ma lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321b-9: rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321b-10: sngon gyi 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321b-11: dge sbyong dang bram zes ma lags pa gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321b-12: khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321b-13: rus pa'i ri bo dag las ni bsgral /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321b-14: ngan song rnams kyi sgo ni bkum /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321b-15: mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321b-16: lha dang mi rnams su ni bdag rab tu bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321b-18: khyod mthus nyes pa mang ldan mi bzad pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321b-19: ngan song lam bkag bsod nams bzang po yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321b-20: mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321b-21: mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang thob par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321b-22: khyod la brten nas shin tu rnam dag mig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321b-23: nyes bral dag pa de ring bdag gis thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321b-24: go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:321b-25: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322a-0: @322a *// 'gro ba lha min lha dang mis mchod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322a-1: skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322a-2: srid pa stong du mthong bar rab dka' ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322a-3: thub pa deng khyod mthong ba'i 'bras bu mchis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322a-4: de nas do shal rab 'phyang dga' gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322a-5: zhabs gnyis la ni mngon par phyag 'tshal nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322a-6: dgra thul ba la g-yas nas bskor byas nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322a-7: lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322a-8: de nas sngon gnod sbyin byed byed pa'i lha'i bu tshong ba khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322a-9: zhing pa lo tog legs pa lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322a-10: dpa' bo g-yul las rgyal ba lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322a-11: nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar pa lta bur 'byor ba gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322a-12: dge slong rnams nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson pas gnas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322a-13: de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na snang ba rgya chen po de mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322a-14: mthong nas the tshom zos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322a-17: mdang gsum bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322a-18: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322a-19: 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi mchis lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322a-21: dge slong dag nga blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322a-22: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322a-23: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322b-0: 'jig @322b rten skyong ba bzhi yang ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322b-1: de lta mod kyi lha sbyin nga bsad pa'i phyir 'bad pas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las sgyogs kyi rdo 'phangs pa gang yin pa de bar snang nyid la gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes phye mar byas pa de'i phyed nga'i steng du lhung ba gnod sbyin kum bi ras bzung nyes pas de des bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322b-2: nga la sems mngon par dad nas shi bas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gya nom pa rnams kyi nang du skyes pa yin te de mdang gsum nga'i spyan sngar 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322b-3: ngas de la chos bshad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322b-4: bden pa mthong bar byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322b-5: rang gi gnas su song ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322b-6: dge slong dag de lta bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322b-7: las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322b-8: gcig tu dkar pa rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322b-9: 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322b-10: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag rnams dang 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322b-11: las gcig tu dkar ba la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322b-12: dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322b-13: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322b-14: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322b-15: btsun pa gnod sbyin kum bi ras bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du bdag nyid yongs su btang ba la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322b-17: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:322b-18: ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis nga'i phyir bdag nyid yongs su btang ba de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323a-0: dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor @323a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323a-4: lo legs pa skye bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323a-5: mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323a-6: de'i tshe grong khyer w'a ra n'a si dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na yod pa'i bsti gnas rtsa ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323a-8: chu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323a-9: bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323a-10: drang srong dka' thub drag po spyod pa chu dang rtsa ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323a-12: pags pa dang shing shun gyon pa zhig gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323a-13: de'i bsti gnas kyi nye 'khor na rngon pa zhig ri dvags bsad cing 'tsho bar byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323a-14: de dus su drang srong de'i gan du 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323a-15: drang srong des kyang rngon pa 'dis bdag gi nye 'khor na gnas pa'i ri dvags rnams gsod par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir de ngal sos nas rtsa ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323a-17: de gnyis gcig la gcig pha dang bu'i 'du shes skyes par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323a-18: rngon pas ni drang srong la pha zhes tshig tu 'bod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323a-19: drang srong gis kyang rngon pa la bu zhes 'bod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323a-20: ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po tshangs sbyin nang par sngar langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323a-21: ri dvags shor du phyir byung ba des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323a-22: ri dvags shig la mdas shi gsor du bsnun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323a-23: drang srong de'i bsti gnas su zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323a-24: der yang rgyal pos lcags mdas gnad du bsnun pas shi bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323a-25: de nas drang srong de khro ba'i kun nas dkris pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323a-26: rgyal po khyod ni phung dkrol spyod pa ngan pa zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323b-0: des na ri dvags nga la skyabs su 'ongs pa @323b bsad do zhes de skad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323b-1: rgyal po zhe sdang gi kun nas dkris pa la zhen pa'i blos blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323b-2: shes ldan dag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la kha tshas zer ba gang yin pa de la chad pa cis bcad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323b-3: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323b-4: lha chad pa dgum lags mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323b-6: gal te de lta na drang srong 'di ngas yongs su spangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323b-7: blon po rnams kyis drang srong gsad par brtsams pa na stes dbang gis rngon pa de yang drang srong de'i nye 'khor na 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323b-9: bdag gson bzhin du drang srong ci'i phyir gsod du gzhug snyam nas nges g-yul 'gyed par brtsams pa na drang srong de bros nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323b-10: dpung chen po'i tshogs kyis de bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323b-12: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323b-13: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323b-14: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rngon pa gang yin pa de ni gnod sbyin kum bi ra 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323b-15: de na yang 'dis nga'i phyir bdag nyid yongs su btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323b-16: da ltar yang 'dis nga'i phyir bdag nyid yongs su btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la rdo ba'i dum bus rma byung ba khrag chad du ma btub nas de bzhin du 'dzag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323b-18: sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed bcom ldan 'das gyi snyun brtag pa'i phyir dus gsum du spyan sngar 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:323b-19: rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye ba'i tshogs dad pa can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324a-0: yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba @324a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324a-1: dang ldan pa nor can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324a-4: de na kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324a-5: 'tsho byed sman 'di ni de la bzang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324a-7: 'di ni de bas kyang bzang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324a-8: sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324a-9: 'di la mod la gdangs par 'gyur ba'i sman yod mod kyi de ni rnyed par dka'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324a-10: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324a-13: tsan dan sa mchog yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324a-14: de'i tshe tsan dan sa mchog rnyed pa nyid med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324a-15: ji tsam na tshong dpon zhig yod pas 'di ltar bdag gis tsan dan sa mchog dus dus su btsongs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324a-16: rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di ni gtum pa brlang pa gzu lums can yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324a-17: gal te ma stes te de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324a-18: tsan dan sa mchog dgos par gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324a-19: de ma rnyed na gdon mi za bar mgo gcod par yang 'gyur ro snyam nas tsan dan sa mchog bsris te bzhag pa zhig yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324a-20: des sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi snyun la ni tsan dan sa mchog gis gdangs par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324a-21: zhes bstan pa thos nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324a-22: ma skyes dgra 'di lhas byin gyis sbad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324a-23: bcom ldan 'das la zhe 'gras pa'i blo yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324a-24: gal te bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la tsan dan sa mchog phul na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324a-25: bdag la gnod pa byed pa'i gnas gang yin pa de yod snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324b-0: bcom @324b ldan 'das ni lha dang mis mchod pa yin pas gal te de'i don du srog dang phral na yang phral du zad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324b-1: ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la tsan dan sa mchog dbul lo snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324b-2: de nas tsan dan sa mchog khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas zhabs la gtugs te gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324b-4: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la tsan dan sa mchog gis bgyi ba mchis par glo bar chud na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bar dgongs te 'di bzhes su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324b-7: kun dga' bo bdag nyid chen po 'di nyid las tsan dan sa mchog long zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324b-8: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324b-9: de nas tshong pa de dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324b-14: chos nyid kyis gnag gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:324b-21: gang dag 'og tu 'gro ba dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325a-7: padma ltar gas pa chen por song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325a-8: sems can dmyal ba tsha ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325a-10: sems can dmyal ba grang ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325a-12: des sems can dmyal ba de dag gi gnod ba'i bye brag dag rgyun gcod par byed cing de dag 'di snyam du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325a-13: shes ldan dag ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes snyam du sems so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325a-14: de dag dad pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa gtong bar mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325a-15: de dag gis sprul ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325a-17: shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin la gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325a-18: 'di ltar sems can sngon ma mthong ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun chad par gyur to snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325a-19: de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325a-20: sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas gang du bden pa dag gi snod du gyur par 'gyur ba'i lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nyid mtshams sbyor ba len par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325a-21: gang dag steng du 'gro ba de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325b-17: 'og min lha rnams kyi nang du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325b-21: bdag med pa zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs par byed cing tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325b-22: brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325b-23: sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya; ;'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325b-24: 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325b-25: gang zhig rab tu bag yod par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325b-27: skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325b-28: sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325b-29: zhes bya ba yang sgrogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325b-30: de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325b-31: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'gro ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325b-32: de la gal te bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325b-33: bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325b-34: ma 'ongs pa lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325b-36: sems can dmyal bar skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325b-37: zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:325b-38: dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-1: yi dvags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-2: zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-3: mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-5: stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-6: phyag g-yon pa'i mthil du nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-7: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-8: phyag g-yas pa'i mthil du nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-9: lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-11: nyan thos kyis byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-13: rang sangs rgyas su lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-15: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-16: gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-17: de nas 'od zer de dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-18: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-19: mdzod spur nub par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-20: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-22: kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-23: tshogs rnams zhal gyis sgo nas byung gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-24: ji ltar gdugs ni shar bar gyur pa bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-25: de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-26: yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-27: rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326a-28: sangs rgyas 'gro nang mchog gi rgyur gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326b-0: @326b rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326b-1: rtsa lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326b-2: de slad brtan pa nyid blos dus mkhyen nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326b-3: rgyal ba'i dbang po thub pa skyes kyi mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326b-4: nyan par 'tshal ba nyan pa po rnams kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326b-5: the tshom skyes pa gsung tshig bstan pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326b-6: dam pa bzang po dag gis bsal du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326b-7: tsha chu ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa'i mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326b-8: rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams glo bur 'dzum mi ston //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326b-9: bstan pa ji slad 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326b-10: skye bo phal chen 'di dag de nyan 'tshal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326b-11: kun dga' bo de de bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326b-14: kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la tshong pas sems mngon par dad par byas nas tsan dan sa mchog phul ba gang yin pa de mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326b-16: kun dga' bo tshong pa de dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326b-17: sems bskyed pa dang sbyin pa'i chos yongs su btang ba des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326b-18: rang sangs rgyas tsan dan zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326b-19: de'i sbyin pa'i chos ni 'di yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326b-20: nga la sems dad par byas pa gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326b-21: 'on kyang khrag de chad du ma btub nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326b-24: da ni bud med gzhon nu'i 'o mas gdab 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:326b-25: dge slong rnams kyis bud med gzhon nu ci 'dra ba zhig ma shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327a-0: bu thon bu btsas pa gang @327a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327a-1: yin pa de ni bud med gzhon nur 'dod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327a-2: de'i 'o ma gang yin pa de ni bud med gzhon nu'i 'o ma zhes bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327a-3: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lhas byin dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327a-4: lhas byin gyi phyogs ma gtogs par 'khor bzhi po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327a-9: rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye ba'i tshogs phal cher la yang bsgo nas thams cad kyis bud med gzhon nu'i 'o ma btsal bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327a-11: skye bo'i tshogs rnams tshol ba na de rnams kyis thabs yod yod kyis gegs byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327a-12: ji tsam na rgyal po'i khab na bu thon bu btsas pa'i bud med gzhon nu 'o ma nyung ste rang gi bu yang 'o mas mi ngoms na gzhan la sbyin tu lta ga la yod pa zhig 'dug pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327a-13: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das la bud med gzhon nu'i 'o ma'i dgos pa byung ba thos nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327a-14: gal te phul na ni bdag gis bu nyam chung bas 'o ma med na 'chi bar 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327a-15: nyes dmigs de 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi gzhan 'di yang yod de lhas byin bcom ldan 'das la yun ring po nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327a-16: phyir rgol ba dgrar gyur pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327a-17: des sbad pa ni rgyal po ma skyes dgra yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327a-18: lhas byin gyi phyogs ko ka li ka dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327a-20: ka ta mo ra ka ti shya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327b-0: 'di dag gis kyang gdon mi za bar gsad par 'gyur ro snyam @327b mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327b-3: bu dang bral ba ni bla'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327b-4: lha dang mis mchod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snyun gyis 'o brgyal ba'i tshor ba sku nyams su bstar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327b-5: de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad 'khrugs par gyur pa ni de lta ma yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327b-6: ma la bdag gis 'o ma khyer la 'gro'o snyam ste de bcom ldan 'das la sems shin tu dad par byas nas snod sar par 'o ma bzhos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327b-7: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327b-11: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'tsho byed kyis bud med gzhon nu'i 'o ma bsten par bdag gis 'tshal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327b-12: bdag rjes su gzung ba'i slad du bud med gzhon nu'i 'o ma 'di bzhes su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327b-14: kun dga' bo bsam pa bzang po can gyi bu mo 'di las 'o ma long zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327b-16: des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327b-19: chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:327b-24: kha cig ni steng du 'gro la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328a-0: gang dag 'og tu 'gro ba de dag ni sems can dmyal @328a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328a-16: padma ltar gas pa chen por song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328a-17: sems can dmyal ba tsha ba gang yin pa de dag tu bsil bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328a-19: sems can dmyal ba grang pa gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328a-20: des sems can dmyal ba de dag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun gcod par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328a-21: de dag 'di snyam du shes ldan dag ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328a-22: 'on te gzhan du skyes snyam du sems so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328a-23: de dag dad pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa gtong bar mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328a-24: de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328a-25: shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin la gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328a-26: 'di ltar sems can sngon ma mthong ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gis gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun chad par gyur to snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328a-27: de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328a-28: sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328a-29: gang du bden pa dag gi snod du 'gyur ba'i lha dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328b-0: mi rnams kyi nang du nyid mtshams @328b sbyor ba len par byed do ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328b-3: gang dag steng du 'gro ba de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328b-25: 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328b-29: bdag med pa zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs par byed cing tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328b-30: brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328b-31: sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328b-32: 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328b-33: 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328b-34: gang zhig rab tu bag yod par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328b-36: skye ba'i 'khor bar rab spangs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328b-37: sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328b-38: zhes bya ba yang sgrogs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328b-39: de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:328b-40: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329a-0: de la gal te bcom ldan 'das pa'i las lung ston @329a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub ba par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329a-3: ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329a-5: sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329a-6: zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329a-7: dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329a-9: yi dvags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329a-10: zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329a-11: mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329a-13: stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329a-14: phyag mthil g-yon par nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329a-15: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329a-16: phyag mthil g-yas par nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329a-17: lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329a-19: nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329a-21: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329a-23: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329a-24: de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spur nub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329a-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-0: kha dog @329b sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-1: tshogs rnams zhal gyi sgo nas byung gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-2: ji ltar gdugs ni shar bar gyur pa bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-3: de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-4: yang tshigs su bcad de gsol ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-5: rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-6: sangs rgyas 'gro nang mchog gi rgyur gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-7: rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-8: rtsa lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-9: de slad brtan pa nyid blos dus mkhyen nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-10: rgyal ba'i dbang po thub pa skyes kyi mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-11: nyan par 'tshal ba nyan pa po rnams kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-12: the tshom skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-13: dam pa bzang po dag gis bsal du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-14: tsha chu ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa'i mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-15: rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams glo bur 'dzum mi ston //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-16: brtan pa ji slad 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-17: skye bo phal chen 'di dag de nyan 'tshal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-19: kun dga' bo khyod kyis nga la bud med kyis sems mngon par dad par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-20: bud med gzhon nu'i 'o ma phul ba gang yin pa de mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-22: kun dga' bo bu mo de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-24: sbyin pa'i chos yongs su btang ba des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-25: rang sangs rgyas 'o ma sbyin pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-26: de'i sbyin pa'i chos ni 'di yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-27: nga la sems mngon par dad pa gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:329b-28: 'on kyang khrag de chad du ma btub nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330a-3: khyim bdag dad pa can mang pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330a-4: bcom ldan 'das de ltar thugs mi bde'o zhes thos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330a-6: de na kha cig ni sman dag 'debs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330a-7: kha cig ni sngags kyi dpyad byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330a-8: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu ldan gyis bden pa gsol bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330a-9: bcom ldan khyed kyi thugs la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330a-10: sras dang dgra bo mtshungs shes na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330a-11: bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yis su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330a-13: bden pa gsol zin pa'i mod kho nar khrag de mi 'dzag par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330a-18: ka ta mo ra ka ti shya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330a-19: rgya mtshos byin rnams ma gtogs par dge slong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330a-23: rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs phal cher thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330a-24: bcom ldan 'das ni mkhyen bzhin du gang zhig ji ltar dpyad byed pa de la de bzhin du rjes su dgyes par mdzad de de rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330a-25: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330a-26: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330a-27: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu ldan gyis bden pa gsol pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyi khrag 'dzag pa chad par gyur pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330b-0: bcom ldan @330b kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330b-1: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nga dug 'bags nas kun tu 'khrugs par gyur pa na 'dis dug zhi bar byas pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330b-2: dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri bor dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330b-3: skyed mos tshal rtsa ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330b-6: chu phun sum tshogs pa bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330b-7: de na drang srong chu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330b-8: rtsa ba dang 'bras bu longs spyod pa pags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330b-9: shing shun gyon pa rig sngags dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330b-10: gsang sngags 'chang ba zhig gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330b-11: ri bor de na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330b-12: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330b-14: dga' mgur spyod par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330b-15: de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330b-16: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330b-17: dus gzhan zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330b-18: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330b-20: nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te ming btags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330b-21: de bskyed bsrings te chen por gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:330b-25: nyal ba na yang dge ba sems shing dge ba'i las byed pas de skye bo'i tshogs kyis chos 'dod ces bya bar ming btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331a-0: de dge ba ci yin zhes tshol ba'i phyir ni ri bor nas dus dus su drang srong de'i drung du 'gro zhing de la bsnyen bkur @331a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331a-2: dka' thub kyis drung du 'gro bas dka' thub ldan dka' thub ldan zhes byar yang grags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331a-3: de dus gzhan zhig na dug cig gis 'bags pa langs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331a-4: de la dug sman du ma dang sngags kyi sbyor bas dpyad byas na yang de'i nad de zhi bar ma gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331a-5: de'i pha dang ma gnyis drang srong de'i drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331a-6: drang srong chen po khyod kyi rim gro bgyid pa ni dug gis 'bags nas srog dang bral la thug gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331a-8: des bden pa gsol bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331a-9: bu gcig khyod kyi sems la ni //
