K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331a-10: dgra dang mdza' bo mtshungs shes na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331a-11: bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yis su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331a-12: khye'u khyod dug ni med par shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331a-13: des bden pa gsol ma thag kho nar dug zhi bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331a-14: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331a-15: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khye'u gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331a-16: drang srong gang yin pa de ni 'od srung stobs bcu ldan pa 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331a-17: de na yang 'dis bden pa gsol bas nga sos par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331a-18: da ltar yang 'di'i bden pa gsol bas nga sos par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331a-19: lhas byin sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331a-21: bdag gis dge sbyong go'u ta ma la rdo 'phangs pa ni don med pa zhig byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331a-22: dge sbyong go'u ta ma yang ma gsod la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331a-23: skye bo mang pos kyang rab tu shes par gyur to snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331b-0: de shing drung zhig tu song ste [?] sems khong du chud @331b cing skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331b-1: dge slong rnams gnas dang gnas rnams su btsun pa dag gzigs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331b-2: lhas byin 'di 'dra bar zhe gdug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331b-4: bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung ba de la yang pha rol gnon pas steng du rdo ba 'phen no zhes smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331b-6: kha ze ra bar byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331b-9: ka ta mo ra ka ti shya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331b-10: rgya mtshos sbyin rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331b-11: shes ldan dag ma brtags par byung rgyal du ci rdol lhas byin shing che ge mo zhes bya ba'i drung na bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ma mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331b-12: bdag nyid chen po de de lta bu byed par ga la 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331b-13: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331b-14: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331b-15: btsun pa ko ka li ka dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331b-17: ka ta mo ra ka ti shya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331b-18: rgya mtshos sbyin rnams bdag nyid ngo tsha ma mchis pas lhas byin ngo tsha ma mchis pa'i bsngags pa sgrogs pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331b-20: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de ji ltar 'das pa na yang ngo tsha med pa 'dis ngo tsha med pa'i bsngags pa smra ba de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:331b-21: dge slong dag sngon byung ba rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams dang rgyal pos dgos pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir khrims su bcas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-1: ni skyes pa rnams dor bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-2: gcig tu ni bud med rnams so zhes bcas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-3: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-5: de dur khrod gcig tu yang gnas skabs ma rnyed cing gnyis par yang ma rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-6: rgyal po'i khab kyi phyogs shig na skyed mos tshal rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-7: me tog phun sum tshogs pa bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-8: de na drang srong spyi cer chu dang rtsa ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-11: shing shun gyon pa zhig gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-12: phyogs de na yang zhing gru gsum zhig la shing ae ran da zhig skyes nas ma ning gi ro de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-14: ro de'i dri tshor nas wa zhig 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-15: des ma ning gi ro de bza' bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-16: bya rog cig kyang ae ran da'i kha na tshang bcas te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-18: wa la bsngags pa smras dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-19: gal te na zos pa'i lhag ma ster ro snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-20: des de la tshigs su bcad de bsngags pa smra bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-21: ji ltar khyod ni seng ge'i mgrin pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-22: ji ltar khyu mchog gshul dang ldan pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-23: ri dvags rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-24: gsol ba'i pham phabs las ni thugs dpag mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-25: was bltas te slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-26: bya yi rab mchog mkha' 'gro ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-27: phyogs kun gsal bar mdzad nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-28: rin chen sbram ltar mdzes gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332a-29: shing mchog rtsel [*rtse la] bzhugs 'di gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-1: skal ldan chen po lta ba'i phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-2: khyod kyi drung du bdag mchis te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-3: ri dvags rgyal khyod phyag 'tshal na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-4: gsol ba'i pham phabs thugs dpag mjod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-6: rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-7: pho rog lta na sdug pa khyod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-8: kun dga' byed pa rnams kyi gtso //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-9: ci bder gsol gyis mar spyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-10: de babs nas wa dang lhan cig ma ning gi ro la za bar byed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-11: drang srong gis mthong nas des tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-12: ljon shing tha chad grib ma la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-13: ngo tsha med par 'dus nas su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-14: tha chad rol longs spyod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-15: ae ma'o ring zhig lon nas mthong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-17: de ma bzod nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-18: 'di ltar seng ge rma bya dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-19: dam pa'i sha la longs spyod na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-20: gzhan gyis byin pas 'tsho ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-21: spyi cer 'dir ni ci zhig gtogs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-22: drang srong de yang mi bzod pa skyes nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-23: 'dab chags tha chad bya rog dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-24: rkang bzhi tha chad wa dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-25: ljon shing tha chad ae ran da //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-26: mi yi tha chad ma ning ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-27: zhing gi tha chad gru gsum ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-28: ngo tsha med rnams 'dus la ltos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-29: de nas bya rog lhag par yang mi bzod pa skyes nas drang srong gi me khang du zhugs te blta bar brtsams pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-30: ci yang mi snang nas ril pa spyi blugs bcag ste bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-31: ji tsam na drang srong de me khang du zhugs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:332b-32: ril pa chag pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-0: 'di ni bya rog gdug pa de'i las kyis @333a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-1: lags kyi gzhan ni su yang ma yin no snyam du rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-2: tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-4: ngo tsha med pa'i gdug sems kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-5: me khang ma rung byas nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-6: ril ba yang ni bcag par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-8: yong ye cung zad smra mi bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-9: blo gros ldan pas rtag tu ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-10: kha rog pas ni bde ba thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-11: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-12: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-13: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gang yin pa de ni lhas byin yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-14: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bya rog ni ko ga li ka yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-15: de na yang ngo tsha med pa de dag gis ngo tsha med pa'i bsngags pa brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-16: da ltar yang ngo tsha med pa 'di dag ngo tsha med pa'i sngags pa brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-17: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-18: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-20: lhas byin thog mar gang du mi mthun par gyur lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-22: dge slong dag sngon byung ba shang shang te'u gnyis lus gcig tu gyur nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram na gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-24: chos ma yin pa zhes bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-25: ji tsam na chos ma yin pa ni gnyid log /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-26: chos can mel tshe byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-27: des bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu zhig chus khyer ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333a-28: des de blangs te bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333b-0: ci re @333b zhig 'di yang bslang ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333b-3: ci zos kyang lus 'di gcig kho nas gso bar zad do snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333b-4: des de ma bslang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333b-7: chos can la bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i sgregs pa byung ba chos ma yin pas tshor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333b-8: des smras pa de gang gi sgregs pa yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333b-13: khyod gnyid log pa na kho bos bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu rnyed nas lus gcig kho na gso bar zad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333b-14: snyam nas khyod ma bslang par kho bos zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333b-16: khyod kyis ma legs pa zhig byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333b-17: ngas kyang dus shes par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333b-18: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333b-19: chos can gnyid log nas chos ma yin pa mel tshe byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333b-20: des dug gi 'bras bu chus khyer ba zhig mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333b-22: de gnyi ga brgyal bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333b-23: chos ma yin pa dug gi 'bras bu kun nas 'khrugs pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333b-24: gang dang gang du skyes pa'i tshe rabs de dang de dag tu khyod la gsod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333b-28: bdag kyang gang dang gang du skyes pa'i tshe rabs de dang de dag tu khyod la byams pa bsgrub par gyur cig ces byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333b-30: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:333b-31: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chos can gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334a-0: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chos ma yin pa gang yin @334a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334a-1: pa de ni lhas byin yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334a-2: der thog mar nga dang mi mthun par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334a-3: ngas kyang de la byams pa'i thugs bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334a-4: gzhan yang ji ltar 'dis nga la mi mthun par byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334a-5: ngas kyang 'di la byams par bsams pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334a-6: dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na rgyal po sra rtsi ldan zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334a-9: lo legs pa skye bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334a-10: mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334a-11: des yul gzhan gyi rgyal po'i bu mo zhig blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334a-12: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334a-14: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334a-17: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334a-18: bu mo de dus gzhan zhig na sems can dang ldan par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334a-19: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa'i nyi ma'i rtse na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334a-20: khye'u gzugs bzang po mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig btsas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334a-21: de btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334a-22: khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334a-23: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334a-24: lha khye'u 'di gdugs kyi rtse na btsas pas de'i slad du khye'u'i ming nyi ma'i mu khyud ces bgyi bar gdags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334a-25: zhes de'i ming nyi ma'i mu khyud ces bya bar btags nas khye'u nyi ma'i mu khyud ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334a-26: nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334b-0: dri ma @334b 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334b-1: rtsed grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334b-2: de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334b-7: gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed cing skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i padma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334b-8: de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334b-12: lag rtsis la nye bar zhugs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334b-13: rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yul dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334b-15: mthu thob pa sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mngon par zil gyis mnan nas gnas pa rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334b-16: bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas tha dad par gyur pa gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334b-33: sgra grags par phogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334b-38: las kyi gnas lnga po de dag la yang byang bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334b-39: phas de rgyal tshab tu bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:334b-40: rgyal po sra rtsi ldan gyi btsun mo dam pa ni chos ldan zhes bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335a-0: @335a *// blon po'i mchog ni phyugs 'dug ces bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335a-1: de la rgyal po lhag par snying 'jog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335a-2: ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335a-4: chos ldan ma dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335a-6: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335a-9: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las chos ldan ma sems can dang ldan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335a-10: de mtshan mkhan rnams kyis khye'u zhig btsa' bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335a-11: des rgyal po srog dang phral nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335a-12: rang nyid cod pan bcings te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335a-13: rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335a-15: ji tsam na rgyal po sra rtsi ldan nad kyis thebs par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335a-16: de la rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335a-19: 'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas kyang de'i nad de zhi bar ma gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335a-20: des lus kyi gnas skabs rig par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335a-23: nyi ma'i mu khyud rgyal por 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335a-24: des gdon mi za bar chos ldan ma bsad par mi 'gyur bar 'dir ye ji ltar bya ba'i dus la bab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335a-26: blon po phyugs 'dug 'di la bdag gis longs spyod bzang po dag bgo bsha' byas shing spyan ras kyis btsas pa yin gyi 'di la chos ldan ma gtad do snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335a-27: des phyugs 'dug bkug ste bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335a-28: nga'i btsun mo dam pa ni chos ldan ma yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335b-0: blon po mchog ni @335b khyod yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335b-1: nga lus kyi gnas skabs shes na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335b-2: gdon mi za bar nga srog dang 'bral bar 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335b-3: khyod kyis nga la sdug par sems na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335b-4: nyi ma'i mu khyud kyis chos ldan ma ji ltar yang srog dang phral bar mi 'gyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335b-7: lha de tsam yang rngo mi thog gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335b-8: lha thugs las chung ngur mdzod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335b-9: ji ltar mi bkur ma de ltar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335b-10: bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335b-11: mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335b-12: phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335b-13: gson pa'i mtha'i ni 'chi ba yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335b-14: rgyal po sras rtsi ldan shing nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335b-17: ba dan la sogs pa bzang po rnams kyis bkur sti cher byas te bsregs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335b-18: nyi ma'i mu khyud rgyal po'i rgyal srid chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335b-19: des blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335b-22: lha ma brtags par bskum ste ci rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335b-26: gal te khye'ur btsas par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335b-28: rgyal po nyi ma'i mu khyud kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335b-29: de bzhin du gyis la khyod kho nas srungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335b-30: des khyim du bzhag pa na zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang khye'u zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:335b-31: de nyid kyi nyi ma la nya pa'i chung ma zhig la bu mo zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-0: des de btsas ma thag kho nar nya ba'i chung ma @336a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-2: nor gyis brid de brjes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-3: phyugs 'dug gi rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-4: lha chos ldan ma la bu mo zhig btsas lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-6: khye'u de nya pa'i chung mas bsnun bsnyod bsos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-7: chen por gyur nas yi ge 'bru dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-9: snyan dngags bya bar brtsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-10: de'i ming nya pa'i khye'u snyan dngags mkhan nya pa'i khye'u snyan dngags mkhan zhes bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-11: phyugs 'dug gis chos ldan ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-12: khyod la ni khye'u snyan dngags mkhan zhig btsas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-13: de ci 'dra ba zhig yin te re zhig blta'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-15: de blta ci dgos zhog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-17: mngon par dga' zhing blta 'dod pas 'dug tu mi btub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-18: phyugs 'dug gis de nges par gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-19: thabs shig bshams te nya zhig bskur nas btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-20: de nang du zhugs pa kho na na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-22: nya ba'i khye'u snyan dngags mkhan 'dis ni rgyal po srog dang phral te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-23: rang nyid cod pan bcings nas rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-26: des blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-27: ci nas kyang ma shor bar zungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-28: des gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa las thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-29: de phan tshun bros pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336a-30: rgan mo zhig gi khyim du zhugs pa dang des de sbas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336b-2: khyogs kyi steng du bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336b-3: ro lta bur bcos nas phyung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336b-4: dur khrod du bor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336b-6: phyogs de na mi zhig me tog dang 'bras bu tshol ba des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336b-8: de'i phyi bzhin bsnyegs shing rgyug pa'i mi de rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336b-9: mi de la dris pa kye nang rje bong tshod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336b-10: kha dog 'di 'dra ba'i mi 'ga' zhig lam 'di nas 'gro ba khyod kyis ma mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336b-12: mthong ste lam 'di nyid nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336b-13: de rnams de'i rjes bzhin song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336b-14: de yang ri bor der btso blag mkhan zhig gi khyim du zhugs nas de la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336b-15: snyegs ma'i mi rnams kyis ri bor btsal bar brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336b-16: gtso blag mkhan gyi gos kyi thum po'i nang du bcug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336b-17: bong bu la bkal te ri bor nas phyir byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336b-18: khrus byed pa'i sar khyer nas btang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336b-19: langs te phyogs bzhir bltas nas bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336b-20: der yang mi gzhan zhig gis mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336b-21: des snyegs ma'i mi rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336b-22: shes ldan dag khyed gang gi don du ri bor na tshol ba'i mi de ni lam 'di nas song gis myur du deng zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336b-23: de rnams dong ba las de yang grong gzhan zhig tu lham mkhan gyi khyim zhig tu zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336b-24: des de la ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:336b-25: mchil lham bol rting par bltas pa zhig gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-0: bdag gis sngon lan 'ga' yang mchil lham @337a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-1: de lta bu byed ma myong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-2: des tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-3: blo gros sna tshogs rang bzhin du ma ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-4: de dag srang gcig tu ni gzhal ba med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-5: lha ma mkhan khyod kyis nga yi tshig bzhin 'dir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-6: rting pa gang de mdun du lta bar gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-7: des lham mkhan de la bslabs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-8: lham mkhan gyis de 'dra ba'i mchil lham zhig byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-9: ri bor de ra bas bskor ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-10: de mchil lam de gyon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-11: gtor khung nas 'dzul te bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-12: snyigs ma'i mi rnams kyis mchil lam gyi rjes bzhin ri bor de nyid bskor te de yang bros nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-14: klu rnams kyis gnas su khrid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-15: rgyal pos gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa las de ji ltar klu rnams kyis klu'i gnas su khrid do zhes thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-16: rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-17: shes ldan dag nga'i yul na sbrul khas sdigs ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad nga'i spyan sngar khug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-18: de rnams kyis yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sbrul khas sdigs rnams rgyal po la phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-19: rgyal pos de rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-20: shes ldan dag deng la klu'i gnas che ge mo zhes bya bar klu zung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-21: lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes sbrul khas sdigs thams cad kyis rgyal po las mnyan nas klu'i gnas su dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-23: gnod sbyin ser skya zhes bya ba khrag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-24: sha za ba zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337a-26: gcan zan rnams kyis kyang 'brog de yongs su spangs na mi rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337b-0: de ser skya'i 'brog @337b ces bya bar grags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337b-1: sbrul khas sdigs rnams kyis sngags kyi mthus ji ltar klu de la gnod par 'gyur ba de ltar byas pas de skrag nas de ser skya'i 'brog de rgal bar mi nus par bor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337b-2: klu rnams kyis gros byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337b-3: bdag gis 'di ltar de ser skya'i 'brog las ma bsgral ba ni ma legs pa zhig byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337b-4: de yang gnod sbyin ser skyas bsad la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337b-5: bdag cag kyang de'i phyir gtses par 'ongs na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337b-6: klu'i rgyal po des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337b-7: don de sbrul khas sdigs rnams la rig par bya'o zhes de rnams kyis sbrul khas sdigs rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337b-8: shes ldan dag gang gi phyir bdag cag 'khrugs par byas pa de ni bdag cag gis thabs kyis bsad pa nyid de 'di ltar ser skya'i 'brog tu bor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337b-9: sbrul khas sdigs rnams kyis don de rgyal po la smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337b-11: gal te de lta na yang 'on kyang tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337b-12: de ser skya'i 'brog na phan tshun 'khyam par brtsams pa na gnod sbyin ser skya yang phyogs zhig na khyi rnams kyis yongs su bskor te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337b-13: de dang khyi rnams kyis de rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337b-14: ci 'dis bdag shi bar gyur to zhes thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337b-15: des na de 'dir 'ongs sam snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337b-16: des de la khyi rnams spang ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337b-17: de bros te shing ljon pa zhig la 'dzegs pa dang khyi rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337b-18: ser skyas ljon shing gi drung du bsdad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337b-20: kva'i nang rje khyod kyis ser skya'i 'brog na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:337b-21: mi ma yin pa ser skya zhes bya ba gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338a-1: song ba gang yin pa de des gsod par 'gyur ro zhes ma thos sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338a-2: khyod dus la bab kyis bobs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338a-4: ji srid la 'tsho ba de srid du 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338a-5: gnod sbyin ser skya pus skyud kyis bcings te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338a-7: de yur ba na des de'i steng du gos shig por ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338a-9: 'di ni mi de kho na lhung ba yin no snyam nas; de rnams kyis gnod sbyin ser skya zos nas dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338a-10: de ljon shing las dal gyis dal gyis babs te song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338a-11: de dang de na 'khor shing bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338a-12: bdag gi zhang po drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ba zhig yod kyis de'i drung du 'gro'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338a-13: drang srong de la yang ri bor zhig na skyed mos tshal rtsa ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338a-16: chu phun sum tshogs pa shing rnam pa sna tshogs tshang tshing gis mdzes par byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338a-17: bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338a-18: de rim gyis de thos pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338a-20: gnyen du 'brel pas smras te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338a-21: der yang rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis btsal te de rnams kyis de bzung par brtsams pa las des ri'i g-yang sa nas bdag nyid mchongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338a-22: des mchongs pa na mi zhig gis gtsug phud nas bzung ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338a-23: gtsug phud byung nas de lhung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338b-0: 'di ni shi bas 'dong ngo zhes gtsug phud khyer te rgyal po'i drung du song nas @338b de rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338b-1: lha nya pa'i khye'u snyan dngags mkhan de bkums nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338b-3: rgyal po mgu nas des de rnams la longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338b-4: de nas drang srong gi skyed mos tshal na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338b-5: drang srong de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338b-6: khyod kyi tsha bo ni sdug bsngal mi bzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338b-7: dog pa nyam nga ba thob na ma dgongs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338b-8: des smras pa gal te bdag gis ma bsams par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338b-9: de ring nyid du srog dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338b-10: drang srong de ni rig sngags dang gsang sngags 'chang ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338b-11: gang gis ni skyes pa bud med du 'gyur zhing phyir yang skyes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rig sngags shes pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338b-12: des de la rig sngags de bslabs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338b-13: da ni song la 'jigs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338b-14: bag tsha ba med pas 'dug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338b-15: de rig sngags kyis dpes bskrun par mi nus pa'i bud med kyi cha byad du mngon par sprul nas w'a ra n'a sir song ste rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal na 'dug pa skyed mos tshal gyi srung mas mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338b-16: mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338b-17: des myur ba myur bar song nas rgyal po nyi ma'i mu khyud la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338b-19: bud med gzugs phun sum tshogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338b-20: dar la bab pa zhig mchis so des bsgo ba khrid de shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338b-21: des dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338b-22: rgyal po'i pho brang du khrid nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:338b-23: de la rgyal po nyi ma'i mu khyud lhag par chags par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-0: dben pa na 'dug pa la bsad de slar yang @339a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-3: de nas rang nyid kyis cod pan bcings te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-4: blon po phyug 'dug la go bar byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-6: lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-7: gang gi mgo ma bcad pa de bsad min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-8: phyir yang langs nas las ni byed par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-9: ji ltar snyan dngags mkhan des glags rnyed nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-10: sra rtsi can bu lta bu de bsad yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-11: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-12: de tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po sra rtsi ldan gyi bu nyi ma'i mu khyud ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-13: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi snyan dngags mkhan gang yin pa de ni 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-14: de na yang 'dis nga la shar gnyer la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-15: da ltar yang 'dis shar gnyer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-16: gzhan yang ji ltar 'dis nga la shar gnyer ba de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-17: dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri bor zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-18: nor bu mkhan gnyis shig gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-19: de gnyis kyis lam po che dang grong bgos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-20: de'i tshe tshong pa 'byor pa yang yongs su zad pa zhig yod pa de nor bu'i snod khyer nas ri bor der phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-21: de nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-22: nor bu mkhan zhig gi drung du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-23: nor bu'i snod 'di rin thang chod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-24: des de'i rin thang chung ngu zhig tu bcad pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-26: 'di ltar kho bo longs spyod las nyams kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-27: shes rab las ma yin pas kho bos 'di ci ri ba lta shes na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339a-28: de skad du smra ba ci'i tha tshig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339b-0: de de'i drung nas log ste cig @339b shos kyi drung du song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339b-1: nor bu'i snod 'di rin thang chod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339b-2: des de'i rin thang thog tu bab par bcad nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339b-3: 'di snyed kyi rin thang re zhig bdag la mi bdog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339b-4: des smras pa; ci pa dog pa de byin la khyer cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339b-6: nor bu mkhan cig shos po des thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339b-7: de mi bzod pa skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339b-9: bdag gis 'di thog mar khyim du khrid cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339b-10: bdag gis 'di'i rin thang yang bcad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339b-12: de gnyis phan tshun khon byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339b-13: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339b-14: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi nor bu mkhan nor bu'i snod rin thang chung ngur gcod pa gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339b-15: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi nor bu mkhan cig shos rin thang thog tu bab par gcod pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339b-16: de na yang ded [*nged] phan tshun mi mthun par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339b-17: da ltar yang nged phan tshun mi mthun par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339b-18: gzhan yang ji ltar nged mi mthun par gyur pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:339b-19: dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri bor zhig na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344a-8: glang chen gtso bo la ni mtho ma 'tsham //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344a-9: glang chen de la mtho 'tsham sdug bsngal 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344a-10: gtso la gnod pa byas pa pha rol tu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344a-11: 'gro ba bzang por 'gyur ba ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344a-12: bzhin bzang khyod re zhig sngon gyi nyes par spyad pas smad pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes na khyod da dung gzhan gyi srog gcod cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344a-13: gzhan gyi srog gcod pas yongs su dga' bar byed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344a-18: bzhin bzang de lta bas na 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344a-19: chos thams cad ni bdag med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344a-20: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344a-21: nga la sems mngon par dad par gyis la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344a-22: ci nas kyang dud 'gro'i skye gnas la 'dod chags dang bral bar gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344a-23: khyim bdag gi khyim gang na ba der gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344a-24: byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344a-25: nor skyong yang bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344a-26: bcom ldan 'das nang du gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344b-0: de sgo @344b drung du sdod pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim de shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344b-4: de la sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par snang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344b-5: des bcom ldan 'das mthong nas ma bshig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344b-6: bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig gdugs tshod gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344b-7: yon bsngo ba mdzad de gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344b-8: de bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du song ba'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344b-9: blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la rig par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344b-10: ma skyes dgras lha byin la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344b-11: khyod kyis bdag la gnod pa byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344b-12: glang po che dam pa 'di la brten nas mtshams gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams kho bo la gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344b-13: de yang khyod kyis dul bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344b-14: de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344b-15: rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344b-16: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das phyir byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344b-17: glang po che dam pa nor skyong ji ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang bar mi 'gyur bar sgo chod la zhog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344b-18: blon po rnams kyis glang po che 'dul mkhan rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344b-19: glang po che dam pa nor skyong ji ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'gro bar mi 'gyur bar sgo ched la zhog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344b-20: des bcom ldan 'das ma mthong nas rdog pas sna brdzis nas shi ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:344b-21: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345a-3: lha'i bu mo ni skyes nas ring por ma lon par /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345a-8: des glang po che las shi 'phos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345a-9: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345a-10: bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par byas pa yin par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345a-11: de nas sngon glang po che byed byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345a-12: bdag zhag lon nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345a-13: ma la bdag gis zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345a-14: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345a-15: de nas sngon glang po che byed byed pa'i lha'i bu rna cha dri ma med cing g-yo ba thogs la do shal dang se mo dos lus brgyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345a-16: de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha rnams kyi me tog autpa la dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345a-20: manda ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345a-21: 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan dka'i gnas thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345a-22: bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-0: rang bzhin mkhyen nas gang thos pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor yang dag par rtogs par @345b 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-1: sngon gyi glang po che lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-2: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-3: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te bden pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-4: lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-5: btsun pa bdag la phas ma bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-8: lha rnams kyis ma lags sdug pas ma lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-9: rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-12: bram zes ma lags pa gang lags pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-14: bdag la mdzad de khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-15: rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-16: ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bku ma /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-17: mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-18: bdag lha dang mi rnams su ni bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-20: khyod mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-21: ngan song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-22: mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-23: mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-24: shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-25: de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-26: go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-27: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal bar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-28: 'gro bar lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-29: skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-30: srid pa stong du mthong bar rab dka' ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:345b-31: thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346a-1: nas 'dud byas do shal rab 'phyang bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346a-2: zhabs la phyag 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346a-3: dgra thul g-yas nas yongs su bskor byas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346a-4: lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346a-5: de nas sngon glang po che byed byed pa'i lha'i bus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346a-6: tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346a-7: zhing pa lo tog legs pa lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346a-8: dpa' bo g-yul ngor rgyal ba lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346a-9: nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar ba lta bur 'byor pa gang gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346a-11: dge slong rnams nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson pas gnas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346a-12: de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na snang ba rgya chen po mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346a-13: mthong nas kyang yid gnyis su gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346a-16: mdang sum bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346a-17: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346a-18: 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi mchis lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346a-20: dge slong dag nga blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346a-21: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346a-22: 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346b-0: de lta mod kyi dge slong dag khyod kyis glang po che dam pa nor skyong zhes bya @346b pa 'di ltar gdug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346b-1: 'di ltar gtum pa des de bzhin gshegs pa dkrongs pa'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346b-2: pha rol gnon pa byas pa gang yin pa de mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346b-5: nga la mngon par dad par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346b-6: shi nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346b-7: de mdang sum nga'i spyan sngar 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346b-8: ngas de la chos bshad de bden pa mthong bar byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346b-9: rang gi gnas su song ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346b-10: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346b-12: btsun pa nor skyong gis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346b-13: las de'i rnam par smin pas dud 'gror skyes lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346b-14: las ci zhig bgyis na des na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346b-15: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes nas bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346b-17: dge slong dag nor skyong 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346b-18: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346b-19: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346b-21: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346b-22: dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na 'jig rten du ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:346b-23: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347a-2: 'od srung zhes bya ba byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347a-3: de grong khyer w'a ra n'a sir nye bar brten nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347a-4: drang srong smra ba'i ri dvags kyi nags na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347a-5: de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347a-6: zhal ta byed pa na de na 'di bslab pa'i gzhi phra mo phra mo rnams la gus par ma byas pas de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas dud 'gror skyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347a-7: de na 'dis dge 'dun la bkur sti byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa des bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347a-8: btung ba thob par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347a-9: nga la sems mngon par dad par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347a-10: shi ba gang yin pa des rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347a-11: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la rab tu byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347a-12: bklag pa dang nod pa byas shing phung po la mkhas par byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347a-14: skye mched la mkhas par byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347a-15: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas par byas pa gang yin pa des lhar gyur nas nga las bden pa mthong bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347a-16: dge slong dag de lta bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347a-17: las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347a-18: las gcig tu dkar ba la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347a-19: dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347a-21: ngang pa gad rgyangs dbyung ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347a-22: ri dvags rul dang spre'u dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347a-23: glang po che dang byi la dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347a-24: ba lang zla ba rdo ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347a-25: glang chen wa dang bram ze'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347b-0: dge @347b slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347b-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347b-2: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga brgyas yongs su btang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347b-3: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos yongs su ma btang ba la gzigs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347b-4: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347b-5: ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang kun dga' bo 'dis nga yongs su ma btang ba de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347b-6: dge slong dag sngon byung ba mtsho chen po ma dros pa na ngang pa'i dpon po yul 'khor skyong zhes bya bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347b-7: de la bu gnyis yod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347b-8: gang ba dang bzhin rgyas zhes bya ba ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347b-9: gang ba ni phu bo yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347b-10: bzhin rgyas ni nu bo yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347b-11: de gnyis las gang ba ni gtum pa brlang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347b-13: rtag tu ngang pa rnams la bsdigs par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347b-15: kha cig la ni rder [*sder] mos rma 'byin par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347b-16: de lta bu dang gzhan yang gnod pa brgya phrag dag byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347b-17: ngang pa rnams nyi ma re re zhing ngang pa rnams kyi dpon po yul 'khor skyong gi gan du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347b-18: rig par byed nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347b-19: gang ba gtum pa brlang ba gzu lums can yin pas gal te bdag gis 'di rgyal tshab la bzhag na bdag shi nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347b-20: 'dis ngang pa'i tshogs bshig par 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347b-21: de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:347b-22: des gang ba dang bzhin rgyas gnyis bkug nas bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:348a-1: nga'i drung du thog mar su 'ongs pa de ngang pa rnams kyi dpon por gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:348a-2: de gnyis kyang gcig la gcig 'gran pa'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:348a-3: 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya dang dong ste de gnyis kyis phan tshun gyi 'bab chu'i dong dang mtsho dang mtshe'u rnams bltas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:348a-4: mthar gyis grong khyer w'a ra n'a sir phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:348a-5: de'i tshe grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:348a-6: rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:348a-9: lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:348a-10: des w'a ra n'a si'i skyed mos tshal dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu tshangs ldan zhes bya ba'i rdzing bu mtshe'u bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa zhig bskor bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:348a-11: der chu nas skyes pa'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:348a-12: 'gram dang phyogs bzhi kun tu yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:348a-13: me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing stong phrag du ma bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:348a-17: padma dkar pos yog par byas shing shing tshang tshing du mas mdzes pa bya sna tshogs mang po skad 'byin pa'i 'byor pa de lta bu des mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:348a-18: ngang pa gang ba 'khor lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te babs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:348a-19: ci dga' ba'i spyod pas rtsa bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:348a-20: bzhin rgyas la yang rang gi tshogs kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:348a-21: khyod kyang bobs la rtsed mo gyis shig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:348b-4: tshangs ldan gyi rdzing bur babs te; bag rkyong zhing bag rkyong zhing gnas pas rtse bar brtsams te /
