K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:352b-20: lhan cig tu ni dgar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:352b-21: de nas rngon pa de lhag par yang ngo mtshar skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:352b-22: ri dvags de bkrol nas lhan cig dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:352b-23: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:352b-24: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ri dvags kyi dpon po gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:352b-25: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ri dvags mo gang yin pa de ni kun dga' bo yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:352b-26: ri dvags gcig gis lnga brgyar ma tshang ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:352b-27: dge slong gcig gis lnga brgyar ma tshang ba 'di dag nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:352b-28: de na yang nga 'di dag gis yongs su btang gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:352b-29: kun dga' bos ni yongs su ma btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353a-2: dge slong kun dga' bos ni yongs su ma gtang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353a-3: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353a-4: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353a-5: btsun pa lhas byin rul ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353a-7: bkur sti rul pas bcom pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353a-9: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353a-10: ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang rul pa 'di /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353a-11: rnyed pa dang bkur sti rul pas bcom pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353a-12: dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri'i phyogs gcig cig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353a-13: padma'i rdzing chen po zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353a-14: de dang nye ba na glang po che zhig gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353a-15: phyogs gzhan zhig na wa zhig kyang gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353a-16: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353a-17: glang po che padma'i rdzing de nas chu 'thungs nas 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353a-18: wa 'ong ba des glang po che la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353a-22: rul pa nyon mongs pa spyi rdol can 'di gal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353a-23: bdag gi rkang lag gis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353a-25: mche bas bsad na mi gtsang bas ma rung bar gyur pas mdor na rul pa 'di ni rul pa kho nas bsad do snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353a-26: tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353a-27: khyod ni rkang lag gis mi bsad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353a-28: mche bas ma yin snas min te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353b-0: @353b rul pa rul pas bsad bya bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353b-1: khyod ni rul pas bsad par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353b-3: lam bzur te song dang gdon mi za bar 'di bdag gi rnges bzhin 'ong ngo snyam nas des lam bzur nas myur ba myur bar song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353b-5: tshig tsam kho nas bdag gis 'di bcom pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353b-6: des na myur ba myur bar bros so snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353b-7: de de'i rjes bzhin 'brangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353b-8: glang po ches nye bar 'ongs par shes nas shugs drag pos de'i steng du rtug pa por bas phog nas shi bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353b-9: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353b-10: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353b-11: de na yang rul pa 'di rul pas bcom mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353b-12: da ltar yang rul pa 'di rnyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353b-13: bkur sti rul pas bcom mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353b-14: gzhan yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353b-15: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353b-16: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi gzigs pa'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa chen po las legs par rgal par gyur pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353b-17: lhas byin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag ni tshul ma lags pas ma rung bar gyur pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:353b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354a-0: dge slong dag da ltar gyi @354a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354a-2: ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354a-3: nga'i tshig nyan pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'jigs pa chen po las thar la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354a-4: lha sbyin gyi tshig nyan pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar gyur pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354a-5: dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri bor zhig dang nye ba me tog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354a-7: chu phun sum tshogs pa na spre'u yi tshogs kyi dpon po gnyis shig gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354a-8: re re la yang 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354a-9: de na tshogs kyi dpon po cig shos gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na bdag gson pa nyid du 'khor lnga brgya dang zangs su bcug par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354a-10: mthong nas kyang skrag sdangs bred de skyi bung zhes byed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354a-11: nam do mnangs te nangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354a-12: spre'u rnams bsags te rmi lam bzlas par brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354a-14: mdang sum ngas rmi lam ngan pa zhig mthong gis gnas 'di nas 'dir 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354a-16: de bzhin du bgyis te 'bros par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354a-17: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rmi lam rno ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354a-18: bdag nyid chen po des tshogs kyi dpon po cig shos la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354a-19: bdag gis rmi lam 'di 'dra ba rmis nas 'dong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354a-21: de yi dam ches nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354b-0: ci rmi lam du rmis so cog bden par 'gyur @354b ram; gal te khyod 'gro na song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354b-1: kho bo ni spyod yul ches yangs par 'gyur bas mi 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354b-2: des de yid ma ches bar rig nas bdag nyid kyi tshogs dang de dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354b-3: ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na ri bor de na bran mo zhig thab na yos rngo ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354b-4: ma stes pas lug cig 'khyam zhing phyogs der phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354b-5: de nas de dag bza' bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354b-6: des mgal dum gyis bsnun pas me 'bar bzhin rgyal po'i glang po che'i bres su zhugs pa dang 'bar ba des glang po che'i bres bsregs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354b-7: glang po che mang po zhig tshig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354b-8: rgyal pos sman pa bkug te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354b-9: glang po che mes tshig pa rnams la dpyad ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354b-10: sman pa de'i nas kyi shing spre'u rnams kyis ma rung bar byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354b-12: spre'u 'di rnams la sha gnyer ba'i dus la bab bo snyam du bsams nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354b-13: lha spre'u yi zhag gis glang po che rnams la bskus na sos par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354b-14: rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba shes ldan dag spre'u'i zhag sta gon gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354b-15: de rnams kyis kyang rngon pa rnams la bsgo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354b-16: rngon pa rnams kyis ri bor gyi nye 'khor na gnas pa'i spre'u thams cad bzung ste phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354b-17: sman pa yun ring po nas sha khon rjes su 'brel bas gson po nyid du zangs su bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354b-18: lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:354b-19: grong rdal dang ni grong khyer na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355a-1: mthun yod par gnas mi bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355a-2: lug dang bran mo mi mthun pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355a-3: spre'u rnams dag ni brlag par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355a-4: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355a-5: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi spre'u tshogs kyi dpon po rmi lam rno ba gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355a-6: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshogs kyi dpon po cig shos gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355a-7: de na yang nga'i tshig nyan pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'jigs pa chen po las thar to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355a-8: lhas byin gyi tshig nyan pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355a-9: da ltar yang nga'i lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355a-10: 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa chen po las rab tu thar to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355a-11: lhas byin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355a-12: gzhan yang nga'i lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355a-13: bde legs su dong bar gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355a-14: lhas byin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355a-15: tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal du gyur pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355a-16: dge slong dag sngon byung ba phyogs shig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355a-17: spre'u'i tshogs kyi dpon po 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya pa gnyis shig gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355a-18: de na cig shos tshogs dang lhan cig ljongs su dong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355a-19: rim gyis ri por zhig tu phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355b-0: @355b ri bor de na shing kim pa ka zhes bya ba 'bras bus yal ga g-yur za bar 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355b-1: spre'u rnams kyis tshogs kyi dpon po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355b-2: tshogs kyi dpon po ljon shing lhag par 'bras bu chags pa 'bras bus yal ga g-yur za ba zhig mchis kyi'o skol dub pa 'bras bu rnams gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355b-3: tshogs kyi dpon pos shing de la brtags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355b-4: tshigs su bcad de smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355b-5: grong gi drung na 'dug kyang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355b-6: byis pas 'di la ma zos pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355b-7: rjes su dpags na shing 'di yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355b-8: 'bras bu bzar mi rung bar shes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355b-10: tshogs kyi dpon po cig shos kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355b-11: tshogs de nyid kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin 'brangs nas rim gyis ri bor du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355b-12: spre'u rnams kyis kim pa ka'i ljon shing de mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355b-13: de rnams kyis tshogs kyi dpon po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355b-14: tshogs kyi dpon po ljon shing gi 'bras bu mchis kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355b-15: 'o skol dub pa 'bras bu rnams la gsol la bde bar bzhud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355b-17: legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355b-18: de rnams kyi zos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355b-19: thams cad tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355b-20: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355b-21: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshogs kyi dpon po dang po pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:355b-22: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshogs kyi dpon po gnyis ba shos gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356a-0: @356a *// de na yang nga'i lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni bde legs su dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356a-1: lhas byin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356a-2: da ltar yang nga'i lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356a-3: bde legs su 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las rgal lo; ;lhas byin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356a-4: gang gi tshe lhas byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la dgrongs pa'i phyir rdo 'phangs pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356a-7: lhas byin bsad kyis 'dong ngo zhes byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356a-10: bar ma dag yod pas gzhan zhig gis lhas byin la sbran nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356a-11: de skrag nas shing drung zhig tu brten te spyod lam zhi bas 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356a-12: de rnams kyis de ltar spyod lam zhi ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356a-14: shes ldan dag lhas byin bdag nyid chen po 'di bcom ldan 'das dgrongs par ga la 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356a-15: kha cig gis bdag cag bslus kyis tshur 'dong ngo zhes de rnams dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356b-0: dge slong rnams kyis lhas byin de lta bu'i spyod lam gyis gnas pas des na grong mi 'khrugs kyang ma bsad do zhes thos nas de rnams @356b the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356b-1: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356b-2: btsun pa lhas byin gyis chos lta bu'i sgo nas 'jig rten bslus pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356b-4: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356b-5: ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di chos lta bu'i sgo nas byi ba rnams brid pa de nyon cig dge slong dag sngon byung ba phyogs shig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356b-6: byi ba rnams kyi tshogs kyi dpon po 'khor lnga brgya pa zhig gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356b-7: byi la me skyes zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356b-8: de gzhon pa'i gnas skabs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356b-9: phyogs gang du gnas pa'i nye 'khor du des byi ba thams cad bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356b-10: de yang dus gzhan zhig na rgas par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356b-11: rgas pas pha rol gnon pas byi ba bzung mi nus nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356b-12: sngon bdag gzhon pa'i gnas skabs na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356b-13: pha rol gnon pas byi ba 'dzin nus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356b-15: 'on kyang thabs shig bshams la bza'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356b-16: de 'jab cing 'jab cing byi ba rnams btsal bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356b-17: des btsal ba na byi ba lnga brgya'i tshogs yod par shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:356b-18: de byi ba de rnams kyi khung bu dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu ngan g-yo'i dka' thub kyis dka' thub byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-0: byi ba rnams phan tshun 'khyam pas spyod lam zhi bas gnas pa de mthong nas de rnams kyis @357a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-1: rgyang ring por 'dug nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-4: kho bo gzhon pa'i gnas skabs na bsod nams ma yin pa mang du byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-5: de zad par bya ba'i phyir dka' thub spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-7: dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa spangs so zhes de la chos kyi rgyu las byung ba'i dad pa skyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-8: de rnams de la nyi ma re re zhing bskor ba byas nas khung du 'jug pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-9: des de rnams kyi nang gi tha ma bzung zhing bzung zhing za'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-10: ji tsam na tshogs de 'gribs nas tshogs kyi dpon pos bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-11: bdag gi byi ba rnams ni nyung bar gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-12: byi la 'di ni nyam skyes par gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-13: 'di la rgyu zhig yod par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-14: des byi la de la brtag par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-15: ji tsam na rtug pa spu can du mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-17: gdon mi za bar 'dis byi ba rnams bsad par gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-18: ma la bdag gis 'di mngon sum du bab par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-19: des de mi mngon pa'i sa nas brtag pa lhur len cing gnas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-21: de tha ma'i byi ba za ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-22: de de logs su song ste rgyang ring por 'dug nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-23: zhang po'i yan lag rgyas gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-24: bdag gi tshogs ni 'gribs gyur la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-25: 'bras bu rtsa ba za ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-26: rtug pa spu can mi 'byung bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-27: dka' thub 'di chos dka' thub min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-28: dka' thub 'di ni don phyir te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357a-30: me skyes khyod ni bkra shis shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357b-0: dge slong dag @357b ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357b-1: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi byi la me skyes zhes bya ba gang yin pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357b-3: de na yang 'dis chos lta bu'i sgo nas byi ba rnams zos so /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357b-4: da ltar yang 'dis chos lta bu'i sgo nas 'jig rten bslus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357b-5: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357b-6: the tshom thams cad gcod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357b-8: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi gzigs pa'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag bde ba dang legs par 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las rgyal cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357b-9: lhas byin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag ni tshul ma lags pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357b-11: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357b-12: ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nga'i lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357b-13: bde ba dang legs par 'brog dgon pa las thar la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357b-14: lhas byin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357b-15: dge slong dag sngon byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357b-16: tshong dpon gnyis shig shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang lhan cig tshong sgyur zhing dgon pa'i lam zhig tu zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357b-17: de gnyis dgon pa'i lam zhig tu phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:357b-18: glang rnams res 'ga' ni rtsva nyung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358a-1: de nas tshong pa de glang rnams dang bcas te lhag par dub pas sdug bsngal gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358a-2: dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pa las phyogs shig na gsing ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358a-3: chu phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas tshong pa rnams kyi der glang rnams btang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358a-4: rang rang khrus byas nas chu mang du 'thungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358a-5: de nas glang chu nyungs pa dang rtsva nyungs pas yongs su dub pa de rnams kyis rtsva 'grangs bar zos chu 'thungs te ngal sos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358a-6: de rnams kyi nang na glang gtso bo gang yin pa des de rnams la shes par byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358a-7: shes ldan dag bdag cag rtsva nyung ngu dang chu nyung yongs su dub pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358a-9: chu phun sum tshogs pa yin gyi gal te khyed cag 'dod na; 'di nyid du then te 'dug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358a-10: glang gtso bo cig shos kyis rang gi tshogs rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358a-11: shes ldan dag mi rnams ni mthu dang ldan zhing gdul dka' ba 'dul bar byed pa yin gyis gnod pa 'thob par 'gyur du 'ongs bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358a-12: bdag cag khal ji ltar bkal ba de bzhin du khyer cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358a-13: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358a-14: glang gtso bo cig shos khros nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358a-15: rang gi tshogs rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358a-16: shes ldan dag zla ba'i rgyab sus mthong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358a-18: yu bus ni mi bkur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358b-0: @358b ji tsam na tshong pa rnams kyis glang rnams gtang bar brtsams pa na glang de rnams phyi lang byed cing 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358b-1: tshong pa rnams kyis mang du brdegs shing lcag gzer bu can gyis gzhus pas khrag 'dzag cing shing rta dang sbyar to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358b-2: gzhan ni cang mi byed par khal mnos pas de dag la cung zad kyang ma byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358b-3: lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358b-4: glang gis ba lang 'di dag ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358b-5: log pa dag tu gtams pas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358b-7: ltogs shing skom par ldan pa ltos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358b-8: glang gis ba lang 'di dag ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358b-9: legs par dag tu gtams pas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358b-10: de rnams dgon pa las rgal nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358b-11: bsil ba'i chu la 'thung ba ltos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358b-12: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358b-13: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang gtso bo legs par ston pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358b-14: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang gtso bo slu bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358b-15: de na yang nga'i tshig nyan pa gang yin pa de dag ni bde ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358b-16: legs par dgon pa las rgal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358b-17: lha sbyin gyi tshig nyan pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358b-18: da ltar yang nga'i lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:358b-19: bde ba dang legs par 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas rgal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359a-0: lhas byin gyi lta ba'i rjes su @359a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359a-1: mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359a-2: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359a-3: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359a-4: btsun pa lhas byin blun zhing 'khor blun pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359a-6: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359a-7: ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359a-8: lhas byin blun zhing 'khor blun pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359a-9: dge slong dag sngon byung ba dgon pa'i gnas zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359a-11: de 'khyams pa na khron par zla ba'i gzugs brnyan shar ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359a-12: tshogs kyi dpon pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359a-13: shes ldan ldan dag zla ba khron par lhung gis 'jig rten zla ba med par bya'am ci dbyung ngo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359a-16: de rnams kyis gros bya bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359a-17: de ji ltar dbyung bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359a-20: spre'u brgyus la dbyung mod ces de rnams kyis spre'u brgyus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359a-21: dang po pas shing gi yal ga la 'jus nas de'i mjug ma la gzhan gyis 'jus shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359b-0: de bzhin du thams cad 'jus pas yal ga lhags par g-yur @359b zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359b-2: zla ba'i gzugs brnyan yang mi mngon par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359b-3: yal ga yang chag nas thams cad khron par lhung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359b-4: tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359b-5: lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359b-6: 'di na blun po gang dag la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359b-7: 'dren pa blun po yod gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359b-8: de dag thams cad brlag 'gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359b-10: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359b-11: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi spre'u'i tshogs kyi dpon po gang yin pa de ni lhas byin nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359b-12: de na yang 'di blun zhing 'khor blun pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359b-13: da ltar yang 'di blun zhing 'khor yang blun pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis las byas shing tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359b-17: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359b-18: las byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359b-19: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam pa smin par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:359b-20: lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360a-0: gdon mi za bar lhas byin @360a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360a-1: gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge 'dun 'byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360a-2: rgyu lngas na dge 'dun bye bar mi 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360a-3: re zhig dang por sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360a-6: sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung zhes grag go zhes 'jig rten de la phyogs pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360a-7: ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360a-9: gang la la zhig 'di skad du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360a-10: nga nyid ston pa yin no zhes zer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360a-11: de la gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das zhal bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa de'i tshe khyod gar song zhes brjod par zad pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360a-13: tshul khrims kyi nyes pa'i nyes pa ma byung ba'i tshe dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360a-14: nyan thos zung mchog tu ma bstan pa'i tshe dge 'dun bye bar mi 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360a-16: dge 'dun bye ba gdon mi za bar nyan thos zung gis sdum par byed pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360a-17: mtshams ma bcad pa na dge 'dun bye bar mi 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360a-19: mtshams kyi nang du dge 'dun 'byed par 'gyur gyi mtshams kyi phyi rol du ni ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360a-21: nga'i dge slong gi dge 'dun skyon med pa las tshul khrims kyi skyon dang lta ba'i skyon gyi skyon byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360b-0: tshul khrims kyi skyon ni ka la na da ka'i bu bzang sbyin las byung @360b ngo; ;lta ba'i skyon yang dge slong 'chi ltas kyis phyung bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360b-1: gdon mi za bar lhas byin gyis dge 'dun 'byed par 'gyur gyis ma la nga rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar bzhugs par dam bca'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360b-4: mi slob pa'i gang zag rnams dang thabs cig rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360b-5: lhas byin gyis dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya bar mi nus kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360b-6: ma la nga so so'i skye bo dge ba'i gang zag rnams dang thabs cig 'gro'o snyam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360b-7: mnyan yod du ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360b-8: rim gro byed pa tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360b-9: dge slong lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360b-10: rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rgyal po'i khab tu byon to ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360b-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas par dbyar bzhugs par zhal gyis bzhes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360b-14: de'i tshe mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo bas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360b-16: dge slong dag da nga dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po 'di lan nang du yang dag par 'jog par bzhed kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:360b-18: gso sbyong de nyid kyi tshe ma gtogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361a-0: dge slong dag su yang nga'i @361a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361a-2: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang khrims su bcas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361a-3: tshe dang ldan pa dag dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po 'di la bsod snyoms stobs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361a-4: gso sbyong de nyid kyi tshe ma gtogs pa bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir bdag cag su yang 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bcas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361a-5: de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361a-6: mo'u dgal gnyis ni lho phyogs kyi ri la dbyar gnas par dam bcas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361a-7: lhas sbyin gyis zla ba gsum du dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361a-9: nad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bstabs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361a-11: des dge slong rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361a-12: tshe dang ldan pa dag dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni nyan thos rnams la 'di skad ces dge slong dgon pa pa nyid kyis ni dag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361a-18: sdug bsngal las 'das pa yang thob par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361a-20: phyag dar khrod pa nyid dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361a-21: chos gos gsum pa nyid dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361a-22: bla gab med pa nyid kyis ni dag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361b-0: sdug bsngal @361b las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes chos 'chad kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361b-1: tshe dang ldan pa dag gang su dag brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga po 'di dag mi 'dod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361b-3: yid la mi 'bab ba de ni dge sbyong go'u ta ma las ring du 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361b-5: de tshul shing long zhig ces byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361b-6: dge slong lnga brgyas tshul shing blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361b-7: lhas byin stan las langs te song ba'i rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du dge slong lnga brgya 'brang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361b-8: tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin sgo na 'dug pa des de dag lha sbyin gyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang ba mthong nas des smras pa; tshe dang ldan pa dag ci'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361b-10: sdig pa 'dod pa 'di'i rjes bzhin rjes bzhin 'brang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361b-12: tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin mu ge'i dgon pa nyam nga ba 'di 'dra ba byung ba na bcom ldan 'das ni mi snang ba na bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361b-13: bdag cag lhas byin gyis mthus srog dang ma bral mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361b-14: gal te lhas byin gyis zla ba gsum du dge slong gi dge 'dun ma gsos par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361b-15: dge slong gcig kyang gson por mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361b-16: gang gi tshe lhas byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa phye ba de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:361b-17: sa chen po 'di g-yos par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:362a-2: nges pa la ma zhugs pa rnams nges pa la mi 'jug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:362a-5: zag pa rnams zad par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:362a-10: dgon pa pa rnams mdo sde dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:362a-12: chos mngon pa dgon par sems pa la rab tu sbyor bar mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:362a-13: nyan thos kyi byang chub kyi sa bon skyed par mi byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:362a-14: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi ma yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:362a-15: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:362a-16: lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'gro ba yang 'khrugs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:362a-17: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na chos kyi 'khor lo rgyun chad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:362a-18: sems can gyi rgyud la mi 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:362a-19: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bus bsams pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367a-3: rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367a-12: mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367a-16: sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367a-17: dge slong dag de lta bas na bdag gi don dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367a-19: gnyi ka'i don la rjes su lta ba rnams kyis ni 'di la rab tu bslab par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367a-20: ci nas kyang rab tu byung ba don yod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367a-23: rnam par smin pa bde ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367a-24: gang dag gis chos gos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367a-27: nad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams la yongs su longs spyod pa de dag la ci nas kyang de dag gis phan btags pa'i 'bras bu shin tu che ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367b-1: yangs shing rgya che bar 'gyur ba de ltar dge slong dag khyed kyis bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367b-2: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de rnams la 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367b-3: rab tu byung ba legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367b-4: zhes bya ba gsungs pa de'i tshe de rnams kyi zhum pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367b-8: yid la gcags pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du bral bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367b-9: de nas dge slong gzhan rnams the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367b-10: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367b-11: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin las ci zhig mdzad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367b-12: 'phrin las de rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye bar gyur lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367b-14: dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su 'phrin las byas shing bsags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367b-15: tshogs rnyed pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367b-16: dge slong dag sngon byung ba'i bsti gnas rtsa ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367b-20: chu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367b-21: shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367b-22: bya'i tshogs du mas bsten pa gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:367b-23: drang srong lnga brgya'i gtso bo drang srong zhig gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368a-0: ji tsam na drang srong gzhan zhig ljongs @368a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368a-1: rgyu zhing song ba na bsti gnas der phyin na drang srong des de la bkur sti legs par ma byas pas de mi bzod pa skyes nas de'i 'khor 'byed par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368a-2: drang srong sdig pa 'dod pa 'di cung zad kyang mi shes na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368a-4: tshur kho bo dang lhan cig 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368a-5: kho bos khyed rnams mngon par shes pa lnga rnams la rab tu dgod do zhes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368a-6: des de rnams phye bas drang srong de'i gdams ngag nyan du mi btub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368a-8: sdig pa byed pa 'dis bdag gi drang srong 'di rnams phye'o snyam nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368a-9: des de la bzhams te smra bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368a-10: tshe dang ldan pa 'khor 'byed par ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368a-11: 'di ni drang srong gi chos ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368a-13: 'dug tu ma btub nas drang srong de yid mi bde zhing thabs shig sems shing gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368a-14: sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368a-15: 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368a-16: ngan pa la snying brtse ba can pas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu rnams 'byung bar 'gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368a-17: de nas rang sangs rgyas zhig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368a-18: drang srong de'i bsti gnas su phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368a-19: drang srong des de'i lus mdzes pa dang spyod lam zhi ba mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368a-20: mthong nas des de la dad pa bskyed nas des de la bya ba byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368a-21: smon lam log par btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368b-0: drang srong sdig pa can gang yin pa 'dis bdag gis 'khor phye bas bdag gis @368b 'di shes bya thams cad la dbang thob na yang 'khor 'byed pa byed par gyur cig ces byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368b-1: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368b-2: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ljongs kyi drang srong gang gis de'i 'khor phye ba de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368b-3: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi gnyug mar gnas pa'i drang srong gang yin pa de ni lhas byin yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368b-4: ngas de'i 'khor phye ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa des na smon lam log par btab nas 'dis nga'i dge 'dun phye ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368b-5: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig pu gnag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368b-6: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368b-7: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368b-8: btsun pa lha sbyin gyis phyi pa dag ni nang par bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368b-9: nang pa dag ni phyi bar bgyis pas 'khor phrogs pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368b-11: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368b-12: ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis phyi pa dag ni nang par byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368b-13: nang ba dag ni phyi par byas pas 'khor phrogs pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368b-14: dge slong dag sngon byung ba phyogs shig na srog chags wa zhig gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368b-15: de shin tu brkam chags can zhig pas dgon par yang rgyu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368b-17: de mthar gyis rgyu ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:368b-18: rim gyis btso blag mkhan zhig gi khyim du zhugs pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369a-0: ram gyi rdza mar lhung nas de skyug @369a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369a-2: de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba na tshar go'i phung po zhig 'dug pa de la nyal nas glos 'gres pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369a-3: de bas kyang lhag par lus ma rung bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369a-4: chu'i nang du zhugs nas langs te song ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369a-5: nyi ma'i zer gyis phog pas nor bu gzi'i kha dog lta bur gyur pa ci tsam na wa rnams kyis mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369a-6: de rnams phyogs phyogs su bros te rgyang ring por 'khod nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369a-10: kho bo ni brgyar 'gro'o zhes bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369a-11: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi rgyal por dbang bskur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369a-13: 'di'i lus kyi kha dog sngon ma mthong ba las na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369a-14: gdon mi za bar de kho na yin no snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369a-15: wa rnams kyis rkang bzhi pa thams cad la rig par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369a-16: seng ge rnams kyis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369a-17: bdag cag las khyad par du 'phags pa su zhig yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369a-18: de rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi rgyal por 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369a-20: rang gi tshogs kyi dpon po la rig par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369a-21: de rnams kyi tshogs kyi dpon po ral pa can zhig ri'i phyogs zhig na gnas pa de la de rnams kyis smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369a-22: des rkang bzhi pa gzhan zhig la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369a-23: song la rkang bzhi pa'i dpon de rkang bzhi pa 'ga' zhig gis mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369a-25: de de'i drung du song ste brtags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-0: sngon ma mthong ba yin zhing seng ge rnams ma gtogs par rkang @369b bzhi pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-1: de de'i drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-2: ji ltar mthong bdag smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-3: des thos nas seng ge'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te de'i drung du dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-4: de ni rkang zhing pa du mas yongs su bskor cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-5: glang po che la zhon nas rgyu ba na de seng ge rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-7: de rnams kyi phyi rim rgyang ring po nas ni wa rnams 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-8: de'i ma ri sul zhig na gnas pa de la des wa zhig mngags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-9: bus rgyal srid nyams su myong gis tshur spyon cig ces spring pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-13: de'i 'khor nang pa ni seng ge dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-15: glang po che dag yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-16: phyi pa ni bdag cag nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-18: ma rung zin gyis song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-19: des tshigs su bcad pas kyang smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-20: bdag ni ri 'di'i sul na bder gnas shing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-21: bsil ba'i chu la bsod snyoms 'thung bar byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-22: de ni ji srid wa sgra mi grag pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-23: de srid glang po che yis bder 'gro 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-24: de song ste des wa rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-25: rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi rgyal po 'di ni wa kho na yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-26: bdag gis de'i ma ri sul ga ge mo zhes bya ba na 'dug pa mthong ngo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-28: gal te de lta na de wa yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:369b-29: ma yin pa wa bdag cag gis brtag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370a-0: chos nyid kyis wa rnams ni gang zhig gis wa skad thos nas skad ma phyung na de'i spu rnams 'byi bar 'gyur @370a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370a-2: wa skad dbyung bar brtsams nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370a-3: gal te bdag gis skad ma byung na ni gdon mi za bar bdag gi spu rnams 'byi bar 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370a-4: gal te glang po tshe las babs nas skad phyung na ni 'dis bdag gsod du 'ong gi 'di nyid du skad dbyung ngo snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370a-5: des glang po che la zhon bzhin du skad dbyung bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370a-7: wa bdag la zhon nam zhes des de bor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370a-9: was tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370a-10: gang dag nang pa phyi pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370a-11: phyi pa nang par byed de dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370a-13: glang po che yis wa bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370a-14: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370a-15: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370a-17: de na yang 'dis nang pa dag ni phyi rol par byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370a-18: phyi rol pa dag ni nang par byas pas tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370a-19: da ltar yang 'dis nang pa dag ni phyi rol par byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370a-20: phyi rol pa dag ni nang par byas pas 'khor rnams phrogs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370a-21: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370a-22: mo'u dga' [*dgal] gyi bu gnyis kyis lha sbyin gyi 'khor phrogs pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370a-23: lha sbyin gyis ko ka li ka dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370a-24: khan da dra ba bya la khyed gnyis kyis nga'i 'khor 'phrog tu bcug go zhes brdegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370a-25: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370a-26: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-0: btsun pa lha sbyin gyi @370b 'khor ni gzhan gyis phrogs la gzhan la 'dis sdug bsngal bskyed pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-2: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-3: de ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di'i chung ma gzhan gyis phrogs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-4: gzhan dag la tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal bskyed pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-5: dge slong dag sngon byung ba phyogs gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-6: glang po che'i tshogs shig gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-7: de na glang po che zhig pa lang mo zhig la sdug par 'dzin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-8: de ni glang po che'i phru gu gzhan zhig yod pa la lhag par chags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-9: des glang po che'i phru gu de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-10: tshor du 'ong gis bdag cag 'bros sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-11: de nas glang po che'i phru gu des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-12: gang gis na bdag cag 'bros pa'i thabs ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-14: bdag gis thabs shes so zhes des glang po che de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-15: khrus bya ba'i phyir rdzing du 'jug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-18: bdag cag las su yun ring du nub par 'dug pa blta'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-19: blun po'i phung po can de dang lhan cig chu nang du nub par 'dug pa na de langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-20: glang po che'i phru gu dang lhan cig bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-21: glang po che ring zhig 'dug nas langs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-22: mi snang nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-23: bdag pham par 'gyur du 'ong gis slar yang nub par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-24: des slar yang nub par byas nas mche ba sa la btsugs te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:370b-25: de ring zhig lon nas dbugs do chad de langs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-1: po che mo de ma mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-2: des rdzing bu de phan tshun du dkrug par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-3: des der nya dang ru sbal dang sbal pa la sogs pa srog chags mang po tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-4: lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-5: kye ma'o sha yi phung po che //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-6: 'di la shes rab yod ma yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-7: gzhan gyis chung ma phrogs gyur na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-8: gzhan la sdug bsngal sten par byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-9: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-10: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang po che dam pa gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-11: de na yang chung ma gzhan gyis phrogs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-12: gzhan la tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-13: da ltar yang 'khor gzhan gyis phrogs la gzhan la tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-15: glags dang mthong ba nyid dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-16: autpal mdog ni bsad pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-17: ril ba dang gsum 'o ma dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-18: sa 'tsho ma dang bzod gsol dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-19: glang dang sems pa nyid dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-20: bya dang tha ma bzhi yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-21: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-22: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-23: btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-24: mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis kyis lha sbyin la glags btsal ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371a-27: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371b-0: ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang @371b sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:371b-1: mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis kyis lha sbyin la glags btsal ba las glags rnyed pa de nyon cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:411b-22: rnam par dvang ba zhig yod pa der /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:411b-23: skyes bu mig dang ldan pa zhig 'gram du 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:411b-29: dung rnams mthong ba de bzhin du /
