K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:412b-13: nongs pa la nongs par gzung du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:412b-14: rgyal po chen po nyes pa la nyes par khyod kyis khong du chud pa ni bden te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:412b-15: 'di ltar khyod sdig pa'i grogs po'i grogs can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:412b-16: sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du song ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:412b-17: sdig pa'i grogs po'i zin pas pha chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po chen po bsad pa ni byis pa ji lta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:412b-18: blun po ji lta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:412b-19: mi gsal ba ji lta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:412b-20: mi mkhas pa ji lta ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:412b-21: rgyal po chen po khyod kyis 'di ltar nyes pa shes shing mthong la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:412b-22: de mthong nas kyang bshags nas phyis sdom par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:412b-23: dge ba'i chos rnams mi nyams shing 'phel ba nyid du 'dod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413a-0: rgyal po chen po gang 'ga' zhig nyes pa shes @413a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413a-2: de mthong nas kyang bshags nas phyis sdom par byed na de'i dge ba'i chos rnams mi nyams shing 'phel ba nyid du 'dod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413a-3: rgyal po chen po de bzhin du khyod kyis 'di ltar nyes pa shes shing nyes pa mthong la de mthong nas kyang bshags nas phyis sdom par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413a-4: khyod kyi dge ba'i chos rnams mi nyams shing 'phel ba nyid du 'dod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das la lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413a-6: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413a-8: de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413a-10: rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra song nas ring po ma lon par thugs su chud nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413b-0: dge slong dag lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dha'i @413b rgyal po ma skyes dgra rma byung zhing nyams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413b-1: sdig pa'i grogs po'i grogs can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413b-2: sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du song ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413b-3: sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pa des pha chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po chos la gnas pa rgyal po chen po bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413b-4: dge slong dag gal te lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras pha chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po chos la gnas pa rgyal po chen po bsad par ma gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413b-5: stan 'di nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413b-9: lam mngon du byas par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas 'di yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413b-10: dge slong dag lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra ni de ltar rma byung zhing de ltar nyams par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413b-11: dge slong dag de lta bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413b-13: gang sdong du ma tshig pa la yang ngan sems mi bskyed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413b-14: rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lta smos kyang ci dgos kyis dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413b-15: de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413b-17: nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413b-19: bcom ldan 'das la gdugs tshod gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:413b-20: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414a-1: par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414a-5: dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414a-6: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414a-7: lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414a-8: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414a-9: de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras sangs rgyas la sogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414a-10: dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414a-11: rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414a-13: lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414a-14: stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i sbyin pa la rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang bar mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414a-17: sbyin sreg mchod sbyin rnams kyi mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414a-18: sdeb sbyor mchog ni nyi ma'i lha //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414a-19: mi yi mchog ni rgyal po ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414b-0: rgya mtsho chu bo rnams kyi @414b mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414b-1: zla ba rgyu skar rnams kyi gtso //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414b-2: nyi ma snang byed rnams kyi gtso //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414b-3: steng dang 'og dang thad kar yar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414b-5: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414b-6: smra ba'i mchog ni rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414b-7: de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414b-8: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414b-9: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414b-10: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414b-11: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414b-14: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414b-15: gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414b-16: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra gzhi med pa'i dad pa la bzhag pa de'i tshe gal te khang bzang gi steng ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414b-17: glang po che la zhon pa las bcom ldan 'das mthong na yang de'i tshe bdag nyid mchong bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414b-18: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na glang po che la zhon pas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas des bdag nyid mchongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414b-21: nang mi rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414b-22: shes ldan dag shes par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414b-23: deng phan chad nga bcom ldan 'das dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:414b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos la skyabs su song gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415a-0: de lta bas na deng phan chad bcom ldan 'das kyi @415a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415a-4: dge bsnyen ma rnams la sgo ma dgag cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415a-6: lhas byin gyi nyan thos rnams la sgo khog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415a-7: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na lhas byin rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa dang sgo bas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415a-8: nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415a-10: deng phan chad nga bcom ldan 'das dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos la skyabs su song gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415a-12: de lta bas na deng phan chad bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415a-15: dge bsnyen ma rnams la sgo ma dgag cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415a-17: lhas byin gyi nyan thos rnams la ni sgo khog cig ces byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415a-18: de yang sgo na sdod cing 'dug pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415a-19: dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog bsod snyoms blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415a-20: rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyir byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415a-21: lhas byin 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415a-22: 'di ni dge sbyong mgo reg mo 'di'i las yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415a-23: 'dis rgyal po ma skyes dgra nang mi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415a-24: gzhon nu dang blon po dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415a-25: bdag tu dbyen byas pas de na bdag 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su gyur to snyam du bsams nas autpa la'i mdog la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415a-26: khyod la kho bos nyes pa ci byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415b-0: gang gi phyir khyod kyis kho bo bsod snyoms kyi khyim las ring du byas zhes des de gsod @415b par brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415b-2: de snying rje rje skad du tshig re re nas dal gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415b-4: ci bdag re zhig khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi mched sh'akya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba la de ltar bgyid dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415b-5: bdag gis de ltar ma bgyis kyis bzod pa mdzod cig ces de skad smras kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415b-6: lhas byin gyi de'i mgo bor khu tshur gyis bsnun to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415b-7: de gnad kyi tshor bas nyen te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415b-8: srog gi 'du byed byin gyis brlabs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415b-9: tshe'i 'du byed btang nas brtson 'grus la gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415b-10: dge slong ma'i dbyar khang du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415b-11: dge slong ma rnams kyis de lta bu de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415b-15: 'dus byas thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415b-16: chos thams cad ni bdag med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415b-17: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba yin pas khyed cag dge ba'i chos rnams la bag yod par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415b-18: lhas byin gyis mtshams med pa gsum pa byas kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes de nas des dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi mdun du cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415b-19: phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415b-20: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:415b-21: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-0: btsun pa lhas byin gyis dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog snying rje rje skad du smres bzhin @416a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-1: du khu tshur gyis bsnun te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-4: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-5: ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis 'di snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don bzhin du bsad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-6: sha zos pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-7: dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri bor zhig na khyim bdag cig gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-8: de'i lug rdzis lug gi khyu de bskyang ba'i phyir grong khyer nas phyi rol tu phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-9: de nas bskyangs nas nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyi tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-10: ri bor du bda' bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-11: de na lug ma rgan zhig phyi nas 'brang zhing song ba de spyang kis bzung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-14: zhang zhang re lta bder gyur tam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-15: zhang zhang nyag cig dgon pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-16: ji ga bde ba ltar lags sam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-18: kho bo'i mjug ma brdzis nas su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-19: mjug ma'i spu yang phyis nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-20: zhang po zhes pa'i tshig smras pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-21: lug khyod thar bar re'am ci //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-22: lug ma mos yang smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-23: khyod kyi mjug ma phongs na yod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-24: bdag ni mdun nas 'ongs gyur na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-25: ji lta bu yi thabs shig gis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-26: bdag gis mjug ma brdzis par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-28: gling bzhi pa 'di rgya mtshor bcas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-29: ri bor bcas pa thams cad na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-30: bdag gi mjug ma yod yin na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-31: khyod ni gang nas 'ongs pa zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416a-33: bzang po khyod kyis mjug ma ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-0: thams cad na ni mchis @416b so zhes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-1: bdag gis gnyen las sngon thos nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-2: nam mkha' las ni mchis lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-4: ma rgan khyod nyid de ring ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-5: nam mkha' las ni 'ongs nas su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-6: bdag gi bza' skal gang yin pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-7: bdag gi ri dvags tshogs de bskrogs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-8: de ni de skad smra bzhin du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-9: sdig pa'i las can gyis mchongs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-10: lug gi mgo bo bcad nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-11: bsad de sha yang zos par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-12: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-13: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi spyang ki gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-14: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi lug ma rgan gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-15: dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-16: de na yang 'di snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don bzhin du bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-17: da ltar yang 'di snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don bzhin du bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-18: de nas lhas byin 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-19: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la pha rol gnon pa mang du byas shing mtshams med pa yang gsum du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-20: bcom ldan 'das la rdo 'phangs nas khrag phyung ba 'di ni mtshams med pa dang po yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-21: dge 'dun phye ba ni gnyis pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-22: autpa la'i mdog bsad pa 'di ni gsum pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-23: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma thob la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-24: gzhan yang dgos pa cung zad kyang ma grub ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:416b-26: sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417a-1: 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417a-2: ji tsam na rdzogs byed de'i drung du phyin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417a-3: lhas byin ci'i phyir lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417a-5: gang gis na bdag zhe sdang gi dbang du song bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417a-6: bcom ldan 'das la pha rol gnon pa mang du byas shing mtshams med pa'i las gsum byas pas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por yun ring du gnas par 'gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417a-7: bdag ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing mi 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417a-9: bdag gis sh'akya rnams kyi nang na khyod 'ba' zhig mkhas pa yin no snyam du shes na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417a-11: gang gis na khyod 'di ltar sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa'i 'jig rten pha rol ga la yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417a-12: gal te 'jig rten pha rol yod na khyod kyis las 'di 'dra ba byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417a-13: khyod kyi phyir kho bo yang sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417a-14: de yid ches par bya ba'i phyir des de'i mdun du ril ba bcag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417a-15: re zhig lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'dir slar 'byor par byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417a-18: byed du 'jug pa po ni 'ga' yang med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417a-19: de lta mod kyi song la ser skya'i gzhir son nas rgyal srid byos shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417a-20: bdag gis khyod kyis blon po'i mchog bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417b-0: de na lhas byin 'phags pa la skur pa @417b 'debs pa'i log pa'i lta ba thob ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417b-1: des na thams cad kyi thams cad du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chad par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417b-3: dge slong dag lhas byin gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bcad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417b-4: dge slong dag ngas ji srid lhas byin la dkar po'i chos gzigs pa de'i bar du ngas 'di ltar lhas byin ngan song sems can dmyal bar bskal par gnas pas gsor mi rung ba'o zhes lhas byin lung ma bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417b-6: grong rdal dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na phyis khung zabs su mi gang lhag tsam zhig yod pa der mi 'ga' zhig mgo dang lag pa dang rkang pa dang bcas par nub par gyur pa de la mi yun ring por don du 'dod pa phan par 'dod pa bde bar 'dod pa grub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417b-7: bde ba la reg par 'dod pa 'ga' zhig song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417b-8: des phyis khung de'i nye 'khor kun tu bskor zhing song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417b-9: mi de'i phyir sas ma reg pa'i phyogs 'ga' zhig rnyed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417b-10: 'di de nas bzung ste dbyung bar bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:417b-11: des de'i nye 'khor kun tu bskor te song na mi de la des bzung ste dbyung ba'i phyogs chung ngu na lag mthil tsam yang mi gtsang bas ma reg pa cung zad kyang med pa de bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418a-0: dge slong dag ngas ji srid lhas byin la dkar po'i chos gang skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang gzigs pa de'i bar du ni ngas 'di ltar lhas byin ngan song sems can dmyal bar bskal par gnas @418a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418a-1: pas gsor mi rung ba'o zhes lhas byin lung ma bstan gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418a-2: ngas gang nas lhas byin la dkar po'i chos la chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i shas tsam yang ma gzigs pa de nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418a-3: ngas 'di ltar lhas byin ngan song sems can dmyal bar bskal par gnas pas gsor mi rung ba'o zhes lhas byin lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418a-4: dge slong dag lhas byin sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos gsum dang ldan pas ngan song sems can dmyal bar bskal par gnas pas gsor mi rung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418a-5: dge slong dag gsum gang zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418a-6: thog ma nyid nas lhas byin sdig pa 'dod par gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418a-7: sdig pa 'dod pa'i dbang du gyur pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418a-8: gang lhas byin thog ma nyid nas sdig pa 'dod par gyur cing sdig pa 'dod pa'i dbang du gyur pa dam pa ma yin pa'i chos dang po 'di dang ldan pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418a-9: lhas byin ngan song sems can dmyal bar bskal par gnas pas gsor mi rung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418a-10: dge slong dag gzhan yang lhas byin sdig pa'i bshes gnyen can sdig pa'i grogs can sdig pa dang sdong pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418a-11: gang lhas byin thog ma nyid nas sdig pa'i bshes gnyen can sdig pa'i grogs can sdig pa dang sdong pa dam pa ma yin pa'i chos gnyis pa 'di dang ldan pas lhas byin ngan song sems can dmyal bar bskal par gnas pas gsor mi rung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-0: gzhan yang lhas byin khyad par ngan ngon cung zad tsam zhig @418b rtogs nas gong du bya ba yod bzhin du bar du sgyid lug par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-1: gang lhas byin gyis khyad par ngan ngon cung zad rtogs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-2: gong du bya ba yod bzhin du bar du sgyid lug pa dam pa ma yin pa'i chos gsum pa 'di dang ldan pas lhas byin ngan song sems can dmyal bar bskal par gnas pas gsor mi rung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-4: bde bar gshegs pas de skad ces gsungs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-5: ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-8: des na sdig pa 'dod rnams kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-9: 'gro ba gang yin shes par gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-10: lhas byin mkhas par kun grags shing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-11: bsgoms pa yid ni bdag nyid du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-12: bkur cing dpal gyis shin tu ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-13: mdzes par rnam par grags yin na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-14: de ni bag med dang ldan 'dir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-15: de bzhin gshegs la khyad bsad pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-16: rdzogs sangs rgyas ni rab mkhyen pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-17: bskal par gnas par de lung bstan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-18: 'jungs shing sdig pa'i kun rtog can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-19: log par lta ba ma gus pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-20: sgo bzhi par ni shes pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-21: mnar med dmyal ba de thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-22: gnod pa med cing sdig pa'i las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-23: mi mdzad pa la gang 'khu ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-24: 'jig rten di dang pha rol tu 'ang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-25: sdig pa de nyid reg par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-26: gang zhig dug gi bum pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:418b-27: rgya mtsho ma rung byed 'dod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419a-2: de yis de sun mi phyin ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419a-3: gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419a-5: yang dag gzigs pa zhi ba'i thugs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419a-6: gang la phyar kas mi rdzi ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419a-7: de 'dra ba ni bshes gnyen bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419a-8: de ni mkhas pas bsten bya ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419a-9: de lta bu la bsten byas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419a-12: dge slong de dag yi rangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419a-14: de nas lhas byin 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa'i log pa'i lta ba dang ldan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419a-15: dge ba'i rtsa ba chad pa 'jig rten pha rol med do snyam pa'i nges pa thob nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419a-16: nyan thos rnams la gzhi lngas chos ston par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419a-17: shes ldan dag dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni zho dang 'o ma la longs spyod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419a-18: deng phyin chad bdag cag gis longs spyod par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419a-20: gzhi de las be'u rnams la gnod par 'gyur bas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419a-21: dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni sha la longs spyod par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419a-22: bdag cag gis longs spyod par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419a-24: gzhi de las srog chags dag gsod par 'gyur bas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419a-25: dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni lan tshva la longs spyod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419a-26: bdag cag gis longs spyod par mi bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419b-0: rdul khrod nas byung ba'i phyir @419b ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419b-1: dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni ras kha tshar bcad pa dag gyon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419b-2: bdag cag gis ras khar tshar ring po dag bgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419b-4: gzhi de las tha ga pa rnams kyi skyes bu'i rtsal don med par 'gyur bas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419b-5: dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni dgon pa na gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419b-6: bdag cag grong du gnas par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419b-8: gzhi de las mi rnams kyi sbyin pa'i chos la longs ma spyad par 'gyur bas so zhes chos 'chad par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419b-10: 'o ma sha dang lan tshva dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419b-11: gos dang dgon par gnas pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419b-12: ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419b-13: mnyan yod du byon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419b-15: bdag gis dge sbyong go'u ta ma la gnod pa ni mang po zhig byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419b-16: dge sbyong go'u ta ma bsad par ma nus kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419b-17: song la de'i chung ma dbrog par bya'o zhes spring pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419b-18: de ser skya'i gzhir song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419b-20: dge sbyong go'u ta ma rab tu byung nas khyod kyi phyir bdag 'ongs kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419b-21: bdag dang khyod du lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o zhes spring pa des sa 'tsho ma la bzlas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419b-23: khyod kyis 'di skad ces byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag cag gis lag pa nas 'dzin par spro na gal te khyod kyang spro na tshur shog cig ces spring zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:419b-24: des de la springs nas de ngo tsha med pas pho brang du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420a-2: des 'dzum pas thal mo sbyar ba brtsams shing de ni tshan po che'i stobs can yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420a-3: de'i lag pa g-yon pas de'i sor mo bsdams pas khrag 'dzag par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420a-4: de nas de byang chub sems dpa'i rol ba'i rdzing du bor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420a-5: de bor ba na khus btab pa sh'akya rnams kyis thos nas lhas byin byang chub sems dpa'i pho brang du zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420a-6: btsun mo rnams 'phrog go zhes rgyug pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420a-7: de rnams kyi de rol pa'i rdzing du bor ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420a-8: de rnams kyis gros bya bar brtsams pa 'di bsad dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420a-10: shi zin pa 'di bsad de ci rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar lhas byin ngan song sems can dmyal bar bskal par gnas te gsor mi rung ba'o zhes 'di lung bstan pa nyid do zhes de rnams kyi bskrad pa dang stor khur nas byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420a-12: bros pa las de'i gos ral te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420a-13: dum bu gnyis su gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420a-15: 'di ni legs kyis bdag gi nyan thos rnams la bskon no snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420a-16: des dus gzhan zhig na sh'akya rnams bsdus te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420a-17: bdag rgyal srid la zhog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mo yod kyis de re zhig bdag gir byos la de nas phyis rgyal srid kyis shig ces de skad smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420b-0: lhas byin sh'akya rnams kyi dogs pa dang bral nas khang @420b bzang gi steng du 'dzegs te grags 'dzin ma'i drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420b-1: thal mo sbyar te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420b-2: khyod kyis bka' stsal pa nyan gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420b-4: bdag gi btsun mo'i dam par bgyis la ser skya'i gzhi la rgyal srid bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420b-5: grags 'dzin ma ni rab gnon chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420b-6: de khri bzang po las langs nas lag pa gnyis nas bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420b-8: de'i lag pa gnyis nas khrag 'dzag par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420b-9: de sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420b-11: khyod ni ngo tsha med cing blun po yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420b-12: khyod kho mos lag pa nas bzung ba gang yin pa'ang bzod par mi nus par kho mo 'dod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420b-13: kho mo'i khyim thab tu ni 'khor los sgyur ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420b-14: byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro zhes des spyos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420b-15: de nas pho brang nang nas byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420b-17: song la bcom ldan 'das la bzod par gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420b-18: gal te khyod la bcom ldan 'das kyis bzod pa gnang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420b-19: de'i 'og tu rgyal srid byas so cog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420b-20: des be'u yi lte ba lta bu zhes bya ba'i dug mchog tu rno bas sen mo'i gseb bkang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420b-21: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la gal te dge sbyong go'u ta mas bzod par byas na de lta na legs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420b-22: gal te bzod pa ma byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:420b-23: de nyid du de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas sen mo bkang pa'i dug gis rkang pa gnyis bskur bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421a-2: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421a-3: bcom ldan 'das bzod par gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421a-5: 'di ci 'dra ba'i sems kyis nga'i spyan sngar 'ongs snyam na de bsad pa'i sems kyis yin par gzigs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs kyi mthil nas zhabs kyi pus mo'i lha nga man chad shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421a-7: des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la sen mos rmad byung bar brtsams pa las de'i sen mo chag nas de skyengs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421a-10: gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs 'gro ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421a-12: zhes gsungs pas khyod la skyabs su mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421a-13: gal te ngan 'gror mchi bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421a-14: khyod kyi de brdzun lags par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421a-15: shin tu drag po'i las yongs su rdzogs par byas pa rnams la ni lus zhig pa la mi sdod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421a-16: de gson po nyid du mnar med pa'i me 'bar bas kun nas yog nas kun dga' bo tshig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421a-17: kun dga' bo bsregs so zhes du bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421a-18: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rang gi skye bo la mnyes gshin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421a-20: byams pa'i bdag nyid can des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421a-21: lhas byin tshur de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la skyabs su song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421b-0: @421b de sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421b-1: las kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421b-2: bsam pa thag pa nas sems bskyed cing tshig tu yang smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421b-3: bdag rus pa'i khong nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421b-5: rang gi las kyis mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421b-7: dge slong dag lhas byin gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshams sbyar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421b-8: mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por bskal par gnas nas rang byang chub mngon sum du byas par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421b-9: rang sangs rgyas rus pa can zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421b-10: de mngon par byang chub ma thag tu bsod snyoms la song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421b-11: de mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421b-12: lag pa 'khru zhing sems pa la zhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421b-13: bdag ci'i phyir yun ring por 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur snyam pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421b-14: des bsams na bdag gis tshe rabs tshe rabs su bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421b-15: thams cad mkhyen pa shes bya la mnga' brnyes pa la yang pha rol gnon pa byas la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421b-16: de yang rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i phyir yin par shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421b-17: des bsod snyoms de yang longs ma spyad par steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te bar ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:421b-20: glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422a-1: dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422a-2: mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis kyi kun tu spyod pa ni dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu zhing 'gro ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422a-3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422a-4: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis lhas byin rang byang chub tu lung bstan gyis tshur bdag cag mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen po'i nang du dong la lhas byin spro bsring ngo zhes de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422a-6: mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po'i nang du dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422a-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422a-8: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po sems can dmyal ba rnams la som zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422a-9: de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422a-10: char pa'i rgyun gtun shing tsam 'bab pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422a-11: chu de mnar med pa'i me lce rnams kyi bar du bskams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422a-12: de bzhin du gnya' shing dang shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char rgyun dag dbab par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422a-13: chu de 'ang bar du bskams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422a-14: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422a-15: mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422a-16: dmyal ba de thams cad chus bkang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422b-0: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen @422b pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422b-1: lhas byin gang yin pa de tshur shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422b-2: lhas byin brgya stong phrag du ma 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422b-3: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung lhas byin gang yin pa de tshur shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422b-5: de nas lhas byin tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422b-6: mo'u dgal gyi bu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422b-7: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422b-8: mo'u dgal gyi bu'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422b-10: khyod la gnod pa'i khyad par cung zad yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422b-12: re zhig mnar med pa'i sems can rnams kyi spyi mthun gang yin pa de lta zhog gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422b-13: bdag la gang zag pa lhag pa mchis pa gang lags pa de gson cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422b-16: me lce gcig tu gyur pa dag mchis nas bdag la til bzhin du 'thag par bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422b-17: sog le phyogs gnyi ga na so mchis pas yan lag dang nying lag rnams 'thub par bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422b-18: lcags kyi tho ba 'bar rab tu 'bar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422b-20: me lce gcig tu gyur pa dag gis myur ba myur bar mgo phye mar rlog par bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422b-21: phyogs bzhi nas glang po che dag mchis nas de rnams kyis bdag 'bras phye bzhin du thag par bgyid do; ;tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422b-22: lhas byin khyod kyis lcags kyi ri 'bar rab tu 'bar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:422b-24: me lce gcig tu gyur pa dag 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423a-0: @423a *// khyod la til bzhin 'thag par byed do zhes smras pa gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar khyod kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423a-1: bcom ldan 'das dgrongs pa'i phyir ri bya rgod kyi phung po las rdo 'phangs pa de'i las kyi 'bras bu yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423a-2: sog le phyogs gnyis na so yod pa 'bar rab tu 'bar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423a-4: me lce gcig tu gyur pa dag gis yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'thub par byed do zhes smras pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423a-5: 'di ltar khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phye ba de'i las kyi 'bras bu yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423a-6: lcags kyi tho ba 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423a-7: me lce gcig tu gyur pa rnams kyis myur ba myur bar klad pa phye mar rlog go zhes smras pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423a-8: 'di ltar khyod kyis dge slong ma dgra bcom pa autpa la'i mdog khu tshur gyis bsnun te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423a-9: bsad pa de'i las kyi 'bras bu yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423a-10: phyogs bzhi nas glang po che rnams lhags te de rnams kyis bdag 'bras phye bzhin du 'thag par byed do zhes smras pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423a-11: 'di ltar khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das dgrongs pa'i phyir glang po 'che'i dam pa nor skyong sbad pa de'i las kyi 'bras bu yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423a-12: de lta mod kyi khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423a-13: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu ci zhig tu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423b-0: dge slong dag lhas byin gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba @423b mtshams sbyar bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423b-1: mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por bskal par gnas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423b-2: rang sangs rgyas rus pa can zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423b-4: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu gal te de lta na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423b-5: bdag blo gcig pus mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por gnas par yang bzod do ///
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423b-7: bam po brgya dgu pa ste tha ma'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423b-8: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423b-9: mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis ko ka li ka la sogs pa gang na ba der dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423b-10: ji tsam na ko ka li ka'i lce thong gshol brgyas rmod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423b-11: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas ko ka li ka la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423b-12: ko ka li ka dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423b-13: mo'u dgal gyi bu des pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423b-14: 'o byams pa dag la sems dad pa skyed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423b-15: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423b-16: ko ka li kas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423b-17: mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423b-18: sdig pa can 'di gnyis 'dir yang 'ongs pa lta zhes tshig tu smras ma thag tu ko ka li ka'i lce la thong gshol stong gis rmed par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423b-19: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyis bu gnyis kyis 'di dag la ci byar yang med do snyam nas slar log ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:423b-20: 'od srung rdzogs byed gang na ba der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424a-0: de nas 'od srung rdzogs byed kyis tshe dang ldan @424a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424a-2: mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis kyi rkang pa la gtugs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424a-3: 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu bdag gis chos log par bshad pas skye ba'i tshogs bslus pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas bdag gi lce la thong gshol lnga brgyas rmed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424a-4: slob ma rnams kyis ji lta ji ltar bdag gi mchod pa la bgyi ba bgyid pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424a-5: de lta de ltar bdag gis ches mi bzad pa'i tshor ba nyams su myong lags kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424a-6: bdag gi gnas skabs de dag la rig par bgyis nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424a-7: de'i mchod pa la bya ba ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424a-9: de bzhin du bya'o zhes khas blangs nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424a-10: mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis kyis dmyal bar brgyus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424a-11: rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin nas de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424a-12: skye bo'i tshogs la lhas byin dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424a-14: rdzogs byed la sogs pa sems can dmyal bar skyes pa rnams kyi gnas skabs rgyas par bsnyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424a-15: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424a-16: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424a-17: btsun pa lhas byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424a-18: bka' ma lags par bgyis bas mnar ma mchis pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung ba la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' @424b stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424b-1: dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424b-2: ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis nga'i tshig ma yin par byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424b-3: tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424b-4: dge slong dag sngon byung ba byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na ba lang rnams kyi nang du skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424b-6: de nub mo grong khyer nas byung nas rgyal po'i mon sran gre'u'i zhing la za /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424b-7: nyin par grong khyer na gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424b-8: ji tsam na de'i drung du bong bu zhig 'ongs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424b-9: zhang po khyod kyi khrag dang sha dang pags pa ni rgyas la; khyod rgyu ba ni lan 'ga' yang bdag gis ma mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424b-11: tsha bo bdag ni nub mo rgyal po'i mon sran gre'u'i zhing la za'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424b-13: zhang po bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424b-15: tsha bo khyod ni skad 'byin 'dod pas gnod par mi 'gyur grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424b-17: zhang po mi dbyung gis 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424b-18: de gnyis kyis rgyal po'i mon sran gre'u'i zhing gi 'greng rib rnams dral te zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424b-19: bong bus ji srid 'grangs pa de srid skad ma phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424b-21: zhang po re zhig glu zhig blang ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424b-23: kho bo ma song gi bar du yud tsam zhig sdod la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424b-24: de'i 'og tu ci dga' ba gyis shig ces smras nas bros pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:424b-25: bong bus skad phyung ba rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis thos nas bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:425a-0: shes ldan dag bong bu 'dis ni rgyal po'i @425a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:425a-1: mon sran gre'u'i zhing thams cad zos kyis chad pas gcad par bya'o zhes de rnams kyis rna ba bcad de mgul du gtun gcig gtags nas btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:425a-2: de phan tshun 'khyam pa khyu mchog gis mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:425a-3: des de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:425a-6: khyod kyi glu yis bdag gi yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:425a-7: rna ba de'u ni yal bar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:425a-8: tshig mi bsrung ba gang yin pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:425a-10: rna dum gtun gyis rnam brgyan pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:425a-11: da ni 'khyam par byed la rag /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:425b-29: 'on kyang de ldog tu ma btub nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429a-4: bu gal te de lta na 'dong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429a-5: kho bo nyid kyis blang bar bya'o zhes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429a-6: de de dang lhan cig shing las byas pa'i rma bya la zhon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429a-7: nyi ma gang la nges par byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429a-8: de nyid kyi nyi ma la ri bor der phyin pa 'jig rten gyis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429a-9: de nas bu mo blangs te slar yang 'khrul 'khor la zhon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429a-10: rang gi khyim du 'ongs nas 'khrul 'khor bsdus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429a-11: de'i ma la gtad nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429a-12: khyod kyi bu 'dis 'khrul 'khor 'gro ba'i sbyor ba shes kyi slar log pa mi shes kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429a-13: khyod kyis 'di la 'khrul 'khor mi sbyin cig ces bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429a-14: des yang nas yang du ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429a-15: yum 'khrul 'khor bdag la stsol cig dang skye bo'i tshogs dbang du bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429a-17: bu khyod kyi slob dpon na re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429a-18: 'dis 'khrul 'khor 'gro ba'i sbyor ba shes kyi slar log pa mi shes kyis ma sbyin cig zer bas tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429a-19: de bas na kho mos mi sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429a-21: yum bdag gis 'gro ba dang ldog pa 'tshal mod kyi slob dpon de phrag dog gis mi ster mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429a-22: bud med ni sems yang zhing 'dod chen che ba yin pas de de la byin nas 'khrul 'khor sbyar te zhon nas song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429a-23: skye bo'i tshogs chen po dga' bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429b-0: de nas @429b 'khrul 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis mthong nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429b-1: pha bi slar mi 'ong par song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429b-2: des ji lta ji ltar 'khrul 'khor bcus pa de lta de ltar shin tu thag ring por ldings nas ji tsam na rgya mtsho chen por lding pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429b-3: rgya mtsho chen po ni lhas rgyun du char 'babs pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429b-4: des sbyor kha rnams bangs nas tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429b-5: lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429b-6: gang zhig don 'dod brtse bas phan pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429b-7: ji skad bstan pa'i tshig ni mi 'dzin cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429b-8: 'chos pa med cing su'i tshig mi nyan gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429b-9: de ni shing las byas pa'i bya yis khyer //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429b-10: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429b-11: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi slob dpon gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429b-12: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi de'i slob ma gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429b-13: de na yang ngas phan par smras na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429b-14: nga'i tshig 'di ma mnyan pas tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429b-15: da ltar yang ngas phan par smras na nga'i tshig 'dis ma mnyan pas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-004-001:429b-19: dge 'dun mthun pa zhes bgyi na /
